name: 10th Regiment of Foot
ability_1_desc: If none of the 10th Regiment of Foot move this turn, add 1 die to their attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a melee attack from an adjacent figure, a Soldier in the 10th Regiment of Foot adds 1 to his defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When rolling attack dice against an adjacent figure, a Soldier in the 10th Regiment of Foot adds 1 to his attack dice. A Soldier in the 10th Regiment of Foot can only use Bayonet Attack if he moved at least one space this turn.

name: 4th Massachusetts Line
ability_1_desc: If none of the 4th Massachusetts Line move this turn, add 1 die to their attack.
ability_2_desc: Each Jandar army control has a valiant defense bonus. Each soldier in the 4th Massachusetts Line receives 1 additional defense die.

name: Abomination
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Abomination may Super Leap. Super Leap is a move of 10. When counting spaces for Abomination's Super Leap, ignore elevations. Abomination may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ramps. Abomination may not leap more than 50 spaces up or down in a single leap. If Abomination is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Abomination rolls a less attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Any figure adjacent to Abomination is affected by the Stomp Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Abomination may not use Stomp Special Attack on the same turn he uses Super Leap.

name: Acolarh
ability_1_title: Leaf of the Home Tree Aura
ability_1_desc: When any Elf you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Acolarh receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you may roll 10 Ullar Valkyrie dice before removing the figure. If you roll at least 3 Ullar symbols, ignore any wounds that figure just received. Acolarh's Leaf of the Home Tree Aura does not affect Acolarh.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures who follow Ullar and start their turn adjacent to Acolarh may move 2 additional spaces.

name: Acolarh
ability_1_title: Leaf of the Home Tree Aura
ability_1_desc: When any Elf you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Acolarh receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you may roll 10 Ullar Valkyrie dice before removing the figure. If you roll at least 3 Ullar symbols, ignore any wounds that figure just received. Acolarh's Leaf of the Home Tree Aura does not affect Acolarh.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures who follow Ullar and start their turn adjacent to Acolarh may move 2 additional spaces.

name: Knight Primus Adelbern
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may inflict one wound on a Small or Medium Squad figure or a Small or Medium Common Hero adjacent to Knight Primus Adelbern.

name: Admiral EJ-1M
ability_1_desc: After rolling for Initiative, you may move any Order Markers from this card onto any of your Pirate or Captain Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2 + Special. You may attack up to 4 times with Boarding Party Special Attack. Roll one additional attack die when attacking a figure engaged with a Pirate or Captain you control. After each attack, if that was the first time you attacked the defending figure this turn, you may move one Pirate or Captain figure you control up to 4 spaces. You may not move the same figure more than once in a turn using Boarding Party Special Attack.

name: Agent Carr
ability_1_desc: Before moving normally, you may choose a figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Agent Carr. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove 1 unrevealed Order Marker at random from the chosen figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Add 4 to Agent Carr's Attack Value when attacking an adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: Agent Carr is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Agent Carr
ability_1_desc: Agent Carr can move through all figures.
ability_2_desc: If Agent Carr is attacking an adjacent figure, add 4 to Agent Carr's attack.
ability_3_desc: Agent Carr can never be blocked during an engagement.

name: Agent Skahen
ability_1_desc: When Agent Skahen attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure, if Agent Skahen inflicts one or more wounds, you may move one Tricky figure you control whose Wydar and is within 8 clear sight spaces of Agent Skahen up to 4 spaces. You cannot use Cover Fire to move Agent Skahen.
ability_3_desc: When Agent Skahen rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: Jandar
ability_1_desc: When attacked at an Air Elemental, you may remove from the figure figures other than Air Elementals. Can move through an Air figure
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's small or medium-sized figure is within 2 spaces or an Air Elemental gains an additional 1 space of range when attacking that figure
ability_3_desc: Figures in the Fighting or the Flying space are not affected by the effects of this figure
ability_4_desc: If underfed and is power could figure gain Armor

name: Airborne Elite
ability_1_desc: Range 5, Line 12. Attack 4. This squad can attack with grenades in addition to normal attacks. Roll one die for each grenade marker to throw grenades in the target hex. Each grenade marker to throw grenades in the target hex. Choose a figure in the target hex and roll for damage against that figure. Roll die to determine the damage. Roll one die for each Airborne Elite figure on this squad to attack.
ability_2_desc: Airborne Elite do not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher you may place all 4 Airborne Elite figures on any empty spaces. You cannot place them adjacent to each other or other figures, or on glyphs.

name: Alastair MacDirk
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Alastair MacDirk, you may immediately take another turn with Alastair MacDirk and take another turn during a round. You may only use this power once during a round.

name: Ana Karithon
ability_1_desc: Range 4, Attack 4. Turn Undead Special Attack can be used to attack only Undead figures.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Ana Karithon add 1 to their defense dice when rolling defense against an attack from a figure who follows Utgar. Ana Karithon's Protection from Evil Aura does not affect Ana Karithon.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a wounded small or medium Hero figure you control that is adjacent to Ana Karithon, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-12, nothing happens. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove up to 2 wound markers from that Hero's Army Card.

name: Anubian Wolves
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11, choose an Anubian Wolf you control and destroy it. The attack value of this card is 1 if you roll 1-11 and 2 if you roll 12-20. If you roll a 12-15, add 3 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 16-19, add 4 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 20, add 5 to the attack value of this card.

name: Arkmer
ability_1_desc: When defending with Arkmer, add as many defense dice as the number of Elves you control adjacent to Arkmer.
ability_2_desc: Arkmer can make medium figure moves adjacent to Arkmer, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, this figure receives one wound. Engaged may be targeted only as they move into engagement with Arkmer.

name: Armoc Vipers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Armoc Vipers, you may first take a turn with any denoted you control on Jandar's Ulthé.
ability_2_desc: Armoc Vipers do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.

name: Arrow Gruts
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Arrow Gruts, you may first take a turn with any Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Arrow Gruts are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Ashigaru Harquebus
ability_1_desc: If none of the Ashigaru Harquebus move this turn, add 1 die to their attack.

name: Ashigaru Yari
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. If 3 Ashigaru Yari you control are adjacent to the same enemy figure, they may roll their attack dice as one combined attack. The defending figure compares height to the lowest Ashigaru Yari to determine any height advantage. If Encircle Special Attack is used, the 4th figure that moved this turn cannot attack.

name: Atlaga the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: All Kyrie you control, except Atlaga, move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Atlaga, you may choose any opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Atlaga. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-15, nothing happens. If you roll a 16 or higher, the chosen figure is destroyed. Atlaga may attempt to use this power only once per game.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Atlaga's movement, ignore elevations. Atlaga may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Atlaga starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Aubrien Archers
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Aubrien Archers, roll one die. On a result of 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Aubrien Archers.

name: Black Wyrmling
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with a Black Wyrmling, you may choose one small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of it. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1–10, nothing happens. If you roll an 11–15, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. If you roll a 16 or higher, the chosen figure receives 2 wounds.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Black Wyrmling Army Card, before taking that Black Wyrmling's turn, you may take a turn with one other Wyrmling you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Black Wyrmling's movement, ignore elevations. A Black Wyrmling may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Black Wyrmling is engaged when it starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Blade Gruts
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with this figure, you may take a turn with any Orc Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: Blade Gruts are never stopped when leaving an engagement.

name: Blastatrons
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with this squad, you may remove 1 of your Blastatrons you control. If you do, the 4 Blastatrons you control get +1 move this turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, add 1 attack to every Blastatron who follows Vylar that is adjacent to the defending figure.

name: Blue Wyrmling Aquilla
ability_1_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Fledgling Lightning Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Fledgling Lightning Breath Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Blue Wyrmling Army Card, before taking that Blue Wyrmling's turn, you may take a turn with one other Wyrmling you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Blue Wyrmling's movement, ignore elevations. A Blue Wyrmling may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Blue Wyrmling is engaged when it starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Bok-Bur-Na
ability_1_desc: Small and Medium figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Bok-Bur-Na reduce their Defense Value by 1 when attacked by a Captain or Pirate you control.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Bok-Bur-Na, you may attack an adjacent figure 1 additional time. Bok-Bur-Na's Attack Value is increased by 2 for the second attack.
ability_3_desc: When Bok-Bur-Na destroys an adjacent figure with a normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, remove one Wound Marker from Bok-Bur-Na. Bok-Bur-Na cannot use Utgar's Cutlass on destructible objects.

name: Spy Ranger
ability_1_desc: Can be played as a subclass. Skip 2 spaces instead of 1 space and can shoot during the same turn it is placed.
ability_2_desc: Each time Brandis Skyhunter destroys an opponent's non-adjacent Unique Hero, you may take another turn with Brandis Skyhunter.

name: Brave Arrow
ability_1_desc: While moving, Brave Arrow may add 2 to his move number. If he does, he cannot attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Scouts adjacent to Brave Arrow receive an additional attack die when attacking a figure adjacent to them.
ability_3_desc: If Brave Arrow is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Brave Arrow. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 10 or higher, ignore any wounds Brave Arrow just received.

name: Braxas
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Braxas. One at a time, roll a 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll an 8 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 17 or higher, destroy that Hero.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Braxas's movement, ignore elevations. Braxas may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Braxas starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Brunak
ability_1_desc: Brunak may carry 1 friendly Orc figure adjacent to him on this turn. That figure is placed in this square and does not take up a square.
ability_2_desc: Blood Hungry Special Attack. Brunak may use a Melee Attack. Brunak may continue attacking with Brunak as a free action. This attack will be done at normal dice rolls even if Brunak would normally roll fewer.
ability_3_desc: Brunak never takes any damage from Lava. Lava terrain does not slow Brunak in any way.

name: Bursting Hive Soldier
ability_1_desc: If a Bursting Hive Soldier receives enough wounds to be destroyed by a normal attack or leaving engagement attack, before destroying that Soldier, roll the 20-sided die once for each adjacent figure that is not a Skordyre. If you roll a 9 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: A Bursting Hive Soldier rolls 1 additional die when making a leaving engagement attack.

name: Captain America
ability_1_desc: Range 5, Attack 4. When Captain America attacks with his Shield Throw Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Captain America may add his attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Capuan Gladiators
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Capuan Gladiators, you may first take a turn with any Human Gladiator Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If all of your order markers are on Gladiator Army Cards, you may add 1 to your initiative roll for every order marker on the Capuan Gladiators' Army Card, up to a maximum of +3 for Initiative Advantage.

name: Chain Gruts
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Chain Gruts, you may first take a turn with a Champion on you control who is an Orc or who follows Volarak.
ability_2_desc: After rolling attack dice, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll 1 die that did not roll a skull.
ability_3_desc: Figures engaged with 1 or more Chain Gruts cannot make leaving engagement attacks against figures that are not Chain Gruts.

name: Chana the Zenithwing
ability_1_desc: If Chana the Zenithwing is within 5 clear sight spaces of a Wizard that you control, instead of attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you may remove one Wound Marker from a friendly Wizard or Beast adjacent to Chana.
ability_2_desc: Stealth Flying

name: Chardris
ability_1_desc: Range 6 Attack 2 + Special. When Chardris attacks with Fire Strike Special Attack, add 1 to Chardris' attack dice for every additional Elf Wizard you control within 3-clear sight spaces of Chardris, up to a maximum of +3 dice.

name: Charos
ability_1_desc: When taking an attack, before damage is dealt, Charos may attack from an adjacent attacking figure. All excess shields count toward Charos' defense
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for movement and elevation, Charos may fly over water without stopping, over blocking figures without becoming stopped

name: COBRA Commander
ability_1_desc: COBRA Commander adds 1 automatic skull when attacking adjacent figures.
ability_2_desc: After COBRA Commander receives 1 or more wounds from a normal attack and is not destroyed, you may move COBRA Commander up to 2 spaces. He may not end this movement adjacent to an enemy figure. While moving with I'll Get You Next Time, COBRA Commander does not take leaving engagement attacks.

name: Guncan the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: All friendly knights and sentinels adjacent to Guncan gain +1 life and an additional lifetime die.
ability_2_desc: Guncan ignores terrain spaces for his movement. Guncan does not count obstacles when calculating spaces between him or a target square. Once per turn, when Guncan is unengaged, he will take any hovering engagement attacks.

name: Cornelius Breech, The Derelict Prince
ability_1_desc: When Cornelius Breech, the Derelict Prince attacks, if the defending figure was not adjacent to him at the start of the round, Cornelius adds 2 to his Attack Value during this attack.
ability_2_desc: After a Unique Captain you control receives a wound or is destroyed, any or all Pirate Squads you control that chose that Captain for The Captain's Way Special Power may choose Cornelius to be their chosen Captain for the rest of the game. If any Squads do, remove all Wound Markers from Cornelius Breech.

name: Crimson Widow
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose a Unique Squad in your Army. For this game the chosen Squad's class becomes Pirate, replacing the class listed on its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: While there is an Order Marker on Crimson Widow, all Pirates you control increase their Attack Value by 1 when attacking adjacent figures.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Crimson Widow, you may reveal the "X" Order Marker on this Army Card to choose up to two Pirates you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Crimson Widow. You may move the chosen Pirates up to 3 spaces each.

name: Crixus
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Crixus rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Crixus may take for the attack is one.

name: Cyprien Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Each figure in Cyprien Esenwein's Army destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Cyprien Esenwein cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc:
After moving and before attacking, Cyprien Esenwein may play a Chilling Touch. To do this, choose a figure adjacent to Cyprien Esenwein on the 20-sided die.
• If you roll 1-12, nothing happens.
• If you roll 13-15, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
• If you roll 16-17, the chosen figure receives 2 wounds.
• If you roll 18 or higher, the chosen figure receives 6 wounds.
Cyprien Esenwein's Chilling Touch does not affect destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Cyprien Esenwein's movement, ignore elevations. Cyprien Esenwein may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and cross blocking terrain.

name: Darrak Ambershard
ability_1_desc: If Darrak Ambershard is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 2 dice to Darrak Ambershard's attack.
ability_2_desc: When you roll the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap with Darrak Ambershard, you may add 4 to your die roll.
ability_3_desc: If Darrak Ambershard is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If Darrak Ambershard is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If he is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1–15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: DEADEYE DAN
ability_1_desc: Range 10. Attack 5. Instead of using a normal figure to attack the chosen figure instead of attacking the chosen figure. Deadeye Dan may use this special power if he moved this turn.

name: Death Chasers of Thesk
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Death Chasers of Thesk, you may first take a turn with any large wild Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the first round of the game, after all order markers have been placed, you may move all Death Chasers of Thesk you control up to 5 spaces each. They must end their Orc Battle Rush movement on an empty space.

name: Death Knights of Valkrill
ability_1_desc: Figures attacked by a Death Knight of Valkrill subtract 2 from their defense dice. Destructible objects are not affected by Soul Weapons.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Death Knights of Valkrill, you may first take a turn with any small, medium, or large or relentless Hero you control.

name: Deathreavers
ability_1_desc: After a Deathreavr you control roll defeats a normal attack, from an opponent's figure, that Deathreavr may immediately move to an adjacent hex.
ability_2_desc: This figure can be never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When moving up to two levels of terrain, this figure may move as if the terrain were level.

name: DEATHSTALKERS
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice against a small or medium figure, if a Deathstalker rolls a skull on every die, the defending figure receives a wound for every skull, and cannot roll any defense dice.

name: Deathwalker 7000
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, Deathwalker may self-destruct. Roll the 20-sided die to determine if any other heroes are within 3 spaces of each adjacent figure on sides. If one of the 4 is within 3 to 10, each adjacent figure receives 2 wounds. After rolling, Deathwalker is immediately destroyed.
ability_2_desc: When Deathwalker 7000 rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: Deathwalker 8000
ability_1_desc: Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Range 7, Attack 3. Fire Special Attack inflicts a wound, he may attack again with his Rapid Fire Special Attack. Deathwalker 8000 may spend a Rapid Fire Special Attack to inflict a wound.

name: Deathwalker 9000
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Explosion Special Attack. Deathwalker only needs a clear sight at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Deathwalker can be affected by his own Explosion Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Any Soulborg Guards adjacent to Deathwalker add 2 spaces to their range.

name: Decker the Burrowbreaker
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally with the Decker the Burrowbreaker, you may place him onto an empty non-water space within 4 spaces of Decker that is no higher than 6 levels above or 3 levels below Decker's level. If Decker is engaged when he starts his Underground Movement, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Decker, you may move him up to 5 spaces in a straight line. When moving with Drill-Drive Special Attack, Decker may pass through figures and does not take leaving engagement attacks from figures he passed through. After moving, roll attack dice once for all figures passed through that turn. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Defending figures never have height advantage against Drill-Drive Special Attack.

name: Deepwyrm Drow
ability_1_desc: Each time a Deepwyrm Drow attacks a small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack or a leaving engagement attack and inflicts at least 1 wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1–11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: If a Deepwyrm Drow is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If that Deepwyrm Drow is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If it is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1–15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Vydar Deflectatron
ability_1_desc: Figures with the Orbital Deployment Special Power do not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of a round, before placing Order Markers, you may place 1 Deflectatron that has not entered the battlefield on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of a friendly figure. You cannot use more than one Orbital Deployment Special Power each round.
ability_2_desc: A Deflectatron never makes leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Figures adjacent to one or more Deflectatrons cannot determine clear sight to any figures. When a figure adjacent to one or more of your Deflectatrons defends against an attack from a non-adjacent figure, change 1 die result that was not a shield to a shield, if possible. Magnetic Deflector Shield is negated while adjacent to another figure with the Magnetic Deflector Shield Special Power.

name: Cobra Destro
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may place up to 2 different Tech Glyphs power-side up onto the Army Cards of up to 2 different Unique Heroes in your Army.
ability_2_desc: Destro adds 1 automatic shield to his defense rolls against attacks from non-adjacent figures.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, after making a normal attack, Destro may reduce his Attack Value by 2 and make an additional normal attack.

name: Doctor Doom
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Doctor Doom, you may choose any Unique Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Doctor Doom. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take temporary control of that hero and immediately take a turn with the chosen Hero. At the end of that turn, remove any Order Markers that were on the player who controlled the Hero before the Mind Exchange. All Order Markers that were on the chosen Hero's card will stay on the card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Doctor Doom's movement, ignore elevations. Doctor Doom may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Doctor Doom starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dorim the Bulkhead Brawler
ability_1_desc: If Dorim the Bulkhead Brawler attacks an opponent's figure during his turn, the Move Value of all of your Army Cards increased by 1 until the next time you reveal an Order Marker.
ability_2_desc: After rolling attack dice, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll one die that did not roll a skull.

name: Doctor Mindbender
ability_1_desc: At the start of Doctor Mindbender's turn, you may move all friendly figures adjacent to Doctor Mindbender up to 3 spaces.
ability_2_desc: At the end of Doctor Mindbender's turn, you may choose an enemy Unique figure within 3 spaces of Doctor Mindbender and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, after this turn you may reveal the "X" Order Marker on Doctor Mindbender. If you do, take temporary control of the enemy Army Card and take a turn with it. After the turn, control returns to the Army Card's previous owner.

name: Dreadnoughts of Caraway Cavern
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose one Unique Captain you control to be the Dreadnoughts of Caraway Cavern's Captain for this game. Dreadnoughts roll one additional defense die against attacks from non-adjacent figures when their chosen Captain is within 4 clear sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Dreadnoughts of Caraway Cavern, you may first take a turn with their chosen Captain or a Pirate Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: After attacking an opponent's figure, roll 1 attack die for each wound inflicted in that attack. For each additional skull rolled, inflict 1 wound on that figure.

name: Drow Chainfighter
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with a Drow Chainfighter, you may choose one opponent's small or medium figure within 6 spaces whose base is no more than 6 levels above that Drow Chainfighter's height or 6 levels below that Drow Chainfighter's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level dungeon space within 6 spaces of that Drow Chainfighter. If the chosen figure was not engaged when it is moved by Chain Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If a Drow Chainfighter is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If that skull roll is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If he is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1-15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Dóno
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose a figure within 6 spaces of Dóno. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher remove all order markers and all order cards from that figure's order card for that figure.

name: G.I. Joe Duke
ability_1_desc: The first time each round you reveal a numbered Order Maker on this Army card, instead of taking a turn with Duke you may take a turn with up to 2 G.I. JOE or Soldier Heroes you control. Duke can be one of those Heroes.
ability_2_desc: While Duke has a revealed Order Marker on his Army Card, other G.I. JOE and Soldier figures you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Duke add 1 to their Attack Value.

name: Dumutef Guard
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to Dumutef Guard's attack and defense while on a road space.
ability_2_desc: Dumutef Creatures adjacent to a Dumutef Guard receive an additional attack die.

name: Ozu-Teh
ability_1_desc: If a Dzu-Teh is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, the Glacier Traverse instead of moving normally. You may do this on any turn. You may also shift to an adjacent Glacier Mountain.
ability_2_desc: If a Dzu-Teh is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, it becomes hard to target. Dzu-Teh can attack it with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: This figure may move through snow only once at 1 space when moving.

name: Einar
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Any non-flying figure adjacent to this Earth Elemental is affected by Earth Slam Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally with an Earth Elemental, you may immediately place it on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of that Earth Elemental and is no higher than 1 level above that Earth Elemental's height or 3 levels below that Earth Elemental's base. If an Earth Elemental is engaged when it starts its Underground Movement, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Eldgrim the Viking Champion
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Eldgrim, you may place a Overexerted marker on him and take another turn with him. You may use this power only once during a round.
ability_2_desc: Eldgrim may move through figures as if they were not there. Eldgrim's Spirit adds 1 to his move number on his unique Army Card.

name: Elite Onyx Vipers
ability_1_desc: Elite Onyx Vipers do not stop moving. They like their movement when entering water terrain.
ability_2_desc: Once you declare a turn with Elite Onyx Vipers, you may roll a die. If you roll a 1 or higher, you may take another turn with the same squad.
ability_3_desc: When an Elite Onyx Viper rolls to take a turn with Evasive 8 is attacked, add 8 to the die roll to the defense roll when that figure is attacked.

name: Elites of Ullar
ability_1_desc: Unique Ullar Kyrie you control roll 1 additional die when attacking a figure engaged with 1 or more of your Elites of Ullar.
ability_2_desc: If an Elite of Ullar receives a wound from a normal attack by an enemy figure, after that attack you may move 1 unengaged Kyrie figure you control who follows Ullar up to 4 spaces, even if all of your Elites of Ullar are destroyed.

name: Emissary
ability_1_desc: This figure may drink this Treasure Crisp
ability_2_desc: Keep this card handy as a reminder for the Elkit of
ability_3_desc: Speed passing glyph of the Elkit
ability_4_desc: Replace for the Elkit of

name: Eltahale
ability_1_desc: Range 1 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to two other figures within 2 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Thunder Ram Assault Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls its own defense dice separately. You can only use Thunder Ram Assault Special Attack if Eltahale was not adjacent to the targeted figure at the start of this turn. You cannot use Thunder Ram Assault Special Attack if you used Thunder Step this turn.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving Eltahale normally, you may choose an opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Eltahale. Place Eltahale on any empty space adjacent to the chosen figure. For the duration of Eltahale's turn, add 1 to her Attack value. At the end of her turn, roll 1 attack die. If a skull is rolled, place 1 wound marker on Eltahale's Army Card. If Eltahale is engaged when she starts Thunder Step, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Emirroon
ability_1_desc:
After moving and before attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add the number of Elves you control adjacent to Emirroon to your die roll.
• If you roll 1-4, nothing happens
• If you roll 5-11, you may place 1 Elf you control adjacent to Emirroon
• If you roll 12-17, you may place up to 2 Elves you control adjacent to Emirroon
• If you roll 18-20, you may place up to 3 Elves you control adjacent to Emirroon
If the summoned Elves are engaged, they will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Emirroon cannot summon an Elf that he is already adjacent to.

name: Empress Kiova
ability_1_desc: Other figures within 5 spaces of Empress Kiova may re-roll all attacks. When a figure within 5 spaces of Empress Kiova makes an attack, it may use the right source of Empress Kiova can be added one time to the attack roll. When an adjacent figure makes an attack against Empress Kiova, if Empress Kiova has not been engaged, and by removing engaged attacks.
ability_2_desc: Empress Kiova can move into figures to use Stealth Flying. Empress Kiova may use Stealth Flying to move without becoming engaged, and by removing engaged attacks.

name: Erevan Sunshadow
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack Special. Each time you attack with Erevan Sunshadow's Fire Blast Special Attack, you may choose to roll 2, 3, or 4 attack dice. If a skull is rolled on every die, you may attack again with Erevan Sunshadow's Fire Blast Special Attack. You may continue attacking with Erevan Sunshadow's Fire Blast Special Attack until you do not roll a skull on every die.
ability_2_desc: Once per game, Erevan Sunshadow may use Fey Step. Before moving normally with Erevan Sunshadow, you may place him on any empty space within 5 spaces of his current location. If Erevan Sunshadow is engaged when he uses Fey Step, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Estivara
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If Estivara inflicts at least 1 wound with Venom Ray Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die for Venom Damage. If you roll a 1–9, the defending figure receives no additional wounds for Venom Damage. If you roll a 10–19, add 1 additional wound marker to the defending figure's Army Card, and roll again for Venom Damage. If you roll a 20, destroy the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: All Arachnid figures you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Estivara roll 1 additional attack die when attacking normally.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Estivara, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, while she remains on that space, Estivara has no visible Hit Zone until the next time you reveal an order marker.

name: Evar Scarcarver
ability_1_desc: When Evar Scarcarver attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Evar Scarcarver's Army Card, you may also reveal an 'X' order marker that is on Evar Scarcarver's Army Card to activate Frost Rage for the duration of the round. While Frost Rage is active, add 1 to Evar Scarcarver's Attack and Defense values for each wound marker on his Army Card.

name: Ewashia, Master of Tides
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Ewashia, Master of Tides, before taking Ewashia's turn, you may take a turn with a Small or Medium Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 6, Attack 4. Ewashia may use Twister Special Attack if she is within 1 space of a water tile. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to 2 spaces in a straight line from the targeted figure. All figures on those spaces are also affected by Twister Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Ewashia is not affected by Twister Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Ewashia does not have to stop her movement when entering a water space. Add 1 to Ewashia's Defense Value while she is on a water space.
ability_4_desc: Ewashia starts each game with 3 water tiles on this Army Card. At the end of Ewashia's turn, you may place a water tile from this Army Card on Ewashia's space or within 1 space of Ewashia, if the water tile fits normally onto that space.

name: Exiles of the Sundered Sea
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 black Powder Markers on this card. After moving and before attacking, you may remove a Powder Marker from this card to add 4 to the Exiles of the Sundered Sea's Range Value for the rest of the turn. You may only use this Special Power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: If an Exile of the Sundered Sea you control is attacked by an opponent's figure that is not adjacent and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-12, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 13 or higher, that Exile takes no damage and may immediately move up to 3 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Exiles of the Sundered Sea are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Fen Hydra
ability_1_desc: When this Fen Hydra attacks, it may attack up to 4 times. Reduce the number of times this Fen Hydra can attack by 1 for each wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of this Fen Hydra, and its base is no more than 3 levels above this Fen Hydra's height or 3 levels below this Fen Hydra's base, this Fen Hydra may add 1 to its Range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: The Fen Hydra does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Feral Troll
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Feral Troll, it receives 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Feral Troll, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Feral Troll's Army Card.

name: Revna Festering Honor Guard
ability_1_desc: For the entire game, if one of your Festering Honor Guard is on a Unique Hero's Army Card at the end of the round, you must roll the 20-sided die for that Hero. If you roll a 17 or higher, destroy that Hero. If a Festering Honor Guard is on a Unique Hero's Army Card when that Hero is destroyed by this Special Power, or by a normal attack, Special Attack, or Jeering engagement attack, place that Festering Honor Guard on a space that Hero occupied, if possible.
ability_2_desc: If Queen Maladrix the Conqueror is in your Army, when She is destroyed, you may move any unrevealed Order Markers from her Army Card to this Army Card. Festering Honor Guards add 1 to their Attack Value if Queen Maladrix is in your Army and is destroyed.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, the Festering Honor Guard may double their Height.

name: Fia Bonny the Void Siren
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 black Powder Markers on this card. After moving and before attacking, you may remove a Powder Marker from this card to add 4 to Fia Bonny the Void Siren's Range Value for the rest of the turn. You may only use this Special Power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: The first time each turn that Fia Bonny is targeted by a Squad figure with a normal or special attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, Fia Bonny cannot be targeted by that attack or any other attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: Fia Bonny is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Find the Viking Champion
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Finn with a range of 1 add 1 to their normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When Finn attacks, add 1 to the figure on any other Army Card. Finn's attack adds 1 to the normal attack number on that card.

name: Fire Elemental Utgar
ability_1_desc: A Fire Elemental never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to at least one Fire Elemental you control. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by Searing Intensity.
ability_3_desc: A Fire Elemental can never roll defense dice while it is on a water space.

name: Frost Giant of Morh
ability_1_desc: If this Frost Giant of Morh begins its turn unengaged, add 2 to its Move value this turn. If it begins its turn engaged, add 2 to its Attack value this turn.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with this Frost Giant of Morh, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may attack again with this Frost Giant of Morh.
ability_3_desc: If this Frost Giant of Morh is attacked with a normal attack by an opponent's figure and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll 3 attack dice. One at a time for each skull rolled, you may inflict 1 wound on one figure that is adjacent to this Frost Giant of Morh. Figures affected by Dying Swipe cannot roll any defense dice and can receive more than 1 wound each. After using Dying Swipe, remove this Frost Giant of Morh from the battlefield.

name: Frostclaw Paladins
ability_1_desc: Before moving a Frostclaw Paladin, you may add 3 to that figure's Move Value this turn. If you do, subtract 2 from that figure's Attack Value this turn.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Frostclaw Paladins, you may take a turn with a Champion you control who follows Jandar.

name: Fyorlag Spiders
ability_1_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Fyorlag Spiders may triple their height.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any one small or medium opponent's figure that is engaged with at least three Fyorlag Spiders that you control. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, remove one unrevealed order marker from the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure).
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Fyorlag Spiders, you may first take a turn with any Predator you control.

name: Vyoar Necrotech Geistfire
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with a Necrotech Geistfire, if that Geistfire attacked a non-adjacent figure, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1–5, that Geistfire receives 1 wound.

name: Gelryie Vanguards
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, after placing Order Markers, you may move each Fierce and Unfathomable figure you control up to 1 space for each of your Order Markers on the Gelryie Vanguards.
ability_2_desc: A Gelryie Vanguard adds 2 to its Defense Value when it is on a Water space or when it defends against an attack from a figure that has height advantage.
ability_3_desc: Gelryie Vanguards do not have to stop their movement when entering a water space.

name: Vyoar Necrotech Ghastblade
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. If a Necrotech Ghastblade attacks with Wild Spin Special Attack, it must attack all adjacent figures, even ones you are not engaged with. Roll each attack separately.

name: Vydar Necrotech Ghoulgrip
ability_1_desc: Small and Medium figures engaged with a Necrotech Ghoulgrip cannot move or be moved by any special power or glyph.
ability_2_desc: A Necrotech Ghoulgrip adds 1 to its Defense Value when attacked with a normal attack by an adjacent figure.

name: Girushia, Grove Keeper
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Girushia, Grove Keeper, before taking Girushia's turn, you may take a turn with a Small or Medium Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: If an enemy Small or Medium figure moves adjacent to Girushia on a space where that figure could end its movement, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, the figure ends its movement and lowers its Attack Value by 1 until the end of the current turn. If you roll an 18 or higher, the figure also suffers one wound.
ability_3_desc: If an enemy figure is within 2 spaces of Girushia, and its level is no more than 9 levels above or 3 levels below Girushia's level, Girushia may add 1 to his Range Value when attacking that figure.
ability_4_desc: At the end of a round, if Girushia is next to a tree or bush, you may remove one Wound Marker from this Army Card.

name: Gladiatrons
ability_1_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to any Gladiatron may not move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, a Gladiatron adds 1 die.

name: Glinervá the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When you reveal an Order Marker, you may also reveal the "X" Order Marker on Glinervá the Kyrie Warrior to activate Hanwi's Darkness. Until you next reveal an Order Marker, Glinervá and all Small, Medium, and Large figures within 5 spaces of her cannot target or be targeted by non-adjacent figures with a normal or special attack.
ability_2_desc: If Glinervá is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Glinervá. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 17 or higher, ignore any wounds Glinervá just received.
ability_3_desc: Flying

name: Goblin Cutters
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Goblin Cutter you control, if the defending figure is engaged with at least 2 other Goblin Cutters you control, it subtracts 2 from its defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When a Goblin Cutter you control is destroyed by a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move any 2 Goblin Cutters you control up to 2 spaces each, and all Goblin Cutters you control no longer have any visible Hit Zones for the duration of the attacking figure's turn while they remain un-engaged. Goblin Cutters will never take any leaving engagement attacks while using Scurry.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Goblin Cutters may add 2 to their height.

name: Iron Golem
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, this Iron Golem always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: This Iron Golem never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Gorillinators
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Gorillinators add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Granite Guardians
ability_1_desc: If a Granite Guardian has a height advantage on an opponent's figure, it may add 2 to its range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: A Granite Guardian with a height advantage on an adjacent opponent's figure rolls an additional attack die when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Granite Guardians, you may move each Granite Guardian you control up to 1 space. This space may be up to 4 levels higher.

name: Grave Grim
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on and before taking a turn with a Grave Grim, you may move up to 6 Small, Medium, or Large Undead or Eiseniek figures you control up to 3 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent rolls the 20-sided die for a Special Power on one of their Army Cards, if one or more of that Army Card's figures are within 3 spaces of a figure you control with the Harrowing Presence special power, they must subtract 3 from the roll.

name: Jandar Greatbow Archers
ability_1_desc: When a Greatbow Archer that has not moved this turn attacks a figure at Range 4 or greater, add 1 to her Attack Value. If the target figure is at Range 7 or greater, instead add 2 to her Attack Value.

name: Greater Ice Elemental
ability_1_desc: While a Greater Ice Elemental is on a water or ice space, that space and all same-level water spaces adjacent to that Greater Ice Elemental are considered normal ice spaces. Figures do not have to stop their movement on normal ice spaces.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to this Greater Ice Elemental, roll the 20-sided die. If this Greater Ice Elemental is on at least one ice or snow space, add 2 to your die roll. If you roll a 15 or higher, the opponent's figure receives 1 wound. Figures can be affected by Ice Spikes only as they move into engagement with this Greater Ice Elemental.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Greater Ice Elemental, if it is on at least one snow or ice space, remove 1 wound marker from this Greater Ice Elemental's Army Card.

name: Greater Ice Elemental
ability_1_desc: While a Greater Ice Elemental is on a water or ice space, that space and all same-level water spaces adjacent to that Greater Ice Elemental are considered ice spaces. Figures do not have to stop their movement on normal ice spaces.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to this Greater Ice Elemental, that figure must roll the 20-sided die. If this greater ice elemental rolls a 15 or higher, the opponent's figure receives 1 wound. Figures can be affected by Ice Spikes only as they move into engagement with this Greater Ice Elemental.
ability_3_desc: After taking a hit with this Greater Ice Elemental, if it is on at least one snow or ice space, remove 1 wound marker from this greater ice elemental's Army Card.

name: Greenscale Warriors
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Lizardfolk Hero you control, or a Unique large or huge Dragon Hero you control, to be the Greenscale Warriors' Lizard King. Each Greenscale Warrior rolls 1 additional attack and defense die when its chosen Lizard King is within 2 clear sight spaces. You can choose only one Lizard King for all the Greenscale Warriors you control.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Greenscale Warriors, you may first take a turn with their chosen Lizard King if it is still under your control.

name: Greenshirts
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Greenshirts, you may move up to 2 unengaged G.I. JOE or Soldier Heroes you control up to 2 spaces.

name: Grimnak
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to Grimnak. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Orc Warriors adjacent to Grimnak roll an additional attack die and an additional defense die.

name: Grok Riders
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Grok Riders, you may first take a turn with any Marro Warlord you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure that is adjacent to any Marro Warlord you control, Grok Riders add 2 to their attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Marro Hive cannot rebirth Grok Riders with its Marro Rebirth special power.

name: Guilty McCraech
ability_1_desc: When Guilty McCraech attacks, he may attack one additional time.

name: Gurei-Oni
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by the Tetsubo Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Haluchott, Corruptor of Beasts
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Haluchott, Corruptor of Beasts, before taking Haluchott's turn, you may take a turn with up to two Small, Medium, or Large Beasts you control.
ability_2_title: Staff of the Long Hand Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. You may use the Staff of the Long Hand Special Attack before or after using Haluchott's normal attack.
ability_3_desc: While defending against an attack from a Beast, Haluchott increases her Defense Value by 2.
ability_4_desc: Flying

name: Halushia, Scion of the Wild
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Halushia, Scion of the Wild, before taking Halushia's turn, you may take a turn with a Small or Medium Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Figures adjacent to a tree or bush roll one fewer Combat Die when defending against Halushia's attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Halushia, you may move him up to 4 spaces. Halushia can attack up to 3 times with Ride-By Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as he is on a space where he can end his movement. Halushia cannot attack the same figure more than once in a single turn with Ride-By Special Attack. When using Ride-By Special Attack, Halushia is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Hatamoto Taro
ability_1_desc: When defending with any Samurai and Ashigaru figures you control, 8 clear sight spaces of Hatamoto Taro, you may roll Einar Valkyrie dice. Each Einar symbol rolled counts as an additional shield. Inspired Defense Aura does not affect Hatamoto Taro.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice for Hatamoto Taro, if Hatamoto Taro is adjacent to at least one figure who follows Einar that you control, add one automatic shield to the defense roll.

name: Hatamoto Taro
ability_1_desc: When defending against a normal attack by an adjacent figure with any Samurai or Ashigaru figures you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Hatamoto Taro, you may roll Einar's symbol rolled counts as an additional shield. Heroic Defense Aura does not affect Hatamoto Taro.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice for Hatamoto Taro, if Hatamoto Taro is adjacent to at least one figure you control who follows Einar, add one automatic shield to the defender roll.

name: Heavy Gruts
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Heavy Gruts, you may first take a turn with any Orc Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: Heavy Gruts are never attacked when leaving engagements.

name: Heirloom
ability_1_desc: Range 5, Attack 3. Choose an opponent's figure to attack. Each opponent's figure adjacent to the chosen figure is also affected by Force Orb Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Heirloom, you may choose a Treasure Glyph on an unoccupied space within 4 spaces of Heirloom. You may move that Treasure Glyph onto any empty same-level space adjacent to Heirloom. Symbol-side-up Treasure Glyphs cannot be revealed, and power-side-up Treasure Glyphs must be placed power-side up when moved by Mage Hand.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Heirloom always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Hellforge Mandukor
ability_1_desc: During Hellforge Mandukor's turn, before moving with it and each time it moves onto a space during this movement, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Hellforge. If you roll a 15 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant Special Power are not affected by Blast Furnace. Hellforge cannot roll for Blast Furnace against the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: If a figure or destructible object adjacent to Hellforge is destroyed, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 8 to the roll if the figure is an Eisenek, Soulborg, or destructible object. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may remove a Wound Marker from this card.
ability_3_desc: At the start of each round after all Order Markers have been placed, if all your Order Markers are placed on Eisenek Army Cards, you may move Hellforge up to 4 spaces. Hellforge must end this movement on an empty space.

name: Vorid Burrowbreaker
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally with the Vorid Burrowbreaker, you may immediately place him on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of the Burrowbreaker and is no higher than 1 level above the Burrowbreaker's height or 3 levels below the Burrowbreaker's base. If the Burrowbreaker is engaged when he starts his Underground Movement, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Instead of moving and attacking normally with the Vorid Burrowbreaker, you may move the Burrowbreaker up to 5 spaces in a straight line. When moving with Drill-Drive Special Attack the Burrowbreaker may pass through figures and does not take leaving engagement attacks from figures he passed through. After moving, roll attack dice once for all figures passed through that turn. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Defending figures never have height advantage against Drill-Drive Special Attack.

name: Admiral EJ-1M
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative, you may move any Order Markers from this card onto any of your Pirate or Captain Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2+ Special. You may attack up to 4 times with Boarding Party Special Attack. Roll one additional attack die when attacking a figure engaged with a Pirate or Captain you control. After each attack, if that was the first time you attacked the defending figure this turn, you may move one Pirate or Captain figure you control up to 4 spaces. You may not move the same figure more than once in a turn using Boarding Party Special Attack.

name: Killian Vane III
ability_1_desc: Range 4, Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Blunderbuss Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure defense dice separately. Killian Vane cannot be affected by his own Blunderbuss Special Attack.

name: Air Marshal Zed Nesbitt
ability_1_desc: After Air Marshal Zed Nesbitt finishes moving, if he used the Flying Special Power during this movement, you may choose any number of friendly Small or Medium Vorids that Nesbitt passed over this turn. Place those figures adjacent to Nesbitt. Figures moved with Skyhook never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Nesbitt can only use Crash Landing Special Attack if he used the Flying Special Power this turn. All figures adjacent to Nesbitt are affected by Crash Landing Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. After using Crash Landing Special Attack, you must place one Wound Marker on this Army Card, and Nesbitt cannot move normally for the rest of the round.

name: Wynonna Earp
ability_1_desc: When placing order markers, if any opponent controls a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill, you must place a numbered order marker on this card and each opponent must place a numbered order marker on the card of a figure they control who follows Utgar or Valkrill, if possible.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Demon or Undead figure, if Wynonna Earp rolls 2 or more skulls, the defending figure cannot roll defense dice and if destroyed is placed on this card. Destroyed figures on this card cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or Glyph.

name: Horned Skull Brutes
ability_1_desc: If a Horned Skull Brute you control is attacked with a normal attack by an opponent's figure and receives 1 or more wounds, you may destroy a small Goblin figure you control that is adjacent to that Horned Skull Brute to ignore any wounds that Horned Skull Brute just received.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, if a Horned Skull Brute you control ends its movement unexpectedly, you may choose an engaged small or medium friendly Squad figure within 3 clear sight spaces of that Horned Skull Brute whose base is no more than 2 levels higher or lower than the base of that Horned Skull Brute. You may switch that Horned Skull Brute with the chosen Squad figure. Figures moved by Barge into Battle never take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ice Troll Berserker
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Ice Troll Berserker, roll the 20-sided die. If this Ice Troll Berserker is on a snow or ice space, add 3 to your die roll. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may move this Ice Troll Berserker again.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Ice Troll Berserker, remove 1 wound marker from this Ice Troll Berserker's Army Card. If it is on a snow or ice space, remove 1 additional wound marker.

name: Incredible Hulk
ability_1_desc: When Incredible Hulk attacks using a normal attack, he receives one extra attack die for each Wound Marker he has, up to a maximum of 5 extra attack dice for Rage Smash.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Incredible Hulk may move up to 10. When counting spaces for Hulk's Super Leap, count over elevations. Hulk may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without being engaged, and leap over obstacles such as walls. Hulk may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Hulk is engaged when he starts to leap, he will sacrifice his move for that turn. Roll Hulk's move 3 times attack dice on any turn that he uses Super Leap.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Any figure adjacent to Incredible Hulk is affected by the Stomp Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately. If a figure does not have a Special Attack on the same turn this user Super Leap.

name: Iron Lich Viscerot
ability_1_desc: Iron Lich Viscerot can move through Small and Medium figures, does not take leaving engagement attacks from Small and Medium figures, and can target and attack non-adjacent figures while only engaged with Small and Medium figures.
ability_2_desc: Begin the game with 3 yellow Surge Markers on this Army Card. Once per turn, before moving another Eiseneck figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Viscerot, you may remove a Surge Marker from this card to add 2 to that figure's Move and Attack Values until the end of the turn.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Viscerot and taking a turn with Viscerot, you may take a turn with another Unique Eiseneck Hero or Squad you control.

name: Iron Lich Viscerot
ability_1_desc: Iron Lich Viscerot can move through Small and Medium figures, does not take leaving engagement attacks from Small and Medium figures, and can target and attack non-adjacent figures while only engaged with Small and Medium figures.
ability_2_desc: Begin the game with 3 yellow Surge Markers on this Army Card. Once per turn, before moving another Eisenек figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Viscerot, you may remove a Surge Marker from this card to add 2 to that figure's Move and Attack Values until the end of the turn.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Viscerot and taking a turn with Viscerot, you may take a turn with another Unique Eisenек Hero or Squad you control.

name: Iron Man
ability_1_desc: When Iron Man attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Iron Man's movement, ignore elevations. Iron Man may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over ruins. When Iron Man starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Isamu
ability_1_desc: If Isamu is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to vanish. If you roll 1-8, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 9 or higher, Isamu takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Isamu can vanish only if he ends his vanishing move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_2_desc: Isamu can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When attacking a figure who follows Jandar, Isamu rolls 2 additional attack dice.

name: Iskra Esenwein
ability_1_desc: When Iskra Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this card.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Iskra Esenwein, you may summon one or more Reachets of Bogdan if they are in your army and they have not yet been summoned. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you must place all 3 Reachets within clear sight spaces of Iskra Esenwein. Any Reachets of Bogdan that you cannot place on the battlefield are immediately destroyed and cannot be summoned. If you cannot place any Reachets of Bogdan, you may immediately take a turn with them.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Iskra Esenwein's movement, ignore elevations. Iskra Esenwein may fly over water and obstacles without becoming engaged, and may ignore obstacles such as ruins.
ability_4_desc: When Iskra Esenwein starts her turn, if she is engaged with a figure, she makes an extra attack against one figure in engagement.

name: Izumi Samurai
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, all excess shields deal damage to the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: James Murphy
ability_1_desc: Special Attack. Range 6, Attack 5. Choose 1 chosen figure adjacent to the chosen target. That figure is also attacked in this attack. Roll one die separately. James cannot be attacked by his own Shotgun blast.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a clear line of sight within range 12 to any figure (even if blocked by an obstacle). James figures located on the same area as the chosen figure. This is a free action and may be affected by terrain.

name: Jinx and Kamakura
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on and before taking a turn with this Squad, you may first take a turn with a Ninja Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: While attacking, roll 1 additional attack die for each other friendly Ninja adjacent to the target.
ability_3_desc: Members of this Squad can move through all figures and never take leaving engagement attacks.

name: Johnny 'Shotgun' Gullivan
ability_1_desc: Range 5, Attack 3, Choose 1 figure within Range of the chosen figure. That attack effect die is affected by the Shotgun Blast Special Attack. Johnny only needs one natural 1 or 2 on his own Shotgun Blast attack.

name: Jorhdawn
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 1 + Special. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Rain of Flame Special Attack. Add 1 to Jorhdawn's attack dice for every additional Elf sight-line(s) of Jorhdawn, up to a maximum of +3 dice. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each affected figure rolls its defense dice separately. Jorhdawn cannot be affected by her own Rain of Flame Special Attack.

name: Jotun Ullar
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Wild Swing Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure not on the same team rolls defense dice. Figures that you control cannot be affected by his own Wild Swing Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium non-flying figure adjacent to Jotun. Roll the 20-sided die for throwing distance. If you roll higher than the height of Jotun of onto water, do not roll for throwing damage. The thrown figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Kaemon Awa
ability_1_desc: Range 4, Attack 4. When Kaemon Awa attacks with his Quick Release Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: Kato Katsuro
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Kato Katsuro, you may take a turn with one of the following figures that you control: +1 Samurai Hero, or +1 Samurai Squad, or 1 Ashigaru Harquebus Squad and/or 1 Ashigaru Yari Squad. You may choose which Squad to activate first. Any figure in the above list instead of a figure in control of Kato Katsuro must be within clear sight of Kato Katsuro before moving.

name: Imperator Kayne
ability_1_desc: Once during Imperator Kayne's turn, at any point during his normal movement that he is on a space where he could end his movement, you may choose an adjacent Small or Medium figure whose level is no more than 5 levels above Kayne's level and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound.

name: Kee-Mo-Shi
ability_1_desc: Before you attack with Kee-Mo-Shi, you may choose any unique figure adjacent to Kee-Mo-Shi. If you roll 19 or 20, you control the chosen figure's Army Card until the end of your next turn. You now control that Army Card and are responsible for directing that figure's Army Card as normal. The chosen figure's Army Card is considered to be an opposing Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When a figure attacks Kee-Mo-Shi in close combat, roll one die. On a 16 or higher, that attacker takes one wound instead of Kee-Mo-Shi and any additional effects.

name: KELDA THE KYRIE WARRIOR
ability_1_desc: At the start of your turn, choose a wounded hero adjacent to Kelda. That hero removes 1 wound. If you roll a 2, remove 2 wounds. If you roll 3-4, remove 3 wounds. If you roll 5-6, remove 2 wounds.
ability_2_desc: When moving Kelda, you may move her in any direction, including over other figures and obstacles. Kelda may fly over water and lava. If she is engaged, she may still fly away freely.

name: Khosumet the Darklord
ability_1_desc: Each friendly figure adjacent to Khosumet with at least one Order Marker receives an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Squads take one extra damage die per figure you may add to your die roll for each Unleashed Fury power on any Army Card.

name: Kilkorax the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose up to 2 different Small or Medium enemy figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Kilkorax the Kyrie Warrior. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll an 8 or higher, you may place the chosen figure onto a same-level space adjacent to Kilkorax. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 17 or higher, you may place the chosen figure onto a same-level space adjacent to Kilkorax. Figures moved by Witchcraft Telekinesis never take leaving engagement attacks.

name: Killian Vane III
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to the figure targeted by Blunderbuss Special Attack are also affected by Blunderbuss Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Killian Vane III cannot be affected by his own Blunderbuss Special Attack.

name: Kita the Springrunner
ability_1_desc: Figures must be within two spaces of Kita the Springrunner to target her with a normal or special attack.
ability_2_desc: Kita can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Knaves of the Silver Scimitar
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Captain you control to be the Knaves of the Silver Scimitar's Captain for this game. Knaves of the Silver Scimitar roll one additional defense die against attacks from non-adjacent figures when their chosen Captain is within 4 clear sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Knaves of the Silver Scimitar, you may first take a turn with their chosen Captain or a Pirate Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with a Knave of the Silver Scimitar, if the defending figure was not adjacent to that Knave of the Silver Scimitar at the start of this turn, that Knave of the Silver Scimitar receives 1 additional attack die.
ability_4_desc: Knaves of the Silver Scimitar are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Knight Irene
ability_1_desc: Before moving Knight Irene, you may add 3 to her Move Value this turn. If you do, subtract 2 from her Attack Value this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3 + Special. You may attack twice with Overwhelm Special Attack. If you attack the same figure a second time, you may roll an additional attack die for the second attack. You may not use Overwhelm Special Attack if you used the Run Special Power this turn.

name: Knights of Weston
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Knights of Weston, you may first take a turn with any Human Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: Knights of Weston roll one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with them.

name: Kozuke Samurai
ability_1_desc: Any or all Kozuke Samurai may act 3 to four Move number as long as they are unengaged prior to making an attack. Figures must be able to move completely to an opponent's figure in order to be able to make a Charging Assault.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack coming from an adjacent stacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure against other Samurai.

name: The Kraken
ability_1_desc: The Kraken does not start the game on the battlefield. After revealing a numbered Order Marker on a Unique or Unfathomable Hero you control you may place 1 figure from this Squad from that has not been destroyed on an empty space adjacent to that Hero.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, instead of taking a turn with a Unique or Unfathomable Hero you control, you may take a turn with The Kraken instead.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normally with 1 of The Kraken's figures, you may place that figure on an empty space within 4 spaces of that figure. If it is engaged when it starts to Warp Space, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ullar Krakenling
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, you may place a Krakenling on an empty space within 4 spaces. If a Krakenling is engaged when it starts to Warp Space, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After moving normally, a Krakenling may switch spaces with an adjacent single-space figure. Figures moved by Eldritch Switch never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: A Krakenling may attack up to 3 times on its turn. Reduce the number of attacks by 1 for each Wound Marker it has.
ability_4_desc: A Krakenling does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: Krav Maga Agents
ability_1_desc: When a Krav Maga Agent rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.

name: Krug
ability_1_desc: When Krug attacks, he receives one extra attack die for each wound marker he has.
ability_2_desc: When Krug attacks, he may attack one additional time.

name: Kumiko Jandar
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Kumiko, you may move Kumiko up to 3 spaces. Kumiko can attack up to 3 times with Ninjutsu Barrage Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as Kumiko is on a space where she could end her movement. Kumiko cannot attack the same figure more than once on a single turn.
ability_2_desc: Kumiko can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Kurrok the Elementalist
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Kurrok the Elementalist, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may, if possible, place one of your previously destroyed small or medium Elementals on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Kurrok the Elementalist.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on Kurrok the Elementalist, instead of taking that turn with Kurrok, you may take a turn with up to three small or medium Elementals you control that are within 8 clear sight spaces of Kurrok the Elementalist.

name: Kyntela Gwyn
ability_1_desc: All friendly Elves adjacent to Kyntela Gwyn add 1 to their defense dice.

name: Lady Jaye
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Zipline Glyphs on this card. Before and after moving normally, you may place up to 1 Zipline Glyph on an empty space within 1 clear sight space of Lady Jaye.
ability_2_desc: The first time each turn that Lady Jaye is targeted for an attack by a Squad figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, Lady Jaye cannot be targeted by that attack or any other attacks this turn.

name: Laglor
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures with a range of 4 or more who follow Vydar and are within 4 clear sight spaces of Laglor add 2 spaces to their range. Vydar's Range Enhancement Aura does not affect Laglor.
ability_2_desc: Range 7, Attack 3. When attacking with Autoload Special Attack, you may roll Vydar Valkryie dice. If you roll at least one Vydar symbol, you may attack again using Autoload Special Attack.

name: Laglor
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures with a Range number of 4 or more who follow Vydar are within 4 clear sight spaces of Laglor and 2 to their Range number. Vydar's Range Enhancement Aura does not affect Laglor.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. When attacking with Autoload Special Attack, you may roll Vydar Valkyrie dice. If you roll at least one Vydar symbol, you may attack again using Autoload Special Attack.

name: Loviaták the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When a Squad figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Loviaták the Kyrie Warrior attacks an adjacent figure with a normal attack, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Brutality Aura may only be used once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Loviaták, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: If you control Loviaták and another Unique Kyrie Hero who follows Utgar, figures you control who follow Utgar increase their Move Value by 1.

name: Einar Lurking Hive Soldier
ability_1_desc: If a Lurking Hive Soldier is targeted and would take 1 or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die.
