If you roll an 8-16, ignore all but one wound just received. If you roll a 17 or higher, ignore all wounds just received. Amulet of Paivatar does not affect Xiamara.
ability_2_desc: Flying

name: Zelrig
ability_1_desc: Range 7 Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Majestic Fires Special Attack. Common Squad figures roll 2 less defense dice against Majestic Fires Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Zelrig cannot be affected by his own Majestic Fires Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Zelrig's movement, ignore elevations. Zelrig may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Zelrig starts to fly, he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Zetacron
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Zetacron, each skull rolled counts for one additional wound.

name: Zettian Guards
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if your second Zettian Guard attacks the same figure as the first Zettian Guard, add one attack die to the second Zettian Guard's attack.

name: Zombies of Morindan
ability_1_desc: Zombies of Morindan that you control each turn. Whenever you may attack with one of your Zombies of Morindan, you may also move up to 2 other Zombies of Morindan even if you didn't move them yet this turn.
ability_2_desc: Instead of making a normal attack, you may have each Zombie of Morindan you control roll one die to be in. You will also gain 1 extra die to be in addition to be rolled for any target that Zombies of Morindan can see.
ability_3_desc: When a Zombie of Morindan is defeated, you may place it in a random spot on your opponents' side of your own perimeter. Detach Zombies of Morindan are not affected Dragons that you own.

name: 77th Infantry Division
ability_1_desc: When a 77th Infantry Division attacks a figure within 2 spaces, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: If a Soldier figure adjacent to a 77th Infantry Division figure receives 1 or more wounds from a non-adjacent attack, instead of placing those wounds, you may destroy one 77th Infantry Division figure adjacent to the defending figure.

name: AZAI
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose an opponent's figure to attack. Each opponent's figure adjacent to the chosen figure is also affected by Force Orb Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When defending with any Gith and Monk figures you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Azai, each shield rolled counts for one additional block. Shields of Light does not affect Azai.

name: Siege
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker and taking a turn with Siege you may take a turn with one other figure you control that has the Party of the Bearer special power.
ability_2_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Siege's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Siege's Army Card to active Crag of Steel for the duration of the round. While Crag of Steel is active, add 3 to Siege's Defense value and subtract 2 from Siege's Attack and Move values. When Siege attakcs while Crag of Steel is active, he may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack seperately.

name: Bilbo Baggins
ability_1_desc: All Unique Hobbit and Halfling Heroes you control, except Bilbo Baggins, have 1 additional Life.
ability_2_desc: If there are no opponent's figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Bilbo, then Bilbo has no Hit Zone.
ability_3_desc: Bilbo is never attacked when leaving an engagement with a figure whose Point Value is equal to or lower than his.

name: TRACTION CLAWS
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this figure may add 2 to its height.
ability_3_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Traction Claws's power.

name: Black Cat
ability_1_desc: Any time an opponent's figure within 3 spaces of Black Cat attacks, you may force that opponent to re-roll the attack once. You must choose which result to keep.
ability_2_desc: When Black Cat rolls defense dice against a normal attack, 1 shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Black Cat may use her Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Black Cat's Swing Line movement, ignore elevations. Black Cat may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Black Cat may not Swing Line more than 30 levels up or down in a single Swing Line. If Black Cat is engaged when she starts to Swing Line, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Radar Blip
ability_1_desc: Replace Glyph of Radar Blip with one of your small or medium figures from reserve and then place from reserve up to 2 of your small or medium figures on empty spaces within 2 spaces of the newly placed figure. After placing all figures, if it's your turn, each may move and attack. You must use this power immediately if this Glyph of Radar Blip is within 5 clear spaces of any enemy figure.
ability_2_desc: When an Ork Nob attacks with a normal attack, it may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Each time you reveal an Order Marker X, remove a wound from this card. If an Ork Nob is destroyed, instead remove all wounds from its card and replace any common Orc squad figure you control with the Ork Nob.

name: Boomerang
ability_1_desc: When Boomerang attacks with a normal attack, he may attack 1 additional time. He must attack the same figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Shatterang Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately. Boomerang can be affected by his own Shatterang Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Boomerang's movement, ignore elevations. Boomerang may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Boomerang is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Batman's T-Rex
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If the X Order Marker is on Batman's Army Card, after taking a turn with Batman, the player controlling Batman may reveal the X Order Marker to attack with Mechanical Bite Special Attack.

name: Commissioner Gordon
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Vigilante Hero you control. At the start of each round that you win initiative you may immediately place the chosen Unique Vigilante Hero on any empty space within 6 clear sight spaces of Commissioner Gordon. The chosen Unique Vigilante Hero will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moved with Bat Signal.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Commissioner Gordon, you may move any number of Lawmen you control up to 5 spaces each. Any Lawman moved this way must end its move adjacent to Commissioner Gordon.

name: BRAINIAC
ability_1_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on this card, you may add or subtract 8 from your initiative roll.
ability_2_desc: Range 8. Attack 7. After attacking normally, Brainiac may attack with his Orbital Strike Special Attack. An engaged Brainiac may target and attack non-adjacent figures with this special attack. Figures never have height advantage when defending against this special attack.
ability_3_desc: When Brainiac is destroyed, you may place his figure on any Robot or Soulborg Unique Hero card. If it is an opponent's card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, take control of that card and remove any Order Markers on it. While Brainiac is on an Army Card, that card is Brainiac and has the Advanced Intellect and Orbital Strike Special Attack special powers.

name: 53rd North Carolina Sharpshooters
ability_1_desc: If none of the 53rd North Carolina Sharpshooters move this turn, add 2 to their Range.
ability_2_desc: A 53rd North Carolina Sharpshooter receives an additional attack die when attacking a figure that is at least 4 spaces away.

name: Azazel the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Azazel the Kyrie Warrior has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, immediately place Azazel on a space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all wound markers on Azazel's card.
ability_2_desc: Azazel the Kyrie Warrior may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Azazel the Kyrie Warrior's movement ignore elevations. Azazel may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Azazel starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Emperor Andask
ability_1_desc: When a figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Emperor Andask attacks an adjacent figure with a normal attack, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Orb of Vengeance Aura does not affect Emperor Andask. Orb of Vengeance Aura may be used only once per turn.
ability_2_desc: Any time you roll the 20-sided die for a Kyrie Army Card, you may add 1 to your die roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Emperor Andask's movement, ignore elevations. Emperor Andask may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Emperor Andask starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Varkaanan Blade Dancers
ability_1_desc: A Varkaanan Blade Dancer rolls 1 additional defense die for each opponent's figure she is engaged to.
ability_2_desc: After a Varkaanan Blade Dancer rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent opponent's figure, if she is still adjacent to the attacking figure, you may place that Varkaanan Blade Dancer on any other space adjacent to the attacking figure, if possible. A Varkaanan Blade Dancer does not take any leaving engagement attacks when using Defensive Vault.

name: Heracles
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Heracles, you may reveal an "X" Order Marker that is on Heracles's Army Card and take another turn with Heracles. During this additional turn, Heracles cannot attack a small or medium figure.
ability_2_desc: Heracles rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against large or huge figures.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium non-flying figure adjacent to Heracles. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may place the figure on any empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of Heracles. If the figure was placed on a non-water space on a level equal to or lower than Heracles's height, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the thrown figure receives 2 wounds. The thrown figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Motley Max
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Motley Max, you may choose up to two enemy small or medium figures within 3 clear sight spaces whose bases are no more than 6 levels above Motley Max's height or 6 levels below Motley Max's base. Roll the 20-sided die once for each figure. If you roll a 6 or higher, place that figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to Motley Max. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Dread Chain Grab 6, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Motley Max, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the opponent's figure receives a wound. Figures may only be targeted as they move into engagement with Motley Max.

name: Elektra
ability_1_desc: Elektra can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: When Elektra attacks, she may attack 1 additional time.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Zogross Hardscale
ability_1_desc: An opponent's figure that is engaged to one or more Warriors or Protectors you control who follow Ullar may not attack Zogross Hardscale.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure that is engaged with Zogross Hardscale targets any other figure you control with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, no dice are rolled for this attack, no defense dice are rolled, and the attacking figure receives one wound.

name: Clementine Ford
ability_1_desc: If Clementine Ford is the only figure you control on the battlefield, add 1 to the Attack and Defense values of this card.

name: Captain America
ability_1_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Shield Throw Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Shield Throw Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Captain America add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.

name: DEPUTRON
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Deputron, each skull rolled counts for one additional hit.

name: ELEKTRA
ability_1_desc: When Elektra attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Elektra can move through all figures that aren't Ninjas and is never attacked when leaving an engagement by figures that aren't Ninjas.

name: Cyclops
ability_1_desc: When Cyclops attacks a figure that is not adjacent, roll 3 extra dice. When Cyclops attacks an adjacent figure, he may cause Knockback.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Cyclops, you may choose another figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Cyclops and move up to 5 spaces with that figure.
ability_3_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Bank Shot Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.

name: Dora Milaje
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card and taking a turn with this Dora Milaje, you may reveal an X Order Marker on this card to take one additional turn with any Dora Milaje you control. That Dora Milaje cannot attack during this turn unless a King or Queen you control is engaged.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to this Dora Milaje attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack this Dora Milaje.

name: Dexter Morgan
ability_1_desc: If any figures were wounded last turn, instead of taking this turn normally with Dexter Morgan, you may take a turn with any Lawman hero or Lawmen squad you control, or with Dexter Morgan. If a figure was destroyed last turn, for the duration of this turn, Dexter Morgan and Lawmen figures you control will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc:
* Dexter Morgan can move through all figures.
* Dexter Morgan can add 3 to his Attack value when attacking Utgar figures.
* Dexter Morgan can't attack if he is adjacent to more than one figure.

name: ARMBLADE
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: If this figure is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 dice to its attack.
ability_3_desc: When a figure equipped with this glyph wounds a figure with a normal attack the targeted figures attack is reduced by 1 for the remainder of the round.
ability_4_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Armblade's power.

name: Earth Archon
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Earth Archon's Army Card, you may first take a turn with any two earth elementals that you control.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure within 2 clear sight spaces of this Earth Archon. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll a 10 or higher, destroy it. If the choosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 18 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero figure. If this Earth Archon destroys the selected figures with Fissure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Earth Elemental.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normally with this Earth Archon, you may immediately place it on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of the Earth Archon and is no higher than 1 level above the Earth Archon's height or 3 levels below the Earth Archon's base. If this Earth Archon is engaged when it starts its Underground Movement, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: ÉOMER
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Éomer, after taking Éomer's turn you may take a turn with one of the following that you control: - 1 large or huge Human Squad or - 1 large or huge Human Hero Any figure taking a turn with Lord of the Mark must be within clear sight of Éomer before moving.
ability_2_desc: Éomer may attack at any point before, during, or after his move as long as Éomer is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice with any large or huge Humans you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Éomer, any die result that is not a skull counts as a shield.

name: Nakita Agent
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a figure that is not adjacent to this card, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure that has not yet taken a turn this round, add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: F.R.E.D. (Fragmentation Remote Explosive Device)
ability_1_desc: F.R.E.D. does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, place it on the Army Card of a figure you control with the Deploy F.R.E.D. special power.
ability_2_desc: If F.R.E.D. is destroyed, you must immediately roll the 20-sided die. When determining adjacency for this special power, you must double its height. • If you roll a 1, nothing happens. • If you roll a 2-15, each adjacent figure receives 1 wound. • If you roll a 16-18, each adjacent figure receives 2 wounds. • If you roll a 19 or higher, each adjacent figure receives 3 wounds.
ability_3_desc: When F.R.E.D. rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage. F.R.E.D. is never subject to leaving engagement attacks.

name: Frost Dwarf
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, you may choose a figure within 2 clear sight spaces and roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 to your roll if this Frost Dwarf is on a Snow or Ice space. If you roll 15 or higher, and the chosen figure is Common Hero or squad figure, destroy it. For any other figure, place a white Snow Marker on its Army Card. For each Snow Marker on a figure's card, reduce its move number by 1, to a minimum of 2. Remove 1 Snow Marker from a figure's card for each wound it receives. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by Snow Drift 15.
ability_2_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Frost Blade
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Frost Blade's movement, ignore elevations and he moves as though all spaces are normal land spaces.
ability_2_desc: When a flying figure receives at least one wound from Frost Blade, place a Wingless marker on the figure's Army Card. Any figure with a Wingless marker on its Army card cannot use its flying/stealth flying special power for the duration of the game.
ability_3_desc: Frost Blade may heal himself. He may heal any other figure. He may heal at any time during the game. Roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 2 or higher, remove all wound markers from the chosen figure's Army Card. If you roll a 1, Frost Blade is destroyed. Remove Frost Blade to another dimension.

name: Gambit
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Full House Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. When Gambit attacks with his Full House Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to Gambit and onto a space where that figure can end its movement, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, Gambit may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Gambit can use this power only if he ends his Nimble move not adjacent to any enemy figures. You may not roll for Nimble more than once during any turn.
ability_3_desc: Gambit is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Greater Ice Elemental
ability_1_desc: While a Greater Ice Elemental is on a water or ice space, that space and all same-level water spaces adjacent to this Greater Ice Elemental are considered normal ice spaces. Figures do not have to stop their movement on normal ice spaces.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to this Greater Ice Elemental, roll the 20-sided die. If this Greater Ice Elemental is on at least one snow or ice space, add 2 to your die roll. If you roll a 15 or higher, the opponent's figure recieves 1 wound. Figures can be affected by Ice Spikes only as they move into engagement with this Greater Ice Elemental.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Greater Ice Elemental, if it is on at least one snow or ice space, remove 1 wound marker from this Army Card.

name: Green Lantern Kilowog
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Green Lantern and the chosen figure are also affected by Ring Punch Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Before moving this Green Lantern, choose up to 2 unengaged, small or medium friendly figures adjacent to this Green Lantern. After you move this Green Lantern, place the chosen figure(s) adjacent to this Green Lantern.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Green Lantern's movement, ignore elevations. Green Lantern may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Green Lantern starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Green Wyrmling
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, two or more excess shields count as an unblockable hit on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Green Wyrmling Army Card, before taking that Green Wyrmling's turn, you may take a turn with one other Wyrmling you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Green Wyrmling's movement, ignore elevations. This Green Wyrmling may move over water without stopping, pass over figues without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Green Wyrmling starts to fly, if he is engaged, then he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Drone Torpedo
ability_1_desc: In order to draft a Drone Torpedo into your army you must first draft Black Manta.
ability_2_desc: When moving, a Drone Torpedo must always fly.
ability_3_desc:
Range Special. Attack 7 + Special. Instead of it's normal attack a Drone Torpedo can explode. Roll 7 attack dice once and add 1 automatic skull. The explosion affects all figures and ITFs within 3 clear sight spaces of the exploding Drone Torpedo. After it explodes a Drone Torpedo is destroyed.

If a Drone Torpedo is destroyed before it explodes roll the 20-sided die:
• If you roll a 1-10 the Drone Torpedo detonates. Follow the above rules.
• On an 11-20 it does not and is removed from the game.

name: Iron Man
ability_1_desc: When Iron Man attacks with his normal attack he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 6. If Iron Man inflicts one or more wounds on a small or medium figure with this special attack, he may place the defending figure on any same level or lower, unoccupied space within 3 spaces of its original location. The figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks and cannot be placed closer to Iron Man than its original placement.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Iron Man, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher remove one wound maker from Iron Man's card.

name: Tusken Raiders (Sand People)
ability_1_desc: If a Tusken Raider attacks a figure that is not adjacent to any other figures, add 1 extra die to his attack.

name: Martian Manhunter
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and instead of taking a turn with Martian Manhunter, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero that you control.
ability_2_desc: Martian Manhunter can move through all figures, ITFs and obstacles, and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When attacking with Martian Manhunter's Plasma Beam Special Attack, after rolling attack dice once, you may reroll any dice that show a shield.
ability_4_desc: Double all wounds that Martian Manhunter sustains from any Special Ability with the word Fire or Flame in its title. This also includes wounds from burning wreckage and lava fields.

name: Killer Croc
ability_1_desc: Waylon Jones was born with a form of atavism that imparted him with reptilian traits and a crocodile-like appearance. This mutation has became more reptilian over time due to both his opposite evolution and genetic experimentation.
ability_2_desc: He has incredible strength, as well as crocodilian abilities, such as a keen sense of smell and the ability to hold his breath underwater for long periods of time. His reptilian skin, sharp claws and teeth make him a dangerous foe to fight hand-to-hand. Despite his brutal savagery and heightened reflexes, his animalistic mentality results in lower intelligence.
ability_3_desc: He has been a member of the Secret Society of Super-Villains and spends most of his time imprisoned in Arkham Asylum.

name: Gronn
ability_1_desc: Gronn may attack twice if his first attack inflicts at least 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: After moving, if Gronn did not attack this turn, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16-19, select up to 3 Wolves or Hybrids that you control within 6 spaces and place them on any unoccupied spaces adjacent to Gronn. If you roll a 20 or higher, after repositioning the selected figures you may take an additional turn with any that have a relentless personality.
ability_3_desc: Small or medium figures engaged by Gronn cannot disengage using any special ability.

name: Rakon, Keeper of the Burning Forge
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Rakon, Keeper of the Burning Forge, you must choose an opponent. That opponent chooses Trick or Treat. If he chooses Trick, you must inflict a wound to a small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Rakon. If he chooses Treat, you must remove a wound marker from any other figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Rakon, if able.
ability_2_title: Sword of the Burning Forge Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 7. Before attacking with Sword of the Burning Forge Special Attack, you must place one wound marker on Rakon, Keeper of the Burning Forge's army card.

name: Giant-Man
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and before taking a turn with Giant-Man, if Ant-Man is currently on the battlefield replace the Ant-Man figure with the Giant-Man figure, choosing any adjacent space to fit his double-base. If there is no adjacent space available you cannot replace the Ant-Man figure, and must forfeit your turn. Any wounds on Ant-Man's card remain on his card. If Ant-Man is destroyed Giant-Man is destroyed as well.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, Giant-Man always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking normally, if Giant-Man ends his movement adjacent to any type of terrain Object he may shake it. All figures on top of the terrain must roll 1 die unblockable damage. Afterwards the player controlling Giant-Man may move each figure that received a wound one space in any direction. Figures moved in this way will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hawkeye
ability_1_desc: While Hawkeye has no superhuman powers he is at the very peak of human conditioning and is a natural athlete. His above average reflexes and hand-eye-coordination make him the most proficient archer ever known. This includes considerable strength, as a supervillain found out when he tried to use the superhero's 250 pounds-force draw weight bow and found that he could not draw back the string to launch an arrow.
ability_2_desc: He is also trained to throw knifes, darts, balls, bolas and boomerangs. Hawkeye is an exceptional fencer, acrobat and marksman, having been trained from childhood in the circus and by the criminals Trick Shot and Swordsman.
ability_3_title: Turn Any Object Into a Weapon
ability_3_desc: He has gained a reputation for being able to "turn any object into a weapon", and has been seen using items such as tin plates, coins, sticks and other debris to great effect against his enemies.
ability_4_desc: In addition to his pinpoint accuracy, Hawkeye relies on a quiver full of gadget arrows with various high-tech tricks such as: flares, explosives, sonic blasts, electrical discharge, suction cups, tear gas and smoke bombs.

name: Hawkgirl
ability_1_desc: When Hawkgirl rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: When Hawkgirl rolls defense dice, if Hawkman is within 4 clear sight spaces she may re-roll any one defense die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Hawkgirl's movement, ignore elevations. Hawkgirl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Hawkgirl starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dalinar Kholin
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Stormlight markers on this card and Dalinar Kholin adds 1 to his Defense and Move for each Stormlight marker on this card. Each time Dalinar Kholin receives 2 or more wounds, remove a Stormlight marker from this card.
ability_2_desc: When Dalinar Kholin attacks a figure with a normal attack, if the defending figure doesn't have the Shardblade or Shardplate power, the most defense dice it may roll is one.
ability_3_desc: Each time Dalinar Kholin destroys a figure, you must roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 7 or lower, remove all order markers from this card and for the duration of the round, Dalinar Kholin will never attack with normal, special, or leaving engagement attacks.

name: Daredevil
ability_1_desc: If Daredevil ends his movement engaged to more opponent figures than he was engaged with at the start of his turn, he may either add 2 to his attack dice or attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If Daredevil is attacked by an opponent's figure using a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11 roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 12 or higher, Daredevil takes no damage and may immediately move using his Leap Swing Special Power.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Daredevil may use Leap Swing. Leap Swing has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Leap Swing, ignore elevations. Daredevil may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Daredevil may not Leap Swing more than 12 levels up or down in a single Leap Swing. If Daredevil is engaged when he starts his Leap Swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Daredevil may only attack adjacent figures on the same turn he uses Leap Swing.

name: Iron Rain Giant
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Shoulder Gunners Special Attack has the following characteristics: Species: Dwarf, Class: Gunner, Personality: Precise. Iron Rain Giant may use this special attack 4 times in the same turn. Iron Rain Giant may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.
ability_2_desc: Iron Rain Giant can move through all small and medium figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with small and medium figures. Iron Rain Giant never rolls for Falling or Major Falling damage. Place a wound on this card instead if a special power would 'destroy' Iron Rain Giant.

name: Jedi Guardian
ability_1_desc: If this unit has not moved or used another special ability this turn, it may attack twice.
ability_2_desc: Unit starts with counters equal to the force rating. Counters are spent for the below abilities. Once counters are spent they are gone for the rest of the game. -Reroll: Reroll one failed dice roll. This includes initiative, attack, and defense. If reroll is taken, the dice must be rerolled. -Movement: Character can spend one force point to move 2 additional hexes. -Flight: May use a force point to fly per the flying rules for one turn.
ability_3_desc: This Unit may spend one force counter to attack All adjacent enemies.

name: Spirit of Independence
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose 1 Common Army Card you control, or up to 2 Unique Army Cards you control. For this game, all chosen cards have the personality of Valiant, regardless of what is listed on that card.
ability_2_desc: Spirit of Independence and all figures you control with the valiant personality that are within 8 clear sight spaces of Spirit of Independence are never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_title: Bombs Bursting In Air Special Attack
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. All figures within 2 clear sight spaces of the chosen figure are also affected by Bombs Bursting In Air Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Spirit of Independence is affected by Bombs Bursting In Air Special Attack, and can only use it once per game.

name: Kailen Mantiskewer
ability_1_desc: If Kailen Mantiskewer is the only figure that you control, add 2 to Kailen Mantiskewer's Attack and Defense values.
ability_2_desc: If there is at least one unrevealed Order Marker on Kailen Mantiskewer's card, he has no visible Hit Zone.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Kailen Mantiskewer's movement, ignore elevations. Kailen Mantiskewer may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Kailen Mantiskewer starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Kalashnikov's Irregulars
ability_1_desc: For every Order Marker on this Army Card, a Mercenary in Kalashnikov's Irregulars adds 1 to his attack.
ability_2_title: We Ain't Getting Paid Enough to Die
ability_2_desc: At the end of each round, you must roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 2 from the result for each previously destroyed Greedy Mercenary in your army. If you roll a 2 or lower, you must destroy a Greedy Mercenary you control.

name: Katara
ability_1_desc: Before moving or after attacking, you may roll the d20. On a roll of 7 or higher, place two spare water tiles on this army card. If Katara is within 3 clear sight spaces of a water tile, add 6 to your roll.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a wounded Unique Hero adjacent to Katara, you may discard up to two water tiles from this army card. For each water tile, remove one wound from the chosen Hero. Instead of attacking, Katara may use Water Healing on herself.
ability_3_desc:
Range 6, Attack 3+Special
When Katara attacks with Water Whip Special Attack, you may discard up to 3 water tiles from this card. Add 1 attack die for each water tile discarded. You may discard 2 water tiles to attack with Water Whip Special Attack one additional time.

name: Kobold Skirmishers
ability_1_desc: Once per normal attack, when a Kobold Skirmisher you control is targeted by an opponent's figure, you may move that Kobold Skirmisher up to 1 space. That space may be up to 4 levels higher. If a Kobold Skirmisher is engaged when he starts his Shifty move, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When a Kobold Skirmisher rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 defense dice to the defense roll.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Kobold Skirmishers may add 2 to their height.

name: Infinity Gem: Mind
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with this figure, choose a Unique Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 17 or higher, take temporary control of that Hero and immediately take a turn with it. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to the player who controlled the Hero before Mind Exchange.

name: Kren Argus
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose one Unique Hero an opponent controls to be Kren Argus's Challenger. Kren Argus rolls 1 additional die when attacking his Challenger and his Challenger rolls 1 additional die when attacking him. If Kren Argus destroys his Challenger, then for the duration of the game, all figures you control add 1 to their attack value. If Kren Argus's Challenger destroys him, then for the duration of the game, all figures controlled by the opponent that controlled Kren Argus's Challenger at the time add 1 to their attack value.
ability_2_desc: Kren Argus is never attacked when leaving an engagement with a squad figure and rolls 2 additional dice when defending against squad figures.

name: Landarian Cloud Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Cloud Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Landarian Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. One at a time do the following with each Cloud Warrior: Choose a figure that is up to 3 spaces away and 10 levels high to attack. After rolling 3 attack dice place the Cloud Warrior adjacent to the chosen figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Cloud Warriors' movement, ignore elevations, up to a height of 5.

name: Lt. Jane Murphy
ability_1_desc: When making an initiative roll, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card, add 1 for every Order Marker on any Lawman, Criminal, or Outlaw Army Card, to a maximum of +6 for All Points Bulletin.
ability_2_desc: After a Lawman hero you control takes a turn, if that Lawman did not move, you may choose another Lawman figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Lt. Jane Murphy. Move the chosen Lawman up to 5 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When making a normal attack on a figure engaged with a Lawman you control, Lt. Murphy rolls 1 additional die.

name: LAPRAS
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. If this Lapras inflicts at least 1 wound with Ice Beam Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, place a Freeze Status Marker on that figure. Instead of moving and attacking with a figure with a Freeze Status Marker, that figure must roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 16-20, remove the Freeze Status Marker. Figures with Freeze Status Markers do not get to make leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Before moving this Lapras, you may choose an unengaged friendly Small or Medium figure adjacent to it. After you move this Lapras, place the chosen figure adjacent to this Lapras.
ability_3_desc: This Lapras does not have to end its movement when entering water spaces. When this Lapras moves on a space that is not a water space, count each hex as 1 extra space. Water creatures cannot climb ladders. Add 3 to a Lapras's Defense when it is on a water space.

name: Lodhar Stoneflame
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, choose an opponent's small, medium, or large figure within 6 clear sight spaces and roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 for each stone space the figure is on. If you roll an 11 or higher, and it is a Squad figure, destroy it. If you roll a 16 or higher, and it is a Hero, it receives two wounds. Remove an unrevealed Order Marker from that Hero's Army Card, if possible. Elementals, Elementars, or figures with the Stealth Flying special power are not affected by Petrification.
ability_2_desc: Before rolling defense dice, you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card and roll the 20-sided die for Mirror Image. If you roll a 1-10, remove the X Order Marker from this card and roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may ignore all wounds from that attack. You may continue to roll for Mirror Image if the revealed X Order Marker is on this card.

name: Loki
ability_1_desc: When placing Order Markers, you may place an additional X Order Marker on any Army Card in your army.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose 2 small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Loki. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, switch the 2 chosen figures. Figures moved by Mystic Mischief never take leaving engagement attacks. Loki may be moved by Mystic Mischief.
ability_3_desc: If Loki is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, Loki takes no damage and may move up to 4 spaces.
ability_4_desc: Loki can move through all figures and never takes leaving engagement attacks.

name: Magdeline Prideheart
ability_1_desc: When a soldier that you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Magdeline Prideheart is destroyed by an adjacent figure, move Magdeline Prideheart adjacent to the attacking figure and roll 3 attack dice. Any skulls rolled count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: If Magdeline Prideheart destroys an adjacent figure, you may inflict one wound on any squad figures adjacent to both Magdeline Prideheart and the defending figure.

name: MALLOK
ability_1_desc: Any time you roll the 20-sided die for a Drow Army Card, you may add 2 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker and taking a turn with Mallok, if Mallok is not engaged, you may take a turn with a Drow hero or squad that you control.
ability_3_desc: Mallok is never attacked when leaving an engagement. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Mallok may triple his height.

name: Manticore of Temephses
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When this Manticore of Temephses attacks with Tail Barbs Special Attack, it may attack up to two additional times.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this Manticore of Temephses movement, ignore elevations. This Manticore of Temephses may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Manticore of Temephses starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Man-Thing
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Man-Thing. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. Fear Touch cannot affect Robots or figures with the Fearless personality.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Man-Thing adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When Man-Thing is on a swamp, swamp water, or water space, add 1 to his attack and defense. Man-Thing does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space.

name: Nightmare Moon
ability_1_desc: Nightmare Moon does not start the game on the battlefield. She may only be summoned if Princess Luna receives one or more wounds. After Luna receives the wounds, roll the 20-side die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may switch Princess Luna with Nightmare Moon. Place all of Luna's wound and order markers on this card. Nightmare Moon may use any of Luna's special powers. If a special power refers to Luna or Luna's card, it refers to Nightmare Moon or this card instead. At the end of a round, you may switch Nightmare Moon back with Luna, placing all of Nightmare Moon's wound markers on Luna's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Common figures attacking Nightmare Moon with a normal attack subtract 1 from their attack dice.

name: Predator
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. Defending figures never add defense dice for terrain effects from shadow spaces and jungle pieces. Predator's Plasmacaster Special Attack does not affect added defense dice from special powers on the defending figure's card.
ability_2_desc: When defending against any attack from a non-adjacent opponent, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, Predator may move 2 additional spaces. When counting spaces for Grappling Hook, ignore elevations. Predator may grapple over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and over obstacles such as ruins. Predator may not grapple more than 25 levels up or down in a single grapple. If Predator is engaged when he starts his Grappling Hook move, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Nguyen Duc Chien
ability_1_desc: If Nguyen Duc Chien starts his turn unengaged and adjacent to a piece of jungle terrain, add 2 dice to his attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: All Ashigaru who begin their turn within 5 clear sight spaces of Nguyen Duc Chien add 2 to their move number this turn.
ability_3_desc: Range: 4 Attack: 4 When Nguyen Duc Chien attacks with his Machine Gun Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.

name: Na
ability_1_desc: If Nyra the Kyrie Warrior is within 3 clear sight spaces of Na, the defense number of Nyra the Kyrie Warrior's Army Card is increased by 1.
ability_2_desc: Na never makes leaving engagement attacks. All figures may move through Na.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Na's movement, ignore elevations. Na may fly over over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Na starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Oakwood Warriors
ability_1_desc: If an Oakwood Warrior is adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or a Jungle Piece, opponents' figures must be adjacent to that Oakwood Warrior to attack it with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Oakwood Warriors always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Nyra the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Nyra the Kyrie Warrior, you may take a turn with up to 3 Nature Spirits you control that are within 6 clear sight spaces of Nyra the Kyrie Warrior.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Nyra the Kyrie Warrior, you may choose a Nature Spirit you control or one of your previously destroyed Nature Spirits and place it on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Nyra the Kyrie Warrior. You cannot place it adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nyra the Kyrie Warrior's movement, ignore elevations. Nyra the Kyrie Warrior may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Nyra the Kyrie Warrior starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ash Ketchum
ability_1_desc: Once per game, Ash may summon Pikachu from the army pool. Pikachu has 3 life, 4 attack, and 2 defense. Pikachu is placed within 3 spaces of Ash and may act immediately.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, if Ash has no friendly figures within 3 spaces, he may roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 14 or higher, Ash gains 1 extra movement and 1 additional attack die for the turn.
ability_3_desc: Once per round, Ash may choose a friendly figure within 4 spaces and give that figure +1 attack die for the rest of the turn. This ability may only be used if Ash is not engaged in combat.

name: Poison Ivy
ability_1_desc: If Poison Ivy is adjacent to a tree or brush, opponents' figures must be adjacent to Poison Ivy to target her.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose up to 3 small or medium figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Poison Ivy that are adjacent to a tree or brush. Roll the 20-sided die for each figure. If you roll an 8 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. Place an Entangled Marker on that figure's base. Figures with an Entangled Marker may not move or be moved by any special power on any Army Card or Glyph. At the end of each round, remove all Entangled Markers from all bases.
ability_3_desc: If Poison Ivy is attacked by an adjacent human figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure may not attack her.

name: Red Skull
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Red Skull's card, instead of taking that turn with Red Skull, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero you control within clear sight of Red Skull.
ability_2_desc:
After moving and before attacking you may either:
• Roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Red Skull, or
• Roll the 20-sided die once for any one figure up to 3 clear sight spaces away.
If you roll a 19 or higher, that figure is destroyed.

name: Regina Tifs
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 3 When Regina Tifs attacks with Pummel Special Attack, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Regina Tifs is attacked with a normal attack and does not receive any wounds, Regina may immediately make a normal attack, if possible.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Regina Tifs always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: PENDANT OF FORTUNE
ability_1_desc: This figure may use this pendant before rolling the 20-sided die for any special power on its Army Card. When you roll the 20-sided die for that special power, roll the 20-sided die one additional time. You may use the result from either roll. Keep this card handy as a reference to the Pendant of Fortune's power.

name: RIBBOL
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3 + Special. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Necessary Sacrifices Special Attack. Ribbol only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice for all affected figures. If at least one friendly figure is affected by the attack, roll an additional attack die. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Ribbol cannot be affected by his own Necessary Sacrifices Special Attack.

name: RUNA
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, Runa may use her Helm of Mitonsoul Aura. When using the Helm of Mitonsoul Aura, you must roll the 20-sided die for all figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Runa, one at a time. If the target is a squad figure and you roll a 15 or higher, destroy the figure. If the target is a hero figure and you roll a 20, destroy the figure. Runa's Helm of Mitonsoul Aura does not affect Runa.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Runa's movement, ignore elevations. Runa may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Runa starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents
ability_1_desc: S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents roll one additional attack die for every wound inflicted on the defending figure this turn by S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents you control.
ability_2_desc: When a S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent wounds an enemy figure with a normal attack, move another S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent you control that did not move normally this turn up to 5 spaces.

name: Ogre Siegemaster
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. Ogre Siegemaster may only use this special attack if they did not move this turn. Ogre Siegemaster rolls three additional attack dice when attacking an indestructible object with this special attack. A figure wounded by Battering Ram Special Attack may not move on their next turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling for lava field damage against Ogre Siegemaster, roll two dice instead of one.

name: Savin Lightguard
ability_1_desc: If Savin Lightguard is attacking an Undead figure, roll one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: If Savin Lightguard destroys an adjacent figure, you may inflict one wound on any squad figures adjacent to both Savin Lightguard and the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: If Savin Lightguard has 5 or more wounds on his Army Card, add 1 to his defense.

name: Sheriff Not-A-Robot
ability_1_desc: When Sheriff Not-a-Robot attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: All Lawmen you control move one additional space. Posse does not affect Sheriff Not-a-Robot.

name: Sandman
ability_1_desc: Sandman is not subject to leaving engagement attacks, falling damage, knockback, or grappling.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, roll a die. If a Skull is rolled, remove 1 Wound marker from this card. Continue to do this even after Sandman has been removed from the board. If there are 4 or fewer Wounds on this card, the Sandman figure may be replaced on any hex not adjacent to an enemy figure. Placement on the board uses all of Sandman's movement for that turn.
ability_3_desc: Any fire or lava-based attack counts each Skull rolled as two hits.

name: Sabretooth
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, you may remove up to 2 Wound Markers from this card.
ability_2_desc: When Sabretooth attacks with his normal attack, for every 2 skulls rolled, the defending figure rolls one less defense die.
ability_3_desc: Range 3. Attack 5. Choose a non-adjacent figure whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from Sabretooth's base. After attacking the chosen figure, if the figure is destroyed, immediately place Sabretooth on a space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, immediately place Sabretooth adjacent to that figure. If it is not possible to place Sabretooth after using Savage Pounce Special Attack, destroy Sabretooth.

name: Shocker
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. When Shocker attacks with his Vibro-Shock Special Attack, if he inflicts at least one wound, he inflicts one additional wound.
ability_2_desc: If Shocker takes no damage from a normal attack by an adjacent figure, the attacking figure receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: Shocker is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Star-Lord
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Star-Lord, you may choose another figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Star-Lord and move up to 5 spaces with that figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. If Star-Lord attacks a non-adjacent figure with Element Guns Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. With his second attack, if he attacks the same non-adjacent figure or a different non-adjacent figure from the same Army Card, that figure rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: Terrax
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure moves onto a land space within 2 clear sight spaces of Terrax, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Earth Barrier.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. After attacking normally, Terrax may attack with Cosmic Axe Special Attack. Non-flying figures roll 2 fewer defense dice when defending against Cosmic Axe Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Terrax's movement, ignore elevations. Terrax may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Terrax is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Thanksgiving Turkey
ability_1_desc: When the Thanksgiving Turkey is destroyed, you may remove up to a total of 6 wound markers from any Army Cards, to a maximum of 3 wound markers removed per Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If every Army Card you control has a different class and personality than every other Army Card you control, you may use Cornucopian Camaraderie. Once per round, before revealing an Order Marker on an Army Card you control, you may move one unrevealed Order Marker from Thanksgiving Turkey to any other Army Card you control.

name: Psylocke
ability_1_desc: Range 3 Attack 3. Psylocke does not need clear line of sight to attack with Mind Blast Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Psylocke can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Psylocke is immune to Mindshackle. If a figure targets Psylocke with Mind Blast Special Attack, Psylocke rolls 2 additional defense dice and all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Saint Patrick
ability_1_desc: When St. Patrick is within 3 clear sight spaces of any friendly figure wearing any green article of clothing, add 2 to that figure's Defense Dice.
ability_2_desc: After moving, if St. Patrick does not attack, he may drink with the masses. All friendly wounded figures within 2 spaces may partake of St. Patrick's brew. Roll the 20-sided die once for all affected figures. If you roll a 1, affected figure attacks one adjacent friendly figure using one attack dice. If there is more than 1 figure adjacent, the controlling player chooses whom to attack. Attacked figure defends as normal. If you roll a 2-6, nothing happens, except affected figure grins and says "I love you, man!" repeatedly. If you roll 7-12, remove 1 wound marker from affected figure. If you roll 13-17, remove up to 2 wound markers from affected figure. If you roll 18-20, remove all wound markers from affected figure.
ability_3_desc: Vipers and Elite Onyx Vipers cannot move within 3 spaces of St. Patrick. If St. Patrick moves within 3 spaces of Vipers and Elite Onyx Vipers they must immediately move out of this range if possible. If engaged, Vipers and Elite Onyx Vipers will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Thuspleth
ability_2_desc: range 8 attack 2, 4 attacks, everyone points around it

name: THONORAH
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack, all figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this Blue-Fire Blast Special Attack. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures.
ability_2_desc: When attacking normally with Thonorah, all skulls rolled count as one additional hit.

name: TOADONT
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Toadont on swamp water spaces. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If you roll a 17 or higher, inflict one wound to the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: If Toadont is attacked with a normal attack by an opponent's figure and receives 1 or more wounds, you may destroy a Bullywug figure you control that is adjacent to Toadont to ignore any wounds Toadont just received.

name: TREEBEARD
ability_1_desc: Before moving, choose up to 2 adjacent friendly Small figures and put them on this card, or put up to 2 Small figures from this card adjacent to Treebeard. Up to 2 Small figures can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 3. After attacking normally, Treebeard may attack with Lob Stones Special Attack once for each Small figure on this card. Treebeard may target and attack non-adjacent figures with Lob Stones Special Attack. Treebeard cannot attack the same figure twice with Lob Stones Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Treebeard can move through Small and Medium figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with Small and Medium figures.

name: Tyrian the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When Tyrian attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Tyrian's movement, ignore elevations. Tyrian may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Tyrian starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Undead Cavalry
ability_1_desc: An Undead Cavalry Knight that begins his turn unengaged and attacks a figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away at the start of the turn may use Trample Charge. After attacking, if the defending figure was destroyed, that Undead Cavalry may move one space and attack again. That Undead Cavalry will not take any leaving engagement attacks. An Undead Cavalry Knight may not attack more than two additional times with Trample Charge.
ability_2_desc: Undead Cavalry Knights roll one additional die when attacking Common Squad figures with a Range value of 4 or higher.

name: Uruk-hai Captain
ability_1_desc: All friendly Scouts adjacent to an Uruk-hai Captain receive an additional attack die when attacking a figure adjacent to them.
ability_2_desc: An Uruk-hai Captain rolls one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with him.

name: Urk
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card and before taking a turn with Urk, you may move up to 8 Common Goblin figures you control up to 2 spaces each. Figures moved by Mob Swarm never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure, add 1 attack die for every Common Goblin figure you control that is adjacent to the defending figure, to a maximum of 3 additional dice.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Urk may add 2 to his height.

name: Wilton Thorne
ability_1_desc: When rolling for Sudema's Stare of Stone against a figure adjacent to Wilton Thorne, you may add 2 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Wilton Thorne attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack Wilton Thorne.

name: Wookie Raiders
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Wookie Raiders, you may first take a turn with any wild Human, Giant, or Wookie Hero you control. If you do not take a turn with any Human, Giant, or Wookie Hero you control, add 1 to the Attack value of this card.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move the same Wookie Raiders again.

name: VALUPID
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 pink Arrow Markers on this card. After moving and before attacking with Valupid, you may choose any opponent's Unique Hero within 6 clear sight spaces of Valupid. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, place an Arrow Marker on that Hero's Army Card. For the duration of the game, that figure loses its Class and Personality. Instead, it has the following characteristics: • Class: Stalker • Personality: Love-struck Amor's Arrows never affects Constructs and Soulborgs. Valupid may only use Amor's Arrows once per turn.
ability_2_desc: Valupid may not be attacked with a normal or special attack by a Love-struck Hero within 5 clear sight spaces of Valupid.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Valupid's movement ignore elevations. Valupid may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Valupid starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Xezbeth of the Inner Circle
ability_1_desc: Whenever attacking a Squad figure or a Hero with 3 or more wound markers on their Army Card, Xezbeth rolls 4 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Xezbeth destroys a figure, every figure adjacent to Xezbeth receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: All friendly figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Xezbeth subtract 1 from their Attack and Defense value. If there is not a friendly figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Xezbeth, subtract 2 from Xezbeth's Attack and Defense Value.

name: Zegryn Guard
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure with this Zegryn Guard, you may roll 1 additional attack die for each revealed Order Marker on the defending figure's army card.
ability_2_desc: When this Zegryn Guard attacks, he may attack one additional time.

name: Zissren
ability_1_desc: Each time Zissren attacks a non-adjacent small, medium, or large Hero with a normal attack and inflicts at least one wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, nothing happens. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: If Zissren attacks an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 2 dice to his attack.

name: SIREN
ability_1_desc: While a Siren is on a water space, add 2 to her Defense. If a Siren starts her turn on a water space, add 1 to her movement for that turn. A Siren does not have to stop her movement when entering a water space.
ability_2_desc: When a Siren inflicts a wound on an opponents' hero with its normal attack place one of your undestroyed Parasites that is not on the battlefield on the targeted figures card.

name: Easter Eggs
ability_1_desc: Easter Eggs do not start the game on the battlefield they must be summoned onto the battlefield by the Easter Bunny.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Easter Eggs, you may first take a turn with any Scout you control. Before moving the chosen Scout, you may destroy one adjacent Easter Egg you control. If you destroy a Easter Egg with Trail Rations remove 1 wound marker from the chosen Scout's Army Card

name: Crackling Sparks
ability_1_desc: When you roll for the Searing Intensity Special Power with any Fire Elemental you control add 1 to your die roll for each Crackling Spark you control that is adjacent to that Fire Elemental, up to a maximum of +3.
ability_2_desc: A Crackling Spark can never roll defense dice while it is on a water space.
ability_3_desc: Crackling Sparks never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage and they do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Lord of Blades
ability_1_desc: When the Lord of Blades attacks he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on the Lord of Blades card and taking a turn with the Lord of Blades you may take a turn with one other Fanatical Warforged hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When the Lord of Blades attacks a figure that is not a Warforged you may roll one additional attack die.

name: Sgt. Maj. Johnson
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Sgt. Maj. Johnson, you may take a turn with one of the following that you control: - 1 Spartan Hero or - 1 Spartan Squad or - 1 UNSC Marines Squad and/or 1 UNSC ODST Squad. You may choose which Squad to activate first. Any figure in the above list that is taking a turn instead of Sgt. Maj. Johnson must be within clear sight of Sgt. Maj. Johnson before moving.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Shotgun Blast Special Attack. Sgt. Maj. Johnson only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Sgt. Maj. Johnson cannot be affected by his own Shotgun Blast Special Attack.

name: Straightshot
ability_1_desc: When Straightshot rolls defense dice against an attacking figure that is not adjacent, if you roll at least one shield, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When Straightshot attacks a figure that is not a Warforged you may roll one additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: Straightshot can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Astinos
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Astinos is adjacent to at least 2 other friendly figures with the Phalanx special power, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Warforged Cultists
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Warforged Cultist you may add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. Any Warforged Cultist that uses Tactical Smite may not use Warforged Resolve on your opponent's next turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, a Warforged Cultist always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: War Machine
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 1, 2, or 3. War Machine starts each turn with 9 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2, or 3 attack dice. War Machine may keep making special attacks with 1, 2, or 3 attack dice until he has rolled all 9 attack dice. He may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. War Machine may use this special attack 2 times in the same turn. War Machine may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.

name: Sir Billius
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Sir Billius's movement, ignore elevations. Sir Billius may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sir Billius starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3+Special If Sir Billius is attacking an Undead figure, roll 2 additional dice for Searing Light Special Attack.

name: PYRO
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Flamethrower Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: If Pyro is standing on a shadow space or is adjacent to a jungle piece, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.

name: UNSC SNIPERS
ability_1_desc: When attacking with UNSC Snipers, each skull rolled counts for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: If a UNSC Sniper inflicts a wound on a non-adjacent hero, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 20 or higher, destroy the hero.
ability_3_desc: Anytime a UNSC Sniper attacks a hero that is at least 5 spaces a way, and you roll the 20 sided die for Headshot, you may add 2 to your die roll.

name: Rampage
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Rampage's army card you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Rampage's Army Card to activate Rage for the rest of the round. While Rage is active, add 2 to Rampage's Move and Attack values and subtract 2 from Rampage's Defense value.
ability_2_desc: When Rampage wounds a figure with his normal attack, he must attack one additional time, if possible.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Rampage always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Ehectal the Elder
ability_1_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 4 + Special. After attacking with this special attack, you may attack the same figure one additional time. Add 1 die to the additional attack for each space the defending figure moved this turn. The defending figure does not have to be within range or clear line of sight of Fulgur for the additional attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Ehectal the Elder's movement, ignore elevations. Ehectal the Elder may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ehectal the Elder starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ladon the Elder
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Combined Flamestrike Special Attack. Common Squad figures roll 2 less defense dice against Combined Flamestrike Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Ladon the Elder cannot be affected by his own Combined Flamestrike Special Attack. When attacking with Combined Flamestrike Special Attack Ladon the Elder may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Ladon the Elder's movement, ignore elevations. Ladon the Elder may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ladon the Elder starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Gryphon Rider
ability_1_desc: Range 5+Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to two other figures within 2 clear sights spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Storm Hammers Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Gryphon Rider's movement, ignore elevations. A Gryphon Rider may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Gryphon Rider starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Rorshack
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Rorshack's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Rorshack's Army Card to activate Rage for the duration of the round. While Rage is active, add 2 to Rorshack's Attack and Move values and subtract 2 from Rorshack's Defense value.
ability_2_desc: At the end of each turn taken with Rorshack while Rage is active, place one black fatigue marker on Rorshack's army card. For each fatigue marker on Rorshack's card subtract one fro his attack and move values. When you reveal an order marker on another figure's army card that you control remove one fatigue marker from Rorshack's card.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Rorshack always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Elam
ability_1_desc: When Elam attacks a Demon figure, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Elam's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Elam's Army Card to active Combat Expertise for the duration of the round. While Combat Expertise is active, add 2 to Elam's Defense value and subtract 2 from Elam's Attack value.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker and taking a turn with Elam, you may take a turn with one other figure you control with the Party of the Bearer special power.
ability_4_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Elam always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Phoenix
ability_1_desc: This Phoenix does not start the game on the battlefield. It must be summoned onto the battlefield by Kael'Thas.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Phoenix's movement, ignore elevations. Phoenix may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Phoenix starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Phoenix. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure recieves 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant Special Power are not affected by Searing Intensity.

name: Sontro'vhi
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally Sontro'Vhi may use his Watersoul Special Power if he is on a water space. When using Watersoul Special Power you may immediately place Sontro'Vhi on any space within 5 spaces. Sontro'vhi may not be placed on a molten lava or lava field space when using the Watersoul Special Power.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Sontro'vhi, you may choose a wounded friendly Hero figure adjacent to Sontro'vhi and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, remove 1 wound marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: Spartan Warriors
ability_1_desc: If every Army Card you control has a disciplined personality, Spartan Warriors receive 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if this Spartan Warrior is adjacent to at least 2 other friendly figures with the Phalanx special power, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Arthas
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Arthas. Roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 12 or higher, remove a wound marker from the chosen figure's card. If the chosen figure is not undead, instead place a wound marker on the chosen figure's card.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with Arthas you may destroy a figure you control that is adjacent to Arthas and remove all wound markers from Arthas' army card. Death Pact may only be used once per game.
ability_3_desc: Arthas may use Animate Dead at the beginning of the round before Order Markers are placed. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher place any two common squad figures that were destroyed in the previous round adjacent to Arthas. Immediately take a turn with the placed figures, then immediately destroy the placed figures. While the placed figures are on the board all of their special powers are negated.

name: Jaina Proudmoore
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to that figure are affected by Blizzard Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may roll a 20-sided die. On a roll of 14 or higher, place a previously destroyed Water Elemental within three clear sight spaces of Jaina Proudmoore. You may immediately take a turn with any Water Elementals you summon.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normally, you may roll a 20-sided die. On a roll of 19 or higher you may choose any empty space that is on the same level and within 10 spaces of Jaina Proudmoore. Place Jaina Proudmoore on this space. Any friendly figures that were adjacent to Jaina Proudmoore before using Mass Teleport may be placed on adjacent empty spaces. Figures moved by Mass Teleport do not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Aldrak the Elder
ability_1_title: King of the Sons of Braxas
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card and instead of taking a turn with Aldrak the Elder, you may take a turn with one of the following: -3 Small, Wild Dragon figures you control. or -1 Large, Tricky Dragon figure you control.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different small, or medium figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Aldrak the Elder. One at a time, roll the twenty sided die for each chosen figure. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll an 8 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 15 or higher, destroy the chosen hero.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Aldrak the Elder's movement, ignore elevations. Aldrak the Elder may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Aldrak the Elder starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Easter Bunny
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with the Easter Bunny you may attempt to summon the Easter Eggs if they are in your army and they have not yet been successfully summoned. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you must place all 3 Easter Eggs on empty spaces within 6 clear sight spaces of the Easter Bunny. Any Easter Eggs that you cannot place on the battlefield are immediately destroyed and cannot be summoned again. When the Easter Eggs are summoned, you may immediately take a turn with them.
