ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Easter Bunny may use his Hop 4. Hop 4 has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Hop 4, ignore elevations. Easter Bunny may hop over water without stopping, hop over figures without becoming engaged, and hop over obstacles such as ruins. Easter Bunny may not Hop 4 more than 12 levels up or down in a single Hop 4. If Easter Bunny is engaged whe he starts to Hop 4, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When an Easter Egg you control is adjacent to Easter Bunny opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack that Easter Egg with a normal attack.

name: ABEL
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Abel's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Abel's Army Card to activate Chastisement for the duration of the round. While Chastisement is active, add 1 to Abel's Attack value and 1 to the Defense values of adjacent friendly figures for each wound marker on his Army Card.

name: ACKERLEY
ability_1_desc: Ackerley adds 2 to his Attack and Defense value when engaged to 3 or more opponent's figures.
ability_2_desc: Ackerley rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against Heroes whose point value is greater than his.

name: Abomination
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to Abomination are affected by Stomp. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. If Abomination moved with Super Leap this turn, he must attack with Stomp.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, Abomination may move up to 10 spaces. When counting spaces for this movement, ignore elevations, terrain effects, figures, and obstacles. Abomination may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. Abomination will take passing swipes before leaping.

name: Akara Infiltrators
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Akara Infiltrators, you may choose to add 2 to their Move, Range, or Attack value this turn.

name: Agent Thema
ability_1_desc: When defending against any attack from an enemy figure, instead of defending normally, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-13, Agent Thema takes as many wounds as skulls were rolled. If you roll an 14 or higher, Agent Thema takes no wounds.

name: Agent Lilith
ability_1_desc: Agent Lilith can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: If Agent Lilith is making a normal attack on an adjacent figure, she rolls 3 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: After attacking with Agent Lilith, if she is unengaged, she may attack one additional time.

name: Abyssal Maw
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to Abyssal Maw. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally with Abyssal Maw, you may immediately place him on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of Abyssal Maw and is no higher than 1 level above Abyssal Maw's height or 3 levels below Abyssal Maw's base. If Abyssal Maw is engaged when he starts his Underground Movement, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Agent Fawcett
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with any Agent you control, except Agent Fawcett, you may move Agent Fawcett up to 3 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with a Stealth Marker on this Army Card. Before taking a turn with Agent Fawcett, you must remove a Stealth Marker from this Army Card if possible. If at least one Stealth Marker is on this Army Card, Agent Fawcett has no visible hit zone and is not not attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Agent Carter
ability_1_desc: All Agents you control, except Agent Carter, move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Agent Carter, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound. Figures may be targeted only as they move into engagement with Agent Carter.
ability_3_desc: When Agent Carter attacks a non-adjacent figure, she may add 2 to her attack. If she does not, she may make one additional attack on a non-adjacent figure.

name: Admiral EJ-1M
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative, you may move any Order Markers from this card onto any of your Pirate or Captain Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2 + Special. You may attack up to 4 times with Boarding Party Special Attack. Roll one additional attack die when attacking a figure engaged with a Pirate or Captain you control. After each attack, if that was the first time you attacked the defending figure this turn, you may move one Pirate or Captain figure you control up to 4 spaces. You may not move the same figure more than once in a turn using Boarding Party Special Attack.

name: Aang
ability_1_desc: Start the game with one Avatar State marker. Once per game, after all Order Markers have been placed, you may place the Avatar State Marker on this card. While the Avatar State marker is one this card, Aang adds 3 to his Move, Range, Attack, and Defense Values, and if he would be destroyed, he instead takes one wound. At the end of the round, remove the Avatar State marker from the game.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with Aang, you may instead remove one order marker from an adjacent figure's army card. Aang and any figure within two spaces of Aang may not attack any figures on that army card for the remainder of the round.
ability_3_desc: Figures that have the Flying or Stealth Flying power subtract 1 from their defense dice when attacked by Aang. Aang is never attacked when leaving an engagement and is always considered to have height advantage on non-Flying figures.
ability_4_desc: When Aang is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Aang can take from this attack is one.

name: Agent Bale
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, choose any two small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces from Agent Bale. Roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may switch the two chosen figures with each other. If a Transposed figure is engaged, that figure does not receive any leaving engagement attacks. Agent Bale may not use Telekinetic Transposition on herself.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Agent Bale, you may first make a normal attack with one other Agent figure you control.

name: BATTLEFIST
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. When attacking with this special attack this figure always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Battlefist's power.

name: Agent Kelvin
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of each round, after placing Order Markers, you may remove or replace Agent Kelvin's helmet. If Agent Kelvin is not wearing his helmet, add 3 to his Range and subtract 1 from his Defense.
ability_2_desc: Small and medium figures roll 1 fewer defense die against a normal attack from Agent Kelvin. When attacking any figure with the Lava Resistant special power, Agent Kelvin adds 1 skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: While Agent Kelvin is on a water or ice space, that space and all same-level water spaces adjacent to him are considered normal ice spaces. Figures do not have to stop their movement on normal ice spaces.

name: Aestubelua
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Aestubelua and before taking a turn with her, you may first take a turn with any Moltarn squad you control.
ability_2_desc: Aestubelua starts each game with 2 molten lava tiles on her Army Card. If Aestubelua ends her turn on an empty land space, you may place a molten lava tile from her Army Card onto the space she occupies if the molten lava tile fits normally onto that space.
ability_3_desc: All Moltarns which begin their turn within 3 clear sight spaces of Aestubelua add 1 to their movement that turn.
ability_4_desc: Aestubelua never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Adeptus Ruststalkers
ability_1_desc: Figures attacked by Adeptus Ruststalkers may not add extra shields or roll extra dice by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph. Destructible Objects are not affected by Transonic Blades.
ability_2_desc: If there are no opponent's figures within 3 spaces with a clear line of sight on an Adeptus Ruststalker you control, then that Ruststalker has no hit zone.
ability_3_desc: Before moving normally, Adeptus Ruststalkers may use Stealth Vault 15. Stealth Vault has a move of 3. When counting spaces for leaping, ignore elevations. Ruststalkers may leap over water, over figures, and over obstacles. Ruststalkers may not leap more than 15 levels up or down in a single leap. Ruststalkers will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Stealth Vault.

name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
ability_1_desc: You may cast an additional white spell the turn you activate this Pilgrim. The spell uses this Pilgrim for line of sight. This Pilgrim may summon white creatures.

name: AK'ASH'ECK
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Ak'ash'eck's Army Card, before taking a turn with Ak'ash'eck, you may take a turn with two Common Sahuagin Heroes you control.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Ak'ash'eck, if you inflicted at least one wound to the defending figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may inflict one wound on the figure just attacked or an opponent's figure adjacent to Ak'ash'eck.
ability_3_desc: While Ak'ash'eck is on a water space, add 2 to his Defense. If Ak'ash'eck starts his turn on a water space, add 1 to his movement for that turn. Ak'ash'eck does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space.

name: ANCALAGON
ability_1_desc: Non-Huge figures attacked by Ancalagon's normal nonadjacent attacks never roll defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Range 6 Attack 6. Wave of Fire Special Attack affects all small, medium, and large units within 6 clear sight spaces of Ancalagon. Wave of Fire Special Attack may only be used once per round.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ancalagon's movement, ignore elevations. Ancalagon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Ancalagon is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Ancalagon may end his move on top of Squad figures. If he does, destroy those figures.

name: Nair Hiri
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Nair Hiri, you can take a turn with any dragon you control.
ability_2_desc: Nair Hiri is never attacked when leaving an engagement with a common figure.

name: Androvil Keghead
ability_1_desc: If Androvil is unengaged and adjacent to a Mok you control, then instead of attacking with Androvil you may remove him from the battlefield and place him on Mok's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 2. Choose a nonadjacent figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Gunner Mod Explosive Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. If Androvil is on the Army Card of Mok, you may use this Special Attack in place of one of Mok's Gunner Special Attacks. While engaged, Mok may target and attack nonadjacent figures with Gunner Mod Explosive Special Attack.

name: Archers of Gondor
ability_1_desc: When attacking a nonadjacent figure, if an Archer of Gondor has a Height Advantage he rolls one additional die when attacking that figure.

name: Dread Reaper
ability_1_desc: When a Planeswalker summons this Dread Reaper, place 5 damage markers on that Planeswalker.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Dread Reaper's movement, ignore elevations. A Dread Reaper may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Dread Reaper starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Tracker Mask
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with this figure, you may choose any other figure on the battlefield that is not a Soulborg or destructible object. Add 1 to this figure's Move number for each Wound Marker on the chosen figure's card, up to a maximum of +3 for Scent. If you do, this figure may attack only the chosen figure this turn.
ability_3_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Tracker Mask's power.

name: Ant-Man
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and before taking a turn with Ant-Man, you may first take a turn with either one Insect squad you control, or up to two different Insect heroes you control.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Ant-Man may use Mighty Leap. Mighty Leap has a move of 5. When counting spaces for his Mighty Leap movement, ignore elevations. Ant-Man may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Ant-Man may not leap more than 5 levels up or down in a single leap. Ant-Man cannot attack on any turn that he moves with Mighty Leap.
ability_3_desc: Ant-Man only takes leaving engagement attacks from Tiny figures.

name: Angel
ability_1_desc: After placing Order Markers and before rolling initiative, you may move Angel up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: If Angel is unengaged and a small or medium figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Angel receives any wounds from a normal attack, before placing any Wound Markers on that figure's Army Card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, ignore all wounds and immediately place the figure on an empty space adjacent to Angel. Figures moved by Guardian Angel will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Angel's movement, ignore elevations. Angel may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Angel starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Arboris
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of every round, you may place a green Overgrowth Marker on this card. When Arboris receives one or more wounds, you may remove 1 Overgrowth Marker from this Army Card to ignore all wounds. A maximum of 3 Overgrowth Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking or defending with Arboris, you may roll 1 additional die for every Overgrowth Marker on this Army Card.

name: Arkham Inmates
ability_1_desc: If an Arkham Inmate inflicts a wound, he or she may attack again. An Arkham Inmate may continue attacking until he or she does not inflict a wound.
ability_2_desc: Control of this Army Card may not be changed by any Special Power or glyph.

name: Arwen Undómiel
ability_1_desc: All friendly Elves adjacent to Arwen add 1 to their defense.
ability_2_desc: When Arwen attacks, she may attack one additional time.

name: Angel
ability_1_desc: Immediately after a friendly figure within 3 spaces of Angel rolls defense against a normal attack, you may move Angel adjacent to the defending figure, if possible. If Angel ends this move also engaged with the attacking figure, you may roll 1 unblockable attack die against that figure. When Angel uses Dark Avenger, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Angel, if he inflicted one or more wounds with his normal attack, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-4, choose an opponent to take control of Angel. Remove all Order Markers from this card, then give this card to the chosen opponent. If Angel is controlled by a player that did not control Angel at the start of the game, Angel cannot use his Dark Avenger special power, rolls one additional attack die, and follows Utgar.
ability_3_desc: At the end of the round, remove one Wound Marker from this card.

name: Aquaman
ability_1_desc: Aquaman does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. If Aquaman ends his normal movement on a water space, you may immediately place him on any empty water space wtihin 5 spaces. If Aquaman is engaged when he starts to dive, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Aquaman is on a water space, add 1 to his attack and defense.
ability_3_title: Assault From The Deep Special Attack
ability_3_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Aquaman may target any figure that is adjacent to a water space or that occupies a water space with Assault From The Deep Special Attack. No line of sight is needed.

name: Army Of The Dead
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for the Army Of The Dead's movement, ignore elevations. The Army Of The Dead may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a figure from the Army Of The Dead starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Applejack
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Applejack, you may choose one small or medium figure within 3 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 6 levels above Applejack's height or 6 levels below Applejack's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty space adjacent to Applejack. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Lasso, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If Applejack begins her turn adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece, she may move 2 additional spaces. If Applejack ends her turn adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece, she may attack one additional time.

name: ARKMER
ability_1_desc: When defending with Arkmer, add as many defense dice as the number of Elves you control adjacent to Arkmer.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Arkmer, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the opponent's figure recieves a wound. Figures may be targetted only as they move into engagement with Arkmer.
ability_3_desc: When Arkmer rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: ARTHUR
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Hero you control for Arthur to 'kick for. After revealing an Order Marker on the Army Card of that Unique Hero and taking a turn with that Hero, you may take an immediate turn with Arthur.
ability_2_desc: When Arthur is targeted for an attack from an opponent's figure, you must roll the 20-sided die. Add 4 to your die roll if Arthur's Hero is adjacent to the targeting figure. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure cannot attack Arthur this turn.

name: Artificer
ability_1_desc: Artifice starts the game with up to 2 temporary non-artifact treasure glyphs on his army card. When Artifice or an adjacent friendly figure activates a temporary non-artifact temporary treasure glyph, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, place the glyph face up on this army card. Otherwise, destroy the glyph.
ability_2_desc: While Artificer is on a lava field space, that space and all lava field spaces adjacent to him become dungeon spaces. While he is on a molten lava space, that space and all molten lava spaces adjacent to him become shadow spaces.
ability_3_desc: While Artificer is on a dungeon or shaodow space, he adds 1 to his Range, Attack and Defense.

name: Aspect of Klexkor
ability_1_desc: The Aspect of Klexkor does not begin the game on the battlefield. He must be summoned by the Idol of Klexkor.
ability_2_desc: When the Aspect Of Klexkor attacks, he may attack up to five additional times. He can only attack the same figure up to three times.
ability_3_desc: The maximum number of wounds the Aspect Of Klexkor can receive from a single attack is one.
ability_4_desc: Aspect of Klexkor can move through small and medium figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with small and medium figures.

name: Asterios
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Asterios, you may move Asterios up to 5 spaces. Asterios can attack up to 3 times with Furious Charge Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as Asterios is on a space where he can end his movement. Asterios cannot attack the same figure more than once on a single turn. Asterios will never take any leaving engagement attacks from small or medium Squad figures while using Furious Charge Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from small or medium Squad figures, Asterios receives 3 additional defense dice.

name: Aubrien Archers
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn the Aubrien Archers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with the Aubrien Archers.
ability_2_desc: When a Aubrien Archer rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Asura, The Storm Giant
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to both Asura, The Storm Giant and the chosen figure are also affected by Sweeping Sword Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any small, medium, or large unique hero within 6 clear sight spaces of Asura, The Storm Giant. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, the chosen figure receive one wound. If you roll 13-20, the chosen figure receive 2 wounds.

name: Azurite Warlord
ability_1_desc: When Azurite Warlord attacks, you may add 3 to his Attack number. If you do, at the end of Azurite Warlord's turn place 1 wound marker on Azurite Warlord's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Azurite Warlord does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.

name: Bane
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Bane, you may place a Wound Marker on this Army Card to add 1 to Bane's move and attack for the rest of the turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Bane. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll defense dice if attacked by Bane this turn.

name: Baran Krael
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Baran Krael, you may move up to 4 Guards you control up to 4 spaces each or all Guards you control up to 2 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with Baran Krael, you may choose any opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Baran Krael that is engaged with any other figure you control. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure recieves one wound.

name: Nanoc the Barbarian
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Nanoc the Barbarian, roll the 20-sided die. Count the number of wounds that have been inflicted by Nanoc this turn. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Nanoc the Barbarian.
ability_2_desc: If Nanoc the Barbarian would receive one or more wounds, before placing wound markers, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the number of wound markers on Nanoc's Army Card. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore any wounds Nanoc would have received.

name: ATHED
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, choose a small or medium figure Athed moved through this turn. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.
ability_2_desc: Athed can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Athed never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Barbarians of Coruana Tribe
ability_1_desc: When attacking a figure that is adjacent to another Barbarian of Coruana Tribe, add 1 skull to whatever is rolled. Figures with the fearless personality are not affected by this ability.
ability_2_desc: When a Barbarian of Coruana Tribe is destroy, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, the figure that destroy you, will receive one wound.

name: Bane
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Bane, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, Bane may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack and select one Small figure adjacent to Bane. Place the selected figure adjacent to the targeted figure before attacking. After attacking, the moved figure receives one wound. Figures moved by Hurling Small Children Special Attack do not receive any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Bane
ability_1_desc: After attacking normally with Bane, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, Bane may attack one additional time. Bane may only use Mad Swings once per turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack and select one Small figure adjacent to Bane. Place the selected figure adjacent to the targeted figure before attacking. After attacking, the moved figure receives one wound. Bane may target non-adjacent figures for Hurling Small Children Special Attack even if he is engaged. Figures moved by Hurling Small Children Special Attack do not receive any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Asterios
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Asterios, you may move Asterios up to 5 spaces. Asterios can attack up to 3 times with Furious Charge Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move. Asterios cannot attack the same figure more than once. When moving with Furious Charge Special Attack, Asterios never takes leaving engagement attacks from small or medium Squad figures.
ability_2_desc: Asterios rolls 3 additional defense dice when defending against a normal attack from a small or medium Squad figure.

name: Batgirl
ability_1_desc: Figures attacking Batgirl never have height advantage.
ability_2_desc: Instead of her normal move, Batgirl may use Grapple Line. Grapple Line has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Batgirl's Grapple Line movement, ignore elevations. Batgirl may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. If Batgirl is engaged when she starts to Grapple Line, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. When Batgirl attacks with her Batarang Special Attack, she may attack one additional time.

name: Beakface Sneaks
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Beakface Sneaks, if at least one Beakface Sneak attacked, you may move up to two Raptorians that you did not move this turn up to 6 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When a Beakface Sneak rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 3 defense dice to the defense roll.
ability_3_desc: Beakface Sneaks never roll for falling damage.

name: Azula
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Azula, if she inflicted one or more wounds with her normal attack this turn, you may take an immediate turn with a Unique Hero you control within clear sight of Azula and you may not take any additional turns with any figures you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. When rolling attack dice for Lightning Strike Special Attack, all skulls rolled count as two additional hits.
ability_3_desc: If Azula inflicts one or more wounds with her normal attack, you may roll an attack die for each wound received. The figure receives one additional wound for each skull rolled. Azula rolls 3 fewer dice for her normal attack and may not inflict additional wounds when attacking a figure with the Lava Resistant Special Power.
ability_4_desc: When Azula is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Azula can take from this attack is one.

name: Bespin Guard
ability_1_desc: This unit rolls 2 additional defense dice if adjacent to a higher level hex that passes through the LOS of the attacking enemy.

name: Bats of Morindan
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Bats of Morindan, you may first take a turn with any medium Devourer Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If all of your remaining order markers are placed on Army Cards for Undead figures, you may move and attack with up to 9 Bats of Morindan you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for the Bats of Morindan's movement, ignore elevations. Bats of Morindan may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Bat of Morindan starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: BELRAK
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. If Belrak fails to inflict a wound when using Reckless Thrust Special Attack, place a wound marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Belrak is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Orc Archers adjacent to Belrak receive an additional attack die and an additional defense die.

name: BLACK BEAR
ability_1_desc: At the end of every round, you may move all unengaged Black Bears you control up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: A Black Bear rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against small or medium figures.

name: BELLYDANCER
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any Unique Hero adjacent to this Bellydancer with at least one Treasure Glyph on its Army Card. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, then take one Treasure Glyph choosen at random from that Hero's Army Card and place it on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When this Bellydancer receives one or more wounds, before removing this Bellydancer, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, ignore any wounds.

name: BILIDE6
ability_1_desc: If Order Marker 2 is on Bilide6, he subtracts 4 from his Move value that turn. If Order Marker 3 is on Bilide6, he subtracts 8 from his Move value that turn.
ability_2_desc: If Order Marker 1 is not on Bilide6's Army Card, he adds 3 to his Defense value. If Order Markers 1 and 2 are not on Bilide6's Army Card, he adds 3 to his Attack value.
ability_3_desc: After attacking, if Bilide6 is engaged with at least 2 opponent's figures, he may attack one additional time.

name: Black Hart Power Armor
ability_1_desc: When attacking Black Hart Power Armor with EMP attacks, subtract 4 attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Black Hart Power Armor is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Black Hart Power Armor, you may first take a turn with any Mariedian Champion you control.

name: Beast
ability_1_desc: Before moving, remove one unrevealed Order Marker from this card to choose an adjacent figure. That figure's controller removes the X Order Marker or the lowest numbered unrevealed Order Marker from that figure's card.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, you must roll the d20. If you roll a 1, place one wound marker on this card. If you roll 2-11, add 1 to Beast's Attack. If you roll 12-19, add 2 to Beast's Attack. If you roll a 20, add 4 to Beast's Attack.
ability_3_desc: Beast may attack up to three times each turn. Beast cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_4_desc: Instead of his normal move, Beast may move up to 3 spaces. When counting spaces for this movement, ignore elevations, terrain effects, figures, and obstacles. Beast may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap. Beast will take any passing swipes when he starts to leap.

name: Bizarro Troupe
ability_1_desc: At the start of every round, after all Order Markers have been placed, roll 3 Combat Dice and place them on this Army Card. Add 1 to the Attack value of this card for every Skull rolled and 1 to the Defense value of this card for every Shield rolled for the duration of the round.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a Bizarro Troupe Deserter destroys a figure, you may move one Bizarro Troupe Deserter you control up to four spaces. Figures moved by Bloodlust Dance never take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Belvaust Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Each time Belvaust Esenwein destroys an adjacent figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Belvaust cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Belvaust Esenwein. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-13, nothing happens. If you roll 14-16, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. If you roll 17-19, the chosen figure receives 2 wounds. If you roll 20 or higher, the chosen figure receives 3 wounds. Bat's Bite does not affect Soulborgs or destructible objects. Belvaust cannot use Bat's Bite if he has 3 or more wounds on his Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Belvaust Esenwein's movement, ignore elevations. Belvaust may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Belvaust starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: AT-ST
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving, the AT-ST may choose a small or medium squad figure that is adjacent, on the same level, and on a space where the AT-ST may end its movement. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1 or higher the chosen figure is destroyed and AT-ST...

name: Blade Champion
ability_1_desc: When a Blade Champion attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Orc Warriors adjacent to a Blade Champion roll an additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: A Blade Champion is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Blaadarung
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Blaadarung, if Blaadarung has at least 1 wound, you may choose any opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Blaadarung. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove 1 wound marker from this Army Card and the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Blaadarung receives 1 or more wounds from a normal or special attack and is not destroyed, you may choose any empty space that is on the same level and within 10 spaces of Blaadarung. Place Blaadarung on the chosen space. When Blaadarung starts to Teleport, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagment attacks.

name: Bloodspike Behemoth
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 3 Choose a figure to attack. Choose one other adjacent figure that is also affected by Tailsweep Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for each affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. This Bloodspike Behemoth cannot be affected by his own Tailsweep Special Attack.

name: Blackened Teeth
ability_1_desc: After a Blackened Tooth destroys an adjacent figure that is not a Soulborg, you may place a wound marker on that Blackened Tooth's base, or two wound markers if the destroyed figure was a Unique Hero. No more than two wound markers may be placed on a Blackened Tooth's base by this special power. Add one to a Blackened Tooth's Move and Attack for each wound marker on its base. Whenever a Blackened Tooth receives one or more wounds from an attack or special power, for each wound received you may instead remove a wound marker from that Blackened Tooth's base to ignore that wound.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defence dice against a normal or special attack, The Blackened Teeth always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Blade
ability_1_desc: When attacking an Undead figure with a normal attack, Blade adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. Blade is never affected by the Chilling Touch special power.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. After attacking normally, Blade may attack with his Blade Throw Special Attack. When attacking an Undead figure with Blade Throw Special Attack, any die result that is not a shield counts as a skull.
ability_3_desc: If Blade ends his turn adjacent to one or more friendly human figures, you must choose one of those figures and roll one unblockable attack die against it.

name: Bodyguard
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Army Card of any Crime Lord or Mastermind you control, instead of moving that Crime Lord or Mastermind, you may move up to 3 Bodyguards you control up to 5 spaces each. A Bodyguard moved by Security Detail will take leaving engagement attacks. A Bodyguard may not move more than once each turn.

name: Bondsmen of Götland
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Bondsmen of Götland, you may first take a turn with any Human Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: When defending, each Bondsman of Götland adds 1 defense die if the figure is adjacent to at least 2 other Bondsmen of Götland. If an order marker is revealed on this Army Card, add 2 defense dice when defending against normal ranged attacks.

name: Bleakwoode Banshee
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different Squad figures within 4 clear sight spaces of the Bleakwoode Banshee. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen figure and, if possible, place one of your previously destroyed Shades of Bleakwoode on an empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of the Banshee. Undead are not affected by Wail of the Banshee.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, you may place a Phantasm Marker on this Army Card. When you take a turn with the Bleakwoode Banshee, you must remove a Phantasm Marker from this Army Card if possible. If at least one Phantasm Marker is on this Army Card, the Banshee has no visible hit zone. A maximum of 1 Phantasm Marker can be placed on this card.
ability_3_desc: Stealth Flying

name: Bloodbath Vipers
ability_1_desc: After you take a turn with Bloodbath Vipers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with Bloodbath Vipers. Add 1 to the Move and Attack value of this card for each successful Rabid Frenzy during a single turn.
ability_2_desc: When a Bloodbath Viper is attacked with a normal attack and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll an attack die. If a skull is rolled, you may inflict 1 wound on any figure that is adjacent to that Bloodbath Viper. Figures affected by Dying Swipe cannot roll any defense dice. After using Dying Swipe, remove that Bloodbath Viper from the battlefield.
ability_3_desc: Bloodbath Vipers do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.

name: Bramm Helmsgold
ability_1_desc: All friendly Dwarves adjacent to Bramm Helmsgold add 1 to their Defense value.
ability_2_desc: When attacking or defending with Bramm Helmsgold, you may use Reckless Powerhouse. When rolling dice with Reckless Powerhouse, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit and all shields rolled count for one additional block. After using Reckless Powerhouse, Bramm always receives one wound, even if this would destroy Bramm.

name: Blackout
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Blackout's Rotor-Blade Special Attack inflicts a wound, he may attack again with his Rotor-Blade Special Attack. Blackout may continue attacking with his Rotor-Blade Special Attack until he does not inflict a wound.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking with a normal attack, Blackout may attempt to use his EMP Blast. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 16 or higher any small or medium figure attacked by Blackout this turn may roll no more than 1 die for defense.
ability_3_desc: Range 7. Attack 2. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Missile Launch Special Attack. Blackout only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Blackout can be affected by his own Missile Launch Special Attack.
ability_4_desc: When counting spaces for Blackout's movement, ignore elevations. Blackout may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Blackout starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Brandis Skyhunter
ability_1_desc: If Brandis Skyhunter is attacking a non-adjacent figure that has the Flying or Stealth Flying special power, add 2 dice to Brandis Skyhunter's attack.
ability_2_desc: Each time Brandis Skyhunter destroys an opponent's non-adjacent figure, you make take another turn with Brandis Skyhunter.
ability_3_desc: When Brandis Skyhunter rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Srillu Bog Vermin
ability_1_desc: If a Srillu Bog Vermin is on a Water or Swamp Water space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to that Srillu Bog Vermin to attack it with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure engaged to a Srillu Bog Vermin you control, one at a time. If you roll a 16 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Soulborgs, Srillu Bog Vermin and destructible objects are not affected by Infectious.
ability_3_desc: When a Srillu Bog Vermin attacks an opponents' figure and inflicts one or more wounds, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled if the attacking Srillu Bog Vermin is on a Swamp Grass or Swamp Water space.

name: Brothers Gror
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. One at a time do the following with each Brother: Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Spread Shot Special Attack. The attacking Brother only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. The attacking Brother cannot be affected by its own Spread Shot Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When the Brothers Gror are within 6 clear sight spaces of each other add 1 to their defense dice.

name: Bulldozer
ability_1_desc: Bulldozer may add 2 to his Move number as long as he is unengaged prior to moving. Bulldozer must end his movement adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Bulldozer, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Bulldozer at the start of this turn, Bulldozer receives 3 additional attack dice.

name: Blizzard
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, before you place order markers, you may chose to activate Cryostat Cold Aura for the duration of the round. While Cryostat Cold Aura is active, the space Blizzard is on and all spaces within 2 spaces of Blizzard are considered heavy snow spaces if they are land spaces, or slippery ice spaces if they are non-land spaces. At the end of each round Cryostat Cold Aura is active, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure within 2 spaces of Blizzard. Add 4 to your roll when rolling for a figure with Cold Weakness. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Molten lava spaces, lava field spaces, and figures with Cold Resistance are not affected by Cryostat Cold Aura.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Blizzard may use Ice Slide. Ice Slide has a move of 3. Blizzard has Flying while moving with Ice Slide. Blizzard cannot move over molten lava or lava field spaces with Ice Slide. Before moving with Ice Slide, you may add 3 to Ice Slide's move, if you do, Blizzard can not move up levels during his Ice Slide move and must end his Ice Slide move on a lower level than his current location.
ability_3_desc: If Blizzard's Cryostat Cold Aura is not active, figures attacked by Blizzard subtract 2 from their defense dice, plus an additional defense die if they have Cold Weakness or Water Weakness. Figures with Cold Resistance are not affected by Frost Blast.
ability_4_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Brutus
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Brutus, if he is unengaged, you may take a turn with an Athlete Squad or Hero that you control that follows Einar.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium non-flying figure adjacent to Brutus. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, you may place the figure on any empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of Brutus. If the figure was placed on a non-water space on a level equal to or lower than Brutus' height, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, the thrown figure receives 2 wounds. The thrown figure does not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Brimstone
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Brimstone, if this Army Card contains fewer than 4 yellow Growing Heat markers, you may place 1 Growing Heat marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack Special. Before rolling attack dice, remove all Growing Heat markers from this card. Roll one attack die for each marker that was removed. Heat Blast Special Attack affects all figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Brimstone. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Heat Blast Special Attack does not affect Brimstone or figures with the Lava Resistant special power.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Brimstone's movement, ignore elevations. Brimstone may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Brimstone starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Buffy Summers
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose an opponent's Unique Hero. When Buffy Summers attacks the chosen Hero with a normal attack, use the white combat dice. All blanks rolled count as skulls.
ability_2_desc: Undead and Demon figures roll 2 fewer defense dice against Buffy Summers' normal attack. Buffy Summers may attack any or all figures adjacent to her with her normal attack. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3 + Special. When Buffy Summers attacks a figure that is exactly 2 spaces away with this special attack, roll 2 additional attack dice. After attacking with this special attack, Buffy Summers may attack with this special attack one additional time.

name: Bywater Ruffians
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Small Squad figure, if there are no Heroes an opponent controls within 4 clear sight spaces of that Squad figure, then that Ruffian rolls one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with a Bywater Ruffian, all excess shields rolled by the defending figure count as unblockable hits inflicted by the defending figure on that Bywater Ruffian.

name: Flash
ability_1_desc: Flash may move through all figures, never takes leaving engagement attacks, and does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces. After taking a turn with Flash, if Flash did not use his Fist Fusillade Special Attack this turn, Flash may move up to an additional 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: RANGE 1. ATTACK 1, 2, or 3. Start the attack with 12 attack dice. You may attack with 1, 2, or 3 attack dice until all of the 12 attack dice have been rolled.
ability_3_desc: When Flash defends against an attack from a figure without the Superspeed special power, and you roll at least one blank, Flash takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces.

name: Blade of Lorien
ability_1_desc: This figure gains the following special power:
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 5 Roll 2 less attack dice against Large and Huge figures. If the defending figure is not destroyed by Throwing Knife Special Attack, place this glyph on an empty space adjacent to that figure. If the defending figure is destroyed, place this glyph power-side up onto the space that figure previously occupied.

name: Chen Tang
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Palm Markers on this card. After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium Unique Hero adjacent to Chen Tang without any Palm Markers on its Army Card. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, place a Palm Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. For the duration of the game, at the end of each round, each other figure with one of your Palm Markers on its card receives a wound. Palm Markers cannot be placed on Monk Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: Chen Tang may attack any and all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.

name: Acolytes of Vorganund
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose any or all Unique Demon Heroes you control to be Bound Heroes of the Acolytes of Vorganund. Place those Heroes on this card. Once per turn, instead of moving normally with an Acolyte of Vorganund, you may destroy that Acolyte and place a Bound Hero from this card on the space that Acolyte occupied.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Acolytes of Vorganund, you may take a turn with a Bound Hero you control. If you do, and a figure other than the Bound Hero received wounds or was destroyed during the Bound Hero's turn, nothing happens. Otherwise, destroy an Acolyte of Vorganund you control.

name: Buccaneers of Tortuga
ability_1_desc: When attacking a figure that does not have any revealed Order Markers on its Army Card (or cards if there is more than one Common Army Card for that figure), Buccaneers of Tortuga receive 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: If a Buccaneer of Tortuga you control is attacked by an opponent's figure that is not adjacent and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-14, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 15 or higher, that Buccaneer of Tortuga takes no damage and may immediately move up to 3 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Buccaneers of Tortuga are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Ebon Armor
ability_1_desc: While an Ebon Armor is engaged, it has no visible Hit Zone.
ability_2_desc: When an Ebon Armor you control is destroyed, you may place it on a Unique Human Army Card in your army that does not already have an Ebon Armor on it.
ability_3_desc: For the entire game, when a Unique Human Hero or Squad figure you control is destroyed by a normal or special attack or leaving engagement attack by an opponent's figure, you may replace it with your previously destroyed Ebon Armor from that figure's Army Card, if possible.

name: Honor Guard of the Blasted Lands
ability_1_desc: All Honor Guards you control adjacent to at least one other Honor Guard you control receive 1 automatic skull when attacking.
ability_2_desc: At the end of each round, you may move up to 6 Honor Guard figures you control up to 2 spaces each. Honor Guards must be able to move adjacent to a friendly figure to use Protective Repositioning.

name: Eilan Sidhe
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Eilan Sidhe, all Eilan Sidhe you control adjacent to a tree or bush may use Through the Green. To use Through the Green, place the Eilan Sidhe on any unoccupied space adjacent to any tree or bush within 4 clear sight spaces of that Eilan Sidhe. If an Eilan Sidhe is engaged when it uses Through the Green, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: You may attack with any 2 Eilan Sidhe you control, even Eilan Sidhe that did not move this turn.
ability_3_desc: When an Eilan Sidhe rolls defense dice while adjacent to a tree or bush, one shield will block all damage.

name: Deltacron
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack Special. Choose any figure that is engaged with Deltacron to attack and roll 5 attack dice. If Deltacron is not engaged after that attack, you may choose a figure within 4 spaces of Deltacron to attack and roll 3 attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on Deltacron, after taking Deltacron's turn, if Deltacron's normal or special attack destroyed a figure or destructible object, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 3 or lower, choose an opponent. That opponent will now take a turn with Deltacron, but will not be able to view any unrevealed Order Markers on this card. At the end of that turn, control of Deltacron returns to you. All Order Markers that were on Deltacron's Army Card will stay on his Army Card.

name: Kozil
ability_1_desc: When Kozil receives one or more wounds from a normal or special attack but is not destroyed, you must immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, inflict 1 wound on a figure adjacent to Kozil, if possible.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Kozil, if Kozil attacked a small or medium figure and rolled at least 1 skull and Kozil is still adjacent to that figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, inflict 2 wounds on that figure.

name: Clawfoot Interceptor
ability_1_desc: While this Clawfoot Interceptor is flying, you may choose one small figure or one friendly medium Raptorian figure that it passed over this turn. Place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to this Clawfoot Interceptor at the end of its move. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Claw Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Claw Grab.
ability_2_desc: If this Clawfoot Interceptor uses its Flying special power this turn, it receives 2 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Clawfoot Interceptor's movement, ignore elevations. A Clawfoot Interceptor may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Clawfoot Interceptor starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Skull Demon
ability_1_desc: Common figures attacking this Skull Demon with a normal attack subtract 1 from their attack dice.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to this Skull Demon with a range of 1 who follow Valkrill add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: Gorillitroopers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Gorillitroopers, you may first take a turn with any Primadon Hero you control. That Primadon Hero may only attack during its turn. If you take a turn with any Primadon Hero you control, the Gorillitroopers cannot use their Autocannons special power this turn.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, you may add 4 to the Range number and subtract 2 from the Attack number of this Army Card for the duration of this turn. When using Autocannons, a Gorillitrooper that did not move this turn may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Gorillitroopers always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Talingul
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Talingul, instead of taking that turn with Talingul, you may take a turn with up to two large or huge Construct Heroes you control. A figure taking a turn with Master of Great Constructs must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Talingul before moving.

name: Teeth of the Makwa
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with a Scout or Tribesman Hero you control, you may immediately move up to six Teeth of the Makwa you control up to 3 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When a Teeth of the Makwa figure you control receives one or more wounds, you may roll the 20-sided die before removing that figure. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore any wounds that figure just received.

name: Glyph of Lorja Ivor
ability_1_desc: For each figure you control with a Range number of 4 or more, add 1 to the Range number.

name: QUAHON
ability_1_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Lightning Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Lightning Breath Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Quahon's movement, ignore elevations. Quahon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Quahon is engaged when she starts to fly, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Axentia
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die for Axentia and then once for each figure adjacent to Axentia. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by immolation.
ability_2_desc: When Axentia would be destroyed, do not destroy Axentia. If it is Axentia's turn, her turn ends immediately. Before the next Order Marker is revealed by any player, remove all wound markers from this Army Card and roll the 20-sided die for all figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Axentia, one at a time. If you roll a 7 or higher, the figure receives a wound. After using Phoenix Rising, negate all powers on this card except Flying for the rest of the game.
ability_3_desc: Normal Flying rules apply.

name: Nicholas Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Each time Nicholas Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. If the destroyed figure was small or medium, and not undead, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Thralls. Nicholas Esenwein may not use Bloodborn Rising on destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Nicholas Esenwein, you may place a wound marker on Nicholas Esenwein and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nicholas Esenwein's movement, ignore elevations. Nicholas Esenwein may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Nicholas Esenwein starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Tomb Skeletons
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Tomb Skeleton you control, if the defending figure is engaged with at least 1 other figure you control, it subtracts 1 from its defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack from a figure with a Range number of 4 or more that is not a Cleric or Wizard, a Tomb Skeleton adds 1 die.

name: Ulfrid Hornwrangler
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. If Grim Determination Special Attack does not destroy a figure, Ulfrid Hornwrangler receives a wound and must attack that figure again with his Grim Determination Special Attack, if possible.
ability_2_desc: When defending with Ulfrid Hornwrangler, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.

name: Rygarn
ability_1_desc: Once per round, before revealing a numbered Order Marker on an Army Card in your army, you may choose this Army Card or an Army Card that has at least one figure you control within 6 spaces of Rygarn. Move that numbered Order Marker to the chosen Army Card and reveal it on that Army Card instead.
ability_2_desc: When Rygarn receives one or more wounds from a normal or special attack by an opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, choose an empty space within 4 spaces of Rygarn. Place Rygarn on the chosen space to ignore any wounds he just received. If Rygarn is engaged when he uses Temporal Jump, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Red Mantis Blade Dancers
ability_1_desc: When a Red Mantis Blade Dancer attacks, that Blade Dancer may attack one additional time. A Red Mantis Blade Dancer cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When a Red Mantis Blade Dancer receives one or more wounds, before removing that Blade Dancer, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, ignore any wounds.
ability_3_desc: Instead of their normal move, any or all Red Mantis Blade Dancers may Stealth Leap. Stealth Leap has a move 3. When counting spaces for a Blade Dancer's leaping movement, ignore elevations. A Blade Dancer may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. A Blade Dancer may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap. If a Blade Dancer is engaged when starting to leap, that Blade Dancer does not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Gem of Lava Resistance
ability_1_desc: This figure gains the Lava Resistant special power. This figure never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and does not have to stop in molten lava spaces.

name: Tombstone Gunslinger
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Tombstone Gunslinger, if there is at least one Order Marker on a Unique Outlaw Hero you control, you may first take a turn with one other Common Outlaw Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: A Tombstone Gunslinger rolls an additional attack die for each Unique Outlaw Hero you control within 2 clear sight spaces of that Tombstone Gunslinger, up to a maximum of 2 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: When a Tombstone Gunslinger is targeted for a normal attack from an opponent's non-adjacent figure within 7 clear sight spaces of that Tombstone Gunslinger, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, the opponent's figure receives 1 wound.

name: Tomoe Gozen
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Unique Samurai Squad you control that has at least one previously destroyed Samurai on its Army Card, before taking that squad's turn, you may first take a turn with Tomoe Gozen.
ability_2_desc: If Tomoe Gozen is adjacent to at least one other Samurai you control, add 1 die to the Defense of Tomoe Gozen and all Samurai you control adjacent to Tomoe Gozen.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: Goblin Slashers
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Goblin Slashers, you may move 3 engaged Goblin Slashers you control up to 3 spaces each. A Goblin Slasher never takes leaving engagement attacks when moving with Goblin Retreat and can only move if it ends its retreating move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Goblin Slashers, if no Goblin Slashers you control are engaged, you may take a turn with a Goblin Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Goblin Slashers may add 2 to their height.

name: Wildwood Runner
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, a Wildwood Runner may move one space. That space may be up to 4 levels higher.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, if you have not used a Vigorous Growth power this round, you may destroy one Wildwood Runner that was not placed this round and replace it with one of your previously destroyed medium Wildwood Heroes. Remove all wound markers from that Hero's Army Card.

name: Hal Jordan
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 1 Green and 3 Blue Battery Markers on this card. Add 1 to this Blue Lantern's Move and Defense numbers for each Blue Battery Marker on this card. Add 1 to this Green Lantern's Range and Attack for each Green Battery Marker on this card. If one or more Green Lantern figures are within 4 spaces of this Blue Lantern, you may also add the same number to this Blue Lantern's Range and Attack numbers.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may remove one Blue Battery Marker from this card to remove up to 1 Wound Marker from the Army Cards of this Blue Lantern and of all figures adjacent to this Blue Lantern.
ability_3_desc: Anytime this Green Lantern or an adjacent, friendly figure is attacked by an opponent and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally, you may remove one Green Battery Marker from this card and ignore that attack.

name: Cannonball
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. You may only use Human Cannonball Special Attack if the defending figure was at least 5 spaces away from Cannonball before he moved this turn.
ability_2_desc: If there is at least one unrevealed Order Marker on Cannonball's card, when Cannonball defends against a normal attack, 1 shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: When Cannonball starts to fly, if engaged, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: CARAKADON
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with this Carakadon, if this Carakadon destroyed a figure during that turn, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher you may take another turn with any Devourer Army Card you control.

name: Zaeus
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Zaeus, you may take a turn with a squad of Gorillinators you control before taking a turn with Zaeus. The Gorillinators cannot move during this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. When Zaeus attacks an opponent's figure that is not adjacent with his Rail Gun Special Attack, you must choose a figure adjacent to the targeted figure, if possible. If Zaeus inflicts more wounds than needed to destroy the targeted figure, all excess wounds count as unblockable hits on the chosen figure.

name: Captain America
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Captain America attacks with his Shield Throw Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Captain America add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Catalan Mercenaries
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, before you place order markers, compare the number of remaining Catalan Mercenaries you control to the number of your previously destroyed Catalan Mercenaries. If there are at least as many destroyed figures as remaining figures, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-7, destroy all remaining Catalan Mercenaries you control.

name: Captain Jonathan Bull
ability_1_desc: When Captain Jonathan Bull attacks, he may attack a second time. He may not attack the same figure twice during his turn.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on Captain Jonathan Bull, you may move one squad of Soldiers with a Disciplined personality or one hero with a Disciplined personality whom you control up to four spaces before taking a turn with Captain Jonathan Bull.

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Cairne Bloodhoof, you may take a turn with on of the following that you control: •1 Minotaur Unique Hero, or •1 Minotaur Unique Squad, or •3 Minotaur Common Heroes.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by a normal attack from Cairne Bloodhoof, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, you may Knockback the figure by placing it on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Cairne Bloodhoof. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Knockback never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Knockback can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: Casrius
ability_1_desc: Attack 3. Range 4+special. Choose a figure to attack. Burning Hands Special Attack also affects up to two figures adjacent to the targeted figure. Roll attack dice once. Roll defense seperately.
ability_2_desc: When Casrius attacks with his normal attack he may subtract one from his attack value and attack a second time.

name: Xualtiaca Fire Ants
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Xualtiaca Fire Ants, count the number of engaged Xualtiaca Fire Ants you control. You may move this number of unengaged Xualtiaca Fire Ants you control that you did not move this turn up to 3 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, Xualtiaca Fire Ants may use Swarm Sting 18. Once for each opponent's figure adjacent to at least one Xualtiaca Fire Ant you control, roll the 20-sided die for stinging damage. Add 1 to your die roll for each Xualtiaca Fire Ant you control engaged with that figure. If you roll an 18 or higher, that figure receives one wound. If the wound was inflicted and the figure was not destroyed, roll again for stinging damage for that figure. Swarm Sting does not affect destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Xualtiaca Fire Ants may triple their height.

name: Captain Marvel
ability_1_desc: After Captain Marvel rolls defense dice against a normal or special attack, add one Energy Conversion marker to this card for each hit that was blocked. Captain Marvel rolls one additional attack and defense die for each Energy Conversion marker on this card. There can never be more than 2 Energy Conversion markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: When Captain Marvel attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Captain Marvel's movement, ignore elevations. Captain Marvel may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When she starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Cavaliers
ability_1_desc: When only one member of the Cavaliers attacks, he may attack two additional times. When only two members of the Cavaliers attack, each may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: The Cavaliers do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.
ability_3_desc: At the end of every round in which the Cavaliers took at least one turn, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, you may choose an opponent who must give two wounds to any figure he or she controls on the battlefield.

name: Captain Britain
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Captain Britain, you may take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: While Captain Britain is flying, you may choose one friendly small or medium figure that he passed over this turn. Place the chosen figure on an empty space adjacent to Captain Britain at the end of his move. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Aerial Rescue, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Figures under overhangs can never be moved by Aerial Rescue.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Captain Britain's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If he is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Doctor Fate
ability_1_desc: If a friendly figure within 2 spaces of Doctor Fate receives wounds that would destroy it, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, ignore the wounds.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Doctor Fate has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, immediately place Doctor Fate on an empty space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all wound markers on this card.
ability_3_desc: Doctor Fate may not have any order markers removed from this card due to any special power on an army card or glyph.

name: Starfire
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 5. All figures within 4 clear site spaces of Starfire are affected by Starburst Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. After using Starburst Special Attack, place 3 wound markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: After any turn where 1 or more Teen Titans are destroyed, you may immediately take a turn with Starfire.

name: Catwoman
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure adjacent to Catwoman. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by Catwoman this turn.
ability_2_desc: When Catwoman rolls defense against a normal attack, 1 shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Catwoman can move through all figures and never takes leaving engagement attacks.
ability_4_desc: Instead of Catwoman's normal move, she may move only 1 space. This space may be up to 15 levels higher or lower.

name: Captain Marvel Jr.
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Any figure adjacent to Captain Marvel Jr. is affected by Shazam! Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: After revealing Order Marker 1 on this card and taking a turn with Captain Marvel Jr., you may take one additional turn, either with him or with another figure with the Shazam! Special Attack that you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Captain Marvel Jr.'s movement, ignore elevations. Captain Marvel Jr. may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles. When Captain Marvel Jr. starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Champion of Weston
ability_1_desc: All friendly knights adjacent to Champion of Weston add one die to their normal attack.

name: Flash
ability_1_desc: When Flash attacks, he may attack 2 additional times.
ability_2_desc: Flash my move over water and lava spaces without stopping and pass through figures without becoming engaged. Flash never takes any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: During his movement, Flash can roll for a leaving engagement attack against any 3 figures he moves through. Speedster Engagement cannot be used against the same figure more than once per turn and does not affect figures with Disengage or Phantom Walk special powers. Flash cannot use his normal attack if he uses Speedster Engagement this turn.

name: Solomon Grundy
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Solomon Grundy has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, immediately place Solomon Grundy on an empty space adjacent to any figure you control and remove all but 2 wound markers from this card. If you place Solomon Grundy on a swamp or swamp water space, remove all wound markers from this card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Solomon Grundy always adds 1 extra shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Rocket Red
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Once per game, choose 2 figures to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figures are also affected by Missile Storm Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 1, 2, 3 or 4. Rocket Red starts each turn with 8 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and roll 1, 2, 3 or 4 attack dice. Rocket red may continue rolling 1, 2, 3 or 4 attack dice until he has rolled all 8 dice. Rocket Red may target the same or different figures with each attack.

name: Chainsaw Fanatic
ability_1_desc: If this Chainsaw Fanatic inflicts more wounds than needed to destroy a figure, you must choose small or medium figures adjacent to this Chainsaw Fanatic to receive any excess wounds as unblockable hits.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a small or medium Hero with 3 or less defense, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Warmachine
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Warmachine may use Shoulder Rockets Special Attack 2 times in the same turn. Warmachine may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Explosion Special Attack. Warmachine only needs clear line of sight to the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Warmachine can be affected by his own Explosion Special Attack.

name: Robin
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Vigilante card you control, and taking a turn with that vigilante, you may immediately take a turn with Robin. You may not take a turn with any other Sidekicks during the Vigilante's turn.
ability_2_desc: If Robin is engaged with the same figure that any Vigilante you control is engaged with, add 1 die to Robin's attack.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Robin may use his Bat Grapple. Bat Grapple has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Bat Grapple, ignore elevations. Robin may grapple over water without stopping, grapple over figures without becoming engaged, and grapple over obstacles such as ruins. Robin may not Bat Grapple more than 30 levels up or down in a single grapple. If Robin is engaged when he starts to Bat Grapple, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Invisible Woman
ability_1_desc: If The Invisible Woman is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-1, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 12 or higher, ignore the attack and The Invisible Woman no longer has any visible hit zones for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 1. When The Invisible Woman attacks with her Invisible Projectile Special Attack, she may attack 2 additional times with Invisible Projectile Special Attack. Figures attacked by Invisible Projectile Special Attack may not roll defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When The Invisible Woman starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Beast
ability_1_desc: When Beast attacks, he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Beast may Heroic Leap. Heroic Leap has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Beast's leaping movement, ignore elevations. Beast may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Beast may not leap more than 10 levels up or down in a single leap. If Beast is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Citadel Guards
ability_1_desc: For every opponent's figure a Citadel Guard destroys, place a silver Experience Marker on this card. When attacking with Citadel Guard, roll one additional Attack die for each Experience Marker on this card. A maximum of 3 Experience Markers can be placed on this card.

name: CHELRA
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with Chelra, you may choose up to 3 figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Chelra. Destroy those figures. Then, for each figure you just destroyed, you may choose an opponent's figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Chelra. Each of the chosen enemy figures receives 1 wound. You cannot inflict more than 1 wound on a single figure using Essence Blast.
ability_2_desc: When Chelra receives one or more wounds, you may choose up to 5 figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Chelra. Destroy those figures. Then, for each figure you just destroyed, you may ignore a wound Chelra just received.

name: Clay Golem
ability_1_desc: When this Clay Golem receives enough wounds to be destroyed, before removing this Clay Golem, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 11 or higher, ignore any wounds.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Clay Golem, you may move each Clay Golem you control up to 1 space.

name: Chen Stormstout
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack or defense dice with Chen Stormstout the 2nd and 4th skull or shield rolled each counts as one additional hit or block.
ability_2_desc: Chen Stormstout begins the game with 3 brown Brew Markers on his Army Card.
