ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. Figures roll 2 fewer defense dice against Telekinetic Bolt Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Gorilla Grodd is considered to have the class of Psychic in addition to his normal class.

name: Griffin Templars
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Griffin Templars, you may first take a turn with any Templar Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When you roll attack dice for a Griffin Templar, you may re-roll one attack die that did not show a skull. War Fury may can be used once for each attack dice roll.

name: Glyph of Augers
ability_1_desc: A Hero holding this glyph does not need a clear line of sight when attacking with a normal ranged attack. All normal attacks made by a Hero holding this glyph are considered to be Special Attacks.

name: GRICK
ability_1_desc: When revealing an order marker on a Grick, after attacking normally, if the defending figure was a small or medium figure and was not destroyed, you may move this Grick up to 3 spaces. After moving, place the defending figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to this Grick if possible. Figures moved by Drag Away never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an order marker on a Grick, after taking a turn with a Grick, you may take a turn with up to two other Gricks you control. If you used Drag Away this turn, those Gricks may add 1 die to their attack when attacking the figure that was moved by Drag Away.

name: Green Wyrmling
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Green Wyrmling, before taking a turn with that Green Wyrmling, you may take a turn with any wyrmling you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, and excess shields are rolled, the attacking figure receives 1 unblockable hit.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Green Wyrmling's movement, ignore elevations. Green Wyrmling may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Green Wyrmling starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Greater Air Elemental
ability_1_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by a normal or special attack from this Greater Air Elemental, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or higher, you may use Gale Force on the figure by placing it on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of this Greater Air Elemental. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Gale Force never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Gale Force can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: Figures that have the Flying or Stealth Flying special power subtract 1 from their defence dice when attacked by this Greater Air Elemental.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Greater Air Elemental's movement, ignore elevations. This Greater Air Elemental may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Greater Air Elemental starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Green Horned Warrior
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Green Horned Warrior Army Card, before taking that Green Horned Warrior's turn, you may take a turn with one other Green Horned Warrior you control.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. • If you roll a 1, this Green Horned Warrior may not attack. • If you roll a 2-6, this Green Horned Warrior may attack once. • If you roll a 7-11, this Green Horned Warrior must attack once. • If you roll a 12-15, this Green Horned Warrior must make two attacks. • If you roll a 16-19, this Green Horned Warrior must make three attacks. • If you roll a 20, this Green Horned Warrior must make four attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Green Horned Warrior's movement, ignore elevations. A Green Horned Warrior may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Green Horned Warrior starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Grima Wormtongue
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative but before anyone takes a turn, choose an opponent's Unique Hero. That opponent must show you all Order Markers on that hero's Army Card, and that hero subtracts 1 from its Attack and Defense for the rest of this round.
ability_2_desc: At the end of the round, if you control Grima Wormtongue you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you must choose an opponent. That opponent now controls Grima Wormtongue. Give this Army Card to that opponent.

name: Glyph of Ophidian Egg Clutch
ability_1_desc: At the end of each round, a player with a figure on the Glyph of Ophidian Egg Clutch may place a previously destroyed Common Viper or Serpent Squad figure from that player's Army adjacent to that figure.
ability_2_desc: When a figure ends its turn on the Glyph of Ophidian Egg Clutch, if it is unengaged and did not attack this turn, it may remove the Glyph from the battlefield.

name: Glyph of Creation Forge
ability_1_desc: If a Wizard with the Rune of Ghurla special power is on this glyph at the beginning of the round, before rolling for initiative you may reveal an Order Marker on that Wizard's Army Card to choose a previously destroyed Warforged figure from your Army. If it is a numbered Order Marker, the chosen Warforged may be a Unique Hero; remove all wound markers and figures from its Army Card. Place the chosen Warforged figure adjacent to that Wizard.

name: Cyborg
ability_1_desc: His sonic cannon can be employed at various settings either to stun the ears of his foes or to deliver concentrated blasts of sound potent enough to shatter rock or deform steel.
ability_2_desc: Large portions of Victor Stone's body have been replaced by advanced mechanical parts, granting him superhuman strength, speed, stamina, and flight.
ability_3_desc: In addition to his mechanical enhancements, Stone possesses an "exceptionally gifted" level of intelligence.

name: Catwoman
ability_1_desc: Catwoman has been both super-hero and super-villain. Beginning her career as a thief and enemy to Batman, she later turned to crime-fighting and became part of the Batman Family. Despite her villainous nature, she works hard to protect the East End of Gotham City.
ability_2_desc: As an orphan who learned to survive on Gotham City's streets, Selina took to thievery to survive. Determined to do it in style, she learned martial arts and trained extensively to perfect her skills in cat burglary. Her criminal activities are often tempered by a reluctant altruism, making her an inconstant villain and occasional ally to Batman.
ability_3_desc: Her main crime is only thievery, as killing is against her own moral code, thus making her more of an anti-hero rather than true villain. She currently only steals from gangsters and mobsters.

name: Joker Goons
ability_1_desc: The Joker Goons are a gang of criminals that work for the Joker. There are at least two dozen members and they usually wear rubber clown masks to hide their identity. They are loyal to both the Joker and Harley Quinn, who acts as a sort of second-in-command. Most of the gang is made up of murderers, rapists, and psychopaths. And while they are not the brightest, or the most skilled fighters, they are very bloodthirsty and vicious. The Joker and Harley Quinn often go out in public accompanied by several of them.

name: Doctor Strange
ability_1_desc: Strange holds the title of Sorcerer Supreme who draws his powers from mystical entities such as Agamotto, Cyttorak, Ikonn, Oshtur, Raggadorr, and Watoomb, who lend their energies for spells.
ability_2_desc: Enables him to fly.
ability_3_desc: An amulet whose light is used to negate evil.
ability_4_desc: Used for protection.

name: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D
ability_1_title: Supreme Headquarters, International Espionage, Law-Enforcement Division
ability_1_desc: S.H.I.E.L.D. is a secret espionage and law-enforcement agency that often deals with paranormal and superhuman threats. These are their field Agents. The acronym originally stood for Supreme Headquarters, International Espionage, Law-Enforcement Division.
ability_2_desc: One of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s unique technological innovations, the LMD (Life Model Decoy), an extremely lifelike android used to replace people in imminent danger of being killed, was the basis for two major upheavals. First, the supervillain Scorpio stole the technology and used it to create the second team of villains called the Zodiac. Later, some LMDs known as the Deltites achieved sentience and infiltrated S.H.I.E.L.D. and Hydra both, replacing key members until Fury defeated them.
ability_3_title: Strategic Hazard Intervention, Espionage and Logistics Directorate
ability_3_desc: This led to the disbanding of the original organization and its replacement by a new task force with the same acronym under the control of the U.N., Strategic Hazard Intervention, Espionage and Logistics Directorate. The new S.H.I.E.L.D. was meant to be more streamlined so Fury could personally oversee it, but would soon become a large organization again.

name: Drone Torpedo
ability_1_desc:
Black Manta is highly intelligent, and has a high degree of expertise in mechanical engineering. A calm and scheming mastermind, Black Manta generally relies more on technology and strategic planning than physical confrontation when it comes to his exploits. Using his scientific knowledge Black Manta has created a wide variety of mechanical devices, such as the Drone Torpedo.

The Drone Torpedo is a self-propelled, flying weapon with an explosive warhead, designed to detonate either on contact with its target, or in proximity to it. On land it's propellers both allow it to stay aloft and to propel it forward. Underwater, it cuts through the water towards it's target with deadly accuracy.

It can also deliver a weak but effective electrical charge to those that get too near.

name: John Stewart
ability_1_desc: Formerly an architect, social activist, and U.S. Marine sniper, John Stewart was selected by the Guardians of the Universe to be one of the Green Lanterns for Sector 2814. His distinguished service in the Corps has resulted in a place among the Oan Honor Guard and the position of chief trainer for new Lantern recruits.
ability_2_desc: According to the Ancient Reader in the Tower of Talo, on the day of John Stewart's birth, an immortal Guardian of the Universe prophesied that John would would grow to become the legendary hero known as "The Opener of Doors."
ability_3_desc: John is a wielder of a Green Lantern Power Ring, which enables him to construct anything out of light based on his imagination and willpower. The ring possesses a wide array of functions such as: translating alien languages, flight, the ability to breath in space and enhanced strength and durability.
ability_4_desc: Stewart is known as the "Master Builder" of the Green Lantern Corps, primarily because of his architectural background. Due to his military training, one of his favorite (and most famous) constructs is a sniper rifle. He can be often seen picking off opponents from a far.

name: Namor
ability_1_desc: Namor possesses a high level of superhuman strength, enabling him to lift/press up to 100 tons while in contact with water; his strength gradually decreases according to the length of time he is out of water and can eventually dwindle to no more than slightly above human level.
ability_2_desc: In addition to his great strength, Namor possesses superhuman stamina and durability, a result of his body's adaptation to underwater pressures. He also possesses superhuman agility, reflexes, and speed, with a maximum swimming speed of roughly sixty miles per hour.
ability_3_desc: Namor is able to fly via the finlike wings on his ankles, and he possesses a telepathic rapport with many, but not all, forms of marine life. Like all Atlanteans, he has a prolonged lifespan and his body is specially developed for underwater conditions, granting him specialized blood circulation to withstand freezing temperatures and highly developed vision to see clearly even in murky ocean depths.

name: Doctor Doom
ability_1_desc:
Any figure temporarily controlled by another figure will act independently, any bonding the controlled figure might have with any other figure(s) is negated for the turn. If a squad figure is temporarily taken over only that one single figure, not the rest of the squad, is controlled.

Mindless figures and Machines cannot be mind controlled.

If a controlled figure is moved into a space, or takes an action, that would potentially cause that figure harm on that turn, it gets a chance to avoid taking the action. (This includes moving into Lava, jumping off of buildings, destroying an adjacent ITF that explodes, hitting a character with counter strike, etc.) To avoid completing the harmful move or action the player that originally owns the controlled figure rolls the 20-sided die. If a Hero figure rolls a 6 or higher it automatically breaks the control and the chosen figure returns to the player who controlled the figure before being controlled. A single squad figure, or a Dimwitted figure, needs to roll a 12 or higher to break the control.

name: Ant-Man / Giant-Man
ability_1_desc: Biochemist Dr. Henry Pym discovers an unusual set of subatomic particles he labels "Pym Particles". Entrapping these within two separate serums, he creates a size-altering formula and a reversal formula, testing them on himself. Reduced to the size of an insect, he becomes trapped in an anthill before he eventually escapes and uses the reversal formula to restore himself to his normal size.
ability_2_desc: Pym's experience in the anthill inspires him to study ants, and he constructs a cybernetic helmet that allows him to communicate with and control them. Pym designs a costume made of unstable molecules to prevent bites or scratches from the ants, and reinvents himself as the superhero Ant-Man.
ability_3_desc: After several adventures, Pym is contacted by Dr. Vernon van Dyne asking for aid in contacting alien life. Pym refuses, but is attracted to Vernon's socialite daughter Janet van Dyne. Vernon is subsequently killed by an alien criminal who teleports himself to Earth, and Janet asks for Pym's help in avenging Vernon's death. Pym reveals his secret identity to Janet, and uses Pym particles to graft wasp wings beneath her shoulders, which appear when Janet shrinks. Janet assumes the alias of the Wasp, and together they find and defeat Vernon's killer. The pair become founding members of the superhero team known as the Avengers.
ability_4_desc: Pym eventually adopts a second, alternate identity as the huge Giant-Man. Years later it's revealed that Pym adopted the Giant-Man identity out of feelings of inadequacy when compared to powerful teammates Iron Man and Thor. He and the Wasp develop a romantic relationship and, shortly afterwards, Pym and van Dyne take a leave of absence from the Avengers.

name: Amazon Warriors
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with the Amazon Warriors, you may take a turn with any Unique Amazon Hero that you control.
ability_2_desc: Amazon Warriors roll one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with them.

name: Black Widow
ability_1_desc: Natasha received the Red Room's variant of the Super-Soldier Serum. Her physical and mental abilities have been enhanced beyond normal human limits. Her agility is greater than that of an Olympic gold medalist. Her bodily tissues have been augmented to superhuman development. She possesses exceptional durability, strength, endurance, and stamina. Her reaction time functions with the peak of human efficiency and capability, bordering on superhuman level. It is possible for Natasha to dodge a bullet even at point blank range.
ability_2_desc: Black Widow is an expert martial artist including karate, judo, ninjutsu, aikido, savate, various styles of kung fu, and boxing. She is also a world class athlete, gymnast and acrobat, trained marksman and weapons specialist, and an accomplished ballerina.
ability_3_desc: Natasha has a gifted intellect. She displays an uncanny affinity for psychological manipulation and can mask her real emotions perfectly. Like Steve Rogers, she possesses the ability to quickly process multiple information streams (e.g., threat assessment) and rapidly respond to changing tactical situations.
ability_4_desc: Black Widow customarily wears two bracelets equipped to discharge the 'widow's bite,' high-frequency electrostatic bolts of up to 30,000 volts, capable of stunning even a superhuman opponent at a range of at least 20 feet. The bracelets' various functions are activated by galvanic sensors keyed to Black Widow's wrist musculature.

name: Mole Machine
ability_1_desc: If there are any usage restrictions as to who can operate the vehicle it will be listed on the vehicle's card. Order markers cannot be placed on a Machine card. They are placed on the card of any occupant instead. If all possible operators are destroyed the vehicle is deactivated and becomes an ITF based on it's Length. If the vehicle is destroyed immediately place wreckage in the spaces that it occupied and place all occupants in any adjacent space(s). Machines cannot be Mind Controlled.
ability_2_desc: Restrictions on the number of occupants that can occupy the vehicle will be listed on the vehicles card. Entering: If an operator ends their move adjacent to the vehicle, instead of attacking, you may place them on the vehicle's card. Occupying: Figures on the vehicle's card lose the use of all of their special powers and must use the move, range, attack and defense values of the vehicle instead of their own. A figure cannot be targeted while they are on the vehicle's card. Exiting: After moving, and instead of attacking, you can place an occupant in any space adjacent to the vehicle.
ability_3_desc: This lists the total number of spaces the vehicle occupies on the battlefield.
ability_4_desc: This number represents the total length of the vehicle. (Not all parts of a vehicle actually rest in spaces. There can be some overhang.)

name: Black Manta
ability_1_desc: Black Manta wears a battle-suit that enables him to survive underwater to unknown depths. It also insulates him against the cold and protects him from pressure changes. It is completely waterproof and bulletproof. He wears a helmet with two large eyes that allow for infrared and scope vision, as well as deadly optic blasts. His helmet connects to an oxygen system that allows him to breathe underwater indefinitely.
ability_2_desc: He also has a jet pack which functions in or out of water, a telepathic scrambler (used to temporarily strip Aquaman of his aquatic telepathy), and a varying array of weapons with which he is very skilled, including a harpoon gun, a pair of long knives, and a trident.
ability_3_desc: Black Manta also often utilizes unique vehicles such as a modified, manta ray-shaped submarine for traveling.
ability_4_desc: Black Manta wears a battle-suit that enables him to survive underwater to unknown depths. It also insulates him against the cold and protects him from pressure changes. It is completely waterproof and bulletproof. He wears a helmet with two large eyes that allow for infrared and scope vision, as well as deadly optic blasts. His helmet connects to an oxygen system that allows him to breathe underwater indefinitely.

name: Batman
ability_1_desc: At any point during Batman's move he may move 1 space that ignores elevations. Outside of his turn Batman may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Batman rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Batman may take from this attack is one. If Batman takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move him 3 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. When Batman attacks with his Batarang Special Attack he may attack 1 additional time.

name: Atlantean Warriors
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Shallow Water markers on this card for every squad of Atlantean Warriors that you control.
ability_2_desc: An Atlantean Warrior does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space. If an Atlantean Warrior starts his turn on a water space, add 2 to his movement for that turn.
ability_3_desc: If an Atlantean Warrior is standing on a water space you may add 2 dice to his attack and 2 dice to his defense.
ability_4_desc: Instead of attacking normally, an Atlantean Warrior may place a Shallow Water marker in his space, or any space, occupied or not, within 3 clear sight spaces of him.

name: Magneto
ability_1_desc: Magneto is a mutant with the power to manipulate electromagnetic fields to achieve a wide range of effects.
ability_2_desc: The primary application of Magneto's power is control over magnetism and the manipulation of ferrous and nonferrous metal. While the maximum amount of mass he can manipulate at one time is unknown, he has moved large asteroids several times and effortlessly levitated a 30,000 ton nuclear submarine.
ability_3_desc: His powers extend into the subatomic level (insofar as the electromagnetic force is responsible for chemical bonding), allowing him to manipulate chemical structures and rearrange matter, although this is often a strenuous task. He can also affect non-metallic and non-magnetic objects to a lesser extent and frequently levitates himself and others. He can also generate electromagnetic pulses of great strength.
ability_4_title: Magnetic Force Fields and Energy Blasts
ability_4_desc: Magneto can create powerful magnetic force fields for personal protection, project blasts of electricity or magnetic energy, and generate powerful electromagnetic pulses.

name: Rocket Raccoon
ability_1_desc: Rocket Raccoon acts as the Guardian of the Keystone Quadrant, an area of outer space sealed off from the rest of the cosmos by the so-called Galacian Wall.
ability_2_desc: He is an accomplished starship pilot, an expert marksman with the two laser pistols he carries as well as having an affinity for heavy weapons.
ability_3_desc: He is also a master military tactician and leader, attributes that help him take charge of the Guardians of the Galaxy when Star-Lord is unavailable.
ability_4_desc: Rocket Raccoon possesses the normal attributes of an Earth raccoon, including speed (which has been additionally amplified by his training) an acute sense of smell, sight, hearing and touch.

name: Doomsday
ability_1_desc: Doomsday was created and evolved through cloning an infant and having it killed over and over again by one of the most dangerous species of the universe and in one of the harshest habitats in existence, prehistoric Krypton. As such, he returns to life every time he dies and becomes near invulnerable to what killed him before. His entire body is built as a defensive structure which continues to arm itself the more it is damaged.
ability_2_desc: He also has a highly accelerated healing factor that allows him to heal and regenerate from most damage almost instantly.
ability_3_desc: With his strength, Doomsday can easily overpower and kill humans and other aliens like Kryptonians, and can bend and break through reinforced steel, destroy impenetrable barriers, and can lift extremely heavy objects, and uproot trees and buildings/structures as well as decimate them with his might. He is strong and powerful enough to overcome entire rosters of superhumans, like the Justice League.
ability_4_desc: Doomsday is almost completely resistant to all forms of physical and mental types of harm, and as such, bullets bounce off him, rockets, lasers and bombs won't leave a mark on him, and high-voltage energy emissions can't penetrate through his tough hide.

name: Power Girl
ability_1_desc: Kara Zor-L was born on the Earth-Two version of the doomed planet of Krypton just before it was destroyed, and her origin story mirrors those of her famous Kryptonian relatives, Superman and her counterpart, Supergirl.
ability_2_desc: Kara's ship was called the Symbioship and it was designed to keep her in a stasis mode during her flight to Earth. To ensure that Kara's mental development kept pace with her physical growth, the ship provided her with a virtual reality that gave her life experiences and education as if she had grown up on Krypton rather than in stasis.
ability_3_desc: As a Kryptonian of the Earth-Two universe, Power Girl has all of the powers, and weaknesses, of the Pre-Crisis Earth-Two Superman. She possesses great superhuman strength, speed, flight and invulnerability. She also has super senses, heat vision, X-ray vision, and freezing breath.

name: Black Manta
ability_1_desc: Black Manta does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space. If Black Manta starts his turn on a water space, add 3 to his movement for that turn.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and before taking a turn with Black Manta, you may take a turn with any Robot that you control.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When Black Manta attacks with his Optic Ray Special Attack, all blanks count as skulls.
ability_4_desc: While Black Manta is in play all special abilities with the word Mind(s) or Telepathic in the title on all cards are negated.

name: Rhino
ability_1_desc: The Rhino was born as Aleksei Sytsevich, a poor immigrant from Russia who was desperate to pay for the rest of his family and came to the United States in hope of finding work to provide for them. With little education and no real skills, the only paying jobs he could get were using his impressive strength and musculature as an enforcer for various criminal organizations. One day he was contacted by some Eastern Bloc agents, who offered him a vast sum of money for participating in an incredible experiment. Sytsevich agreed, and was subjected to intensive chemical and radioactive treatment, which bonded a super-strong polymer to his skin and greatly augmented his strength and speed. He was given the code name "Rhino," and was sent to work as a super-assassin.
ability_2_desc: One day he was contacted by some Eastern Bloc agents, who offered him a vast sum of money for participating in an incredible experiment. Sytsevich agreed, and was subjected to intensive chemical and radioactive treatment, which bonded a super-strong polymer to his skin and greatly augmented his strength and speed. He was given the code name "Rhino," and was sent to work as a super-assassin.

name: Doctor Octopus
ability_1_desc: When moving Doctor Octopus can ignore elevation changes of 1 - 4 levels. For the cost of 3 points of movement he can ignore elevation changes of 5 levels or more. Outside of his turn Doctor Octopus may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When determining height advantage to an opposing, figure Doctor Octopus may use the height of any terrain, object, or ITF that he is adjacent to.
ability_3_desc: Doctor Octopus can only attack figures and ITFs whose base is not higher or lower than 4 levels from his base, and are within 4 clear sight spaces of him. When Doctor Octopus attacks, he may attack up to 4 times. Reduce the number of times he can attack by 1 for every two wound markers on this card.

name: Spider-Man
ability_1_desc: Peter can cling to most surfaces, which allows him to crawl up walls.
ability_2_desc: He has superhuman strength (able to lift 10 tons optimally) and is roughly 15 times more agile than a regular human.
ability_3_desc: Using his brilliant and scientific brain, he created for himself handy dandy web shooters that shoot out his very own web fluid (another of his creations), allowing him to swing from building to building.
ability_4_desc: His spider-sense provides an uncanny early warning detection system linked with his superhuman kinesthetics, enabling him the ability to evade most any injury, provided he doesn't cognitively override the autonomic reflexes.

name: Elektra
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, each shield rolled counts for one additional block. If Elektra takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move her 2 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Elektra receives 2 automatic skulls when she attacks an adjacent figure with her normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. When Elektra attacks with her Deadly Onslaught Special Attack she may attack up to a total of 3 times. Each of these attacks may come at any point before, during, or after her move as long as she is on a space where she could end her movement.

name: Doctor Doom
ability_1_desc: After moving, and before attacking, choose an opponents' figure that is within 6 clear sight spaces of Doctor Doom. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 12 or higher all of that figure's special powers are negated until the end of Doctor Doom's turn. In addition, if you roll a 20, inflict 1 wound to that figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. All figures and ITFs adjacent to Doctor Doom are affected by his Electrical Armor Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Doctor Doom you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Doctor Doom. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher (12 or higher for a single squad or Dimwitted figure), take temporary control of, and immediately take a turn with that chosen figure. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen figure returns to its owner. Mindless figures cannot be Mind Controlled.
ability_4_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of Doctor Doom.

name: Iron Fist
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, each shield rolled counts for one additional block. If Iron Fist takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move him 2 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Once per round Iron Fist may double his normal attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose either Iron Fist or any figure adjacent to Iron Fist. Roll an attack die, if you roll a Blank remove 3 wound markers, a Shield remove 2, and a Skull remove 1.

name: DOOMSDAY
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a normal move Doomsday may Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10 and ignores elevations. Doomsday rolls 3 less attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap. Doomsday will take any leaving engagement attacks when he Super Leaps. Doomsday never takes any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When defending, Doomsday receives 1 extra defense die for each wound marker on this card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Doomsday, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher remove one wound maker from Doomsday's card.
ability_4_desc: When attacking a figure that has any type of WEAKNESS that doubles wounds, Doomsday doubles all wounds.

name: MANTRIPOD
ability_1_desc: In order to draft a Mantripod into your army you must first draft Black Manta.
ability_2_desc: Range 8. Attack 5. When the Mantripod attacks with it's Optic Ray Special Attack, all blanks count as skulls.
ability_3_desc: When a Mantripod is destroyed immediately place wreckage in the three spaces that it's legs occupied.
ability_4_desc: See the back of this card for rules on Mantripod movement and targeting.

name: Flash
ability_1_desc: Flash can move through all figures, ITFs and obstacles, and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Flash may ignore height restrictions when moving and does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.
ability_2_desc: If Flash does not attack this turn he may add 4 to his move number.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Flash rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Flash may take from this attack is one. If Flash takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move him 4 spaces.
ability_4_desc: When Flash attacks he may attack up to a total of 3 times. Each of these attacks may come at any point before, during, or after his move, as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement.

name: Thugs
ability_1_desc: After all Thugs have attacked once, choose a Thug that attacked this turn and attack 1 additional time.

name: Hulk
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a normal move Hulk may Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10 and ignores elevations. Hulk rolls 3 less attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap. Hulk will take any leaving engagement attacks when he Super Leaps. Hulk never takes any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: After rolling defense Hulk may choose to add 1 automatic shield.
ability_3_desc: When Hulk attacks add 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on his card.
ability_4_desc: After taking a turn with Hulk, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher remove one wound maker from Hulk's card.

name: Krypto
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, Krypto always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's figure within 8 spaces of Kyrpto targets a figure that you control, you may immediately place Krypto in any space adjacent to the attacking figure. Krypto will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moved in this way.
ability_3_desc: Krypto may ignore the effects of any special ability with the word Incognito or Shape Shift in it's title.
ability_4_desc: Any attack that has the word Magic in its title, or is from a Kryptonian, negates Krypto's Dog of Steel Special Ability.

name: Krypto
ability_1_desc: On Krypton, parallel evolution led to the emergence of analogous species to Terran cats, simians, birds and dogs, which were domestic companion animals as they were on Earth.
ability_2_desc: Due to the environment (Earth's yellow sun and lower gravity), Krypto possessed the same powers and abilities as his master, although his physical abilities were proportionate to his smaller size and species, similar to an ordinary dog vs. a human.
ability_3_desc: Certain sensory abilities of Krypto's (senses of smell and hearing) would be more acute than those of Superman, just as an ordinary dog's senses would be more acute than those of an ordinary human.
ability_4_desc: Krypto also had super-canine intelligence (approximately human level, though with his canine traits and interests still present).

name: Mordor Orc Archers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Mordor Orc Archers, you may first take a turn with any Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Mordor Orc Archers are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Poison Ivy
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking you may roll 1 attack die. If you roll a skull all figures adjacent to Poison Ivy receive 1 point of unblockable damage.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Poison Ivy you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Poison Ivy. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher (12 or higher for a squad or Dimwitted figure), take temporary control of that figure and immediately take a turn with that chosen figure. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen figure returns to its owner. Mindless figures cannot be Pheromone Controlled.
ability_3_desc: Poison Ivy is not affected by any Special Ability with the word Venom or Poison in its title.

name: Abomination
ability_1_desc: Formerly known as Emil Blonsky, a spy of Soviet Yugoslavian origin working for the KGB, the Abomination gained his powers after receiving a dose of gamma radiation similar to that which transformed Bruce Banner into the incredible Hulk. As a result he was permanently transformed into a massive green-skinned monster whose physical power was equivalent to, if not greater than, that of the Hulk. While he was able to maintain his normal level of self-control and intelligence after this transformation, he is unable to return to human form.
ability_2_desc: Given his gamma-spawned origins, Blonsky blames his condition on Banner and his alter ego, the Hulk. The Abomination and the Hulk have clashed on numerous occasions, with Blonsky perpetually playing the role of the aggressor. Although Blonsky occasionally gains the upper hand in their battles, the Hulk manages to triumph in the end. But not always; the Abomination is one of the few who can lay claim to victory over the green-skinned goliath.
ability_3_desc: In recent years, it was revealed that his hideous new visage had served to alienate Blonsky from his ex-wife, Nadia. Coupled with constant defeats at the hands of the Hulk, this has driven Blonsky nearly insane in his hatred for Banner. The Abomination also grew incensed upon learning that Banner had married Betty Ross, the daughter of General "Thunderbolt" Ross. With the loss of his wife, Blonsky figured it is only fair to him that Banner should lose Betty. Out of jealousy, he caused the apparent death of Bruce Banner's wife Betty. While she was recovering from radiation sickness caused by exposure to the gamma radiation within Banner, he poisoned her with his radioactive blood, causing Banner and his associates to believe that her close proximity to the Hulk had given her a fatal case of radiation poisoning. Banner later exposed the Abomination's role in Betty's seeming death, and defeated him in combat.
ability_4_desc: Not only had his grand scheme failed, but Banner also forgave Blonsky. The Abomination could not comprehend and endure his enemy's absolution, and his moment of triumph was twisted into crushing defeat. Blonsky realized he had become what he abhorred the most - it was he who was the rampaging, inhuman monster; not the Hulk as he had religiously believed all these years.

name: Harley Quinn
ability_1_desc: If Harley Quinn is targeted by a normal attack from a figure that is not adjacent to her, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, Harley Quinn takes no damage from that attack.
ability_2_desc: Harley Quinn never rolls fewer than 2 defense dice.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Harley Quinn can use this Special Attack to target all figures adjacent to her. Roll attack dice once and apply the results to each figure's defense roll separately.

name: Ultron-Bots
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with the Ultron-Bots, you may take a turn with Ultron if you control him.
ability_2_desc: If you control Ultron, and he is destroyed, immediately replace any currently in play Ultron-Bot that you control with Ultron. Afterwards, remove all wounds from and add one Evolve marker to Ultron's card.
ability_3_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of an Ultron-Bot.

name: Spider-Man
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally Spider-Man may Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 4 and ignores elevations. Spider-Man will not take any leaving engagement attacks when he uses Swing Line. Outside of his turn Spider-Man may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When determining height advantage to an opposing figure, Spider-Man may use the height of any terrain, object, or ITF that he is adjacent to.
ability_3_desc: If Spider-Man is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, Spider-Man takes no damage and may immediately move using his Swing Line Special Power.
ability_4_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Figures roll 1 less defense dice against this attack. If Spider-Man wounds a tiny, small or medium figure you may place that figure adjacent to Spider-Man. A figure moved this way will not take any leaving engagements or any type of falling damage.

name: THE SHADOW
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose any Human figure within 5 clear sight spaces of The Shadow. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by The Shadow this turn.
ability_2_desc: When The Shadow attacks with his normal attack he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with The Shadow you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of The Shadow. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher (12 or higher for a single squad or Dimwitted figure), take temporary control of, and immediately take a turn with that chosen figure. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen figure returns to its owner. Mindless figures cannot be Mind Controlled.

name: Grok
ability_1_desc: When making a normal attack on a non-adjacent figure, if Grok rolls at least 1 skull, add 1 skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: If Grok is engaged, add 1 to his Attack and Defense.
ability_3_desc: Each time Grok destroys an opponent's non-adjacent Unique Hero, you may take another turn with Grok.

name: Ultron
ability_1_desc: Add one to Ultron's Life, Range, Attack and Defense numbers for each Evolve marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Ultron you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Ultron. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher (12 or higher for a single squad or Dimwitted figure), take temporary control of, and immediately take a turn with that chosen figure. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen figure returns to its owner. Mindless figures cannot be Mind Controlled.
ability_3_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of Ultron.

name: Gryphon
ability_1_desc: Gryphon may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack on an opponent's figure without an Order Marker on its card, Gryphon rolls 2 additional attack dice.

name: Green Lantern Corp Soldier
ability_1_desc: The Green Lantern Corps is an intergalactic police force dedicated to the promotion of order and democracy throughout the universe. Each Green Lantern member protects a sector and it is their duty to defend it from any possible threat.
ability_2_desc: Upon recruitment each Green Lantern in the original Corps received a Power Ring, a Power Battery shaped like a lantern (with which the ring is recharged), and a uniform.
ability_3_desc: The mission of the Green Lantern Corps is to protect the universe from interstellar threats of all kinds, ranging from planetary-level threats (problems that could annihilate an entire civilization) to cosmic-level threats (problems that could annihilate the entire universe).
ability_4_desc: Each member has a great deal of autonomy as to their methods in their jurisdiction, subject to review by the Guardians if they feel the Green Lantern in question has abused their assigned authority.

name: Haldir
ability_1_title: Elven Archer and Ranger Attack Enhancement
ability_1_desc: All friendly elven archers and rangers adjacent to Haldir receive an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Penguin
ability_1_desc: Intelligent, rich and sophisticated; Oswald Cobblepot puts up a gentlemanly front, but behind closed doors he is the angered, power hungry criminal known as The Penguin. He shows flashes of compassion sometimes, but he is dominated by a desire to be respected and to control those around him.
ability_2_desc: The Penguin is a master criminal strategist and occasional engineer who uses his genius-level intellect to gain wealth and power through criminal means. Driven by self-interest and an inferiority complex, the Penguin relies on cunning, wit, and intimidation to exploit his surroundings for profit. He usually plans crimes, but does not often commit them himself as it makes tracing the crimes back to him much more difficult and acting for himself risks exposing his respectable businessman persona to the general public. Although the dirty work is mostly delegated to his henchmen, he is not above taking aggressive and lethal actions on his own, especially when provoked. In spite of his appearance, he is a dangerous hand-to-hand fighter with enough self-taught skills in Judo to overwhelm attackers many times his size and physical bearing.
ability_3_desc: The Penguin has carried an umbrella since he was a child due to his mother's obsession with rain (his father died from pneumonia after a drenching). His umbrellas usually contain weapons such as machine guns, sword tips, and acid or poison gas spraying devices. He often carries an umbrella that can transform its canopy into a mini helicopter; he often uses this to escape threatening situations.
ability_4_desc: His latest operation has him running a nightclub, the Iceberg Lounge, that is popular with the underworld. This business provides a cover for criminal activity, which Batman sometimes uses as a source of criminal underworld information. Batman comes to tolerate his operations so long as the Penguin remains one of his informants. The entrepreneurial Penguin often fences stolen property or arranges early prison furloughs – for a hefty fee, of course.

name: Vision (Massive)
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and before taking a turn with Massive Vision, if Intangible Vision is currently on the battlefield you must swap out the two figures and use the information on this card. When placing wounds on Vision, all wound markers are placed on this card. If one form of Vision is destroyed, both forms are destroyed.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, Massive Vision always adds 2 automatic shields.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 8. All figures and ITFs in a straight line from Vision, who are in Vision's line of sight, are affected by this Special Attack. Once Vision uses this special attack add one wound marker to this card.
ability_4_desc: After drafting Vision into your army you automatically receive the Intangible Vision card at no additional cost.

name: Quicksilver
ability_1_desc: Quicksilver possess superhuman speed, and can travel on foot at speeds exceeding the speed of sound for hundreds of miles before tiring; he can "fly" for short distances by flapping his arms or "vibrating" his legs; he can also use his speed to dodge machine gun and laser fire and run up walls and across water. When the High Evolutionary's Isotope E upgraded his powers, he did not know the true limits of his speed.
ability_2_desc: Following the loss of his mutant nature, Quicksilver exposed himself to the Terrigen Mists, resulting in him now possessing the power to vibrate his atoms so quickly he travels forward in time. His molecular speed that he generates displaces him out of the mainstream time/space so that he is able to propel himself into the future. He can leap from thirty seconds to up to twelve days, and remain for several minutes to several hours before being recalled to his present time once his body tires, or he can return at will before his time is up. As he returns from his trip, he returns the exact moment he left so as to appear that he has been gone for half a nano-second. These new powers are having an affect on his physical health. Each time he meets up with his future self (if indeed the person he meets is his future self), the future self looks more and more haggard.

name: Hal Chandler
ability_1_desc: Before moving, Hal Chandler may attempt to summon 3-D Man, if he is in your army. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 4 or higher you must replace Hal Chandler with 3-D Man. You may take an immeadiate turn with 3-D Man and replace all order markers from Hal Chandler onto 3-D Man.
ability_2_desc: If there is a enemy Skrull on the battlefield, Hal Chandler may only attack it. Hal Chandler may move an additional space and roll an additional attack dice while there is a enemy Skrull on the battlefield.

name: Groot
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Groot, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Groot's height or 3 levels below Groot's base, Groot may add 1 to his range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose up to 3 small or medium figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Groot that are adjacent to a tree or bush. Roll the 20-sided die for each figure. If you roll a 12 or higher, the chosen figure receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: If a friendly figure adjacent to Groot is targeted by a non-adjacent normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, the figure is attacked as normal. If you roll a 12 or higher, the attack targets Groot instead.

name: Hawkgirl
ability_1_desc: When Hawkgirl starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Hawkgirl attacks, she may attack one additional time.

name: Háma
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, but before taking a turn with Háma, you may take a turn with one other Guard Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: All figures you control with the loyal personality move one additional space. Loyal Leadership does not affect Háma.

name: Harvest Golem
ability_1_desc: If this Harvest Golem destroys a figure with a normal attack, this Harvest Golem may attack again. This Harvest Golem may continue attacking until it does not destroy a figure.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, this Harverst Golem always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: Hawthorne Banner Bearer
ability_1_desc: All friendly Knights within 4 clear sight spaces of Hawthorne Banner Bearer add 1 to their attack dice and 1 to their defense dice. This effect is not cumulative with multiple Banner Bearers.

name: GWAR
ability_1_desc: After making a normal attack, Gwar can attack an additional time. When making that attack, Gwar rolls 1 additional attack die if the first attack caused at least one wound.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, after making a normal attack that caused at least 1 wound, Gwar may move up to 3 spaces. When moving with Hit and Run, Gwar will not take a leaving engagement attack from the figure he just attacked, and cannot end his movement engaged with that figure, or on a glyph.
ability_3_desc: All opponent's small and medium Squad figures adjacent to Gwar subtract 1 from their Defense. Disciplined figures are not affected by Intimidating Roar.

name: Ultron
ability_1_desc:
Any figure temporarily controlled by another figure will act independently, any bonding the controlled figure might have with any other figure(s) is negated for the turn. If a squad figure is temporarily taken over only that one single figure, not the rest of the squad, is controlled.

Mindless figures and Machines cannot be mind controlled.

If a controlled figure is moved into a space, or takes an action, that would potentially cause that figure harm on that turn, it gets a chance to avoid taking the action. (This includes moving into Lava, jumping off of buildings, destroying an adjacent ITF that explodes, hitting a character with counter strike, etc.) To avoid completing the harmful move or action the player that originally owns the controlled figure rolls the 20-sided die. If a Hero figure rolls a 6 or higher it automatically breaks the control and the chosen figure returns to the player who controlled the figure before being controlled. A single squad figure, or a Dimwitted figure, needs to roll a 12 or higher to break the control.

name: Hellriot Clowns
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Hellriot Clown you control destroys the last figure of an opponent's Army Card with unrevealed Order Markers on it, you may take another turn with Hellriot Clowns.
ability_2_desc: Hellriot Clowns roll one additional die when defending against a normal attack from a figure with an Attack Value of 3 or less.
ability_3_desc: Hellriot Clowns roll one additional die when attacking a figure under an overhang.

name: Iron Wolves
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Iron Wolves, you may first take a turn with any Disciplined Baller you control.
ability_2_desc: If any Unique Hero you control is attacked with a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent's figure and receives enough wounds to be destroyed, you may destroy an Iron Wolf you control that is on the same level or higher and within 2 clear sight spaces of the defending hero to ignore any wounds that hero just received.

name: Harley Quinn
ability_1_desc: When revealing an order marker on an Insane Hero figure you control, after taking that figure's turn, if that figure is within 4 clear sight spaces of Harley Quinn, you may take an immediate turn with Harley Quinn. When an opponent reveals an order marker on an Insane Hero figure they control, after that opponent takes that figure's turn, if that figure is within 4 clear sight spaces of Harley Quinn, you must roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 4 from your die roll if that opponent took a turn with the Joker. If you roll a 4 or lower, that opponent may take temporary control of Harley Quinn and immediately take a turn with her. At the end of that turn, control of Harley Quinn returns to you.
ability_2_desc: If Harley Quinn is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 1 die to Harley's attack. If that figure was not adjacent to Harley at the start of this turn, it subtracts 2 from its defense dice.
ability_3_desc: Harley Quinn can move through all figures, is never attacked when leaving an engagement, and does not roll for damage from a fall or major fall.

name: HELMADARK
ability_1_desc: Helmadark starts the game with 4 magic counters on his card. At the beginning of each round you may place another magic counter on this card to a maximum of 4.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 4. Remove 4 magic counters from this card. Inferno affects all figures within 3 spaces of Helmadark.
ability_3_desc: In place of Helmadark's normal attack you may remove 2 magic counters from this card and cast Blood Lust on any figure within 6 clear sight spaces. The affected figure gains the Double Attack Special Ability during it's next activation.
ability_4_desc: When Helmadark attacks, he may attack one additional time.

name: High Dune Scorpions
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice, if a High Dune Scorpion a skull on every die, the defending figure cannot roll defense dice. Venomous Sting does not affect destructible objects
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice for a High Dune Scorpion, you may re-roll up to 1 die that did not show sheilds. Carapace may only be used once for each defense roll.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, High Dune Scorpions may double their height.

name: Hill Giant Brute Squad
ability_1_desc: At the end of every turn in which the Hill Giant Brute Squad destroyed an enemy figure, you may roll the 20-sided die, adding 1 to the roll for each Hill Giant Brute Squad member that has been destroyed. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may immediately take another turn with the Hill Giant Brute Squad.
ability_2_desc: When a Hill Giant Brute Squad member rolls defense dice against an attack from an adjacent small or medium figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Hei Bai
ability_1_desc: Start the game with a Vengeance marker. If a figure is destroyed while adjacent to a Tree or Jungle Tree by any figure other than Hei Bai, place the Vengeance marker on this card. While the Vengeance Marker is on this card, Hei Bai adds 5 to his Attack Value and may attack one additional time per turn. While the Vengeance Marker is on this card, Hei Bai may only attack figures adjacent to a Tree or Jungle Tree and must attack if able. At the end of the round, if there are no figures adjacent to a Tree or Jungle Tree, remove the Vengeance Marker from this card.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Hei Bai, choose an unengaged friendly Small or Medium figure adjacent to him. After you move Hei Bai, place the chosen figure adjacent to Hei Bai.
ability_3_desc: If Hei Bai attacks a figure that is not a Spirit, that figure's powers are negated for this attack. If Hei Bai rolls defense dice from an attack from a figure that is not a Spirit, Hei Bai adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Martian Manhunter
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Martian Manhunter, you may take a turn with any other Unique Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When Martian Manhunter is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, Martian Manhunter no longer has a visible hit zone for the duration of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Martian Manhunter's movement, ignore elevations. Martian Manhunter may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Martian Manhunter starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Toyotomi Hideyoshi
ability_1_desc: When Hideyoshi attacks and wounds an adjacent figure, he may attack any other adjacent figures. He may continue attacking adjacent figures he has not attacked in this turn until he fails to wound, or he has attacked each adjacent enemy once.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Hideyoshi, you may move three Samurai squad members or one Samurai hero up to 6 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does NOT work against other Samurai.

name: Hjálmar the Dauntless
ability_1_desc: When attacking or defending against a small or medium figure, you may add 4 to the height of the base of Hjálmar the Dauntless.
ability_2_desc: Before making a normal attack, choose a figure adjacent to Hjálmar the Dauntless that is also adjacent to the target. After that attack, if the target was destroyed, Hjálmar may make an additional attack on the chosen figure. Before making that additional attack, you may choose a new figure for Mighty Swing.
ability_3_desc: When defending against a normal attack from a figure that does not have the Lava Resistance special power, add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Black Widow
ability_1_desc: When Black Widow attacks an opponent's adjacent small or medium figure, you may switch Black Widow with the defending figure. After switching spaces, Black Widow must continue that attack, if possible, and cannot attack any other figure this turn. Figures moved by Tactical Switch never take any leaving engagement attacks. An opponent's figure may be moved by Tactical Switch only once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When Black Widow attacks an adjacent figure, she may attack an adjacent figure one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Black Widow may use her Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Black Widow's Swing Line movement, ignore elevations. Black Widow may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Black Widow may not Swing Line more than 12 levels up or down in a single Swing Line. If Black Widow is engaged when she starts to Swing Line, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ant-Man
ability_1_desc: Before moving a figure you control adjacent to Ant-Man, you may choose Ant-Man to Tag Along. After moving the figure, place Ant-Man on an empty space adjacent to the moved figure.
ability_2_desc: Ant-Man starts the game with one black Ant Marker on his card. After moving and before attacking with Ant-Man you may choose a unique hero within 6 spaces of Ant-Man and roll the 20 sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher the chosen figure is affected by Ant Control. Remove the Ant Marker from the card it is currently on and place it on the affected figure's card. When an opponent takes a turn with an affected figure, the figure cannot attack but can remove the Ant Marker and return it to Ant-Man's card at the end of the affected figure's turn. After the Ant Marker is removed from their card, the figure is no longer affected by Ant Control. Ant-Man is never affected by Ant Control.
ability_3_desc: Ant-Man can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. When moving up or down levels of terrain, Ant-Man may triple his Height.

name: Hobgoblin Impaler
ability_1_desc: When making a normal attack with a Hobgoblin Impaler, after rolling attack dice, you may reroll all attack dice that do not show a skull. You may not reroll any dice more than once per turn due to Brutal Strike.
ability_2_desc: When a Hobgoblin Impaler you control receives one or more wounds, before removing him from the board, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, ignore all wounds.

name: HIVE TROOPERS
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with HIVE Troopers, you may take a turn with any Hivelord you control.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, HIVE Troopers, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, you may move and attack with up to 3 HIVE Troopers you control. If you roll 13-16, you may move and attack with up to 6 HIVE Troopers you control. If you roll 17-20, you may move and attack with up to 9 HIVE Troopers you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for HIVE Troopers' movement, ignore elevations. HIVE Troopers may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When HIVE Troopers start to fly, if they are engaged they will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Herd Chief Baabas
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the target are also affected by Hammer Quake Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Hammer Quake Special Attack does not affect figures with the Surefooted ability.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium common figure rolls defense dice but is not destroyed by a normal or special attack from Baabas, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, you may place that figure on any unoccupied same-level or lower space within 3 spaces of the figure. Figures moved by Hammering Impact never take disengagement attacks and non-flying figures receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for movement (including height limits for climbing and falling), ignore up to 2 levels of elevation per hex. Any remaining levels are counted normally. This ability does not apply to movement on ladders.

name: Battle Brute
ability_1_desc: For each additional Battle Brute in your army, roll 1 extra die when attacking and defending, up to a maximum of 2 extra dice.
ability_2_desc: You may move and attack with up to 3 Battle Brutes that you control each turn.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. A Battle Brute may only use Boulder Throw Special Attack if it is on a stone, road, or wall walk space.

name: Hogun
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Hogun, you may move up to 2 other Asgardian heroes you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. All figures adjacent to the target figure are also affected by Mace Smash Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Hogun cannot be affected by his own Mace Smash Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When Hogun is destroyed, place this figure on any unique Army Card. Hogun's Spirit adds 1 to the move, attack, or defense number on that card.

name: HORNETIGER
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, Hornetiger may Leap up to 3 spaces and up to 25 levels up or down. When Leaping, ignore elevations, terrain effects, figures, and obstacles. Hornetiger will not take passing swipes before Leaping.
ability_2_desc: If Hornetiger rolls a skull on every die when attacking, the defending figure cannot defend. Venomous Sting does not affect destructible objects.

name: Huntress
ability_1_desc: After moving, if Huntress is not engaged she may attack twice during this turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure that is not adjacent, Huntress may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.

name: HOUYNYM
ability_1_desc: Houynym receives 2 additional dice when attacking an adjacent figure that was at least 4 spaces away at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: If Houynym began his turn unengaged, you may add 6 to his Range. If he began his turn unengaged and did not move, you may also attack the same figure an additional time.
ability_3_desc: If Houynym began his turn engaged and did not move this turn, he may attack up to three times.

name: Hoplitron
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with a Hoplitron, you may choose one small or medium figure adjacent to that Hoplitron. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may move the chosen figure one space. A figure moved by Shield Push never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Shield Push can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Hoplitron card, and before taking a turn with that Hoplitron, you may first take a turn with one other soulborg hero you control with a range of one.

name: Hydro-Man
ability_1_desc: When Hydro-Man is on a water space, add 1 to his attack and defense. Hydro-Man can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. Hydro-Man never takes falling damage.
ability_2_desc: If Hydro-Man ends his normal movement on a water space, you may immediately place him on any empty same-level water space within 8 spaces.
ability_3_desc: When Hydro-Man rolls defense dice, one shield will block all damage.

name: Huang Long
ability_1_desc: When you roll defense dice for any Samurai or Ninja that you control who follows Einar and is within 3 clear sight spaces of Huang Long, you may re-roll all defense dice that did not show shields. Golden Wings of Protection Aura can be used only once for each defense roll.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Huang Long's movement, ignore elevations. Huang Long may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Huang Long starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Killua Zoldyck
ability_1_desc: Killua may move through all figures and does not take leaving engagement attacks. He may also add 2 to his move when attacking an enemy figure.
ability_2_desc: Range: 3 | Attack: 5. Killua may attack any figure within 3 spaces. If he inflicts at least one wound, roll one unblockable attack die against that figure.
ability_3_desc: If Killua attacks a figure that has not moved this round, roll one additional attack die.

name: Hyena
ability_1_desc: At the end of every round, you may move all unengaged Hyenas you control up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Opponent's small, medium, and large figures adjacent to this Hyena subtract 1 from their defense dice when attacked by any figure other than this Hyena. A figure never subtracts more than 1 defense dice due to the Harry special power even if adjacent to multiple figures with Harry.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Hyena may add 2 to its height.

name: Human Torch
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 5. Human Torch can only attack with Supernova once per round. All figures within 3 clear sight spaces are affected by Supernova. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. After attacking with Supernova, remove all Order Markers from this card.
ability_2_desc: After leaving an engagement and after passing swipes are rolled, roll the d20. If you roll 11 or higher, the figure Human Torch left engagement with receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: Human Torch ignores terrain effects of lava field and molten lava spaces.

name: Sgt. I95
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Sgt. I95 can attack nonadjacent figures with his Photon Cannon Special Attack when he is engaged.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Sgt. I95 may not move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_3_desc: If Sgt. I95 is engaged, add 1 to his attack dice and 1 to his defense dice.

name: Hulk
ability_1_desc: When Hulk attacks he recieves one extra attack die for each Wound Marker he has, up to a maximum of 5 extra attack die for Rage Smash.
ability_2_desc: Hulk may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack seperately. Hulk rolls 3 fewer attack dice when using Stomp.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Hulk may use Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10. When counting spaces for Hulk's Super Leap movement, ignore elevations. Hulk may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Hulk may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Hulk is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Hulk rolls 3 fewer attack dice on any turn that he leaps.

name: Super Mario
ability_1_desc: Range 3 Special. Attack 5. Choose a figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Super Mario whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from the base of Super Mario to attack. If Super Mario's Jumping Special Attack destroys the figure, immediately replace the figure with Super Mario. If Super Mario doesn't destroy the figure, he receives 1 wound and must be placed on an empty space adjacent to the figure, or be destroyed.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally, Super Mario may Jump. Jump has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Jump, ignore elevations of up to 5. Super Mario may jump over water without stopping, jump over figures without becoming engaged, and jump over obstacles such as ruins. After destroying a figure with his Jumping Special Attack, Super Mario may Jump 5.
ability_3_desc: The most damage Super Mario may take for any attack or special power is 1. If Super Mario is destroyed and has no wounds on his Army Card, before removing his figure from the battlefield, place a wound on his Army Card, move him to any adjacent empty space, and he isn't destroyed. If Super Mario has any wounds on his Army Card, subtract 2 from his height and he is a small figure.

name: IBIS
ability_1_desc: Whenever an opponent's Unique Hero Figure that is within 6 clear sight spaces of Ibis destroys a Common Squad figure you control who follows Jandar, you may place that Squad figure on that Hero's Army Card. Ibis rolls one additional die when attacking a Unique Hero for every 2 figures placed on their Army Card from Condemn, up to a maximum of +3 dice.
ability_2_desc: All opponent's figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Ibis cannot add extra skulls or roll extra dice by any special power on their Army Card or Glyph when attacking normally.

name: Ice Devil Warfiends
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. An Ice Devil Warfiend that did not attack normally may use Freezing Breath Special Attack. When attacking with Freezing Breath Special Attack, that Ice Devil Warfiend may attack 2 additional times. It cannot attack the same figure more than once. Freezing Breath does not affect figures with the Ice Cold special power.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, place 4 copper Exoskeleton markers on this Army Card. After an Ice Devil Warfiend rolls defense dice against a normal or special attack, you may remove 1 Exoskeleton marker from this Army Card to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.

name: Ice Archon
ability_1_desc: If this Ice Archon inflicts at least one wound with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-8, nothing happens. If you roll a 9-18, the attacked figure cannot move or roll defense dice for the rest of the round. If you roll a 19-20, destroy the attacked figure and inflict one wound to each figure adjacent to the attacked figure.
ability_2_desc: While a Ice Archon is on a water or ice space, that space and all same-level water spaces adjacent to that Ice Archon are considered normal ice spaces. Figures do not have to stop their movement on normal ice spaces.

name: Iago Heterodyne's Chess Playing Automaton
ability_1_desc: At the start of the first round of a game, after all order markers have been placed, you may move Iago Heterodyne's Chess Playing Automaton up to 5 spaces. It must end its Opening Gambit movement on an empty space.
ability_2_desc: Once per game, before moving Iago Heterodyne's Chess Playing Automaton normally, choose a non-adjacent figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces. After moving the Automaton, you may immediately move the chosen figure up to 6 spaces. The chosen figure cannot end its move adjacent to the Automaton, and will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When attacking a King, Queen, Knight, Bishop, or the Castle Door, Iago Heterodyne's Chess Playing Automaton rolls 2 additional attack dice.

name: Imperial Stormtroopers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Imperial Stormtroopers you may first take a turn with any Sith Lord you control.

name: Ignidom
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Ignidom, you may first take a turn with any two fire elementals that you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Choose an opponent's small or medium figure to attack with Incinerate Special Attack. Ignidom destroys the selected figures with Incinerate Special attack, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Fire Elemental.
ability_3_desc: Ignidom never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and it do not have to stop on molten lave spaces.

name: Initiate Monk
ability_1_desc: When adjacent to another monk, this Initiate monk may add one additional attack dice.

name: Imperator Kayne
ability_1_desc: Once during Imperator Kayne's turn, at any point during his normal movement that he is on a space where he could end his movement, you may choose an adjacent Small or Medium figure whose level is no more than 5 levels above Kayne's level and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound.

name: Illiana Sunshield
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack, Illiana Sunshield always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Illiana Sunshield attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack Illiana Sunshield.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Illiana Sunshield rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Illiana Sunshield may take for this attack is one.

name: Idol of Klexkor
ability_1_desc: When revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, if there is already a revealed Order Marker on this card, then instead of taking a turn with the Idol Of Klexkor, you may remove it from the battlefield and replace it with the Aspect Of Klexkor. Move all Order Markers, Wound Markers, and special markers such as Negation from this Army Card to the Aspect Of Klexkor's Army Card and immediately take a turn with the Aspect Of Klexkor. At the end of the round, remove Aspect of Klexkor from the battlefield, replace it with the Idol of Klexkor, and move all wound and special markers back onto this card.
ability_2_desc: At the end of your turn, remove one wound marker from this Army Card.

name: Igor
ability_1_desc: The first time each turn Igor is targeted with a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, Igor no longer has any visible hit zones for the rest of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Igor may not move or be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Igor may double his Height.

name: Ignis Dullahan
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose an opponent's non-adjacent figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Ignis Dullahan. Move the chosen figure up to 3 spaces. The chosen figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks for this move. The chosen figure rolls one fewer defense die if attacked this turn.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Ignis Dullahan and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher and the chosen figure is a squad figure, it receives one unblockable wound. If you roll a 13 or higher and the chosen figure is a Unique Hero figure, remove one wound marker from its Army Card. Ignis Dullahan cannot use Treat 13 if he used his Trick special power this turn.

name: HSIEN-KO
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, before you place order markers, you may chose to activate Daibakusou Rimoukon for the duration of the round. While Daibakusou Rimoukon is active: add 1 to Hsien-Ko's Move value and Attack value, the most wounds Hsien-Ko may take from any attack is one, and all other special powers on this army card are negated.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving and attacking normally with Hsein-Ko, you may move Hsein-Ko up to 5 spaces in a straight line. Hsein-Ko has Flying while moving with Senpuu Bu. After moving with Senpuu Bu, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure Hsein-Ko passed over during her move. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack Special. Choose a non-adjacent figure to attack, and roll the 20-sided die: • If you roll a 1-5, roll 3 attack dice for this special attack. • If you roll a 6-10, roll 4 attack dice for this special attack. • If you roll an 11-15, any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this special attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. • If you roll a 16-20, roll 4 attack dice for this special attack. If you roll at least 1 skull, the chosen figure cannot move or attack until the next time you reveal a numbered order marker.

name: QURAK
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Sorcerer or Sorceress Hero you control to be Qurak's Master. Qurak rolls 1 additional attack die when attacking an opponent's figure that is engaged to his chosen Master.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Qurak's chosen Master's card, before taking that figure's turn, you may first take a turn with Qurak.
ability_3_desc: Qurak's chosen Master does not take leaving engagement attacks from figures that are engaged to Qurak.

name: Ingrid Ironwill
ability_1_desc: When a Dwarf you control who follows Aquilla and is adjacent to Ingrid Ironwill receives one or more wounds, you may place one wound marker on this Army Card to ignore one wound that figure just received.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice or defense dice, if there are at least 4 wound markers on this Army Card, Ingrid Ironwill adds one automatic skull or shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Ingrid Ironwill may double her Height.

name: Ilyeana Esenwein
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Ilyena Esenwein, choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces. Roll the 20-sided die once for each figure controlled by an opponent that is adjacent to the chosen figure. If you roll a 16 or higher, the adjacent figure receives 1 wound. Add 3 to your die roll if the chosen figure is a Squad figure. Soulborgs and Constructs cannot be chosen for Vampiric Domination.
ability_2_desc: Each time Ilyeana Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Ilyeana Esenwein cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ilyeana Esenwein's movement, ignore elevations.
