name: Murkwood
ability_1_desc: Figures adjacent to Murkwood are considered to be adjacent to a Jungle Bush.
ability_2_desc: At any point while moving, Murkwood may choose a small or medium figure that is adjacent, on the same level, and on a space where Murkwood may end his movement. Roll the 20-side die. If you roll 1-7, the figure is safe and Murkwood's movement ends. If you roll 8-20, the figure receives 1 wound. If the wound destroys the figure, move Murkwood onto the space that figure occupied, and you may continue Murkwood's movement. If the chosen figure is not destroyed, Murkwood's movement ends. Murkwood must be on a space where he can end movement each time he uses this power.

name: Næckyr
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may roll 6 Aquilla Valkyrie dice. If you roll at least 4 Aquilla symbols, then all friendly figures within 7 clear sight spaces of Næckyr attain Thorian Speed. Enemy figures must be adjacent to attack your friendly figures with a normal attack for the rest of the round. You may re-roll any of the 6 dice that did not show Aquilla symbols up to two times. Siren Song does not affect Næckyr.
ability_2_desc: Næckyr does not have to stop her movement when entering water spaces.

name: Nhah Scirh Elite
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Nhah Scirh Elite, you may first take a turn with one Icarian Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Whenever a Nhah Scirh Elite destroys a Common figure, you may choose another Common figure that is also adjacent to that Nhah Scirh Elite. That figure receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a Special Attack, a Nhah Scirh Elite always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Mystique
ability_1_desc: The first time each turn Mystique is targeted with a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or higher, Mystique no longer has any visible hit zone for the rest of the targeting figure's turn.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with any Hero you control, if Mystique is within 4 clear sight spaces of an opponent's figure you may move another Hero you control up to 4 spaces. Mystique cannot be moved by this power.
ability_3_desc: Mystique can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. When she leaves engagement with small or medium figures she may make a leaving engagement attack against them. She cannot make a leaving engagement attack against the same figure more than once per turn.

name: Mysterio
ability_1_desc: Mysterio can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Any time Mysterio moves through an opponent's figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's army card and negate that card's special powers for the rest of this turn. You can only roll once per figure each turn. Robots and Soulborgs are never affected by Hallucinogen Gas.
ability_3_desc: If Mysterio is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to vanish. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll 11 or higher, Mysterio takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Mysterio can vanish only if he ends his vanishing move not adjacent to any opponent's figures.

name: Nightmare the Fiendlord
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Figures who follow Jandar do not roll defense dice against Dark Bomb Special Attack. Figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Dark Bomb Special Attack. Roll Attack dice once for all affected figure. Figures roll defense dice seperately. Undead figure are not affected by Dark Bomb Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, but before taking a turn with Nightmare, you may first take a turn with any Squad you control who follows Utgar. The only Hero who may take a turn as the result of this power is Nightmare.

name: Chandra's Fury
ability_1_desc: Chandra inflicts 4 blockable damage to all objects and enemy hero figures adjacent to her and she inflicts 1 blockable damage to all enemy squad figures adjacent to her.

name: NAX'KLON
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, when a figure you control within 5 clear sight spaces of Nax'Klon makes a normal attack, you may re-roll up to 3 attack dice once. After that attack, if the target was not destroyed, the attacker receives one wound for each re-rolled die that did not show a skull.
ability_2_desc: When defending against a normal attack, if fewer than 4 attack dice were rolled, Nax'Klon may add 1 shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Before moving, you may choose an opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Nax'Klon. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, and it is a Unique Hero, remove all Order Markers on the chosen figure's Army Card. Otherwise, the figure receives one wound.

name: NIDHOG
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Nidhog. One at a time, roll the 20-sides die for each chosen figure. If you roll a 1-10, nothing happens. If you roll an 11-18, the chosen figure recieves 1 wound. If you roll a 19 or higher, the chosen figure recieves 1 wound and you may remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common card for that figure). Breath of Decay does not affect Undead or Constructs.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Nidhog's movement, ignore elevations. Nidhog may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Nidhog starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Night Whisperer
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking with the Night Whisperer, you may choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of the Night Whisperer. Place a Dream Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card. The Night Whisperer never takes any leaving engagement attacks from figures with at least one of your Dream Markers on their Army Card.
ability_2_desc: For the entire game, instead of revealing a numbered Order Marker on an Army Card in your army to take a turn, you may choose a Unique Hero or Unique Squad with at least one of your Dream Markers on their Army Card. Remove one of your Dream Markers from that Army Card. Take temporary control of the chosen Hero or Squad and immediately take a turn with that Hero or Squad. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero or Squad returns to its previous owner.

name: NEO
ability_1_desc: Begin the game with up to 6 Ability Glyphs. At the start of the game, before placing Order Markers, choose 1 Ability Glyph and place it on this card. Once per game, after revealing a numbered Order Marker on this card, if Neo is unengaged, you may also reveal the "X" Order Marker on this card to place 1 additional Ability Glyph on this card, to a maximum of 3 Ability Glyphs.
ability_2_desc: When Neo attacks with his normal attack, he may attack one additional time. When Neo uses his Lots Of Guns special power, he may not use any Power Glyph on his card that would allow him to attack more than two times this turn.
ability_3_desc: When Neo rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage. When Neo rolls defense dice against an adjacent attacking figure, if he rolls at least one shield, the most wounds he may take for this attack is one.

name: Noirloom
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the round, after everyone have put all order makers, reveal the "X" order marker on Noirloom army card. For the duration of the round, Noirloom will have 2 on its attack value and 5 on its defense value. Noirloom can now attack all adjacent figures, roll attack dices separately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dices against a normal or special attack, Noirloom always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled. You can't use this power if you are using Changing Styles this round.

name: Nilkanta
ability_1_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to 2 other figures within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Lightning Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Lightning Breath Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Nilkanta's movement, ignore elevations. Nilkanta may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Nilkanta starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: MORDED
ability_1_desc: Every time Morded destroys another figure, place one marker on his Army Card. For each marker on Morded's card, add one to his attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Morded always adds 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: Olog-Hai
ability_1_desc: When this Olog-hai attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to this Olog-hai. If the defending figure receives any wounds from this Olog-hai's attack, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When this Olog-hai attacks a destructible object, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Ogre Raiders
ability_1_desc: Ogre Raiders roll one additional die when attacking small or medium squad figures.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Ogre Raiders always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Ogre Raiders roll one additional die when attacking figures who are standing on a Glyph or carrying a Treasure Glyph.

name: Obsidian Guards
ability_1_desc: Obsidian Guards never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage and they do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_2_desc: When an Obsidian Guard is on a molten lava space it may add 4 to its range. Otherwise, when a Obsidian Guard is adjacent to at least one figure with the Lava Resistant special power it may add 2 to its range.
ability_3_desc: When Obsidian Guard is on a water space it rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: Obsidian Champion
ability_1_desc: At the end of the round, spaces adjacent to this Obsidian Champion are considered lava field spaces. Friendly figures adjacent to this Obsidian Champion may treat the space they are on as a molten lava space. Volcanic Heat does not affect water or ice spaces.
ability_2_desc: This Obsidian Champion never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: When a Obsidian Champion is on a water space it rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: Olog
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Olog, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Olog at the start of this turn, Olog receives 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the round, after all Order Markers have been placed, you may move Olog up to 3 spaces. Olog must end his Wild Rush on an empty space.

name: Nordlüng
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. Robots and Soulborgs who do not follow Jandar roll one less defense die when attacked by Nordlüng's Shock Rifle Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Nordlüng attacks with his Hoarfrost Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nordlüng's movement, ignore elevations. Nordlüng may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles. When Nordlüng starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Omnicron Elite Sniper
ability_1_desc: Squad figures attacked by this Omnicron Elite Sniper cannot roll any defense dice. Hero figures attacked by this Omnicron Elite Sniper subtract 2 from their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to this Omnicron Elite Sniper to target him for a special attack.

name: Nyssa
ability_1_desc: If Nyssa is on a grass or swamp space, add one to her defense number. If she ends the round on a grass or swamp space, you may remove one wound marker from this card.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is adjacent to a tree or bush within two spaces of Nyssa, it is considered to be engaged with that tree or bush. You may make leaving engagement attacks on that figure, if possible.
ability_3_desc: All friendly figures who follow Ullar and are adjacent to Nyssa, or to a tree or bush that is also adjacent to Nyssa, roll one additional defense die when defending against a normal attack.

name: Nordlung
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. After attacking with Shockgun Special Attack, you must roll the 20-sided die once for the target figure and each figure adjacent to it, if that figure is a Soulborg who does not follow Jandar. If you roll a 15 or higher, that figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Nordlung attacks with his Hoarfrost Breath Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nordlung's movement, ignore elevations. Nordlung may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles. When Nordlung starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Orc Overseer
ability_1_desc: All friendly squad figures from Isengard who start their turn adjacent to at least one Orc Overseer may move 2 additional spaces.

name: NORDLUNG
ability_1_desc: Range 8. Attack 4. After attacking a Soulborg figure with Omnicron Pulse Rifle Special Attack, you may reveal an X Order Marker on this card to remove an unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's card (or cards if there is more than one army card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Nordlung attacks with his Princeling Ice Shards Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Nordlung's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ond Rot
ability_1_desc: When Ond Rot attacks, for every skull you roll, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.
ability_2_desc: Ond Rot may add 6 to his move value if he would move adjacent to an Evergreen Tree, Jungle Piece or a figure your opponent controls.
ability_3_desc: Friendly Small and Medium figures adjacent to Ond Rot roll an additional defense die when attacked by a figure that is not adjacent.

name: Ol' Scratch
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Ol' Scratch, you may reveal an 'X' Order Marker on this card. Until the next time you reveal a numbered Order Marker, all opponents' figure other than Soulborgs or Undead within 2 spaces of Ol' Scratch subtract one from their attack and defence.
ability_2_desc: When Ol' Scratch attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ol' Scratch's movement, ignore elevations. Ol' Scratch may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ol' Scratch starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Onshu the Welkineye
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. When Onshu the Welkineye attacks with Sonic Blast Special Attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Onshu the Welkineye's movement, ignore elevations. Onshu may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Onshu is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Optimus Prime
ability_1_desc: When Optimus Prime attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Optimus Prime is destroyed, place this figure on any unique Army Card. Optimus Prime's Spirit adds 1 to the normal attack number on that card.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Optimus Prime may not use his Ion Blaster Special Attack to attack another Autobot figure.
ability_4_desc: All figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Optimus Prime add 1 die to their normal attack. Optimus Prime's Rollout Attack Inspiration does not affect Optimus Prime.

name: Order of Dagon
ability_1_desc: After an Order of Dagon figure you control rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure that is not adjacent, you may place any Order of Dagon figure you control on an empty space adjacent to the attacking figure. If the chosen figure is engaged, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If a Disciple or Priest you control receives one or more wounds from a normal attack, you may destroy an adjacent Order of Dagon figure you control to ignore all wounds.

name: Owlbear Brawler
ability_1_desc: If this Owlbear Brawler inflicts at least 2 wounds with a normal attack, it may immediately attack again. This Owlbear Brawler may continue to attack in this way as long as it inflicts at least 2 wounds with each attack.
ability_2_desc: If this Owlbear Brawler has at least one wound on its Army Card, it receives one extra attack die.

name: Osamu
ability_1_desc: Before attacking with Osamu, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, then all skulls rolled for Osamu's attack count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure if that figure is adjacent. If that figure is not adjacent, then Osamu may move two spaces for each excess shield rolled. If Osamu is engaged when he starts to Rush, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Bulbasaur
ability_1_desc: SPECIAL POWAAHHSS!!

name: Peregrin Took
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, you may re-roll any attack or defense roll made by Peregrin Took. You must keep the result from the re-roll.
ability_2_desc: Peregrin Took is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Kobolds of Idona Keep
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Warrior Hero you control to be the Kobolds of Idona Keep's Master. While their chosen Master is in play, when taking a turn with the Kobolds of Idona Keep, you may move and attack with 1 additional Kobold for each Wound Marker on their Master's Army Card. You can choose only one Master for all the Kobolds of Idona Keep you control. Kobolds of Idona Keep cannot attack their Master.
ability_2_desc: A Kobold of Idona Keep rolls 2 additional attack dice while its chosen Master is destroyed.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Kobolds of Idona Keep may add 2 to their height.

name: Paul Muad'Dib
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, Paul Muad'Dib may declare himself a Fremen. For the remainder of the game, treat this card as a Fremen card.
ability_2_desc: When Paul attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: An opponent may never take temporary or permanent control of Paul Muad'Dib.
ability_4_desc: Paul is immune to all attacks involving acid or poison.

name: Pavin Nahz
ability_1_desc: Range 8. Attack 1. Before attacking with Stun Rifle Special Attack, choose a figure you control that is engaged with the targeted figure. If you roll a skull and the target is not destroyed, you may move the chosen figure up to 4 spaces. A figure moved by Stun Rifle Special Attack may move through the targeted figure, and does not take leaving engagement attacks from that figure. Pavin Nahz may use this special attack 3 times in one turn.

name: PA-ROK-SA
ability_1_desc: If Pa-Rok-Sa ends his normal movement on a water space, you may immediately place him on any empty same-level water space within 5 spaces. If Pa-Rok-Sa is engaged when he starts his Water Tunnel, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When a Squad figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Pa-Rok-Sa attacks with a normal attack, it subtracts 1 from its attack dice. Figures with the menacing personality are not affected by Pa-Rok-Sa's Menacing Aura.

name: Pallaton Darkriver
ability_1_desc: Range 6 Attack 2. If Pallaton Darkriver inflicts a wound with Sleep Dart Special Attack, remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: If Pallaton Darkriver is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and Pallaton. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 10 or higher, ignore any wounds Pallaton just received.

name: PAYLIND
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. All humans adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected. Figures costing 90 or fewer points per card may not roll any defense dice agianst Shopping Spree Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Before Taking a turn with Paylind the Human Governor, you may first take a turn with any Human with a Right Wing personality you control.
ability_3_desc: Paylind must add 1 to her base move, attack, and defense when she is on a snow or ice space.

name: Captain Bones
ability_1_desc: Each time Captain Bones destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Captain Bones cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, Captain Bones may attempt a Chilling Touch. To do this, choose a figure adjacent to Captain Bones and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, nothing happens. If you roll 13-15, the chosen figure receives 1 wound. If you roll 16-17, the chosen figure receives 2 wounds. If you roll 18-19, the chosen figure receives 3 wounds. If you roll a 20 or higher, the chosen figure receives 6 wounds. Chilling Touch does not effect Soulborgs or destructible objects.

name: TAE-WOK-SA
ability_1_desc: When an opponent rolls defense dice for a small or medium figure adjacent to Tae-Wok-Sa, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that opponent must re-roll all defense dice that did show shields. Intimidating Presence can be used only once for each defense roll.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice for Tae-Wok-Sa, if a skull is rolled on every die, you may attack again until you do not roll a skull on every die.

name: Pathfinders of the Iron Hills
ability_1_desc: A Pathfinder of the Iron Hills that does not attack this turn may move 2 additional spaces
ability_2_desc: When a Pathfinder of the Iron Hills within 5 clear sight spaces of a Dwarf Unique Hero you control rolls attack dice, you may re-roll any dice that did not show skulls. Kin of Dain may only be used once per attack.
ability_3_desc: Pathfinders of the Iron Hills are never attacked when leaving an engagement,
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Pathfinders of the Iron Hills may double their Height.

name: Plague Rats
ability_1_desc: At the end of every round for the entire game, roll the 20-sided die and add the number of your previously destroyed Plague Rats. If you roll a 20 or higher, you may choose an opponent. That opponent must give one wound to any figure he or she controls that is not a Rat, Soulborg, Undead, or Construct.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Plague Rats may triple their height.

name: Praetorian Guards
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Praetorian Guards, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against Samurai.

name: Priscus
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. A small or medium figure attacked with Grapple Special Attack rolls one less defense die.
ability_2_desc: If all of your order markers are on Gladiators, and at least one order marker is on Priscus, all friendly Gladiators adjacent to Priscus add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: PHEELIX
ability_1_desc: Pheelix rolls 2 additional defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. Begin the game with one Etheric Disruption marker on this card. When using Etheric Pulse Rifle Special Attack, choose a Soulborg or Cyborg figure to attack. If 2 skulls are rolled, place the Etheric Disruption marker on that figure's Army Card. While the marker is on that card, no figure on that card may use a special power on that Army Card. Return the marker to this card at the end of the round.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, if Pheelix would receive enough wounds to be destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, you may ignore any wounds that would destroy Pheelix.

name: PORKYUS
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Porkyus and within 2 spaces of a water space will be affected by Raging River Special Attack. Roll attack die once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Porkyus cannot be affected by her own Raging River Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: While Porkyus is on a water space, add 2 to her Defense. If Porkyus starts her turn on a water space, add 1 to her movement for that turn. Porkyus does not have to stop her movement when entering a water space.

name: Prince Imrahil
ability_1_desc: At the end of any round in which you lost initiative, you may move up to 4 Human Soldiers you control who follow Einar up to 5 spaces each. The chosen figures must be within clear sight of Prince Imrahil before moving and will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When taking a turn with a Human Squad you control who follows Einar, if you did not attack with all figures activated that turn, Prince Imrahil may make one normal attack before that turn ends.

name: Firelord Ozai
ability_1_desc: Order Markers may not be moved from this card to any other card. After placing Order Markers, before rolling for initiative, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 11 or lower, you must move any unrevealed Order Markers on Army Cards you control to this card and Firelord Ozai adds 1 to his Attack Value and subtracts 1 from his Defense Value for the rest of the round.
ability_2_desc: If Firelord Ozai destroyed a figure this turn, you may attack again with his normal attack. Firelord Ozai may continue attacking until he fails to destroy a figure. Firelord Ozai may not attack more than three times in a single turn.
ability_3_desc: If Firelord Ozai inflicts one or more wounds with his normal attack, you may roll an attack die for each wound received. The figure receives one additional wound for each skull rolled. Firelord Ozai rolls 3 fewer dice for his normal attack and may not inflict additional wounds when attacking a figure with the Lava Resistant Special Power.
ability_4_desc: When Firelord Ozai is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Firelord Ozai can take from this attack is one.

name: Professor Lombot
ability_1_desc: When rolling for initiative, if there is at least one Order Marker on Professor Lombot's Army Card and you roll a 20 or higher, you may look at all of your opponent's Order Markers for the duration of the round.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with any figure you control, you may choose an opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Professor Lombot. Choose one of that figure's special powers and activate its effect for the duration of the turn. You may activate that special power's effect even if the requirements for activating that power are not fulfilled.

name: Puncture
ability_1_desc: If Puncture wounds a figure with a normal nonadjacent attack, he may attack one additional time. Speed Reloader may only be used once per turn.
ability_2_desc: If no player has revealed Order Marker 3, then Puncture has no hit zone.

name: Controller
ability_1_desc: If Controller would inflict a wound on an opponent's Unique Hero, instead of placing Wound Markers, you may place a Slave Disc Marker on that Hero's Army Card. If the figure costs over 150 points, Controller must inflict at least two wounds to place a marker. A figure with a Slave Disc Marker cannot attack Controller. If an opponent only has one figure left, that figure cannot have a Slave Disc Marker. If Controller recieves a wound, remove all Slave Disc Markers. Before taking a turn with Controller, you may first take a turn with any figure that has a Slave Disc Marker on its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: For every figure with a Slave Disc Marker on its Army Card, you may roll one additional attack and defense die. If the figure costs more than 200 points, you may add a second additional die.

name: Pryce Mercenaries
ability_1_desc: After revealing a numbered Order Marker on the Pryce Mercenaries, you may also reveal an unrevealed "X" Order Marker that is on this card. If you do, then before taking a turn with the Pryce Mercenaries, you may first take a turn with any Unique Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Pryce Mercenaries, if they did not attack this turn, you may move up to 2 other Mercenaries you control up to 5 spaces. You may only use March Movement on turns in which you use Paid Loyalty Bonding.

name: Queen Ecterine
ability_1_desc: All friendly Loyal figures adjacent to Queen Ecterine add 1 to their Defense value. Add 1 to Queen Ecterine's Defense value for every friendly Loyal figure adjacent to her, up to a maximum of +3 Dice.
ability_2_desc: If Queen Ecterine is destroyed by an opponent's figure, all Loyal figures you control may add 1 to their Move and Attack values for the duration of the round, and you may add 10 to your next Initiative roll.

name: Pikachu
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving and attacking normally, this Pikachu may use Agility. While using Agility, this Pikachu adds 3 to its movement and may make a normal attack once before, during, or after its movement. While using Agility, this Pikachu is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When this Pikachu attacks with its Thunderbolt Special Attack, it may attack one additional time. This Pikachu may target the same or a different figure with each attack.
ability_3_desc: When this Pikachu rolls defense dice against an opponent's attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 dice to this Pikachu's defense.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this Pikachu may double its height.

name: QUAMUR
ability_1_desc: Range Special Attack 6. Choose a Construct figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Quamur. All figures adjacent to the chosen Construct are affected by Bolt Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Whenever attacking an adjacent figure, Quamur rolls 2 additional dice.

name: Psylocke
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. After attacking normally, Psylocke may attack with her Psychic Knife Special Attack. Figures cannot roll defense dice against Psychic Knife Special Attack. Psylocke cannot attack Robots or destructible objects with Psychic Knife Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Any time Psylocke is targeted for a normal or special attack by an opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure cannot attack Psylocke this turn. Robots are never affected by Telepathic Illusion.
ability_3_desc: Psylocke can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Puppet Master
ability_1_desc: Puppet Master starts the game with one puppet marker. If Puppet Master does not move or attack this turn, you may place the puppet marker on any Unique Hero within clear line of sight. If Puppet Master moves, attacks, receives a wound or is destroyed, remove the puppet marker. Any figure with a puppet marker on its Army Card may not attack Puppet Master.
ability_2_desc: When any player takes a turn with a figure, if it has a puppet marker on its Army Card, you may immediately take that turn with that figure instead of that player. If you do, remove the puppet marker. Instead of taking a turn with Puppet Master, you may take a turn with any figure with a puppet marker on its Army Card. Puppet Master cannot use Puppetry Control the same turn he used his Radioactive Sculpting special power.

name: Question
ability_1_desc: Once per round, before taking a turn with any figure you control, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card, you may choose an opponent and guess which card in that opponent's control has an unrevealed "X" Order Marker on it. If you are correct, that opponent must remove the "X" Order Marker and, for the duration of the round, all figures you control add 1 to their defense dice when defending against any attack from a figure controlled by that opponent.

name: Ishikawa Goemon
ability_1_desc: Ishikawa Goemon rolls an additional attack die when attacking a figure that is not a destructible object sitting on at least one shadow space.
ability_2_desc: When Ishikawa Goemon rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Abra
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving this Abra normally, you may choose any empty space that is within 8 spaces of this Abra. Place this Abra on the chosen space. When this Abra starts to Teleport, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If this Abra is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 1-8, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 9 or higher, this Abra takes no damage and may immediately use Teleport. Abra can flee only if it ends its teleporting move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_3_desc: When one or more order marker is removed from this Abra from an opposing figure's special power, you may remove one unrevealed order marker at random from the opposing figure's Army Card. When this Abra receives a status effect marker, you may place one status marker of the same type on the opposing figure.

name: Raelin the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: While opponents' figures are within 4 clear sight spaces of Raelin the Kyrie Warrior, they lower their Defense Value by 1.
ability_2_desc: If Raelin inflicts at least 1 wound with a normal attack or leaving engagement attack, she inflicts 1 additional wound.

name: Quick Jack
ability_1_desc: When a figure with at least one Treasure Glyph on its Army Card ends its movement within 3 clear sight spaces of Quick Jack, you may choose one Treasure Glyph on that card and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, move that Treasure Glyph to this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When you roll the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap with Quick Jack, you may add 4 to your die roll.
ability_3_desc: Quick Jack may add 3 to his move number. Quick Jack must be able to land on a Treasure Glyph in order to use Sidetracked.

name: Black Paladins
ability_1_desc: When you roll attack dice for a Black Paladin, you may re-roll two attack dice that did not show a skull one time each.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, a Black Paladin always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Rakhalar the War Troll
ability_1_desc: If Rakhalar is attacking an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to his attack.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Rakhalar, roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 to your roll for each Wound Marker on this Army Card. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may attack again with Rakhalar.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Rakhalar the War Troll, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Army Card.

name: QUAITUS D
ability_1_desc: Figures attacked by Quaitus D may not add extra shields or roll extra dice by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph. Destructible Objects are not affected by Transonic Blades.
ability_2_desc: Quaitus D adds 3 to his Attack when attacking an opponent's figure who is not adjacent to any other opponent's figures.
ability_3_desc: Before, during, or after moving, Quaitus D may use Stealth Jettison 25. Stealth Jettison has a move of 3. When counting spaces for leaping, ignore elevations. Quaitus may leap over water, over figures, and over obstacles. Quaitus may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. Quaitus will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Stealth Jettison. Stealth Jettison 25 may only be used once per turn.

name: Ralentar
ability_1_desc: When defending with Ralentar add 3 dice to his roll if the attacking figure's line of sight is partially blocked by a tree.
ability_2_desc: Add 2 to Ralentar's movement when he begins his turn on a grass hex.
ability_3_desc: You may take a free turn with Ralentar after the activation of any opponent orc army card. You may only make an attack with this free turn if it's against an orc.

name: Ragnarok
ability_1_desc: When Ragnarok inflicts at least one wound with a normal attack, for each wound dealt you may remove 1 wound from this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Before placing Order Markers each round, you may inflict 1 wound on Ragnarok to give Ragnarok no hit zones until the end of the round.
ability_3_desc: Shadow spaces adjacent to Ragnarok that are above the level of his base are immediately removed as he becomes adjacent to them. When he moves awy from those spaces, they are not returned to their space.

name: Raakchott Steward of Death
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Raakchott, Steward of Death, before taking Raakchott's turn, you may take a turn with a Small or Medium Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 red Consume Markers. When a figure within 3 clear line spaces of Raakchott is destroyed, place a Consume Marker on this Army Card. You cannot place more than one Consume Marker on this card each turn.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. All figures adjacent to Raakchott are affected by Soul Fury Special Attack. Add 1 to Raakchott's attack dice for each Consume Marker on this Army Card. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Do not place Consume Markers on this Army Card while using Soul Fury Special Attack. After using Soul Fury Special Attack, remove one Consume Marker from this Army Card for each figure you attacked this turn.

name: RAMTOR
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Ramtor's Army Card, before taking a turn with Ramtor, you may take a turn with Torram if he is under your control.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose 3 spaces in a straight line from Ramtor. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Right Arm Flamethrower Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Pikachu
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, roll a 20-side die. On a roll of 15 or higher, the opponent is stunned for the remainder of the round.
ability_2_desc: If Ash dies, Pikachu get +2 to every stat for the remainder of the game. Excludes life points.
ability_3_desc: Move Pikachu when Ash moves. Pikachu has to stay withing 3 spaces of Ash.

name: Rebel Trooper
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if another unit in this squad attacks the same target, add one attack die to the 2nd unit's attack.

name: Rebel Officer
ability_1_desc: All allied non-Unique Heros within 6 LOS hexes gain +1 attack dice. (does not stack)

name: Raven's Claw
ability_1_desc: Range 4, Attack 3. If Raven's Claw's Mystic Axe Special Attack destroys a figure, immediately place Raven's Claw on the space the figure occupied and Raven's Claw may attack again with his Mystic Axe Special Attack. Raven's Claw may continue attacking with his Mystic Axe Special Attack until he does not destroy a figure. Raven's Claw does not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving during Mystic Axe Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If Raven's Claw receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore any wounds.

name: Raziel
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Mind Flayer, Raziel may attack one additional time with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Razeil's Army Card, before taking a turn with Raziel, you may take a turn with two other Gith Monks you control.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Concussion Orb Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Superman
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Superman's movement, ignore elevations. Superman may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Superman starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Superman never adds an opponent's height to their defense dice when attacking.
ability_3_desc: Superman never takes leaving engagement attacks.

name: Raven of Ostriyich
ability_1_desc: A Raven of Ostriyich may attack any figure within 1 clear sight space, ignoring engagement rules. When attacking, a Raven's base is considered to be one higher than the base of the defending figure. After attacking an enemy figure, that Raven may move up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When Raven of Ostriyich rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 3 defense dice to the defense roll.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Raven of Ostriyich's movement, ignore elevations. Raven of Ostriyich may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Raven of Ostriyich starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Red Hood
ability_1_desc: When Red Hood attacks, he may attack one additional time. If he is attacking an adjacent figure or a figure he has previously wounded this turn, he rolls one additional die.
ability_2_desc: Red Hood is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Ringwraith - Twilight
ability_1_desc: You may have no more than 9 Nazgul in your Army.
ability_2_desc: ALL figures within 2 clear sight spaces of a Ringwraith subtract 1 from their attack.
ability_3_desc: A Ringwraith In Twilight can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Red Skull
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, instead of taking that turn with Red Skull you make take a turn with another Unique Hero you control within clear sight.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, you must roll one attack die. If you roll a skull, remove one Wound Marker from this card and inflict one unblockable wound on any figure within 4 clear sight spaces.

name: Red Skull
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Red Skull's card, instead of taking that turn with Red Skull, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero you control within clear sight of Red Skull.
ability_2_desc:
After moving and before attacking you may either:
• Roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Red Skull, or
• Roll the 20-sided die once for any one figure up to 3 clear sight spaces away.
If you roll a 19 or higher, that figure is destroyed.

name: Rev MacDirk
ability_1_desc: Before you take a turn with Rev MacDirk, you may choose an opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces. Your opponent must choose one unrevealed order marker on the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure), display it and return it to its original position.
ability_2_desc: When any Squad figure you control who follows Jandar adjacent to Rev MacDirk receives one or more wounds, you may place a wound marker on Rev MacDirk and ignore any wounds that figure just received.
ability_3_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Utgar, Rev MacDirk receives 1 additional attack die.

name: River Song
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with River Song, you may take a turn with another Time Lord or Companion you control.
ability_2_desc: River Song may be considered to be a Time Lord in addition to her normal class.
ability_3_desc: Before or after attacking, you may choose an adjacent small or medium figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, remove all Order Markers on that figure's card (or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure.) Soulborgs, Cyborgs, and Robots are not affected by Hallucinogenic Lipstick.

name: Natima
ability_1_desc: Range 9. Attack 6. Natima may only use this attack if she did not move this turn. Deadly Shot Special Attack can not be used to attack an adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: Natima rolls one less defense die for each order marker on this army card.

name: Royal Guard Knights
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Royal Guard Knights, you may first take a turn with any small or medium King, Queen, or Prince Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Any or all Royal Guard Knights may add 2 to their Move number as long as they are unengaged prior to moving. Royal Guard Knights must be able to move adjacent to a friendly King, Queen, or Prince Hero in order to use Swift Aid.

name: Robin Tim Drake
ability_1_desc: If Robin is adjacent to an opponent's figure, other heroes you control may add 1 to their attack when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Robin may attack with Batarang Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Robin may Swing Line with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. Robin may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles. Robin may swing up to 30 levels up or down in a single swing. If Robin is engaged when he starts to swing, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Rufus T. Harley
ability_1_desc: Rufus T. Harley may attack up to 3 times at any point before, during, or after his move as long as he is on a space where he could end his movement. He must move at least one space between each attack.
ability_2_desc: Rufus T. Harley is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: If there are at least 3 wound markers on this Army Card, subtract 4 from its Move value.

name: Riznet
ability_1_desc: When an adjacent common Marro figure is destroyed, place an Armor Marker on this card. When defending with Riznet, roll one additional defense die for each Armor Marker on this card. When Riznet receives one or more wounds, remove an Armor Marker on this card if able. A maximum of 4 Armor Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When using Shuriken Special Attack, Riznet may attack the same figure twice.

name: Sako Akihiro
ability_1_title: Sword of the Eternal Golden Dragon
ability_1_desc: Sako Akihiro may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: Sako Akihiro may roll one additional attack dice, if he begins its turn unengaged.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurais.

name: Ronan
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Hero. Ronan rolls one additional die when attacking or defending against the chosen hero.
ability_2_desc: When revealing a numbered Order Marker on this card, you may also reveal an X Order Marker on this card to activate Universal Weapon for the duration of the round. While Universal Weapon is active, subtract 2 from Ronan's Range and add 2 to the Defense of all friendly figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Ronan.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ronan's movement, ignore elevations. Ronan may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ronan starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sardaukar Warriors
ability_1_desc: Sardaukar Warriors are immune to all special elemental attacks such as frost, fire, cold, acid, lightning, or poison.
ability_2_desc: When engaged, a Sardaukar Warrior adds one to his attack value.
ability_3_desc: All shields count as skulls when rolling for a leaving engagement attack.

name: Rocket Red
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Use this power once per game. Start the game with a missile marker on this card. Remove the missile marker to launch missiles. Choose 2 figures to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figures are also affected by the Missile Storm Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 1, 2, 3 or 4. Rocket Red starts each turn with 8 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2, 3 or 4 attack dice. Rocket Red may keep making special attacks with 1, 2, 3 or 4 attack dice until he has rolled all 8 attack dice. Rocket Red may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Rocket Red's movement, ignore elevations. Rocket Red may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Rocket Red starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: SAMWISE
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Samwise, you can take a turn with any hobbit hero you control.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game choose a Unique Hero you control. If the chosen hero receives 1 or more wounds from an attacking figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Samwise, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, fi possible move Samwise adjacent to the attacking figure and inflict one wound to the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: Samwise is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Santa Claus
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose any 3 Treasure Glyphs that are not on the battlefield and place them on this Army Card. The 3 chosen Treasure Glyphs must all be different and must not match any power-side-up Treasure Glyphs on the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the first round of the game, before placing order markers, choose an opponent. That opponent must choose a Treasure Glyph on this Army Card and either place it on any Unique Hero Army Card or discard it from the game. Then you may place the remaining Treasure Glyphs on this Army Card on the Army Cards of any Unique Heroes adjacent to Santa Claus. You may place all of the Treasure Glyphs on one Army Card or spread them between multiple Army Cards.

name: Scorpion Neuromancer
ability_1_desc: All clone figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of this Scorpion Neuromancer may reroll one attack die that does not show a skull. Psychic Third Eye Aura can be used only once for each attack dice roll. This Scorpion Neuromancer's Psychic Third Eye Aura does affect this Scorpion Neuromancer.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a non-adjacent figure, the defending figure rolls one less defense die.

name: SCAR
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Scar's movement, Scar may ignore up to 4 levels of elevation or pass over 2 water spaces. You may only use this power once during a turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. If Scar's Smart Disk Special Attack inflicts a wound, he may attack again with his Smart Disk Special Attack. Scar may continue attacking with his Smart Disk Special Attack until he does not inflict a wound.
ability_3_desc: Before rolling defense dice against a normal attack, roll a D20. If you roll a 12 or higher, Scar is not affected by that attack.

name: High Dune Scorpions
ability_1_desc: Figures attacked by a High Dune Scorpion subtract 1 from their defense dice for each skull rolled.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice for a High Dune Scorpion, you may re-roll up to 1 die that did not show shields. Carapace may only be used once for each defense roll.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, High Dune Scorpions may double their height.

name: Saruman
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Saruman, you may choose any Hero or Squad with at least one figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Saruman. Roll the 20-sided die, subtracting 4 from the result if the chosen figure has the fearless personality. If you roll 14 or higher, take temporary control of that Hero or Squad and immediately take a turn with it. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero or Squad returns to the player who previously controlled it. All Order Markers that were on the chosen Hero or Squad's card will stay on the card.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with any Uruk-hai figures you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Saruman, any die result that is not a shield counts as a skull.

name: Scarecrow
ability_1_desc: If a Scarecrow you control receives enough wounds to be destroyed, before removing the figure from the board you may immediately choose another figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of that Scarecrow. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, place that Scarecrow on an empty same-level space adjacent to the chosen figure and ignore all wounds. A Scarecrow can only use Restuff if it moves to a different space. If that Scarecrow is engaged before using Restuff, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: SANDSLASH
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, add 2 dice to this Sandslash's Attack.
ability_2_desc: After this Sandslash rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, if it is not destroyed and if it is on a rock or sand space, you may move all figures you control with an Alert or Cautious Personality within 8 clear sight spaces of this Sandslash up to 3 spaces each. This Sandslash's Sand Sense does not affect this Sandslash.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with this Sandslash, you may move it up to 7 spaces. This Sandslash can attack with Rollout Special Attack before, during, or after moving as long as it is on a space where it can end its movement. If this Sandslash's Rollout Special Attack inflicts a wound, it may immediately move and attack again with Rollout Special Attack. This Sandslash may continue moving and attacking with Rollout Special Attack until it does not inflict a wound. While using Rollout Special Attack, this Sandslash does not take leaving engagement attacks and does not roll for falling damage.

name: SCRAPBOT AP-02
ability_1_desc: If Scrapbot AP-02 inflicts a wound on a small, medium, or large figure, that figure may not move for the rest of the engagement. Scrapbot AP-02 rolls one extra attack die against that figure for the rest of this engagement. This effect does not stack.
ability_2_title: DISINTEGRATOR BEAM SPECIAL ATTACK R4 A2
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. If Scrapbot inflicts a wound on a figure with Disintegrator Beam Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher, destroy that figure. Destructable objects may not roll defense dice against Disintegrator Beam Special Attack.

name: Sentinel of Fire
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Sentinel of Fire's Army Card, before taking a turn with the Sentinel of Fire, you may take a turn with up to 2 other Primordial Sentinels you control.
ability_2_desc: When Sentinel of Fire attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Sentinel of Fire and any adjacent Primordial Sentinels that you control roll an additional attack die when attacking a large or huge figure.

name: Seevric Tersec
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, choose a Unique small or medium Hero to be the Master of Seevric Tersec. After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may first take a turn with Seevric Tersec's Master.
ability_2_desc: When Seevric Tersec attacks a figure that is engaged with his Master, roll 2 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: If Seevric Tersec's Master would receive any wounds, and if Seevric Tersec and his Master are adjacent, you may destroy Seevric Tersec and ignore all wounds.
ability_4_desc: If Seevric Tersec is destroyed when adjacent to his Master, you may move any unrevealed order markers from this Army Card to his Master's Army Card.

name: Sentinel of Water
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Sentinel of Water's Army Card, before taking a turn with the Sentinel of Water, you may take turns with two other Primordial Sentinels you control.
ability_2_desc: When Sentinel of Water attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one small or medium figure that is adjacent to the defending figure but is not adjacent to the Sentinel of Water. If the defending figure is destroyed by the Sentinel of Water's attack, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: Sentinel of Water and all adjacent Primordial Sentinels that you control add 1 to their attack when attacking small or medium figures.

name: Sentinel of Earth
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Sentinel of Earth's Army Card, before taking a turn with the Sentinel of Earth, you may take a turn with up to 2 other Primordial Sentinels you control.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose 2 spaces in a straight line from Sentinel of Earth. All figures on those spaces that are in line of sight are affected by Tectonic Hammer Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: When Sentinel of Earth and any adjacent Primordial Sentinels that you control roll defense dice against an adjacent attacking figure, add 1 defense die to their roll.

name: Sentinel MK II
ability_1_desc: Before moving, choose an opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of this Sentinel. Roll the 20-sided die, adding 5 to the result if the chosen figure is a Mutant. If you roll a 13 or higher, all of the special powers on that figure's army card (or cards if your opponent has more than one common army card for that figure) are negated until the end of this Sentinel's turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 6. After attacking normally, this Sentinel may attack with Adaptation Special Attack. While engaged, this Sentinel may target and attack non-adjacent figures with Adaptation Special Attack. If it is attacking a Mutant, no clear line of sight is needed.
ability_3_desc: When this Sentinel rolls defense, it receives one extra defense die for each Wound Marker it has, up to a maximum of 3 extra dice for Adaptive Defense.

name: Rod of Obedience
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any Unique figure adjacent to this figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 19 or 20, take control of the chosen figure and that figure's Army Card. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove any Order Markers on this card. If this figure is destroyed, you retain control of any previously Mind Shackled Army Cards.

name: Scrabbling Claws
ability_1_desc: You may move up to 6 Scrabbling Claws that you control each turn. However, you may attack with only 3 Scrabbling Claws. You may attack with any 3 Scrabbling Claws, even ones you did not move this turn.
ability_2_desc: If an enemy figure starts its move while adjacent to one or more Scrabbling Claws, roll a 20-sided die and add 2 to the roll for each Scrabbling Claw beyond the first they are adjacent to; 1-12: the figure moves as normal, 13-18: the figure cannot move this turn if it is medium or smaller, 19-20: the figure cannot move this turn unless it is huge or larger. Roll only once for each figure moving in this way, regardless of the number of Scrabbling Claws they are adjacent to.
ability_3_desc: When attacking an enemy figure that was already attacked by a Scrabbling Claw this turn, roll 1 additional attack die against that figure.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Scrabbling Claws may triple their Height.

name: Sentry
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you must choose an opponent. That opponent's army will include the Void Army Card and figure. Any time Sentry attacks and destroys a figure, at the end of his turn replace his figure with your opponent's Void figure.
ability_2_title: One Million Exploding Suns Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. Any figure adjacent to Sentry is affected by One Million Exploding Suns Special Attack. Roll 6 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Sentry's movement, ignore elevations. Sentry may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Sentry starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sephtis the Undead Dragon
ability_1_desc: Range 4 Attack 3 Choose up to three figures to attack. All affected figures subtract 1 from their defense dice. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. If Sephtis only attacks one figure with Maw of Death Special Attack, that figure cannot roll any defense dice.
ability_2_desc: All Undead Wasps you control move one additional space.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Sephtis' movement, ignore elevations. Sephtis may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sephtis starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sfath Shambler
ability_1_desc: If the Sfath Shambler is on a swamp or swamp water space, add 1 to its Attack and Defense.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking a small or medium figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure rolls 2 fewer defense dice.
ability_3_desc: If the Sfath Shambler destroys an opponent's figure, you may choose up to 6 other figures you control who follow Ullar. You may move those figures a combined total of up to 12 spaces. A figure moved by Ullar's Inspiration must be within 6 clear sight spaces of the Sfath Shambler at the start of its move, and may not move more spaces than its Move number.

name: SHAMAI
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Mind Flayer, Shamai may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Shamai adds one attack and defense die for each friendly figure that is currently engaged with same figure that he is engaged with up to a maximum of 3 dice.

name: Shadow Elemental
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, before taking a turn with this Shadow Elemental, you may choose a figure you control with the Hide In Darkness or Shadow Dance special power. Move the chosen figure up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: This Shadow Elemental and all figures adjacent to it are considered to be on shadow spaces. When being attacked by a Shadow Elemental, a figure receives no defense bonus from being on a shadow space.
ability_3_desc: This Shadow Elemental may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Shadow Wraith
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, you may place this Shadow Wraith adjacent to any other Shadow figure you control within 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: Shadow figures you control that are adjacent to at least one Shadow Wraith add one to their Defense.
ability_3_desc: A Shadow Wraith can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Sharptooth Behemoth
ability_1_desc: Before moving roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 11 or higher, then all opponent's figures roll 2 less defense dice for the remainder of your turn.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to this Sharptooth Behemoth. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.

name: Shadow Binder
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with a Shadow Binder, you may choose one opponent's small or medium figure within 2 clear sight spaces whose base is no higher than the Shadow Binder's height or 6 levels below that Shadow Binder's base. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to that Shadow Binder. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Tentacle Grab, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: A Shadow Binder can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Shade of the Darkmage
ability_1_desc: Add 2 to the move of all common undead in your army.
ability_2_desc: Special Attack Range 4 Attack 4. If this attack destroys a nonundead unique hero gain control of that figure and it's army card instead. That hero loses all abilities, has 1 life, has a range of 1, and becomes terrifying.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Shade of the darkmage's movement, ignore elevations. Shade of the Darkmage may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Shade of the Darkmage starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Shadow Fungus
ability_1_desc: A Shadow Fungus does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, you may place any or all Shadow Fungi that have not been previously placed using Pre-Conjured, on any empty space within 8 spaces of a Sorcerer you control. You cannot place them adjacent to each other or other figures.
ability_2_desc: When a Shadow Fungus is destroyed, you may choose a figure adjacent to that Shadow Fungus and roll the 20-sided die before removing that Fungus. Add 1 to your roll for every other Shadow figure you control adjacent to the chosen figure. If you roll a 13 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: Small and Medium figures may not leave engagement with a Shadow Fungus.
ability_4_desc: A Shadow Fungus can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Shadow Fungus
ability_1_desc: A Shadow Fungus does not start the game on the battlefield. At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, you may place any or all Shadow Fungi that have not been previously placed using Pre-Conjured, on any empty space within 8 spaces of a Sorcerer you control. You cannot place them adjacent to each other or other figures.
ability_2_desc: When a Shadow Fungus is destroyed, you may choose a figure adjacent to that Shadow Fungus and roll the 20-sided die before removing that figure. Add 1 to your roll for every other Shadow figure you control adjacent to that Fungi. If you roll a 13 or higher, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: Small and Medium figures may not leave engagement with a Shadow Fungus.
ability_4_desc: A Shadow Fungus can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: SHAUZIA
ability_1_desc: Any friendly figure adjacent to Shauzia will receive one additional defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Enemy figures adjacent to Shauzia must attack her before attacking any other friendly figure, unless it uses a range attack.
ability_3_desc: Shauzia can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Silver Sable
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Silver Sable, you may move 3 Wild Pack Mercs you control up to 5 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When Silver Sable attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, she may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Silver Sable is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Shazoc, The Glacian Hunter
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. You may choice to attack up to three adjacent figures. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures. If at least 2 selected figures are destroyed, then remove 1 wound from this army card.
ability_2_desc: If Shazoc, The Glacian Hunter is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, opponents' figures must be adjacent to Shazoc to attack it with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Sindar Blademasters
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure adjacent to another Sindar Blademaster, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When a Sindar Blademaster rolls defense dice against an attacking figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Sharwin Wildborn
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If the defending figure recieves at least 1 wound, you may choose a figure that was adjacent to the defending figure at the beginning of that attack and attack that chosen figure with Arcane Bolt Special Attack. You may continue attacking with Arcane Bolt Special Attack in this manner until you fail to inflict a wound. A figure cannot be attacked more than once in a turn with Arcane Bolt Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When Sharwin Wildborn rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.
ability_3_desc: When Sharwin Wildborn rolls defense dice against a normal attack, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_4_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack on an adjacent figure, Sharwin Wildborn always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.

name: Shelob
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 4. If a Unique Hero is wounded by Paralysis Sting Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. Add 2 to your die roll for every wound inflicted. If you roll a 17 or higher, remove all unrevealed Order Markers from the defending figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Shelob starts her turn unengaged and on at least one shadow or swamp water space, for this turn add 1 to Shelob's movement and 3 to her Attack value.
ability_3_desc: If Shelob is on a shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack her with a normal attack.

name: Silver Banshee
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Silver Banshee. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each chosen figure. If you roll a 13 or higher the chosen figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: Each time Silver Banshee destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this card. Silver Banshee cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving Silver Banshee normally, you may choose any empty same-level space within 10 spaces of Silver Banshee. Place Silver Banshee on the chosen space. When Silver Banshee starts to Teleport, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Silver Surfer
ability_1_desc: Silver Surfer will not take passing swipes when he starts to fly.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 7. If Silver Surfer wounds an enemy Unique Hero with Cosmic Force Blast, roll the d20. If you roll 16+, that opponent removes the unrevealed Order Marker with the lowest numerical value from that Hero's card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn, Silver Surfer can move up to 5 spaces if he did not attack with Cosmic Force Blast.

name: Sir Lances-A-Lot
ability_1_desc: When Sir Lances-A-Lot attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Sir Lances-A-Lot receives 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from him at the start of his turn.
ability_3_desc: Sir Lances-A-Lot may pass over water (and lava) without stopping.

name: Sir Ashford
ability_1_desc: Sir Ashford receives 2 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from him at the start of his turn.
ability_2_desc: When Sir Ashford attacks, you may choose up to X figures without the lava resistant special power within 2 clear sight spaces of the defending figure, where X is the defending figure's maximum life. If the defending figure is destroyed, each of the chosen figures receives a wound.

name: Sir Pellinore
ability_1_desc: All small or medium figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Sir Pellinore add 1 to their defense dice when rolling defense against an attack from a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill. Sir Pellinore's Greater Protection from Evil Aura does not affect Sir Pellinore.
ability_2_desc: Sir Pellinore rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against a Terrifying figure.

name: Sir Dagmagus
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Jandar; Sir Dagmagus will receive 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Opponents' figures must be adjacent to Sir Dagmagus to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Sir Dagmagus rolls one additional dice against small or medium figures leaving an engagement with him.
ability_4_desc: All terrifying figures adjacent to Sir Dagmagus will move one additional space.

name: Shryk
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose up to 3 figures to be affected by Piercing Cry Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defence dice separately. If a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by Piercing Cry Special Attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, you may move that figure up to 3 spaces. A moved figure never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Shryk movement, ignore elevations. Shryk may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Shryk starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Silver Surfer
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Silver Surfer's movement, ignore elevations. He may move over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Silver Surfer starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 7. If an opponent's Unique Hero receives at least one wound from the Power Cosmic Blast Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that hero's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Silver Surfer, if he did not attack with Power Cosmic Blast Special Attack he may move up to 5 additional spaces and attack with his normal attack. He may only use this power once per turn.

name: Skalmad
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with a Troll Hero you control which ended its turn within 8 clear sight spaces of Skalmad, you may take a turn with Skalmad. For the duration of Skalmad's turn, add 2 to his Attack value. At the end of his turn, roll 3 attack dice. Place 1 wound marker on the Army Card of the troll Hero who took a turn before Skalmad for each skull rolled.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Skalmad, remove 1 Wound Marker from Skalmad's Army Card.

name: Skeletal Giants
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against any attack, Skeletal Giants always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled. When a Skeletal Giant receives enough wounds to be destroyed, before removing it from the board, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore any wounds.
ability_2_desc: Range 1, Attack 3. When a Skeletal Giant attacks with its Trample Special Attack, it may attack 1 additional time. It cannot attack the same figure more than once.

name: Skeletal Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Skeletal Warriors, you can take a turn with any skeletal hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Skeletal Warriors roll 1 additional attack and defense die when they are within 3 clear sight spaces of a skeletal hero.

name: Skeletal Rider
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking roll the 20-sided die. Select any small or medium enemy figure adjacent to this Skeletal Rider. If you roll 1-12, nothing happens. If you roll 13-19, that figure receives one wound. If you roll 20, that figure receive two wounds.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's figure who follows Jandar; Skeletal Rider will receive 1 additional attack die.

name: Slice
ability_1_desc: After attacking a figure that is medium, large, or huge, Slice may make one additional attack on that figure, or on another such figure.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Slice may triple its height.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Slice always add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: SLITHERBLADE
ability_1_desc: Range 4, Attack 4. After Slitherblade attacks using the Trident Throw, if all skulls are rolled, Slitherblade may continue to attack until a shield is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When Slitherblade is on a water space, Add 1 to move, Add 1 to attack, Add 2 to defense
ability_3_desc: Slitherblade does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.

name: Skeletal Slashers
ability_1_desc: Begin the game with 1 Skeleton marker for each Skeletal Slasher you control. Whenever a Skeletal Slasher you control is destroyed, place a Skeleton marker on the hex it previously occupied, if able. Skeleton markers may only be placed on empty spaces. It requires 1 extra movement for a small or medium figure to move onto a space containing a Skeleton marker. If a figure ends its movement on a space containing a Skeleton marker, remove that marker. Removed markers may be used again.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with a Lord or Shaman you control, you may replace one Skeleton marker within 3 clear sight spaces of that Lord or Shaman with one of your previously destroyed Skeletal Slashers, if able. Replaced Skeleton markers may be used again for Skeletal Remains.

name: Skeletons of Annellintia
ability_1_desc: When a Skeleton of Annellintia you control is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, place that Skeleton of Annellintia on the Army Card of any Unique Lord, Lady, Duke, or Duchess you control.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Army Card, before taking a turn with the Skeletons of Annellintia, you may remove one previously destroyed Skeleton of Annellintia from the Army Card of one Unique Hero you control and place it on any empty space adjacent to that Hero.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with the Skeletons of Annellintia, you may move two unengaged Skeletons of Annellintia you control who did not move or attack this turn up to 4 spaces each.

name: Sokka
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack, Sokka always adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking choose 2 small or medium opponents within 3 clear sight spaces of Sokka. If you roll 13 or higher, the targeted figures may not move or attack until you reveal an order marker. Roll once for all affected figures.

name: Sobek
