ability_1_desc: Before moving, Sobek must attack all adjacent Squad figures. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: Any figure adjacent to or occupying a water or swamp water space rolls 2 less defense dice when attacked by Sobek.
ability_3_desc: While Sobek is on a water space, add 2 to his Defense. If Sobek starts his turn on a water space, add 1 to his movement for that turn. Sobek does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space.

name: Sokka
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Sokka, you may rearrange any unrevealed Order Markers on cards you control. If you do not, you may instead take a turn with a Unique Hero you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Sokka.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When attacking with Boomerang Special Attack, you may choose up to two other figures within 2 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Boomerang Special Attack. Roll dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Cyber Orcs
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. Before attacking with the Random Fire Special Attack, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-3, chose an opponent. That opponent may attack twice with each Cyber Orc, and you cannot attack with the Cyber Orcs this turn. If you roll a 4-7, chose an opponent. That opponent may attack once with each Cyber Orc and then you may attack once with each Cyber Orc this turn. If you roll a 8-11, chose an opponent. You may attack once with each Cyber Orc and then the chosen opponent may attack once with each Cyber Orc this turn. If you roll a 12-20, you may attack twice with each Cyber Orc this turn.

name: Roman Cataphracts
ability_1_desc: If Order Marker 1 is revealed on the Roman Cataphracts, add 2 to their Move number and 1 extra attack die for that turn.
ability_2_desc: When a Roman Cataphract attacks a figure that he was not adjacent to at the start of this turn, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: When a Roman Cataphract rolls defense dice against a normal attack and and receives one or more wounds, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 4 to your die roll if this is the first time that Roman Cataphract has been attacked this turn. If you roll a 17 or higher, ignore any wounds that Roman Cataphract just received.

name: Snowman
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack Special. Instead of moving and attacking normally, the Snowman may use Avalanche Special Attack. Move the Snowman any number of spaces. The first move must be to a lower level. While moving with Avalanche Special Attack, the Snowman may not move to a higher level space and must end its movement if it remains on the same level for 3 consecutive moves. While using Avalanche Special Attack, the Snowman never takes falling damage, can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. During the movement after the Snowman leaves a space occupied by another figure, the Snowman must attack that figure. Roll attack dice equal to the number of levels the Snowman descended this turn before moving into the figure's space, to a maximum of 5 attack dice. The Snowman may not attack any figure more than once per turn with Avalanche Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Librarian Vydar
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Librarian may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: Range 7 Attack 5. If no skulls are rolled, Librarian takes one wound for each blank rolled.
ability_3_desc: Squad figures within 5 clear sight spaces of this Librarian count blanks on defense rolls as shields.

name: Space Marine Assault Bike
ability_1_desc: Space Marine Assault Bike is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack 3. Instead of moving and attacking normally with this Space Marine Assault Bike, you may move it up to 5 spaces. This Space Marine Assault Bike can attack up to 3 times with Chainsword Drive-By Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as this Space Marine Assault Bike is on a space where he can end his movement. This Space Marine Assault Bike cannot attack the same figure more than once in a single turn.
ability_3_desc: Space Marine Assault Bike cannot move onto a space more than 2 levels above its level.

name: Sonlen's Dragon
ability_1_desc: If Sonlen is in your army: Instead of placing Sonlen's Dragon on the battlefield, place 3 blue Vengeance Markers on this army card. Whenever the Sonlen you control is wounded or destroyed, you may transfer 1 or 2 of your Vengeance Markers from any army card(s) to the responsible army card. If the Sonlen you control was destroyed, place Sonlen's Dragon within 6 clear sight spaces of his last position.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 1 + Special. Add 1 to Sonlen's Dragon's attack dice for each of your Vengeance Markers on the targeted figure's army card. The targeted figure cannot roll more than 1 defense die. After Swoop Special Attack, Sonlen's Dragon may continue moving if it has any Move spaces remaining.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Sonlen's Dragon's movement, ignore elevations. Sonlen's Dragon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sonlen's Dragon starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sonlen's Dragon
ability_1_desc: If Sonlen is in your army: Instead of placing Sonlen's Dragon on the battlefield, place 3 blue Vengeance Markers on this army card. Whenever the Sonlen you control is wounded or destroyed, you may transfer 1 or 2 of your Vengeance Markers from any army card(s) to the responsible army card. If the Sonlen you control was destroyed, place Sonlen's Dragon within 6 clear sight spaces of his last position.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 1 + Special. Add 1 to Sonlen's Dragon's attack dice for each of your Vengeance Markers on the targeted figure's army card. The targeted figure cannot roll more than 1 defense die. After Swoop Special Attack, Sonlen's Dragon may continue moving if it has any Move spaces remaining.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Sonlen's Dragon's movement, ignore elevations. Sonlen's Dragon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Sonlen's Dragon starts to fly, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Space Marine Scouts
ability_1_desc: Space Marine Scouts may be deployed up to 3 Clear Sight spaces from their Starting Zone.
ability_2_desc: If a Space Marine Scout is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If they are on a grass space, add 3 to your die roll. If they are next to a jungle piece, add 3 to your die roll. If you roll 1-17, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 18 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Snow Wolves Space Marine Devastator
ability_1_desc: Missile has no range, it can be fired at any model within LOS of the Devastator. Enemy model loses 1 rolled Shield.
ability_2_desc: Ignores water terrain effects and gas effects.
ability_3_desc: You may only have 1 Devastator unit per Space Marines Unit selected.

name: Space Marine Assault Squad
ability_1_title: And They Shall Know No Fear (Fearless Hero Bonding)
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Space Marine Assault Squad, you may first take a turn with a Fearless Hero you control within 5 Clear Sight spaces.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds a Space Marine Assault Squad member may take from this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: If an opponent's small, medium, or large figure moves adjacent to a Space Marine Assault Squad member, roll the 20-sided die. If the figure is Large or a Squad figure, add 4. If you roll a 15 or higher, the opponent's figure receives a wound. Figures may only be targeted as they move into engagement with a Space Marine Assault Squad member.

name: Space Ghost
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Choose a figure and before attacking with this special attack choose one of the following effects: • Each opponent's figure adjacent to the chosen figure is also affected by this special attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately; or • add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled; or • if you inflict one or more wounds on the defending figure, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's army card; or • if you inflict one or more wounds on a small or medium figure, immediately place it on any empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of its current location, if possible. A figure moved by this special attack never takes any leaving engagement attacks and can receive any falling damage that may apply. After attacking with this special attack Space Ghost cannot use his Inviso Power special power until the next time you reveal an order marker.
ability_2_desc: Space Ghost is never attacked when leaving an engagement, cannot be targeted by opponent's non-adjacent figures for any attacks or special powers that require clear sight, and adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled when defending against an attack.

name: Space Marine Dreadnought
ability_1_desc: When this Space Marine Dreadnought rolls defense dice against a non-adjacent figure, it gains 3 additional dice.
ability_2_desc: This Space Marine Dreadnought can use both Special Attacks in one turn.
ability_3_desc: Range 1 Attack 5. If Space Marine Dreadnought's Power Claw Special Attack inflicts a wound and the target is small or medium, you may place the figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to this Space Marine Dreadnought.
ability_4_desc: Range 5 Attack 5. This Space Marine Dreadnought may attack 3 times with Assault Cannon Special Attack. If Assault Cannon rolls no skulls on an attack, place a Jam Marker on this Army Card. This Space Marine Dreadnought cannot make any Assault Cannon Special Attacks while it has a Jam Marker. Before placing Order Markers at the beginning of the Round, you may remove the Jam Marker from this Army Card.

name: Teal'c
ability_1_desc: Teal'c is considered a member of SG-1.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, you may remove 1 would marker from this card. Anytime Teal'c receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, remove all order markers and all but 5 would markers from this card. (stolen from somebody's Wolverine...sorry, don't remember whose)
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack or special attack, Teal'c always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_4_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. If Zat Gun Special Attack inflicts at least 1 wound, you may remove 1 order marker from the defending figure's army card.

name: Starshine
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 5. Starshine needs clear sight instead of line of sight to attack with Living Light Special Attack. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Living Light Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Starshine, if she wounded a Creature she may take one additional turn. You may only use this power once per round.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Starshine's move, ignore elevations. She may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When she starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Sulûdan The Serpent Lord
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving, Sulûdan may choose a small or medium figure that is adjacent, on the same level, and on a space where Sulûdan may end his movement. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-7, the figure is safe and Sulûdan's movement ends. If you roll 8-20, the chosen figure receives one wound. If the wound destroys the figure, move Sulûdan onto the space occupied, and you may continue Sulûdan's movement. If the chosen figure is not destroyed, Sulûdan's movement ends.

name: Jack O'Neill
ability_1_desc: Jack O'Neill is considered a member of SG-1.
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Jack O'Niell, you may instead take a turn with any 2 members of SG1 you control.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, choose a space within 5 spaces of Jack O'Neill and roll the 20 sided die. • If you roll 1, nothing happens • If you roll 2-10, roll 4 Attack dice once for all figures and destructible objects on or adjacent to the chosen space. • If you roll 11-19, roll 5 Attack Dice once for all figures and destructible objects on or adjacent to the chosen space. • If you roll 20 or higher, roll 6 Attack dice once for all figures and destructible objects on or adjacent to the chosen space. Affected figures roll defense separately. Destructible objects cannot roll defense dice against C4
ability_4_desc: If Jack O'Neill is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-8, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 9 or higher, Jack O'Neill takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Jack O'Neill can take cover only if he ends his take cover move not adjacent to any enemy figures.

name: Super-Adaptoid
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 mimicry markers on this Army Card. Instead of moving with Super-Adaptoid, you may remove any 1 of your mimicry markers from any Army Card and place it on any adjacent figure's Army Card. At any time, Super-Adaptoid may immediately change its move, range, attack, and defense values, and all special powers to the values and special powers on any Army Card with its mimicry marker on it. This power never removes the Permanent Mimicry special power.

name: Subek-Dema
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Subek-Dema. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll a 7 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure if a Hero figure and you roll a 17 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero.

name: Sturmhalten Behemoth
ability_1_desc: After making a normal attack, this Sturmhalten Behemoth may make an additional attack on a different figure.
ability_2_desc: Once per attack, when making a normal attack on an adjacent figure, you may reroll any dice that did not show skulls.

name: Spark IV
ability_1_desc: When a numbered Order Marker is revealed on a unique, human hero you control who follows Vydar, you may immediately move Spark IV up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When an adjacent unique, human hero you control who follows Vydar is attacked and receives one or more wounds, you may immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, you may place all wound markers on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When Spark IV rolls defense dice against a non-adjacent figure, you may add 2 defense dice to your roll.

name: Stormblast Spider
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Choose a space within 4 spaces of this Stormblast Spider. All figures on or within 1 space of that space are affected by this special attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. A Stormblast Spider cannot be affected by its own Stormblast Special Attack. Immediately after rolling attack dice, roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 11 or higher, all figures defending against this attack roll one fewer defense die against this special attack. This Stormblast Spider may only use this special attack once per round.
ability_2_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving. When moving this Stormblast Spider, up to four times each turn, you may choose not to count a space when entering a Snow or Ice space.
ability_3_desc: Whenever this Stormblast Spider is targeted for a normal or special attack from a non-adjacent figure, if this Stormblast Spider occupies a Snow or Ice space, you may roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the defending Stormblast Spider and the closest attacking figure and add this number to your roll. If you roll a 16 or higher, the Stormblast Spider may not be targeted for any attacks from non-adjacent figures this turn.

name: Stealth Armor Iron Man
ability_1_desc: Iron Man is never attacked when leaving an engagement. If an opponent's figure is at least 4 spaces away from Iron Man, that figure cannot target Iron Man for an attack or chose him for a special power.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 5 clear sight spaces of Iron Man, all figures you control, except Iron Man, with a Range number of 4 or more may add 2 to their range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: At the end of the round, if Iron Man in not engaged, you may move him up to 4 spaces.
ability_4_desc: Iron Man has the species Robot in addition to what is listed on this card. When rolling defense dice against an attack, if there are no wound markers on this Army Card, Iron Man adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Sylvan Stalkers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Sylvan Stalkers, you may first take a turn with any Treant you control.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Any unengaged Sylvan Stalker which moved but did not attack normally and is adjacent to an Evergreen or Jungle Piece may use Sylvan Strike Special Attack. That Sylvan Stalker may target any figure that is adjacent to any Evergreen or Jungle Piece within 7 spaces. A Sylvan Stalker does not need clear line of sight to use Sylvan Strike Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: Sylvan Stalkers adjacent to an Evergreen or Jungle piece are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Kroot Hounds
ability_1_desc: All skulls count for an additional hit.

name: Syndra Jotris
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. You may attack up to two times when using this Spacial Attack.
ability_2_desc: When moving Sydra Jotris throw snow or ice spaces, ignore any role that could affect her movement. When rolling defense dices adjacent to a glacier, add 1 more dice to her defense.

name: Starman
ability_1_desc: Before moving, choose a small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Starman. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, if the chosen figure was adjacent to Starman, place it on any empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of him. If the figure was not adjacent to Starman, place it on any empty space adjacent to him. Figures moved by Gravity Rod never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Figures you control who start their turn adjacent to Starman have the Flying special power.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for his move, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Aun'shi - Master of Blades
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. The power does not work on other units with counter strike.
ability_2_desc: Opponents figures must be adjacent to this unit to attack it with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: May attack all adjacent creatures

name: Pathfinders
ability_1_desc: Squad set up after all other deployment. You may place all 3 figures on empty spaces. You cannot place them adjacent to each other, other figures, or glyphs.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Fire Warriors you may first take a turn with a Shas'ui.
ability_3_desc: If a Shas'ui is selected with this unit they may use the Scout ability with the Pathfinders.

name: Taril the Brave
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, Taril the Brave may use Battle Leap, which has a move of 4. Instead of counting spaces for his movement, ignore elevations less than 15. He may leap over water without stopping, and pass over figures and obstacles less than 15 high. When leaping over figures he does not become engaged. When he starts to leap, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When attacking with this special attack, you may choose one figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: Domino
ability_1_desc: When Domino attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's figure uses a power that requires rolling the 20-sided die on Domino, subtract 1 from the die roll.
ability_3_desc: When attacking or defending, Domino may reroll all attack dice that do not show skulls and all defense dice that do not show shields one time.

name: Space Infinity Gem
ability_1_desc:
Before moving, choose this figure or another figure within 1 clear sight space. Place the chosen figure on a space within 1 space of its current space. That figure will not take passing swipes.

If this figure has the Infinity Gauntlet, place this glyph on the Infinity Gauntlet's card and when choosing a figure for this card, you may choose a figure within 3 clear sight spaces instead, and place that figure within 3 spaces of its current space instead.

name: Syther the Skeletal Champion
ability_1_desc: All friendly undead warriors adjacent to Syther gain +4 Defense dice.
ability_2_desc: If you destroy a figure with Soul Harvest, place that figure on this card. The destroyed figure adds 1 to the attack number on this card.

name: Tetticus
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, instead of taking a turn with Tetticus, you may choose to remove your 'X' order marker from its card, and take a turn with that card.
ability_2_desc: All friendly small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Tetticus add 1 to their defense dice. Tetticus's Defensive Inspiration does not affect Tetticus.

name: SYLVIS
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Sylvis, you may first attack with all small and medium Elf Squad figures with a Range of 1 adjacent to Sylvis. You may only use Quick Command if Sylvis moved at least 1 space this turn.
ability_2_desc: If Sylvis inflicts a wound on a figure, that figure rolls 1 less Attack and Defense die until the end of your next turn.

name: BATTERING RAM
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 6. Ram Special Attack can only target Destructible Objects. No less than two of the three figures must be adjacent to the target to use Ram Special Attack. Figures used for Ram Special Attack cannot attack again this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack 6. Ram Special Attack can only target Destructible Objects. No less than two of the three figures must be adjacent to the target to use Ram Special Attack. Figures used for Ram Special Attack cannot attack again this turn.

name: 84th Gordon Highlanders
ability_1_desc: For each squad member that has been killed, add one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Add one defense die for each friendly figure that is adjacent to this figure.

name: Tha'alab the Darklord
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-3, place a Wound Marker on this card. If you roll a 4-8, add 1 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 9-13, add 2 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 14-16, add 3 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 17-19, add 4 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 20 or higher, add 8 to the attack value of this card.
ability_2_desc: Tha'alab is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: The Black Viper
ability_1_desc: If The Black Viper begins her turn on a shadow space, then she will gain 1 more dice when attacking. If The Black Viper ends her turn on a shadow space, then she will gain 1 more defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, select any Unique, Common, or Uncommon Hero adjacent to The Black Viper and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, nothing happens. If you roll 13-19, the chosen figure will receive one wound. If you roll 20, destroy the chosen figure.
ability_3_desc: If the figure you are attacking have an unreveal order marker, then you may attack it again.

name: TERRADOM
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Terradom, you may first take a turn with any two earth elementals that you control.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose a small or medium figure within 2 clear sight spaces of Terradom. Roll the 20-sided die. If the choosen figure is a Squad figure and you roll a 10 or higher, destroy it. If the choosen figure is a Hero figure and you roll a 18 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero figure. If Terradom destroys the selected figures with Fissure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Earth Elemental.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving normaly with Terradom, you may immediately place it on any empty non-water space that is within 4 spaces of Terradom and is no higher than 1 level space above Terradom height or 3 levels below the Earth Archon's base. If Terradom is engaged when it starts its Underground Movement, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Fallen
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving The Fallen normally, you may place The Fallen on any empty, same level space within 10 spaces of his current location. If The Fallen is engaged when he Teleports, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with The Fallen, if the defending figure was not adjacent to The Fallen at the start of this turn, The Fallen receives 3 additional dice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for The Fallen's movement, ignore elevations. The Fallen may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When The Fallen starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: The Balrog, Dark Terror
ability_1_title: Whip Of Many Thorns Special Attack
ability_1_desc: Range 7, Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures (Common Squad figures roll 2 less defense dice). Each figure rolls defense dice separately. The Balrog cannot be affected by his own Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for the Balrog's movement, ignore elevations. The Balrog may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When the Balrog starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: The Balrog never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he does not have to stop in molten lava spaces.

name: TALRUTH
ability_1_desc: Range 5 + Special. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one other figures within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure to be affected by Electric Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Electric Breath Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Talruth's movement, ignore elevations. Talruth may fly over water spaces without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Talruth starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagements attacks.

name: Yankee Zulu
ability_1_desc: If Yankee Zulu did not move this turn, you may either add 3 to his range, or add 2 to his attack.
ability_2_desc: If Yankee Zulu has height advantage when making a normal attack on a non-adjacent figure, the defending figure rolls 1 fewer defense die.

name: Blak Scalds
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, a Blak Scald always add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: Instead of Blak Scalds normal move, he may move only one space. This space may be up to 15 levels higher. When using the Mechanical Jump, all engagement rules still aply.
ability_3_desc: When attacking with a Blak Scald, choose 4 clear sight spaces from the attacking Blak Scald. All figures on these spaces are affected with this attack. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.

name: Surkil
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by Hurricane Blast Special Attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, you may move the figure by placing it on any empty space within 6 clear sight spaces of Surkil. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Hurricane Blast Special Attack never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Hurricane Blast Special Attack can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Surkil's movement, ignore elevations. Surkil may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Surkil starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Superboy
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose an adjacent small or medium figure or an adjacent destructible object and roll the 20-sided die. Add 2 to the roll if the figure is a Robot or Soulborg. If you roll 15 or higher, the chosen figure or object receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Figures roll 2 fewer defense dice against Superboy's Telekinetic Bolt Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Superboy's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Superboy starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: THE SWORD OF RECKONING
ability_1_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure with this figure, add 4 dice to this figure's normal attack.

name: Juliet Kilo
ability_1_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add 7 to the result if Juliet Kilo is unengaged. If you roll an 11 or higher, you may remove up to 2 wound markers from this card, or from the Army Card of an adjacent friendly Human Hero.
ability_2_desc: Juliet Kilo, and all adjacent Humans you control, roll 1 additional attack die when making a normal attack on a Human figure.
ability_3_desc: Juliet Kilo never makes leaving engagement attacks on figures with only 1 Life remaining.

name: The Magic
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, any or all Magic may use Magic 3 Ball. Choose a unique figure within 7 clear sight spaces and roll 3 attack dice. If 3 skulls are rolled, negate all powers on that army card for this game.
ability_2_desc: Instead of their normal move, any or all of the Magic may Super Leap up to 3 spaces, ignoring elevations. Magic may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and go over obstacles. Magic may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. Defending figures can not roll defense dice. A Magic can not use this special attack if he moved this turn.

name: Thor
ability_1_desc: Range special. Attack special. If Thor is engaged, roll 4 attack dice once for all opponent's figures adjacent to Thor. Each affected figure rolls defense dice seperately. If Thor is not engaged, you may choose any one figure within 5 clear site spaces of Thor, and attack by rolling 5 attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When rolling Defense dice, each shield rolled count for one additional shield.

name: Thunderbird
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Thunderbird, you may place a wound marker on Thunderbird and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Thunderbird always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: THETACRON
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Thetacron, you may move 3 Replusors you control up to 5 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 2 Deflector Markers on this card. When Thetacron, or any small or medium figure you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Thetacron, rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, the defending figure adds 1 to its defense dice for each Deflector Marker on this army card.
ability_3_desc: After Thetacron, or any small or medium figure you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Thetacron, rolls defense dice against a normal attack or special attack from a figure who is not adjacent, you may remove 1 Deflector Marker from this Army Card to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.

name: THE TARDIS
ability_1_desc: The TARDIS does not start the game on the battlefield. At the beginning of the game, you must place the TARDIS, at least one Time Lord you control, and up to two small or medium Unique Heroes you control on this card.
ability_2_desc: At the beginning of every round, before placing Order Markers, if the TARDIS is on this card roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, place the TARDIS on any empty space. Place all figures on this card adjacent to the TARDIS. If you cannot place a figure, remove it from the game.
ability_3_desc: The TARDIS may not make attacks or leaving engagement attacks. No figure that is not a friendly Time Lord can move through the TARDIS, either normally or with any special power on any Army Card or glyph. After placing figures with Materialisation, if you do not control a Time Lord, remove the TARDIS from the game.

name: The Witch King of Angmar
ability_1_desc: Opponent's figures without a Fearless Personality within 6 spaces of The Witch King subtract 1 from their Attack.
ability_2_title: Do You Not Know Death When You See It
ability_2_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, you may choose a Unique Hero without the Fearless Personality within 6 clear sight spaces of The Witch King and reveal an unrevealed "X" Order Marker on this card. For the duration of the round, the chosen Unique Hero cannot move or attack normally, and they cannot roll defense dice when defending against The Witch King.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for The Witch King's movement, ignore elevations. The Witch King can fly over water, fly over figures, and pass over obstacles. When The Witch King starts to fly, he will not receive any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Foot Ninja
ability_1_desc:
Range 4. Attack 2
Each Foot Ninja can attack up to 3 times using Shuriken Special Attack. Roll for each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: Foot Ninjas can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Foot Soldier
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and before taking a turn with Foot Soldiers, you may first take a turn with any Foot Clan Master or Assassin Unique Hero you control
ability_2_desc: You may attack with any 3 Foot Soldiers, even Foot Soldiers that you did not move this turn.

name: Thunderball
ability_1_desc: Range 2. Attack 4. If the targeted figure is not adjacent to Thunderball, its base must be no more than 5 levels above Thunderball's height or 5 levels below Thunderball's base. If the targeted figure is adjacent to Thunderball, all figures adjacent to Thunderball are affected by Ball and Chain. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled against Destructible Objects.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with Thunderball, if Thunderball destroyed a figure or Destructible Object you may immediately take a turn with another figure you control with the Wrecking Crew power.

name: Tommy Tombstone
ability_1_desc: When Tommy Tombstone is targeted for an attack from a non-adjacent opponent within his range, roll 2 attack dice. Each skull rolled counts as an unblockable hit on that figure. If that figure is destroyed, it may not complete its attack.

name: THOR
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. After attacking normally, Thor may attack with Mjolnir Special Attack. When attacking a non-adjacent figure with Mjolnir Special Attack, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, choose up to 3 different small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Thor. Roll the 20-sided die for each figure. If you roll 11 or higher, the chosen figure receives a wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Thor's movement, ignore elevations. Thor may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When Thor starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ticalla Mantis
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 3 spaces of this Ticalla Mantis and its base is no more than 4 levels above the Ticalla Mantis' height or 4 levels below the Ticalla Mantis' base, this Ticalla Mantis may add 2 to its range when attacking that figure.
ability_2_desc: If this Ticalla Mantis is adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece, add 1 to its attack dice and 2 to its defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, this Ticalla Mantis may double its height.

name: The Thing
ability_1_desc: When a targeted figure is Knocked Back by this figure's Strength attack, the targeted figure is Knocked Down.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 additional skull for each skull rolled during an attack. If the targeted figure receives 3 or more Wounds, this figure may attack one additional time while still adding 1 additional skull for each skull rolled.
ability_3_desc: This figure has Resistance 1 vs Fire and Sonic attacks. Additionally, if this figure rolls 3 or more shields during a Defense roll against an adjacent figure's Physical or Energy attack, immediately give the attacking figure 1 Wound for every 2 Strain taken by this figure.
ability_4_desc: When this figure receives enough wounds to be destroyed, make a d12 Endurance Check. If passed, remove up to 5 Strain or Wound Markers.

name: Shredder
ability_1_desc: Shredder may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: When Shredder is targeted by a normal attack you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 11 or higher, Shredder may swap places with an adjacent Foot Soldier. The Foot Soldier takes the attack and rolls for defense.
ability_3_desc: All common Foot Clan squad figures that start their turn within 2 clear sight spaces of Shredder add +2 to their move that turn.

name: Ticalla Centipedes
ability_1_desc: If a Ticalla Centipede inflicts a wound upon an opponent's unique Hero but does not destroy it, place a green Venom marker on that Hero's Army Card. Before that Hero takes a turn, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-12, the opponent may remove the Venom marker. If you roll an 13-20, that Hero may not move or attack and the Venom marker remains on the Army Card. A figure may not have more than one Venom marker at a time on its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Ticalla Centipedes, you may first take a turn with any Predator you control.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Ticalla Centipedes may double their height.

name: Toph Bei-Fong
ability_1_desc: Toph Bei-Fong does not need clear Line of Sight to attack a non-Flying figure. If Toph Bei-Fong is on a water space, she subtracts two from her Attack and Defense values.
ability_2_desc: If Toph Bei-Fong is on a land space add 1 to her Attack and Defense values. If Toph Bei-Fong inflicts one or more wounds on a non-Flying figure on a land space, you may move that figure up to two spaces as long as it remains on a land space.
ability_3_desc: When Toph Bei-Fong is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Toph Bei-Fong can take from this attack is one.

name: LEONARDO
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Leonardo, you may move up to 3 Ninjas you control up to 2 spaces each. All figures moved this way must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Leonardo prior to moving. Leonardo cannot be moved with Fearless Leader.
ability_2_desc: If a figure within 3 clear spaces of Leonardo attacks a friendly figure and rolls at least one skull, before defense is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-13, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 14 or higher, move Leonardo adjacent to that figure and attack it with a normal attack. If the figure survives, roll defense dice normally. When Leonardo Protects, he is never attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: TWI'LEK BODYGUARD
ability_1_desc: If an adjacent allied unit is the target of a normal attack, this unit may roll defense and take the damage instead.

name: Marro Warriors
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Marro Warriors, if any of the Marro Warriors you moved are on a water space, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, place a previously destroyed Marro Warrior figure on any empty water space within 4 spaces of a Marro Warrior you moved.

name: TOKNAR
ability_1_desc: Range 4+Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sights spaces of the targeted figure, and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure. All chosen figures are affected by Lightning Breath Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Lightning Breath Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Toknar's movement, ignore elevations. Toknar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Toknar starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ulag
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Ulag the defending figure rolls one less defense die for every figure, except Ulag, that you control adjacent to it.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Ulag, if there is an adjacent Unique Hero with one life remaining, you may destroy that figure.

name: ULRICK
ability_1_desc: If Ulrick attacks a non-adjacent opponent with a normal attack and only one skull is rolled, the defending figure may ignore this attack.
ability_2_desc: If Ulrick is attacking an adjacent small or medium figure, add 1 to Ulrick's attack.

name: Trevok the Forest Guardian
ability_1_desc: Trevok starts each game with up to 2 Evergreen Trees on his Army Card. When Trevok ends his turn, you may place an Evergreen Tree from his Army Card onto any land space within 4 clear sight spaces, if the Evergreen Tree fits normally onto that space.
ability_2_desc: After moving but before attacking, choose an Evergreen Tree adjacent to Trevok. You may place the chosen evergreen tree onto another land tile within 4 clear sight spaces of Trevok if it fits normally. After placing the tree, roll the 20 sided dice for each small or medium enemy figure adjacent to the selected Evergreen Tree. If you roll a 16 or higher that figure receives one unblockable wound.
ability_3_desc: All small and medium figures adjacent to Trevok roll one additional die, when rolling defense against a normal or special attack from a figure who is not adjacent.

name: UNSC Spartan Soldier
ability_1_desc: If this UNSC Spartan Soldier starts its turn unengaged, remove 3 wound markers from this card.

name: Uglúk, Servant Of Saruman
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Uglúk, roll 12 Saruman dice. You may move up to 4 squad figures you control who follow Saruman up to X spaces. X equals the number of White Hand symbols rolled. Any squad figures moved with Saruman's Dispatch must be within 8 clear sight spaces of Uglúk prior to moving.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Uglúk with a range of 1 add 1 to their normal attack.

name: Ulu-Thurg
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may choose one other figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Soulfire Special Attack. If you place a wound marker on Ulu-Thurg before attacking, you may choose any number of figures adjacent to the target figure to be affected by Soulfire Special Attack. Ulu-Thurg only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: U.S. Agent
ability_1_desc: Range: 5, Attack: 4. When U.S. Agent attacks with his Shield Throw Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: If U.S. Agent is engaged to one or more figures at the beginning of his turn, you must roll one 20-sided die. If you roll 18 or higher, add 1 to U.S. Agent's Attack vs. that figure(s) until they are detroyed or leave the engagement. U.S. Agent may not disengage from the figure(s) until they are destroyed or leave the engagement, first.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: TRIPLICATE GIRL
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a Triplicate Girl on the battlefield and do one of the following: • Place up to two Triplicate Girls you control, that are adjacent to the chosen Triplicate Girl, onto this Army Card, or • Place up to two Triplicate Girls, that are on this card and still in play, on any empty space(s) adjacent to the chosen figure. All Triplicate Girls placed on the battlefield may attack if Dividing Force Special Attack isn't used this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. Only a Triplicate Girl that was on the battlefield at the start of this turn may attack with Dividing Force Special Attack. Add 3 attack dice to Triplicate Girl's attack for each Triplicate Girl figure placed on the battlefield this turn adjacent to the attacking Triplicate Girl.
ability_3_desc: If a Triplicate Girl is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, you may place up to two adjacent Triplicate Girls you control onto this Army Card. For each Triplicate Girl placed on this card add 3 dice to your defense. When a Triplicate Girl is destroyed place all Triplicate Girls, that are on this card and still in play, on empty space(s) nearest to the space that the destroyed figure last occupied.

name: Valguard
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Valguard, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Valguard at the start of this turn, Valguard receives 3 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Berserker Charge power on any Army Card.

name: VALDUR
ability_1_desc: If Valdur is engaged with more than one squad figures from the same Army Card, Valdur may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, each excess shield counts as three unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Un-Kal, The Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When Un-Kal, The Kyrie Warrior attacks, he may attack one additional time. Add one more attack dice to the second attack.
ability_2_desc: When Un-Kal, The Kyrie Warrior begin his turn adjacent to a friendly Aquilla figure, he may move 2 more spaces.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Un-Kal's movement, ignore elevations. Un-Kal may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Un-Kal starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Umbrage
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack Special. If Umbrage is attacking a small or medium figure, roll 3 attack dice for Throwing Knives Special Attack. If Umbrage is attacking a figure of a different size or a destructible object, roll 2 attack dice for Throwing Knives Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If Umbrage starts his turn unengaged and on at least one shadow or swamp water space, for this turn add 1 to Umbrage's movement and add 3 to his Attack value.
ability_3_desc: Umbrage starts each game with up to 2 shadow tiles on his Army Card. If Umbrage ends his turn on an empty land space, you may place a shadow tile from his Army Card onto the space he occupies if the shadow tile fits normally onto that space.

name: Uriel Ventris
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, if one shield is rolled, the most wounds Uriel Ventris may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: When rolling Defense against non-adjacent attacks, one shield blocks all damage.
ability_3_desc: Range 1 Attack 3. If all attack dice roll skulls, add 3 skulls to the result.

name: Urszula Szczur
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Urszula Szczur, you may move up to 6 Rats you control up to 6 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: All Vermin figures you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Urszula Szczur roll 1 additional attack die when attacking normally.

name: Ukulele
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose 8 spaces in a straight line from Ukulele. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Ukulele's Storm Line Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. Squad figures roll 2 less defense dice against Storm Line Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Ukulele, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with Ukulele.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ukulele's movement, ignore elevations. Ukulele may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ukulele starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ungoli Spinners
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally you may attempt to use Web Line. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-15, move normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, Ungoli Spinners may ignore elevations, move over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and move over obstacles such as ruins for this turn. When an Ungoli Spinner starts to Web Line, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: VEL-RA-XI
ability_1_desc: All friendly Marro and Wilsinu Hunters within 4 clear sight spaces of Vel-Ra-Xi add 1 to their attack and defense dice.
ability_2_desc: All Small and Medium Squad figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Vel-Ra-Xi subtract 1 from their attack and defense dice. Marro and Wilsinu are not affected by Scatter the Weak.

name: VANNYS
ability_1_desc: When Vannys rolls defense dices agains a non-adjacent attack, she may add 1 more dice to its defense.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Vannys' movement, ignore elevations. Vannys may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Vannys starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Venusian Agents
ability_1_desc: If Venusian Agent is attacked with a normal attack by a non-adjacent figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to return fire. If you roll 1-11, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 12 or higher, the Venusian Agent takes no damage and inflicts one unblockable wound to the attacking figure.

name: Venom
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, Venom can Swing up to 4 spaces and up to 40 levels up or down. While Swinging, ignore elevations, terrain effects, figures, and obstacles. Venom will not take passing swipes while Swinging.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose a figure within 2 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 14+, that figure receives one wound, then choose that figure or another figure and roll again.
ability_3_desc: If an enemy figure attacks Venom, roll the d20. If you roll 14+, Venom takes no damage and may use Swing Line.

name: Velociraptor
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, before taking a turn with this Velociraptor, you may immediately move up to 2 other Velociraptors you control up to 7 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack, this Velociraptor adds 1 to its attack for every other Predator you control adjacent to the target, to a maximum of +3 for Pack Hunter.
ability_3_desc: Range 3. Attack 5. To use Pounce Special Attack, choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from the base of this Velociraptor. If the figure is destroyed, immediately place this Velociraptor on the space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, destroy this Velociraptor.

name: War Ape
ability_1_desc: When attacking a figure who has a wild personality, this War Ape rolls 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: If this War Ape ends his turn engaged with an opponent's figure, then you may attack with one Agent squad that you control.

name: Warg Riders - Swords
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Warg Riders, you may first take a turn with any Orc Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to at least one Warg Rider. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, that figure receives one wound.

name: Warg Riders - Bows
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Warg Riders, you may first take a turn with any Orc Champion you control.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to at least one Warg Rider. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 19 or higher, that figure receives one wound.

name: Viereyl
ability_1_desc: If Viereyl fails to inflict a wound with his normal attack, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Each time Viereyl inflicts a wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-9, the defending figure receives no additional wounds from Poisoned Arrows. If you roll a 10-19, add one additional wound marker to the defending figure's card, and roll again for Poisoned Arrows. If you roll a 20, destroy the defending figure.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Viereyl, you may roll the 10-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, while he remains on that space, Viereyl has no visible hit zones until you reveal an Order Marker.

name: THE ONE RING
ability_1_desc: This figure gains the following Special Power:
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with this figure, you may activate Invisibility. For the rest of the round, this figure has no Hit Zone, is never attacked when leaving an engagement, and adds 2 to its Defense. Nazgûl opponents control may ignore these effects. At the end of that round, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-3, choose an opponent. That opponent now controls this figure. Remove any Order Markers from this figure's Army Card, then give that card to that opponent.
ability_3_desc: The additional rules for this Treasure Glyph vary, depending on the Game Scenario. Keep this card handy as a reference to the One Ring's Power

name: VRIMSEN
ability_1_desc: If Vrimsen destroys a friendly figure with a normal attack, you may place that figure on this Army Card and immediately take another turn with Vrimsen. Vrimsen adds 1 to his Move and Attack value for every figure placed on his Army Card from Mad Blooddash. At the end of every round, remove all figures placed on this Army Card from Mad Blooddash.
ability_2_desc: Vrimsen never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he does not have to stop in molten lava spaces.

name: VIGORK
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. Select a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by this Rock Catapult Special Attack. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Max Elevation 15. Select any small or medium friendly squad figure adjacent to Vigork. Place the chosen figure up to 6 spaces at any direction. Then roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-6, destroy the selected squad figure. Don't roll the 20-sided die for small squad figures. You can use this Squad Catapult Special Ability three times per turn.

name: Vision
ability_1_desc: If Vision is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, choose one of the following: Roll defense dice; one shield will block all damage. or Add 4 to Vision's defense.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 1. Before attacking normally, Vision may attack with Disruption Special Attack. Figures cannot roll defense dice when attacked with Disruption Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Vision's movement, ignore elevations. Vision may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, fly through overhangs and over obstacles such as ruins. When Vision starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Warriors from Stonehill
ability_1_desc: When a Warrior from Stonehill rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: When the Warriors from Stonehill attacks a small figure that don't follow Aquilla, that figure will roll one less defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, the Warriors from Stonehill may double their height.

name: WA-KUL-RA
ability_1_desc: Whenever Wa-Kul-Ra attacks an adjacent figure, add 2 to his attack value.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. As long as Wa-Kul-Ra gives at least one wound when attacking with Chain Gun Arm Special Attack, you may continue attacking with Chain Gun Arm Special Attack
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Wa-Kul-Ra, you may first move 2 common Marro squads you control up to the unit's move value.

name: Vornsk Demon
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 5. To use Pounce Special Attack, choose a non-adjacent small or medium figure whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from the base of the Vornsk Demon. If the figure is destroyed, immediately place the Vornsk Demon on the space the figure occupied. If the figure is not destroyed, destroy the Vornsk Demon.
ability_2_desc: After the last turn of the round has been taken, before resolving any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, if there are no Order Markers on this card you may move the Vornsk Demon up to 4 spaces. When moving with Skulking Advance, the Vornsk Demon does not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Volaticus
ability_1_desc: You may add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Pheromone Phrenzy power on any Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Volaticus is attacked by an adjacent opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-9, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 10 or higher, Volaticus takes no damage and may immediately move up to 2 spaces. If Volaticus is engaged when he starts to flutter, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Volaticus's movement, ignore elevations. Volaticus may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Volaticus starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Vukanaar
ability_1_desc: An adjacent figure making a normal attack on Vukanaar rolls 1 fewer attack die. When rolling defense dice against that attack, if Vukanaar rolls any excess shields, the attacking figure takes one wound. Lava Resistant figures are not affected by Infernal Heat.
ability_2_desc: At the end of the round, if Vukanaar is on a lava field or molten lava space, you may remove a wound marker from this card. Vukanaar takes one wound each time it moves onto a water, ice, or snow space.
ability_3_desc: Vukanaar never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_4_desc: All same-level land spaces adjacent to Vukanaar are considered to be lava field spaces.

name: Watchers of Xenothea
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Watcher of Xenothea, roll an additional attack die for every other Watcher you control within 8 spaces who has a clear line of sight on the defending figure, up to a maximum of +4 dice.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Watchers Of Xenothea's movement, ignore elevations. Watchers may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Watchers start to fly, they will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: WARSTOMPER
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Warstomper's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Warstomper's Army Card to activate Wardance for the duration of the round. While WarDance is active, the player who controls Warstomper may not take any turns with Warstomper and all other figures who follow Aquilla that this player controls roll one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: If a Warstomper destroys a common figure with a normal attack, he may attack another common figure one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Add 2 to your die roll when you roll for the Concealment power on any Army Card.

name: Welsh Longbowmen
ability_1_desc: Welsh Longbowmen do not need line of sight to attack an enemy figure as long as they have LOS to a friendly figure that has LOS to the figure being attacked.
ability_2_desc: Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against a Welsh Longbowman that has LOS to it.

name: The Watcher in the Water
ability_1_desc: When The Watcher attacks, it may attack up to three additional times. Reduce the number of attacks The Watcher can make by one for every two Wound Markers on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Whenever The Watcher wounds a Unique Hero, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that Hero cannot move normally until the beginning of your next turn or until you roll for this power again.
ability_3_desc: The Watcher does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces. If it has not attacked this Round The Watcher has no Hit Zone while on a water space.

name: Wild Pack Mercs
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Up to one Wild Pack Merc that was activated but did not move or attack normally this turn may attack with Heavy Weapon Special Attack.

name: WILDCAT
ability_1_desc: After attacking, if Wildcat is engaged with a small or medium figure and one wound would be enough to destroy that figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, that figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: If Wildcat takes no damage from a normal attack by an adjacent figure, the attacking figure receives a wound.

name: The Witch-king - Mounted
ability_1_desc: All figures within 2 clear sight spaces of the Witch-King subtract 1 from their defense.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to the Witch-King. If you roll an 18 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Nazgûl and Undead are not affected by Black Breath.

name: WERLAK
ability_1_desc: All Small, Medium, and Large Beast figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Werlak add 1 to their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Werlak, if he is adjacent to a tree or bush, he may use Through the Green. To use Through the Green, place Werlak on any unoccupied space adjacent to any tree or bush within 4 clear sight spaces of him. Werlak will not take any leaving engagement attacks when he uses Through the Green.

name: Wererabbit
ability_1_desc: The Wererabbit rolls 2 fewer defense dice against any attack from a Hunter.
ability_2_desc: Instead of its normal move, the Wererabbit may Leap. Leap has a move of 3. When counting spaces for its leaping movement, ignore elevations. The Wererabbit may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. The Wererabbit may not leap more than 12 levels up or down in a single leap. If it is engaged when it starts to leap, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Whispers of Sephtis
ability_1_desc: Whispers of Sephtis adds 3 additional defense dice when rolling defense against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent.
ability_2_desc: Common figures cannot roll defense dice against Whispers of Sephtis.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Whispers of Sephtis' movement, ignore elevations. Whispers of Sephtis may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Whispers of Sephtis starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Wolverine
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. When Wolverine attacks with Snikt!, he may attack one additional time for every two wound markers on this card. All figures and Destructible Objects roll 1 fewer defense die against Snikt! for every two wound markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Wolverine, remove one Wound Marker from this card. At the end of the round, if you reveal your X Order Marker on a card you control with Healing Factor X, remove one Wound Marker from each card you control with Healing Factor X.

name: Wulfing Hunters
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card and taking a turn with the Wulfing Hunters, if at least two Wulfing Hunters that you control are engaged, you may take 1 additional turn with an unengaged squad of Wulfing Hunters or an unengaged Hunter Hero.
ability_2_desc: While a Wulfing Hunter is not adjacent to any other figures it has no visible hitzones.

name: Wind Riders
ability_1_desc: A Wind Rider never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_2_desc: If a Wind Rider starts its turn within 4 clear sight spaces of a friendly Air Elemental, when counting spaces for a Wind Rider's movement, ignore elevations. A Wind Rider may wind ride over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and wind ride over obstacles such as ruins. When a Wind Rider starts to move using Wind Riding, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: A Wind Rider can never roll defense dice while it is on a water space.

name: Zylos the Blood Hunter
ability_1_desc: Zylos may add 3 to his Move number as long as he is unengaged prior to moving. Zylos must end his move adjacent to an opponent's figure with 1 or more wounds on its Army Card in order to use Blood Thirst.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Zylos, he receives 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, up to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.
ability_3_desc: Heavy Snow only counts as 1 space when moving Zylos. Zylos can move through all figures on at least one snow or ice space and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with a figure on at least one snow or ice space.

name: Scar
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose up to 8 spaces in a line from Scar, ending 1 space away from Scar. You may choose up to 2 different figures in line of sight on those spaces to attack. Roll attack and defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling the 20-sided die for Scar's Stealth Suit power, add 2 to your die roll for each Honor Marker on this card, up to a maximum of +4.
ability_3_desc: Start the game with a blue Stealth Marker on this card. Remove the Stealth Marker if Scar enters a water space or receives 2 or more wounds. When Scar is chosen for an attack or power requiring line of sight or engagement from a non-Alien or non-Yautja figure, if there is a Stealth Marker on this card and Scar is able to move, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, Scar is not affected by that attack or power.

name: WOOD ELADRIN
ability_1_desc: When a Wood Eladrin attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When a Wood Eladrin rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 3 defense dice to the defense roll.
ability_3_desc: Once per game, the Wood Eladrin may use Fey Step. Before moving normally with the Wood Eladrin, you may place each one on any empty space within 5 spaces of his current location. If a Wood Eladrin is engaged when he uses Fey Step, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Longshot
ability_1_desc: When Longshot attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent rolls dice for any figure they control within 4 clear sight spaces of Longshot, they may re-roll all dice one time once for this turn.
ability_3_desc: When rolling attack or defense dice with Longshot, if you rolled all skulls for an attack or all shields when defending, flip this Army Card over and use that side after this turn. Do not reroll dice. Any Order Markers or Wound Markers on this Army Card are switched over to the new side.

name: Wood Woad
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may move up to two other Wood Woads you control. A Wood Woad may move one additional space if it ends its move adjacent to a Plant figure you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, a Wood Woad always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: If a small or medium figure you control who follows Ullar that is adjacent to this Wood Woad is targeted by a normal attack, you may switch that figure with this Wood Woad. The attacker must target this Wood Woad, if possible. When moving with Ullar's Shield, figures do not take leaving engagement attacks.

name: Y'Anrylh
ability_1_desc: If Y'Anrylh begins his turn unengaged, add 2 to his Move value this turn. If it begins his turn engaged, add 2 to his Attack value this turn.
ability_2_desc: When Y'Anrylh receives one or more wounds, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore any wounds.
ability_3_desc: Y'Anrylh can move through all figures.

name: Wooden Revenant
ability_1_desc: This Wooden Revenant does not begin the game on the battlefield. When a Unique Hero you control is destroyed by an enemy figure's attack, if this Wooden Revenant has not yet been placed on the battlefield, you may place that Hero on this card and place this Wooden Revenant on the space your Unique Hero previously occupied. If this Wooden Revenant is not placed on a grass space or adjacent to an evergreen tree or jungle piece, place 2 Wound Markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: If there is a Unique Hero on this card, this Wooden Revenant rolls 2 additional attack and defense dice. When this Wooden Revenant destroys a figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 7 or lower, remove the Unique Hero from this card.

name: X-Series Cryo Centurion
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this Army Card, before taking this Cryo Centurion's turn, you may take a turn with one other Mariedian Cyborg you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Figures roll 1 fewer defence die when attacked by Cryo Blaster Special Attack or, if they have the Lava Resistant Special Power, they instead roll 2 fewer defence dice when attacked by this special attack.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving. Add 1 to this Cryo Centurion's defence while on an ice or snow space.

name: Yashbuckler Pirates
ability_1_desc: Range 4 Attack 3 Up to two Yashbuckler Pirates that were activated but did not attack normally this turn may attack with Flintlock Special Attack
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Yashbuckler Pirates, if at least three Pirates you control are engaged, you may immediately take a turn with one Human Pirate Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: A Yashbuckler Pirate rolls one additional attack die if there is a Glyph or Treasure Glyph within 4 clear sight spaces of that Pirate.

name: Yillia Hunters
ability_1_desc: If a Yillia Hunter is engaged, add 1 to his attack dice and 2 to his defense dice.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Yillia Hunters, if at least two Yillia Hunters you control are engaged, you may immediately take a turn with a Unique Wolf Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking with Yillia Hunters, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, add 3 to Yillia Hunters' Range value for the duration of its turn.

name: Yillia Shadow Trackers
ability_1_desc: If a Yilla Shadow Tracker you control is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, you must roll the 20-sided die. Count the minimum number of spaces between the attacker and the Yilla Shadow Tracker. Add this number to your die roll. If you roll a 17 or higher, ignore any wounds the Yilla Shadow Tracker just received.
ability_2_desc: Yilla Shadow Trackers can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement

name: Xundar
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3 + Special. When Xundar attacks a figure with Shadow Cast Special Attack, add 1 additional attack die if at least one friendly Shadow figure is engaged with the defending figure. If Xundar destroys an opponent's figure with Shadow Cast Special Attack, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Common Shadow figures.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Xundar, and instead of taking that turn with Xundar, you may move Xundar up to 5 spaces and then take a turn with up to three small or medium Common Shadow heroes you control that are within 8 spaces of Xundar.

name: Xualtiacan Fire Ants
ability_1_desc: You may attack with any 4 Xualtiacan Fire Ants you control, even Xualtiacan Fire Ants that did not move this turn.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with a Xualitican Fire Ant that did not move this turn, you may add 1 die to its attack.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Xualtiacan Fire Ants may triple their height.

name: Zelda
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense against an incoming attack, you may roll the 20-Sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, add 2 dice to her defense.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Zelda may attack any or all figures adjacent to her. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures.

name: Zulu Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Zulu Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Tribesman Hero you control. If you take a turn with a Tribesman Hero, add 1 to the Zulu Warriors' attack. If you do not take a turn with a Tribesman Hero, add 4 to the Zulu Warriors' range.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, a Zulu Warrior adds 1 to his defense dice.

name: ZORABUUDU
ability_1_desc: After moving and attacking with Zorabuudu, you may place Zorabuudu on any empty space that is on the same level and is within 3 spaces of Zorabuudu. When Zorabuudu starts to Teleport, if it is engaged it will not take any leaving engagement attacks. After using Teleport Slash, if Zorabuudu did not remain on the same space, it may attack one additional time. Zorabuudu may only use Teleport Slash once per turn.

name: Zolgues
ability_1_desc: If Zolgues receives one or more wounds, even if he would be destroyed, roll 1 attack die for each wound recieved. For each skull rolled, you must inflict 1 wound on any figure that is within 1 space to Zolgues, including Zolgues. Figures affected by Explosive Gas Canisters cannot roll any defense dice. After using Explosive Gas Canisters, if Zolgues would be destroyed, remove Zolgues from the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: When Zolgues rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 3 defense dice to the defense roll.

name: ZZZAX
ability_1_desc: Range 4, Attack 5. Zzzax may use his Energy Bolt instead of a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: For every life point destroyed by Zzzax add a counter to Zzzax's card, up to 4 counters. For every counter add +1 to Zzzax's attack.
ability_3_desc: Zzzax may fly over terrain ignoring elevations and figures. If engaged when he starts to fly he will take leaving engagement attacks.

name: Zombies of Midtown
ability_1_desc: You may move up to 6 Zombies of Midtown that you control each turn. However, you may attack with only 3 Zombies of Midtown. You may attack with any 3 Zombies of Midtown, even Zombies of Midtown that you did not move this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. Three Zombies of Midtown on the same level may combine their attacks and roll their attack dice as one attack. All Zombies of Midtown in the attack must be engaged to the targeted figure.
ability_3_desc: If a Zombie of Midtown that you control destroys an opponent's small or medium figure, replace that figure immediately with one of your own previously destroyed Zombies of Midtown, if possible. Newly placed Zombies cannot attack this turn. Undead are not affected by Zombies Rise Again.

name: YUR MAIGAN NA
ability_1_desc: Start the game with one orange Twisted Marker on this card. Whenever an opponent's figure targets Yur Maigan Na for a normal or special attack, if they roll an uneven number of blanks, you may place your Twisted Marker on that figure's card. Any Army Card with your Twisted Marker on its card, except for Yur Maigan Na's card, must use its Attack number in place of its Defence and its Defence number in place of its Attack. If that Army Card's Attack and Defence numbers are identical, then all figures belonging to that card must count all skulls rolled as shields and all shields rolled as skulls when attacking or defending. At the end of the round, return the Twisted Marker to this card.
ability_2_desc: After attacking an opponent's figure with Yur Maigan Na: • If you rolled an uneven number of skulls, and the defending figure is Small or Medium, you may place it on any empty, same level space adjacent to Yur Maigan Na; • If you rolled an uneven number of shields, and the defending figure is adjacent to Yur Maigan Na, you may remove one wound marker from this card and inflict a wound on the defending figure; • If you rolled an uneven number of blanks, you may move any unrevealed Order Markers on the defending figure's card to any other card in the defending figure's army.

name: Zahara
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. If Zahara inflicts at least one wound with Sleep Dart Special Attack, roll the 20-sided die for Sleep Poison. If you roll a 13 or higher, the defending figure's Move, Attack, and Defense values are 0 for the duration of the round. And, all of that figure's Special Powers/Attacks are negated for the duration of the round. Sleep Poison never affects Constructs, Soulborgs, or destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: If Zahara is on a dungeon space, add 1 to her Attack and Defense values. If she is on a shadow space, add 2 to her Attack and Defense values.
ability_3_desc: Zahara can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Mordo
ability_1_desc: If Mordo is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, Mordo may Glacier Traverse instead of moving normally. To Glacier Traverse, move to any unoccupied space adjacent to that Glacier Mountain.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Mordo, remove 1 wound marker from Mordo's Army Card. If he is on a snow or ice space, remove 1 additional wound marker.

name: Saint Patrick
