ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Saint Patrick, you can take a turn with any viking you control.
ability_2_desc: All figures you control that follow Ullar within two clear sight spaces of Saint Patrick add two to their move values.
ability_3_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure that does not follow Ullar moves onto a space within 2 clear sight spaces of Saint Patrick, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through any figure affected by Pinch.

name: PYRO
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. All figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Flamethrower Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: If Pyro is standing on a shadow space or is adjacent to a jungle piece, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Master Chief
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 5 Choose 7 spaces in a straight line from Master Chief. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Master Chief's Spartan Laser Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Master Chief adds 2 to his attack when attacking an adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Master Chief always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Watcher
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Watcher, you can take a turn with any animal you control.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 3. If Watcher inflicts at least one wound with Lightning Bolt Special Attack, he may attack the defending figure two additional times with Lightning Bolt Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Watcher always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Watcher may double his height.

name: PARASITE
ability_1_desc: When a Parasite is placed on a Hero's card subtract 1 from that Hero's move and defense values.
ability_2_desc: A Parasite does not start the game on the battlefield it must be placed on the battlefield by Infected Host. At the end of each round roll 1 unblockable attack die against each opponent's figure with a Parasite on its Army Card. When a hero with a Parasite on its Army Card is destroyed place that Parasite on the space the hero occupied.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Parasites may add 2 to their height.

name: Rorshack
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Rorshack's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Rorshack's Army Card to activate Rage for the duration of the round. While Rage is active, add 2 to Rorshack's Attack and Move values and subtract 2 from Rorshack's Defense value.
ability_2_desc: If Rorshack destroys an opponent's unique figure this round, any other unique figures attacked by Rorshack this round roll two less defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Rorshack always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Mender
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a wounded Warforged Hero figure adjacent to Mender and roll the 20-sided die. •If you roll a 1, nothing happens. •If you roll 2-7, remove 1 wound marker from the chosen figure. •If you roll 8 or higher, remove 2 wound markers from the chosen figure.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker and taking a turn with Mender, you may take a turn with one other figure you control with the Party of the Bearer special power.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Mender always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Rorshack
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Rorshack's Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Rorshack's Army Card to activate Rage for the duration of the round. While Rage is active, add 2 to Rorshack's Attack and Move values and subtract 2 from Rorshack's Defense value.
ability_2_desc: If Rorshack destroys an opponent's unique figure this round, any other unique figures attacked by Rorshack this round roll two less defense dice.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Rorshack always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Needler Grunts
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Needler Grunt, if the defending figure rolls no shields, than all skulls rolled by that Needler Grunt count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: If an Elite or Warrior figure that you control is destroyed within 4 clear sight spaces of a Needler Grunt you control, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher nothing happens. If you roll a 1-12 the enemy player that destroyed the figure may move three Needler Grunts of their choice that were within 4 spaces of the destroyed figure up to 4 spaces each.

name: Sin'dorai Lieutenants
ability_1_desc: All Blood Elves you control move one additional Space.
ability_2_desc: Sin'dorai Lieutenants never roll for molten lava damage or lava field damage and they do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Sin'dorai Lieutenants' card, before taking that turn with the Lieutenants, you may choose one other Unique Blood Elf Army Card you control and take a turn with it. You may not attack with more figures from the chosen Army Card than the number of destroyed Sin'Dorai Lieutenants on this card.

name: BLAZE
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Blaze. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure recieves 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant Special Power are not affected by Searing Intensity.
ability_2_desc: Blaze never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he do not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 5 spaces. Roll the 20 sided if you roll 5 to 10 the chosen figure recieves one wound.

name: Carnifex
ability_1_desc: At the end of each round, you may reveal an "X" Order Marker on Carnifex's Army Card to place an Anticipation Marker on this card. When attacking with Carnifex, roll an additional attack die for each Anticipation Marker on this card. A maximum of 4 Anticipation Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an opponent's non-adjacent attacking figure with a Disciplined or Precise personality and at least 1 skull is rolled, if no shields are rolled by Carnifex, you may inflict 1 wound on the attacking figure. After using Vengeful Howl of Chaos, remove Carnifex from the battlefield.

name: SABER
ability_1_desc: When revealing a numbered order marker on Saber's Army Card you may also reveal an "X" order marker that is on Saber's Army Card to activate Rage for the duration of the round. While Rage is active, add 2 to Saber's Attack and Move values and subtract 2 from Saber's Defense value.
ability_2_desc: When Saber attacks a figure that is not a Warforged you may roll one additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Saber always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Dragon Turtle
ability_1_desc: Before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to this Dragon Turtle. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, place the chosen figure on this card. The chosen figure will not take any leaving engagement attacks. At the end of the round roll one unblockable attack die. If a skull is rolled the figure takes a wound. If a blank is rolled place the figure on a space adjacent to this Dragon Turtle. If there is an undestroyed figure on this card this Dragon Turtle may not use Devour.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, this Dragon Turtle always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Flying Machine
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. If Flying Machine's Flak Cannon Special Attack inflicts a wound, it may attack again with its Rapid Fire Special Attack. Flying Machine may continue attacking with its Rapid Fire Special Attack until it does not inflict a wound. When attacking a figure with the flying special power, a Flying Machine always adds one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When a Flying Machine attacks an opponent's figure, any special powers or glyphs preventing clear sight to the defending figure are negated for that attack.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Flying Machine's movement, ignore elevations. Flying Machine may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Flying Machine starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hunter
ability_1_desc: Range 1 Attack 4. If a small, medium, or large figure recieves one or more wounds from Shield Bash Special Attack, you must, if possible, move it 1 space. A figure moved by Shield Bash Special Attack never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Shield Bash Special Attack can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to this Hunter, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the opponents figure recieves 1 wound. Figures can be affected by Sharp Spines only as they move into engagement with this hunter.
ability_3_desc: If this Hunter is engaged, it may not attack with its normal attack.

name: Connor MacLeod
ability_1_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Connor MacLeod has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, immediately place Connor MacLeod in your start zone and remove all wound markers from this Army Card. You may not use this special power if Connor MacLeod was destroyed by a figure with the Immortal 11 special power.
ability_2_desc: When Connor MacLeod destroys a figure with the Immortal 11 special power, take permanent control of that figure's Army Card and any Army Card that figure controlled with The Quickening. Connor MacLeod may use any special power on any Army Card that you control with The Quickening special power.
ability_3_desc: After moving and before attacking, if Connor MacLeod ends his movement unengaged, you may choose a small or medium friendly Unique Hero within 3 clear sight spaces of Connor MacLeod whose base is no more than 2 levels higher or lower than Connor MacLeod's base. You may switch Connor with the chosen Unique Hero. Figures moved by Loyalty Strike never take any leaving engagement strikes.

name: Enforcer 241
ability_1_desc: When Enforcer 241 attacks, you may either: • Re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls once, or • Attack one additional time. Enforcer 241 cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.

name: Master Chief
ability_1_desc: Range 7 Attack 2. When attacking with M6D Pistol Special Attack, each skull rolled counts for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 white Shield Markers on this card. Anytime Master Chief is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally, you may remove one white Shield Marker from this card and ignore that attack.

name: Ogre Clubber
ability_1_desc: For every opponent's figure this Ogre Clubber destroys, place a purple Experience Marker on this card. When attacking with this Ogre Clubber, roll one additional attack die for each Experience Marker on this card. A maximum of 3 Experience Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: When you roll the 20-sided die for a Treasure Glyph trap with this Ogre Clubber, you must subtract 4 from your die roll.

name: Arthas
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Arthas. Roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 12 or higher, remove a wound marker from the chosen figure's card. If the chosen figure is undead, instead place a wound marker on the chosen figure's card.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, if Arthas is attacked and at least one skull is rolled you may reveal the X Order Marker on this card. After revealing the X Order Marker, the opposing player's turn immediately ends and Arthas recieves no wounds.
ability_3_desc: Arthas may use Resurrection at the beginning of the round before Order Markers are placed. Roll the 20-sided die, if you roll a 17 or higher you may place 3 previously destroyed common squad figures that you control within three clear sight spaces of Arthas. Resurrection may not be used on figures that are Undead.

name: GLAIPHEN
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Glaiphen inflicts at least one wound with Poison Fang Special Attack roll the 20-sided die for Poison Damage. If you roll a 1-9, the defending figure recieves no additional wounds for Poison Damage. If you roll a 10-19, add 1 additional wound marker to the defending figure's Army Card, and roll again for Poison Damage. If you roll a 20 destroy the defending figure.
ability_2_desc: Glaiphen does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.

name: Brutes
ability_1_desc: Brutes add 3 to their attack when attacking an adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack 5. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Brutes you may move a Brute you control up to 5 spaces. That Brute can attack up to 5 times with Rage Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as that Brute is on a space where it could end its movement. A Brute may not attack the same figure more than once in a single turn.

name: Shawnstar
ability_1_desc: When counting spaces for Shawnstar's movement, ignore elevations. Shawnstar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Shawnstar starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, you may choose a wounded Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Shawnstar. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, remove one wound marker from the chosen Hero's Army Card.

name: Watcher
ability_1_desc: If Watcher is standing on a shadow space or is adjacent to a jungle piece, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 3. If Watcher inflicts at least one wound with Lightning Bolt Special Attack, he may attack the defending figure two additional times with Lightning Bolt Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Watcher always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Watcher may double his height.

name: Cadueceus
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker and taking a turn with Cadueceus you may take a turn with one other figure you control that has the Party of the Bearer special power.
ability_2_desc: Range 4 + Special. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure and a third figure within 2 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by Chain Lightning Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Chain Lightning Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a special attack, Cadeuceus always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Swift
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker and taking a turn with Swift you may take a turn with one other figure you control that has the Party of the Bearer special power.
ability_2_desc: If Swift is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 2 dice to his attack.
ability_3_desc: If Swift is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If Swift is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If he is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1-15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Swift may add 2 to his height.

name: Dragonhawk Rider
ability_1_desc: If a Dragonhawk Rider rolls a skull against a figure with the Flying special power leaving an engagement with it, that figure may not leave the engagement with that Dragonhawk Rider this turn.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Dragonhawk Rider's card, before taking that turn with the Riders, you may choose one other Unique Blood Elf Army Card you control and take a turn with it. You may not attack with more figures from the chosen Army Card than the number of destroyed Dragonhawk Riders on this card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Dragonhawk Rider's movement, ignore elevations. Dragonhawk Riders may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Dragonhawk Rider starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: 77TH INFANTRY SOLDIER
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with a 77th Infantry Soldier, you may take a turn with one additional 77th Infantry Soldier. After revealing an Order Marker on the army card of any Unique Soldier Hero you control and taking a turn with that Hero, you may move any two 77th Infantry Soldiers you control up to 4 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When a 77th Infantry Soldier attacks a figure within 2 spaces, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: If a Soldier figure adjacent to a 77th Infantry Soldier figure receives 1 or more wounds from a non-adjacent attack, instead of placing those wounds, you may destroy one 77th Infantry Soldier adjacent to the defending figure.

name: Abaddon
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 2. Each skull rolled counts as additional attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 10. Attack 6. After attacking with Combi-Stick Special Attack, place the Combi-Stick glyph at the target's location. Attack cannot be reused until the Combi-Stick glyph is recovered by any Yautja.

name: Agrith-Naar
ability_1_desc: Each time Agrith-Naar destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After attacking, if Agrith-Naar did not destroy a figure, he receives one wound. If he does destroy a figure, Agrith-Naar must attack again, if possible. Agrith-Naar must continue attacking until he does not destroy a figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Agrith-Naar's movement, ignore elevations. Agrith-Naar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Agrith-Naar starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Agrith-Naar
ability_1_desc: After attacking, if Agrith-Naar did not destroy a figure, he receives one wound. If he does destroy a figure, Agrith-Naar may attack again. Agrith-Naar may continue attacking until he does not destroy a figure.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Agrith-Naar's movement, ignore elevations. Agrith-Naar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Agrith-Naar starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: WINGED CAPE
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this figure's movement, ignore elevations. This figure may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this starts to fly, if this figure is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Winged Cape's power.

name: Agrith-Naar
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. If Agrith-Naar's Bloodthirsty Special Attack destroys a figure, Agrith-Naar may attack again with his Bloodthirsty Special Attack. Agrith-Naar may continue attacking with his Bloodthirsty Special Attack until he does not destroy a figure. If Agrith-Naar does not destroy a figure with his Bloodthirsty Special Attack, he receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Agrith-Naar's movement, ignore elevations. Agrith-Naar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Agrith-Naar starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Abu Sakhr
ability_1_desc: When Abu Sakhr defends against a normal or special attack, add one shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: If Abu Sakhr ends his turn on a stone space, you may remove one wound marker from this card.
ability_3_desc: Before making a normal attack, choose a figure engaged with Abu Sakhr that is also adjacent to the target. After that attack, if the target was destroyed, Abu Sakhr may make an additional attack on the chosen figure. Before making that additional attack, you may choose a new figure for Mighty Swing.

name: Absorbing Man
ability_1_desc: When Absorbing Man rolls defense dice while on a land space, he rolls 2 additional dice and any die result that is not a skull counts as a shield. When Absorbing Man rolls defense dice while on a water space or a molten lava space, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Absorbing Man may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately. Absorbing Man rolls 3 fewer attack dice when using Ball and Chain Assault.
ability_3_desc: Absorbing Man never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.

name: Abomination
ability_1_desc: Abomination may attack any and all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately. Abomination rolls 3 fewer attack dice when using Stomp.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Abomination may use Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10. When counting spaces for Super Leap movement, ignore elevations. Abomination may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Abomination may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Abomination is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Abomination rolls 3 fewer attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap.

name: Admiral EJ-1M
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative, you may move any Order Markers from this Army Card onto any of your Pirate or Captain Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 2 + Special. You may attack up to 4 times with Boarding Party Special Attack. Roll one additional attack die when attacking a figure engaged with a Pirate or Captain you control. After each attack, if that was the first time you attacked the defending figure this turn, you may move one Pirate or Captain figure you control up to 4 spaces. You may not move the same figure more than once in a turn using Boarding Party Special Attack.

name: Abomination
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Abomination may use Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10. When counting spaces for Super Leap movement, ignore elevations. Abomination may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Abomination may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Abomination is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Abomination rolls 3 fewer attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap.
ability_2_desc: Range 1, Attack 3. Any figure adjacent to Abomination is affected by this special attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately. Abomination cannot use this special attack and Super Leap in the same turn.

name: Agamemnon
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Agamemnon and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, the chosen figure and every small or medium figure adjacent to the chosen figure receives one wound. Agamemnon cannot be damaged by God Thunder.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Agamemnon is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die before removing him from the battlefield. If you roll a 20, Agamemnon is not destroyed. Add 1 to your roll for every Sacred Band adjacent to Agamemnon.

name: PLACEHOLDER
ability_1_desc: Though it doesn't look like much, never fear. Just put this figure in your start zone and wait for something better to come along. It will happen, just don't worry about it. Worrying only causes more problems, you know. So trust in the heart of the dice, and wait for this placeholder's true place to be held, because it will come, and you can switch the figure with it.
ability_2_desc: You can forget all that and just play 10 Points Under.

name: Agent Amaya
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Agent Amaya, if she is unengaged, Agent Amaya may move up to 2 spaces.
ability_2_desc: If Agent Amaya is attacking an adjacent figure, add 2 dice to Agent Amaya's attack.

name: Admiral Zhao
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Admiral Zhao, you must roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you must take another turn with Admiral Zhao and you must attack a figure during this turn, if possible. After this additional turn, choose an opponent. That opponent may then take a turn with a figure they control within 5 spaces of Admiral Zhao. You must continue to roll for Overconfidence 15 until Admiral Zhao takes a wound.
ability_2_desc: If Admiral Zhao inflicts one or more wounds with his normal attack, you may roll an attack die for each wound received. The figure receives one additional wound for each skull rolled. Admiral Zhao rolls 3 fewer dice for his normal attack and may not inflict additional wounds when attacking a figure with the Lava Resistant Special Power.
ability_3_desc: When Admiral Zhao is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Admiral Zhao can take from this attack is one.

name: Armbow
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: When this figure attacks with a normal attack, you may change the Range number on its Army Card to 5 and the Attack number on its Army Card to 3. After attacking normally with this Treasure Glyph, this figure may attack two additional times with this Treasure Glyph.
ability_3_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Armbow's power.

name: Agent Thema
ability_1_desc: When defending against any attack from an enemy figure, instead of defending normally, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-15, Agent Thema takes as many wounds as skulls were rolled. If you roll a 16 or higher, Agent Thema takes no wounds.

name: Wand Sheath (Searing Light)
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Wizard, Cleric, or Artificer Figure.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3+Special. If this figure is attacking an Undead figure roll 2 additional dice for Searing Light Special Attack.
ability_4_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Wand Sheath (searing Light)'s power.

name: GITHZERAI MONK
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Githzerai Monk, you may choose a Treasure Glyph on an unoccupied space within 4 spaces of Githzerai Monk. You may move that Treasure Glyph onto any empty same-level space adjacent to Githzerai Monk. Symbol-side-up Treasure Glyphs cannot be revealed, and power-side-up Treasure Glyphs must be placed power-side-up when moved by Mage Hand.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. After attacking with Ki Strikes Special Attack, Githzerai Monk may attack one additional time with his Ki Strikes Special Attack. If Githzerai Monk used Mage Hand this turn, roll 1 additional attack die for each of his attacks.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Githzerai Monk may use Stealth Leap 17. Stealth Leap 17 has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Stealth Leap 17, ignore elevations. Githzerai Monk may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Githzerai Monk may not leap more than 17 levels up or down in a single leap. If Githzerai Monk is engaged when he starts his Stealth Leap 17, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Agatha Heterodyne
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may first take a turn with a Clank Hero or Squad you control. Any figure that is taking a turn with Spark Command must be within clear sight of Agatha Heterodyne before moving.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, if a wounded friendly Cyborg, Soulborg, or Construct Hero begins or ends its move adjacent to Agatha Heterodyne, you may remove 1 wound marker from its Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Range 4+Special, Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may choose a second figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the targeted figure, and a third figure within 3 clear sight spaces of the second figure to be affected by this special attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Lightning Staff Special Attack does not affect destructible objects.

name: Akane
ability_1_desc: All wounds inflicted by Akane are placed upside down on a figure's Army Card. These wounds cannot be healed or removed by any means.
ability_2_desc: Akane may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Agent Morgan
ability_1_desc: Add 1 to Agent Morgan's Move Value and subtract 1 from her Range Value for each wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When Agent Morgan attacks a non-adjacent figure, if there are 2 or fewer wound markers on this Army Card, you may re-roll one attack die that did not show a skull. Preternatural Aim can only be used once for each attack.
ability_3_desc: When Agent Morgan destroys an adjacent figure, if there are 3 or more wound markers on this Army Card, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Agent Morgan cannot Life Drain destructible objects.

name: Agent Eva
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative, if there is at least one Order Marker on this card, choose an opponent and roll the 20-sided die. • If you roll a 1-3, you must reveal your X Order Marker. • If you roll a 4-14, nothing happens. • If you roll a 15 or higher, the opponent must reveal an X Order Marker.
ability_2_desc: When Agent Eva attacks an adjacent small or medium figure, it rolls 1 fewer defense die. When Agent Eva makes a leaving engagement attack against a small or medium figure, a skull counts as two hits.
ability_3_desc: If Agent Eva does not move this turn and attacks a non-adjacent figure, she may either roll 1 additional attack die, or add 2 to her range. When using Steady Aim X, add 1 automatic skull if the target has a revealed X Order Marker on its Army Card.

name: AH JONG
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 2. If Ah Jong rolls at least 1 skull with his Ten Thousand Bullets Special Attack, he may attack again with his Ten Thousand Bullets Special Attack. Ah Jong may continue attacking with his Ten Thousand Bullets Special Attack until he rolls no skulls.
ability_2_desc: If Ah Jong attacks an adjacent opposing figure that is not adjacent to another opposing figure with a normal attack, he rolls 2 additional dice.

name: Command Circlet
ability_1_desc: This glyph may only be carried by a Warforged figure.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the card of the Unique Hero equipped with this glyph, before taking a turn with that Hero or using other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first take a turn with any Warforged Unique Hero you control within 8 clear sight spaces of the figure equipped with this glyph. The chosen figure may not take additional turns with any other figure you control.
ability_3_desc: Keep this card handy as a reference for the Command Circlet's power.

name: Agrith-Naar
ability_1_desc: Agrith-Naar may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: If Agrith-Naar did not destroy a figure during his turn, place a wound marker on his Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Agrith-Naar's movement, ignore elevations. Agrith-Naar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Agrith-Naar starts to fly, if he is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Agent Moore
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, instead of taking a turn with Agent Moore you may move up to 3 Agents you control who follow Jandar up to 4 spaces each. Agent Moore may be moved by Agents of Jandar. A figure moved by Agents of Jandar does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 5 Attack 2+Special. If Agent Moore is unengaged, she may use Coordinated Agent Special Attack. When attacking with Coordinated Agent Special Attack, add 2 attack dice for each other unengaged Agent you control who is in clear sight of Agent Moore and who is also in range of the target, up to a maximum of +4.
ability_3_desc: If a Unique Agent Hero you control is destroyed, you may move all Order Markers from that Agent's Army Card to this card.

name: Agent Chimps
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Agent Chimps may use teleport. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-8, Agent Chimps can not move this turn. If you roll a 9-20, you may place Agent Chimps on any space within 10 clear sight spaces of his starting position.
ability_2_desc: If Agent Chimps is targeted for a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-12, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 13-20, you may place Agent Chimps on any space within 5 clear sight spaces of his starting position. The attacking figure may attack Agent Chimps if he did not move out of the attacking figure's range or line of sight.
ability_3_desc: Agent Chimps is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Self-Destruct Device
ability_1_desc: When the Self-Destruct Glyph is placed on the board or revealed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-5, remove the Self-Destruct Glyph from the Battlefield. If you roll a 5 or higher, place the die on the Self-Destruct Glyph with the number you rolled face-up. At the end of each turn, lower the number on the die by 1. When the number on the die would be lowered below 1, you must roll the 20-sided die for all figures within 10 spaces of the Self-Destruct Glyph, one at a time. Add 1 to your roll for every space between the Self-Destruct Glyph and a figure. If you roll a 1-16, destroy the figure.

name: AKKURASK
ability_1_desc: When Akkurask attacks, he may attack up to 6 times. Reduce the number of times Akkurask can attack by 1 for each wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Akkurask does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.
ability_3_desc: When attacking a large or huge figure with at least 3 wounds, blanks counts as skulls.

name: The Alder Knights
ability_1_desc: When a Unique Knight or Fighter figure you control that is adjacent to at least one of your Alder Knights receives one or more wounds from a normal or special attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, ignore those wounds. Oath of Protection 9 cannot be used to protect Alder Knights.

name: Akiaro Hotoga
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the round, after everyone have put all order makers, reveal the "X" order marker on Akiaro Hotoga Army Card. For the duration of the round, Akiaro Hotoga will have 2 on its attack value and 5 on its defense value. Akiaro Hotoga can now attack all adjacent figures, roll attack dices separately.
ability_2_desc: At the end of the round, when only the "X" order markers remains, reveal the "X" order marker on Akiaro Hotoga Army Card. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, nothing happens and a new round begins. If you roll 13-20, you can take a turn with Akiaro Hotoga.

name: Agent Liu
ability_1_desc: Agent Liu rolls 1 additional defense die against a normal or special attack from a Tricky figure. A Tricky figure that is engaged with Agent Liu may not use any special power on its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If Agent Liu is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-11, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 12 or higher, Agent Liu takes no damage and may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Agent Liu can Shadow Dodge only if she ends her move unengaged. She does not take leaving engagement attacks while moving with Shadow Dodge.
ability_3_desc: Range 1, Attack Special. Roll 4 attack dice. If at least 1 skull is rolled, she may attack again with Whirling Katana Special Attack, rolling 1 fewer die. She may continue to attack with Whirling Katana Special Attack, rolling 1 fewer die for each subsequent attack, until you fail to roll a skull.

name: Almighty Skull
ability_1_desc: When Almighty Skulls attacks an adjacent figure or destructible object, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Any adjacent figures expect those with the Fearless personality roll less defense die when defending a normal attack from Almighty Skull.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Almighty Skull always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Andalusian Soldiers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Andalusian Soldiers, you may first take a turn with any Captain you control who follows Einar.
ability_2_desc: If an Andalusian Soldier's entire movement is on sand spaces, he may move 2 additional spaces. Any extra move must also be on sand spaces.
ability_3_desc: Andalusian Soldiers roll an additional die when attacking a figure with a Move value of 4 or less.

name: ANAYS
ability_1_desc: If an Undead figure that you control within 8 clear sight spaces of Anays destroys an opponent's small or medium figure, replace that figure immediately, if possible, with one of your own previously destroyed Undead squad figures. Newly placed Undead squad figure cannot attack this turn. Undead are not affected by Necromancy.
ability_2_desc: If all your Order Markers are on Thrall or Savage Army Cards, you may add 1 to your initiative roll for every Order Marker on a Thrall's or Savage's Army Card, up to a maximum of +3 for Initiative Advantage.

name: Alixron Vandos
ability_1_desc: Alixron Vandos starts the game with 1 Inspiration Marker on his Army Card. Before moving, you may choose any other Hero figure within 4 spaces of Alixron. Place the Inspiration Marker onto the chosen figure's Army Card. After the chosen Hero rolls the 20-sided die for any special power, they may remove the Inspiration Marker from their Army card. They must then reroll the 20-sided die, adding 1 to the roll. The new roll must be used. After a figure removes an Inspiration Marker from their card, place it onto Alixron's Army card.
ability_2_desc: Every round, You may add 1 to your Initiative roll, for every Order Marker placed onto Alixron's Army Card.

name: Annihilation Corroders
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-side die once for each Soulborg figure adjacent to any Annihilation Corroder you control. If you roll a 13 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Annihilation Corroders are not affected by Plague of Rust.
ability_2_desc: When a Annihilation Corroder rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: If an Annihilation Corroder is attacked with a normal attack by an opponent's figure and is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, all adjacent figures receive 1 wound.

name: ANUBIAN WOLVES
ability_1_desc: Before moving, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, choose a Anubian Wolf you control and destroy it. If you roll a 2-6, add 1 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 7-11, add 2 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 12-15, add 3 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 16-19, add 4 to the attack value of this card. If you roll a 20, add 8 to the attack value of this card.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with the Anubian Wolves, you may first move any small, medium or large relentless Hero you control up to 6 spaces.

name: Apep Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Apep Warriors, you may first take a turn with one Deity Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking or defending with an Apep Warriors, add 1 die for each other adjacent Apep Warrior up to a maximum of +2 dice for the Phalanx Formation power.

name: Aragorn - Mounted
ability_1_title: Spear Of The Mark Special Attack
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Figures with the Wolves Of Isengard ability subtract 2 from their defense dice when defending against Spear Of The Mark Special Attack.

name: Amber Rhyllian
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3 + Special. Choose up to 2 figures and apply up to one terrain effect to each. 1) If a figure is on a rock space or adjacent to a rock outcrop, add 1 attack die. 2) If a figure is on or adjacent to a molten lava space and does not have the Lava Resistant special power, add 2 attack dice. 3) If a figure is on a water space and does not have the Water Mastery special power, it rolls one less defense die. 4) If a figure is on an ice space or adjacent to a glacier, does not have a special power that allows healing on an ice space, and receives at least one wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, remove one order marker at random from the figure's army card.
ability_2_desc: Amber may choose to ignore all terrain effects and all special powers of elementals.

name: Arantil
ability_1_desc: Opponent's small or medium figures attacked by Arantil subtract 1 from their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, after Arantil destroys a figure with a normal attack, he may move up to 2 spaces and attack again.

name: Araan the Undying
ability_1_desc: All Undead figures that you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Araan the Undying roll one additional attack die and add one to their Move number. Araan the Undying's Profane Aura does not affect Araan the Undying.
ability_2_desc: Figues attacked by Araan the Undying subtract 2 from their defense dice. Destructible Objects are not affected by Soul Weapon.

name: Archers of Imladris
ability_1_desc: When an Archer of Imladris attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Archers of Imladris are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: ANTONY
ability_1_desc: Before moving Antony, you may choose an adjacent, friendly Tiny Unique Hero that is not engaged with a Tiny figure. After moving Antony, place the chosen figure on an empty space adjacent to him.
ability_2_desc: If an adjacent friendly Tiny figure would take any wounds from a normal attack, you may destroy Antony and ignore all of those wounds.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Antony's movement, ignore elevations. Antony may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Antony starts to fly, if he is engaged, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Aragorn
ability_1_desc: Opposing figures roll one less attack dice when attacking Aragorn or any friendly adjacent figure. Figures may not roll less than one attack die because of this power.
ability_2_desc: When Aragorn attacks, you may re-roll 1 die that does not show a skull once per trun.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Aragorn, you may place a wound marker on Aragorn and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.

name: Annihilator Mark II
ability_1_desc: Range 10, Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Nuclear Blast Special Attack. Annihilator Mark II only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Before rolling attack dice, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-2, roll 5 attack dice once. Annihilator Mark II and every adjacent figure receive as many wounds as skulls were rolled. Annihilator Mark II's turn ends immediately. If you roll a 3-12, Annihilator Mark II receives 1 wound and his turn ends immediately. If you roll a 13-19, the affected figures roll 2 less defense dice. If you roll a 20, the affected figures cannot roll any defense dice. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: All huge opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Annihilator Mark II may not move. Figures affected by the Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on an Army Card or glyph.

name: Apocalypse
ability_1_desc: Apocalypse cannot be destroyed without first taking enough wounds to be destroyed. If Apocalypse receives one or more wounds and does not roll defense dice ignore any wounds that Apocalypse just received. If a terrain rule or a special power on any Army Card, Glyph, or Destructible Object would automatically destroy Apocalypse, that terrain rule or special power instead inflicts 3 wounds on Apocalypse.
ability_2_desc: An opponent may never take temporary or permanent control of Apocalypse. It is never possible to negate Apocalypse's special powers by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_3_desc: When rolling attack dice against common figures or defense dice against against normal or special attack from common figures, Apocalypse always adds 1 automatic skull or shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Arghan Div
ability_1_desc: If Arghan Div destroys a figure with a normal attack, remove 1 wound marker from this card.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any number of figures adjacent to Arghan Div. For each figure chosen, place one wound marker on this card. The chosen figures each receive one wound.

name: Atom Al Pratt
ability_1_desc: After attacking, if Atom is engaged with only one figure he may attack one additional time. Atom rolls one less die for this second attack.
ability_2_desc: When Atom rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Arukar the Mighty
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game Arukar may not use any of his special powers, except Battle Fury. For every opponent's figure Arukar destroys, place a purple Experience Marker on this card. When this card has 3 Experience Markers on it, Arukar may use all of his special powers.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Arukar, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Arukar.
ability_3_desc: If Arukar is attacking an adjacent figure, add 3 dice to Arukar's attack.

name: Arelkaros
ability_1_title: Hunting for the Prey Special Attack
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2. Select up to 2 adjacent figures to attack. Roll attack dices once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Squad figures roll one less defense dice. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 15 or higher, you may attack 3 adjacent figures instead of 2.
ability_2_desc: If Arelkaros is adjacent to a Glacier Mountain, opponents' figures must be adjacent to Arelkaros to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Arbiters of Ozirael
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, whenever an Arbiter Of Ozirael destroys a figure that is not an Arbiter, place that figure on this Army Card. All Arbiters Of Ozirael you control add 1 to their Attack and Defense values for every figure on this Army Card that are not Arbiters. At the end of the round, remove all non-Arbiters from this card. All non-Arbiters placed by Smiter Spears can only be placed on a single Arbiters Of Ozirael Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for the Arbiters Of Ozirael's movement, ignore elevations. Arbiters may pass over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When an Arbiter starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Autumn Vulpine
ability_1_desc: While moving, Autumn Vulpine may add 2 to her move number. If she does, she cannot attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: If Autumn Vulpine did not move this turn, add 3 to her Range value.
ability_3_desc: Autumn Vulpine may pass through trees and bushes while moving.

name: Atreides House Troop
ability_1_desc: Before moving Atreides House Troop, you may first move one Atreides Unique Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: Atreides House Troops receive an additional defense die if there is a wounded Atreides Unique Hero in the game.
ability_3_desc: If none of the Atreides House Troops moves this turn, each troop receives an additional attack die against figures with the Flying or Stealth Flying abilities.

name: Aubrein Light Elves
ability_1_desc: When defending against a normal attack, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Whenever an Aubrein Light Elf is adjacent to any friendly Elf Hero, add 1 to the Defense value of that Hero and that Light Elf when defending against adjacent attacks. Figures cannot receive more than 1 extra Defense die from Frontline Defense.

name: Aya Morningbrook
ability_1_desc: If every Army Card you control has an unmodified attack value of 2 or less and an unmodified defense value of 2 or less, then Aya Morningbrook, and each figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Aya Morningbrook, receives 1 additional attack die and 1 additional defense die.

name: Arenatron
ability_1_desc: When Arenatron destroys an opponent's figure: If there is not a figure with the Trophy Marker on its Army Card, place the Trophy Marker on the destroyed figure's Army Card and place a Victory Marker on Arenatron's Army Card. If there is a figure with the Trophy Marker on its Army Card, and the destroyed figure's point cost is greater than the point cost of the figure with the Trophy Marker on its Army Card. Remove the Trophy Marker from the original Army Card, place it on the destroyed figure's Army Card, and place a Victory Marker on Arenatron's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If there is at least one Victory Marker on this card, when Arenatron attacks, he receives an additional attack die. If there are at least two Victory Markers on this card, when Arenatron attacks, he may attack one additional time. If there are at least three Victory Markers on this card, when Arenatron attacks, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Avalanche
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose 6 spaces in a straight line from Avalanche. All non-flying figures on those spaces are affected by Tremor Special Attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Any non-flying figure adjacent to Avalanche is affected by Quake Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.

name: Assault Daleks
ability_1_desc: You may choose a figure within 3 clear sight spaces of any Assault Dalek that did not attack this turn. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, and you roll a 7 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero, and you roll a 17 or higher, destroy it.
ability_2_desc: When rolling for defense, use the white combat dice. Any dice that show a skull may be re-rolled once.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for an Assault Dalek's movement, you may subtract 1 from each elevation change. An Assault Dalek may ignore all effects from terrain tiles it moves onto or occupies. An Assault Dalek never takes leaving engagement attacks.

name: AT-ST
ability_1_desc: When using the AT-ST, you must place any two medium unique hero figures on this card they will act as driver and gunner, when the AT-ST is destroyed both figures will be destroyed. Both unique army cards will be included in team count and total.
ability_2_desc: When AT-ST leaves an engagement with any adjacent figure, roll 20 sided dice, roll either a 1 or a 20 that AT-ST is captured by last figure attacked, remove driver and gunner to normal play, new owner must place any 2 unique hero figures on that card. if you have no unique hero cards you may place 1 unique squad on AT-ST card. Any wound markers that were previously on the AT-ST card will remain.

name: Azorok
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Azorok, you must choose one small or medium Squad figure adjacent to Azorok, if possible, and destroy it.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Azorok, if Azorok did not destroy a figure with his Hungry Chomp special power this turn, add 2 dice to Azorok's attack.

name: Bahadur
ability_1_desc: Small Squad figures attacked by Bahadur subtract 2 from their defense dice. Medium Squad figures attacked by Bahadur subtract 1 from their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When Bahadur is destroyed, place this figure on any Unique Army Card with a Range of 1. Bahadur's Spirit adds 1 to the normal Attack number on that card.

name: Aura Baras of the Inner Circle
ability_1_desc: Aura Baras begins the game with 3 silver Cripple markers on her Army Card. After moving and before attacking, you may choose a Small, Medium, or Large Unique Hero within 5 clear sight spaces of Aura Baras and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may place a Cripple Marker on that figure's Army Card. A figure with a Cripple Marker on their Army Card never rolls more than one die when attacking or defending. Apepians, Soulborgs, and Constructs are never affected by Cripple markers.
ability_2_desc: All figures you control who follow Ozirael who are within 6 clear sight spaces of Aura Baras add 1 to their Attack value. If Aura Baras is destroyed, all figures you control who follow Ozirael subtract 1 from their Attack value.

name: Ash Stormwind
ability_1_desc: If there was a revealed numbered Order Marker on this card before the beginning of this turn, Ash Stormwind has the Species of Hybrid, and adds 3 to his Move and 1 to his Attack.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Ash Stormwind you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Ash Stormwind, or with any Hybrid Hero you control within 4 clear sight spaces of him.
ability_3_desc: If Ash Stormwind is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, if he is a Hybrid you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, Ash Stormwind takes no damage and immediately moves up to 4 spaces. When using Shifter Instincts, Ash Stormwind does not take leaving engagement attacks from the attacker, may not end his move engaged with that figure, and must move at least one space.

name: Banner Bearer of Weston
ability_1_desc: All friendly Knights within 4 clear sight spaces of Banner Bearer of Weston add 1 to their attack dice and 1 to their defense dice. This effect is not cumulative with multiple Banner Bearers.

name: Basalt Tribe Warriors
ability_1_desc: When attacking with a Basalt Tribe Warrior, that Warrior may decrease its Attack by 2 to add 4 to its Range.

name: ATHARM
ability_1_desc: Begin the game with 3 Green Larvae Markers on this card. Once per turn, whenever a figure within 6 spaces of Atharm is destroyed by a figure you control, before removing that figure from the battlefield, you may move Atharm up to 6 spaces. Atharm must be able to move adjacent to the destroyed figure to use Corpse Fertilisation. If she ends her move adjacent to that figure, place a Larvae Marker from this card on a space that figure previously occupied if there is no marker already on that space. At the end of any round, you may, if possible, place any previously destroyed Volucris Suicidiae you control on any spaces occupied by one of your Larvae Markers, and return that Larvae Marker to this card. You may then place one other previously destroyed Volucris Suicidium you control adjacent to the newly placed Volucris Suicidium.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Atharm, if she occupies or is within one space of a space with a Larvae Marker, you may place that Larvae Marker on this card to remove one wound marker from this card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Atharm's movement, ignore elevations. Atharm may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Atharm starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Bal Aram Guem
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with any Corsair, you may move one unrevealed Order Marker from any Corsair Army Card in your army to any other Corsair Army Card you control.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Bal Aram Guem, you may place a wound marker on Bal Aram Guem and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.
ability_3_desc: At the start of each round, before placing order markers, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, you may remove 1 wound marker from this Army Card.

name: Baron Zemo
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative but before anyone takes a turn, you may choose an opponent. That opponent must show you their Order Markers.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Baron Zemo. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may remove one unrevealed Order Marker at random from that Hero's Army Card.

name: Bahamut, Divine General
ability_1_desc: When a Dracon figure you control is destroyed, you may place the figure on this Army Card, up to a maximum of 4 figures.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, you may remove a Dracon on this Army Card and attack one additional time with Bahamut.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 1 + Special. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the targeted figure are also affected by Spirit Flare Special Attack. Before rolling remove all Dracon figures from this Army Card. Add 1 to Bahamut's attack for each figure removed. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Bahamut cannot be affected by his own Spirit Flare Special Attack.

name: Beakface Talon Master
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Beakface Talon Master, if the defending figure is engaged with another Kenku figure you control, then subtract 1 defense die from it defense dice for each Kenku figure also engaged with the defending figure. A maximum of 3 defense dice may be subtracted.
ability_2_desc: This Beakface Talon Master never rolls for falling damage

name: Banshee
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose 4 spaces in a straight line from Banshee. All figures on those spaces that are in line of sight are affected by Sonic Scream Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Banshee's movement, ignore elevations. Banshee may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Banshee starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Balalzag
ability_1_desc: If Balalzag wounds an opponent's figure but does not destroy it, Balalzag must use Fell Grip Engagement. Balalzag and the figure it wounded must remain adjacent until one or the other is destroyed. Neither figure can make a normal attack on any other figure, or make leaving engagement attacks. Either figure may only move, either normally or by a special power or glyph, if the other can be placed adjacent to it at the end of that move. The Move number of both figures is reduced by 3.
ability_2_desc: While in Fell Grip Engagement with a figure, Balalzag rolls 2 additional attack dice when attacking that figure, and rolls 2 fewer defense dice when defending against any other figure. If Balalzag destroys that figure, remove a wound marker from this card.

name: BE-ZAK-SA
ability_1_desc: When a Cyborg Squad figure you control rolls the 20-sided die for a special power on its Army Card, add 1 to the result.
ability_2_desc: After making an attack on an adjacent figure, Be-Zak-Sa may make an additional attack. She may target the same or a different figure, and may target a non-adjacent figure even if she is still engaged.

name: Balrog of Morgoth
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Balrog of Morgoth, you may choose one opponent's small or medium figure within 5 clear sight spaces whose level is no more than 18 levels above this Balrog's level or 8 below this Balrog's level. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 8 or higher, place the chosen figure on any empty same-level space adjacent to this Balrog. Figures moved by Fiery Whip Grab do not take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Balrog of Morgoth, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to this Balrog of Morgoth. If you roll 13 or higher, that figure receives a wound. Ainu and figures with the fearless personality are not affected by Morgoth's Shadow.

name: Bat-Devil
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack and up to two other figures adjacent to that figure to be affected by Projectile Barrage. Roll attack once for all affected figures.
ability_2_desc: If Bat-Devil is attacked with a normal attack, roll the d20. Add 3 to your roll if Bat-Devil is on a dungeon space, or 6 if he is on a shadow space. If you roll 16+, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Baron Von Bronn
ability_1_desc: If Baron von Bronn is targeted by a normal attack from a Common figure, immediately roll the 20-sided die. Add 3 if the figure is adjacent to Baron von Bronn. If you roll a 19 or higher, the figure may not attack this turn.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack on a figure that follows Aquilla, Jandar, or Ullar, Baron von Bronn rolls 1 additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: If there is at least one Order Marker on this card and on the Army Card of a Squad you control, then add 1 to your initiative roll for every wound marker and every Order Marker on this card.

name: Beawið
ability_1_desc: When Beawið attacks large or huge figures, add 2 attack dice. The opponent may not disengage using any special abilities.
ability_2_desc: When a Bondsman of Götland figure receives one or more wounds, before removing the figure you may add 1 wound marker to Beawið's Army Card and have the selected Bondsman ignore all other wounds. Figures must be within 4 clear sight spaces of Beawið to benefit from Warrior's Sacrifice.

name: Beast Boy (Aerial)
ability_1_desc: Your army can only include Beast Boy (Aerial) if it also includes Beast Boy. Beast Boy (Aerial) never starts the game on the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Beast Boy's movement, ignore elevations. Beast Boy may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Beast Boy starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: BELIAL
ability_1_desc: Attack 3. Range 5. Instead of attacking normally or after attacking normally, if Belial is not engaged, he may use Tail Spikes Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Belial's movement, ignore elevations. Belial may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Belial starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Birch Sentry
ability_1_desc: Birch sentry recieves one additional defense die for each other figure named Birch Sentry that is adjacent to it
ability_2_desc: When defending with Birch Sentry, each shield rolled counts as one additional block.
ability_3_desc: Whenever Birch Sentry would receive a wound, instead you assign a wound to any adjacent Woodkin you control.

name: AURA OF SPARKS
ability_1_desc: Whenever the figure carrying this Glyph wounds a figure with a normal attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die for every small and medium figure adjacent to the wounded figure. Subtract 2 from you roll if the wounded figure is not adjacent. If you roll a 1, this figure receives a wound. If you roll a 2-14, nothing happens. If you roll a 15 or higher, the adjacent figure receives a wound. The figure carrying this Glyph is not affected by Aura of Sparks damage.

name: Beliazal
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, Beliazal may use Ram Charge. Move Beliazal in a straight line. If Beliazal moved at least 3 spaces with Ram Charge, add 1 to his attack value for each space between the figure or destructible object he attacks and Beliazal's original placement. If the defending figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed after Beliazal uses Ram Charge, you may knock the figure back by placing it on any space one space from its current location and not adjacent to Beliazal. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A figure moved by Ram Charge never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved by Ram Charge will receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: Common figures subtract 1 from the defense dice when attacked by Beliazal.

name: Black Canary
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Black Canary. One at a time, roll the 20-sided die for each figure. If you roll a 15 or higher, the figure receives 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Black Panther
ability_1_desc: If Black Panther rolls at least 3 skulls when attacking, he may attack again. He may continue attacking until he rolls fewer than 3 skulls.
ability_2_desc: When Black Panther rolls defense dice against a normal attack, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Black Panther may move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Black Panther
ability_1_desc: Instead of Black Panther's normal move, he may move 1 space up to 25 levels higher or lower, and will not take passing swipes.
ability_2_desc: Robots and Destructible Objects roll one fewer defense die against Black Panther.
ability_3_desc: When Black Panther defends against a normal attack, each shield rolled counts for an additional block.

name: Bellatrix Severa
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, before taking a turn with Bellatrix Severa you may either take a turn with any Archer Squad you control, or move all Archer Squad figures you control up to 2 spaces each. A figure activated with Archer's Command must be within 4 clear sight spaces of Bellatrix Severa at the start of its move, and will take any leaving engagement attacks when moving if it is engaged. Wild figures are not affected by Archer's Command.
ability_2_desc: All Archer Squad figures you control also have the class of Soldier for all special powers on any Army Card or glyph.
ability_3_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on Bellatrix Severa, you may add 3 to your initiative roll.

name: Black Canary
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose up to 3 different small or medium figures within 4 clear sight spaces of Black Canary. Roll the 20-sided die once. Subtract 2 from the roll if you chose 2 figures. Subtract 3 from the roll if you chose 3 figures. If you roll an 11 or higher, inflict a wound on all chosen figures.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Black Harts
ability_1_desc: Any or all Black Harts may add 3 to their Move number as long as they are unengaged prior to moving. Black Harts must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium figure defends against an attack from a Black Hart that was not adjacent to it at the start of the turn, it must subtract 1 from its defense for every other Black Hart figure that it is engaged with, up to a maximum of 3 fewer defense dice.

name: Ringwraith - Mounted
ability_1_desc: You may have no more than 9 Nazgul in your Army.
ability_2_desc: ALL figures within 2 clear sight spaces of a Black Rider subtract 1 from their attack.
ability_3_desc: After attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to the attacking Ringwraith. If you roll an 18 or higher, that figure receives one wound. Nazgul and Undead are not affected by Black Breath.

name: Blackroot Recruits
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Blackroot Recruits, you can take a turn with any einar hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When a Recruit is adjacent to an Einar Hero you control, any adjacent attack made gains one automatic skull.

name: BILIDE
ability_1_desc: Whenever Bilide wounds a figure with an attack, or whenever Bilide is wounded by a normal attack, immediately roll an attack die for every figure adjacent to the wounded figure. If you roll a skull, the adjacent figure receives a wound. Soulborgs and Hellectic cannot be wounded by Toxic Biology.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of Bilide, and its base is no more than 3 levels above Bilide's height or 3 levels below its base, Bilide may add 1 to its Range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: If there are more than 2 Order Markers on this Army Card, then at the end of the round, place one wound marker on this Army Card for every additional Order Marker on this card.

name: Birnamwood Guards
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, a Birnamwood Guard always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When a figure moves normally out of engagement with a Birnamwood Guard, count that hex as 1 additional space. When an opponent's figure moves through a Birnamwood Guard, that figure takes one wound.
ability_3_desc: After a figure you control who follows Ullar rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may choose a Birnamwood Guard you control who is not the defender and move it up to 3 spaces. When moving with Ullar's Guard, a Birnamwood Guard will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Blackhorn
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. In addition to attacking normally, Blackhorn may attack with Gore Special attack. When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by Gore Special Attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may place that figure on any empty space adjacent to Blackhorn. A figure moved by Gore Special Attack never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-FLYING figure moved by to a lower evalation by Gore Special Attack can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: Black Slaad Stalker
ability_1_desc: When you reveal an order marker on a Black Slaad Stalker, before taking a turn with it, you may first take a turn with any common Slaad squad or hero you control. If you take a turn with a common Slaad squad or hero using Slaad Hierarchy, reduce Black Slaad Stalker's movement by 3 this turn.
ability_2_desc: If a Black Slaad Stalker rolls defense dice against a normal or special attack and does not receive a wound, you may immediately place it on an unoccupied space within 3 clear sight spaces. Figures moved by Chaos Shift do not take disengagement attacks.

name: Blade Demon
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with this Blade Demon, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1–10, it may attack normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, instead of attacking normally, it must attack each figure adjacent to it, if possible. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: Blackgaard Agent
ability_1_desc: If this Blackgaard Agent is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 1 dice to his attack.
ability_2_desc: This Blackgaard Agent can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: This Blackgaard Agent starts each game with up to 2 shadow tiles on his Army Card. If this Blackgaard Agent ends his turn on an empty land space, you may place a shadow tile from his Army Card onto the space he occupies if the shadow tile fits normally onto that space.

name: Blan Tur'ken
ability_1_desc:
After moving and before attacking, you may roll the 20-sided die. Add the number of Goblins you control adjacent to Blan Tur'ken to your die roll.

• If you roll 1–4, nothing happens.

• If you roll 5–11, you may place 2 Goblins you control adjacent to other Goblins you control.

• If you roll 12–17, you may place up to 3 Goblins you control adjacent to other Goblins you control.

• If you roll 18–20, you may place up to 4 Goblins you control adjacent to other Goblins you control.

If the dispersed Goblins are engaged, they will not take any leaving engagement attacks. Blan Tur'ken cannot disperse a Goblin that is already adjacent to another Goblin you control.

name: Black Widow Yelena Belova
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. After attacking normally, Black Widow may attack with Widow's Bite Special Attack. Figures roll 2 fewer dice when defending against Widow's Bite Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice for Black Widow, or any friendly Agent adjacent to her, any die result that is not a skull counts as a shield.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Black Widow may Swing Line with a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line, ignore elevations. She may swing over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles. She may swing 30 levels up or down in a single swing. If she is engaged when she starts to swing, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: BATMOBILE
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: BOFUR
ability_1_desc: Anytime you roll the 20-sided die for a Hero you control, you may add or subtract 1 to your die roll.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Miners adjacent to Bofur with a range of 1 add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: Blind Servant
ability_1_desc: When an Undead Queen you control receives one or more wounds from an opposing figure's normal or special attack but is not destroyed, you may place one Blind Servant on any empty space adjacent to your Undead Queen. If the Blind Servant is engaged, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Blind Servant, you may move 2 Crypt Guards that you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_3_desc: A Blind Servant cannot be destroyed by Sudema's Stare of Stone.

name: BOL
ability_1_desc: If a Unique Hero you control is destroyed, and there are unrevealed Order Markers on that Hero's card, move the unrevealed Order Markers on that card to Bol's card.
ability_2_desc: When Bol attacks large or huge figures, add 2 attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Bol is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Bol may add 2 to his height.

name: Blood Reaper
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Blood Reaper before taking a turn with Blood Reaper, you may roll the 20-sided die for each undead squad figure in play. If you roll a 18 or higher, place a previosly destroyed undead squad figure of the same unit on a same-level or lower space adjacent to that undead squad figure. An undead squad figure on a shadow space needs a 15 or higher to resurrect.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium figures you control who follow Utgar or Valkrill and are within 3 clear sight spaces of Blood Reaper add 1 to their normal attack dice when attacking a figure who follows Jandar. Blood Reaper's Evil Attack Aura does not affect Blood Reaper.

name: BOTHAN SPY
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 2. Use this power once per game. One at a time, do the following with each squad figure: Choose a figure to attack; no clear line of sight is needed. Any figures adjacent to target are also affected. Roll 2 attack dice for all affected figures.

name: BOL
ability_1_desc: If a Unique Hero you control is destroyed, and there are unrevealed Order Markers on that Hero's card, move the unrevealed Order Markers on that card to Bol's card.
ability_2_desc: When Bol attacks large or huge figures, add 2 attack dice.
ability_3_desc: Bol is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Bol may add 2 to his height.

name: Boneclaw Endeavor
ability_1_desc: For each wound marker on this Boneclaw Endeavor Army Card, add 1 to its range. If the attacking figure is a squad figure, then also add 1 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When this Boneclaw Endeavor is engaged to three or more figures, then roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 13 or higher you may attack all adjacent figure.

name: Blazing Skull
ability_1_desc: After revealing a numbered order marker on any army card you control, you may immediately remove 1 wound marker from this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After Blazing Skull attacks with a normal attack, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, Blazing Skull must attack again with a normal attack, if possible.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When attacking with this special attack, if you roll at least one blank, and the defending figure is not on a water space, the defending figure immediately receives one wound. Figures with Heat Resistance do not take damage from this special attack. Figures with Heat Weakness roll 1 fewer defense die when defending against this special attack.
ability_4_desc: Blazing Skull never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage and he does not have to stop in molten lava spaces.

name: BOK-BUR-NA
ability_1_desc: Small and Medium figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Bok-Bur-Na reduce their Defense Value by 1 when attacked by a Captain or Pirate you control.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Bok-Bur-Na, you may attack an adjacent figure 1 additional time. Bok-Bur-Na's Attack Value is increased by 2 for the second attack.
