ability_3_desc: When Bok-Bur-Na destroys an adjacent figure with a normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 14 or higher, remove one Wound Marker from Bok-Bur-Na. Bok-Bur-Na cannot use Ut'gar's Cutlass on destructible objects.

name: Boneclaw Impaler
ability_1_desc: When attacking with this Boneclaw Impaler, it receive 1 extra attack die for each wound marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 additional attack dice for Blood Frenzy.
ability_2_desc: When a small or medium adjacent figures, attack this Boneclaw Impaler, they will roll one less attack dice, unless they have a fearless personality.

name: Boromir
ability_1_desc: Whenever Boromir receives one or more wounds, you may choose a number of figures you control equal to the number of wounds received. Move those figures up to 5 spaces. The chosen figures must be within 12 spaces of Boromir prior to moving and will receive any leaving engagement attacks. A single figure can only be moved once by this power per turn.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Boromir rolls at least one shield, the most wounds he may take for this attack is one.

name: Bog Bullies
ability_1_desc: While a Bog Bully is on a water space, if he rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Instead of their normal move, any or all Bog Bullies may Frog Hop. Frog Hop has a move of 3. When counting spaces for a Bully's leaping movement, ignore elevations. A Bully may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. A Bully may not leap more than 10 levels up or down in a single leap. If a Bully is engaged when he starts to leap, he does take any leaving engagement attacks. After moving with Frog Hop a Bully move roll one additional attack die.

name: Braetian Honor Guard
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, choose a personality. Braetian Honor Guard figures roll an additional die when attacking or defending against figures with that personality.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Braetian Honor Guard Army Card and taking a turn with the Braetian Honor Guard, you may take an additional turn with the Braetian Honor Guard.

name: Bounty Hunters of Arctorus
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game, choose an opponent's Unique Hero as the Target of these Bounty Hunters of Arctorus. When making a normal attack on their chosen Target, a Bounty Hunter of Arctorus adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: After their chosen Target takes a turn, you may move all Bounty Hunters of Arctorus you control up to 3 spaces. When moving with Stalking Prey, a Bounty Hunter never takes leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn, you may choose a Bounty Hunter of Arctorus you control. When that figure makes a normal attack on their chosen Target this turn, it may add 1 automatic skull for each previously destroyed Bounty Hunter of Arctorus in your army.

name: Bleakwood's Grapple Gun
ability_1_desc: Instead of this figure's normal move, it may move only one space. This space may be up to 25 levels higher. When using the Grapple Gun, all engagement rules still apply.

name: Brawler 237
ability_1_desc: When Brawler 237 is destroyed, do not remove him from the battlefield until the end of the round. Brawler 237 is considered in play and may still move and attack while Overdriving.
ability_2_desc: When Brawler 237 attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When Brawler 237 rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Brantiscke the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with Brantiscke, you may choose one opponent's figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Brantiscke. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, place the chosen figure on an empty same-level space adjacent to Brantiscke. If the chosen figure is engaged when it is moved by Siren Song, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Brantiscke the Kyrie Warrior's movement, ignore elevations. Brantiscke the Kyrie Warrior may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Brantiscke the Kyrie Warrior starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: BRAINIAC
ability_1_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on this card, you may add or subtract 8 from your initiative roll.
ability_2_desc: Range 8. Attack 7. After attacking normally, Brainiac may attack with Orbital Strike Special Attack. An engaged Brainiac may target and attack non-adjacent figures with Orbital Strike Special Attack. Figures never have height advantage when defending against Orbital Strike Special Attack.
ability_3_desc: When Brainiac is destroyed, you may place his figure on any Robot or Soulborg Unique Hero card. If it is an opponent's card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 16 or higher, take control of that card and remove any order markers on it. While Brainiac's figure is on an Army Card, that card is Brainiac and has the Advanced Intellect and Orbital Strike Special Attack special powers.

name: Brothers Tor
ability_1_desc: Neither Brother takes disengagement attacks from figures adjacent to the other Brother.
ability_2_desc: If the Brothers Tor are not adjacent and are both attacking the same figure, the figure may not roll defense dice against the second Brother.
ability_3_desc: For each wound a Brother takes, place a wound marker on this card. When this card contains three or more wound markers, both Brothers are destroyed.

name: Bullseye
ability_1_desc: Bullseye adds one skull when attacking non-adjacent figures.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving and attacking, choose a non-adjacent figure within 10 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 7-18, that figure receives one wound. If you roll 19+, destroy that figure.

name: BRUTUS
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round in which you won initiative, after all order markers have been placed, you may move Brutus and all Ogre Thugs you control up to 3 spaces each. They must end their Ogre Battle Charge movement on an empty space. Figures moved by Ogre Battle Charge will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Brutus always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Bleeder Spear
ability_1_desc: This figure cannot drop this Bleeder Spear during its movement. After taking a turn with this figure, you must roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 1-16, this figure receives one wound. If you roll a 17 or higher, this figure is safe and immediately drops this Bleeder Spear.

name: Bulwark
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game choose a small or medium Unique Hero for Bulwark to guard. When this figure rolls defense dice, if Bulwark is adjacent then he will receive any wounds from the attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Bulwark always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Bullywug Thugs
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Bullywug Thugs, you can take a turn with any Bullywug Unique Hero or Slaad Unique Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: While a Bullywug Thug is on a water space, add 1 to its Defense. A Bullywug Thug does not have to stop its movement when entering a water space.

name: Buccaneers of the Endless Sea
ability_1_desc: When a Buccaneer of the Endless Sea attacks a figure that does not have any unrevealed Order Markers on its Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure), you may roll one additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Instead of their normal move, any or all Buccaneers of the Endless Sea may use Telekinetic Charge as long as they are unengaged prior to moving. To Telekinetic Charge, choose a friendly Gith figure that is engaged and within 8 clear sight spaces of the Charging Buccaneer. Place the Charging Buccaneer on any space adjacent to the chosen Gith figure.

name: Brutes of Droaam
ability_1_desc: When a Brutes of Droaam attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one Squad figure that is also adjacent to the Brutes of Droaam. If the defending figure recieves any wounds from the Brutes of Droaam's attack, the chosen figure recieves 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, if a Brutes of Droaam you control ends its movement unengaged, you may choose an engaged small or medium friendly Squad figure within 3 clear sight spaces of that Brutes of Droaam whose base is no more than 2 levels higher or lower than the base of that Brutes of Droaam. You may switch that Brutes of Droaam with the chosen Squad figure. Figures moved by Barge into Battle never take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: BULWARK
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game choose a small or medium Unique Hero who follows Vydar for Bulwark to guard. If Bulwark is adjacent to that figure when it takes one or more wounds from a normal attack, you may instead place all of those wound markers on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Bulwark always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: BUA GLUM
ability_1_desc: All Scouts you control can move an additional 2 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When Bua Glum is on a swamp water space, add 1 to his attack and defense.
ability_3_desc: If Bua Glum is targeted for attack roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, nothing happens. If you roll an 11-15, the figure targeting Bau Glum is choked out by Swamp Gas and unable to attack. If you roll 16 or higher, figure targeting Bau Glum is unable to attack and moves 5 spaces in a direction away from Bau Glum. If the targeting figure is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Buccaneers of Tortuga
ability_1_desc: When attacking a figure that does not have any unrevealed Order Markers on its Army Card (or cards if there is more than one Common Army Card for that figure), Buccaneers of Tortuga receive 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: If a Buccaneer of Tortuga you control is attacked by an opponent's figure that is not adjacent and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-14, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 15 or higher, that Buccaneer of Tortuga takes no damage and may immediately move up to 3 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Buccaneers of Tortuga are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: CHAIN-BLADE 14
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking with the Chain-Blade, choose a small or medium figure to attack and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher the chosen figure receives 1 wound and may roll no more than 1 die for Defense when attacked with the Chain-Blade this turn.

name: Supergirl
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack additional skull rolled until The defending defense normally.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense against a normal attack from a figure that is not a Kryptonian, if at least one shield is ro all blanks rolled count as extra sh
ability_3_desc: When u Supe if st

name: Huntress
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3+ When Huntress attacks a figure that is exactly two spaces away, add 2 attack dice to her Crossbow Special Attack. After attacking with Crossbow Special Attack, Huntress may attack with her Crossbow Special Attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If Huntress is not adjacent to any friendly figures and is engaged with at least one enemy figure, add 1 to her normal attack and subtract 1 from her defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, if Huntress is not destroyed by this attack, all skulls rolled count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Spoiler
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Sidekick Hero you control and taking a turn with that Sidekick, if Spoiler is within 6 clear sight spaces of that Sidekick, you may take an immediate turn with Spoiler. You may not take any additional turns with other figures you control.
ability_2_desc: If you win initiative, you may choose a Crime Lord or Criminal adjacent to Spoiler to receive a wound.
ability_3_desc: Instead of her normal move, Spoiler may use her Bat-Grapple. Bat-Grapple has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Bat-Grapple, ignore elevations. Spoiler may grapple over water without stopping, grapple over figures without becoming engaged, and grapple over obstacles such as ruins. Spoiler may not grapple more than 30 levels up or down in a single grapple. When Spoiler starts her Bat-Grapple, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Agent Nora
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. Choose 6 spaces in a straight line from Agent Nora. Choose one figure within clear line of sight on those spaces to attack with Bullet Storm Special Attack. When using Bullet Storm Special Attack, Agent Nora may attack up to 6 times, but must choose a different 6 spaces in a straight line each time.
ability_2_desc: Agent Nora can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Arashara Goshiri
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose two small or medium figures on land spaces within 4 clear sight spaces of Arashara Goshiri and within 4 spaces of each other. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, you may switch the two chosen figures. Figures moved by Shifting Sands never take leaving engagement attacks. Arashara Goshiri may be moved by Shifting Sands.

name: Achillean Gladiatrix
ability_1_desc: When an Achillean Gladiatrix attacks an adjacent figure, you may choose one small or medium figure that is adjacent to the defending figure but is not adjacent to that Achillean Gladiatrix. If the defending figure is destroyed by that Achillean Gladiatrix's attack, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking with an Achillean Gladiatrix, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, add 3 to that Achillean Gladiatrix's Range value for the duration of her turn.

name: Bahadur
ability_1_desc: Small Squad figures attacked by Bahadur subtract 2 from their defense dice. Medium Squad figures attacked by Bahadur subtract 1 from their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When Bahadur is destroyed, place this figure on any Unique Army Card with a Range of 1. Bahadur's Spirit adds 1 to the normal Attack number on that card.

name: Plastic Man
ability_1_desc: Friendly figures do not take leaving engagement attacks from opponents' figures that are engaged with Plastic Man.
ability_2_desc: After rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent enemy figure, you may choose a figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Plastic Man. All excess shields rolled count as unblockable hits on the chosen figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Plastic Man's movement, ignore elevations. Plastic Man may Bounce-n-Stretch over water without stopping, Bounce-n-Stretch over figures without becoming engaged, and Bounce-n-Stretch over obstacles such as ruins. When Plastic Man starts to Bounce-n-Stretch, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks. After moving, If Plastic Man does not attack this turn, he may Bounce-n-Stretch 4 additional spaces.

name: Swamp Thing
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving and attacking, you may place Swamp Thing on an empty space up to 8 spaces away. Swamp Thing can only use The Green if he is placed adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece, or on a grass, swamp, or swamp water space. If Swamp Thing is engaged when using The Green, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks. After using The Green, you may remove 1 Wound Marker from this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When Swamp Thing is on a swamp or swamp water space, add one die to his Attack and Defense.
ability_3_desc: When Swamp Thing attacks, roll one fewer attack die for each Wound Marker on this card.

name: Wonder Woman
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, if Wonder Woman was not engaged prior to moving, you may choose an opponent's non-adjacent small or medium figure within 4 clear sight spaces whose base is no more than 10 levels above Wonder Woman's height or 10 levels below Wonder Woman's base. Place the chosen figure on an empty space adjacent to Wonder Woman. The chosen figure does not receive any leaving engagement attacks. The chosen figure cannot use any Special Powers on its Army Card until it is no longer engaged with Wonder Woman or another opponent's figure moves into engagement with Wonder Woman.
ability_2_desc: If Wonder Woman rolls a skull against a figure leaving an engagement with her, that figure may not leave the engagement with Wonder Woman this turn.
ability_3_desc: When Wonder Woman rolls defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Banshees of Durgeth Swamp
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with the Banshees of Durgeth Swamp, you may destroy one Common figure within 3 clear sight spaces of at least two Banshees of Durgeth Swamp you control.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for a Banshee of Durgeth Swamp's movement, ignore elevations. A Banshee may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Banshee is engaged when it starts to fly, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Avernus
ability_1_desc: Before moving normally with Avernus, and each time Avernus moves onto a space during normal movement, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to Avernus. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by Wave of Flame. Avernus cannot roll for Wave of Flame against the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: Avernus never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop in molten lava spaces.
ability_3_desc: Avernus can never roll defense dice while it is on a water space.

name: Poison Ivy
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figure moves onto or over a grass or swamp space within 2 spaces of Poison Ivy, or moves onto or over a space adjacent to an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece that is within 2 spaces of Poison Ivy, that figure must end its move there. Figures can never move through or over any figure affected by Entangling Vines.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, you may choose a Unique Hero figure within 2 spaces of Poison Ivy. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 17 or higher, take control of the chosen figure and that figure's Army Card and remove any Order Markers on that Army Card. If Poison Ivy is destroyed, control of all Pheromone Seduced Hero figures returns to the players who controlled the Hero figures before they became Pheromone Seduced.
ability_3_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, roll the 20-sided die for all opponent's figures within two spaces of an Evergreen Tree or Jungle Piece that is within 6 spaces of Poison Ivy, one at a time. If you roll 12 or higher, the figure receives 1 wound.

name: Bugbear Basher
ability_1_desc: If this Bugbear Basher did not move this turn, add 2 to his Attack.
ability_2_desc: If this Bugbear Basher is attacked with a normal attack by an opponent's figure and receives 1 or more wounds, you may destroy a small Goblin figure you control that is adjacent to this Bugbear Basher to ignore any wounds this Bugbear Basher just received.
ability_3_desc: All friendly Goblin figures adjacent to this Bugbear Basher roll an additional attack die when attacking an adjacent figure.

name: Beorn Boltcutter
ability_1_desc: Destructible objects and opponents' Soulborg figures subtract 2 from their defense dice when adjacent to Beorn Boltcutter.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 Upgrade Markers on this card. Instead of attacking, you may choose a friendly Unique Soulborg Hero adjacent to Beorn Boltcutter that does not have an Upgrade Marker on its Army Card. Place an Upgrade Marker from this card on the chosen hero's Army Card. For the duration of the game, that Soulborg adds 1 to its Move and Attack numbers as long as that Upgrade Marker is on its Army Card. If that Soulborg defends against a normal attack and no excess shields are rolled, remove the Upgrade Marker from its Army Card.

name: Calibrax the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When Calibrax attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Each time Calibrax destroys an adjacent figure which is not a destructible object, you may choose a wounded Hero figure you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Calibrax. Remove one wound marker from the chosen Hero's Army Card. Calibrax cannot remove wound markers from his own card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Calibrax's movement, ignore elevations. Calibrax may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Calibrax starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Deathstrike Thrall
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-5, you may take a turn with 1 Thrall you control. If you roll a 6-15, you may take a turn with up to 2 Thralls you control. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take a turn with up to 3 Thralls you control.
ability_2_title: Return to the Grave Special Attack
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. After attacking with Return to the Grave Special Attack, destroy the attacking Deathstrike Thrall.

name: Augamo
ability_1_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by a normal or special attack from Augamo, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 6 or higher, you may Ram the figure. The player who controls the Rammed figure must place that figure, if possible, on an empty space within 2 spaces of its current location, within clear sight of Augamo but not adjacent to him. The space must be on the same level as or lower than its current location. A Rammed figure never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Ramming can receive any falling damage that may apply.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Instead of moving and attacking normally with Augamo, you may move Augamo up to 4 spaces. Augamo can attack up to 2 times with Headlong Charge Special Attack at any point before, during, or after this move as long as Augamo is on a space where he could end his movement.
ability_3_desc: Augamo rolls 3 additional defense dice when defending against a special attack.

name: Command Courier
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with a Command Courier, if that Command Courier did not attack, you may choose an adjacent small or medium Unique Hero you control that follows Vydar and take a turn with that Hero.
ability_2_desc: If a Command Courier is attacked with a normal attack by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll 1 10, roll defense dice normally. If you roll an 11 or higher, that Command Courier takes no damage and instead may move up to 4 spaces. A figure moving with Fleet Footed never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A Command Courier can use Fleet Footed only if he ends his move not adjacent to any enemy figures.

name: AXENTIA
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die for Axentia and then once for each figure adjacent to Axentia. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by Immolation.
ability_2_desc: When Axentia would be destroyed, do not destroy Axentia. If it is Axentia's turn, her turn ends immediately. Before the next Order Marker is revealed by any player, remove all wound markers from this Army Card and roll the 20-sided die for all figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Axentia, one at a time. If you roll a 7 or higher, the figure receives a wound. After using Phoenix Rising, negate all powers on this card except Flying for the rest of the game.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Axentia's movement, ignore elevations. Axentia may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Axentia starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Garrett Burns
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Lawman, Garrett Burns rolls 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: When Garrett Burns is targeted for a normal attack from an opponent's non-adjacent figure within 7 clear sight spaces of Garrett Burns, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the opponent's figure receives 1 wound.

name: Durgeth Ravagers
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Durgeth Ravagers' Army Card and taking a turn with the Durgeth Ravagers, if the Durgeth Ravagers destroyed at least one opponent's figure this turn, you may immediately take a turn with one Savage Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Durgeth Ravager is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If that Durgeth Ravager is on a swamp space, add 3 to your die roll. If he is on a swamp water space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll 1-15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would be inflicted by the attack.

name: Gen. Simon Fraser
ability_1_desc: If at least one Order Marker is on Gen. Simon Fraser, you may add 3 to your initiative roll.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Soldiers who start their turn within 6 clear sight spaces of Gen. Simon Fraser may add 2 to their Move number as long as they are unengaged prior to moving. Figures must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Prepare the Charge.

name: Eilan Sidhe
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Eilan Sidhe, all Eilan Sidhe you control adjacent to a tree or bush may use Through the Green. To use Through the Green, place the Eilan Sidhe on any unoccupied space adjacent to any tree or bush within 4 clear sight spaces of that Eilan Sidhe. If an Eilan Sidhe is engaged when it uses Through the Green, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: You may attack with any 2 Eilan Sidhe you control, even Eilan Sidhe that did not move this turn.
ability_3_desc: When an Eilan Sidhe rolls defense dice while adjacent to a tree or bush, one shield will block all damage.

name: Elaria the Pale
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's Squad figure moves adjacent to Elaria the Pale and onto a space where that Squad figure can end its movement, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, Elaria the Pale may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Elaria the Pale will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Slippery. Elaria the Pale can use this power only if she ends her Slippery move not adjacent to any enemy figures. You may not roll for Slippery more than once during any turn.
ability_2_desc: After a tricky figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Elaria the Pale rolls the 20-sided die for a special power on its Army Card, you may add 1 to your die roll. Queen of Thieves does not affect Elaria the Pale.

name: Bucky and Balin
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Bucky and Balin, if the defending figure is engaged with both Bucky and Balin, subtract 3 from its defense dice.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on Bucky and Balin's Army Card, before taking a turn with Bucky and Balin, you may first take a turn with any Dwarf Warlord you control.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Bucky and Balin always add 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Father Caylus
ability_1_desc: Start the game with one Enfeeblement Marker on this card. After moving and before attacking, you may place your Enfeeblement Marker on the Army Card of a Unique Hero within 4 clear sight spaces of Father Caylus. For the remainder of the round, that Unique Hero subtracts 1 from its Move and Attack values and cannot attack with any special attack. At the end of the round, return your Enfeeblement Marker to this card.
ability_2_desc: If there is a revealed Order Marker on Father Caylus, all Clerics you control that start their turn within 4 clear sight spaces of Father Caylus may add 2 to their Move value and add 1 to their Attack value. This power does not affect Father Caylus.

name: Bronn
ability_1_desc: When Bronn wounds a figure with his normal attack, he must attack one additional time, if possible.
ability_2_desc: Bronn may add 3 to his Move number as long as he is unengaged prior to moving. Bronn must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.
ability_3_desc: If Jaimie Lannister takes enough wounds to be destroyed within 5 spaces of Bronn, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 11 or higher, Jaimie Lannister takes no damage, and moves adjacent to Bronn, and receives no Leaving Engagement Attacks.

name: Grigor & Rogirg
ability_1_desc: At the start of Grigor & Rogirg's turn, if there are 3 or fewer wound markers on this Army Card, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or lower, Grigor & Rogirg cannot attack if they move this turn.
ability_2_title: Two Heads Are Better Than One
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Grigor & Rogirg, if there are 3 or fewer wound markers on this Army Card, they may attack one additional time.

name: Gem of Lava Resistance
ability_1_desc: Lava Resistant

name: Josie Whistlestop
ability_1_desc: When Josie Whistlestop attacks, she may attack up to 2 additional times. Subtract 1 from Josie's Attack value on her second attack and subtract 2 from her Attack value on her third attack.

name: Haduc
ability_1_desc: When Haduc, or any Elf Wizard you control adjacent to Haduc, rolls defense dice, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled for each revealed order marker on Haduc's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Any time you roll the 20-sided die for an Elf Army Card, you may add 1 to your die roll.

name: Goblin Slashers
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Goblin Slashers, you may move 3 engaged Goblin Slashers you control up to 3 spaces each. A Goblin Slasher never takes leaving engagement attacks when moving with Goblin Retreat and can only move if it ends its retreating move not adjacent to any enemy figures.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Goblin Slashers, if no Goblin Slashers you control are engaged, you may take a turn with a Goblin Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Goblin Slashers may add 2 to their height.

name: Glyph of Lorja Ivor
ability_1_desc: Range +1

name: Himmelskralle
ability_1_desc: After attacking with Himmelskralle, if she destroyed a figure with her normal attack, Himmelskralle may move up to 3 spaces and attack again. Himmelskralle may continue using Onslaught until she does not destroy a figure.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Himmelskralle's movement, ignore elevations. Himmelskralle may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Himmelskralle starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hrognak
ability_1_desc: If an Orc figure you control begins its turn within 2 clear sight spaces of Hrognak, it may move 1 additional space. Hrognak's Orc Movement Aura does not affect Hrognak.
ability_2_desc: Hrognak rolls 3 additional attack dice when attacking any figure that was at least 3 clear sight spaces away from Hrognak at the start of his turn.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. After attacking normally, Hrognak may attack with Howdah Archer Special Attack. Hrognak may target and attack non-adjacent figures with Howdah Archer Special Attack while engaged.

name: Makwa Tribesman
ability_1_desc: After this Makwa Tribesman attacks, he may attack one additional time. The additional attack must target a figure that is within 3 clear sight spaces of a Hunter you control.
ability_2_desc: When this Makwa Tribesman receives one or more wounds, before removing the figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, ignore any wounds.

name: Marro Gnids
ability_1_desc: If a Marro Gnid inflicts one or more wounds on an opponent's Unique Hero, you may place that Marro Gnid on the affected figure's card. Subtract 1 from that Hero's Move and Defense values for each Marro Gnid on the figure's card. A maximum of 3 Marro Gnids can be placed on any Hero's card.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Marro Gnids may add 1 to their height.

name: Manauvi
ability_1_desc: Manauvi may add 3 to his Move number as long as he is unengaged prior to moving. Manauvi must be able to move adjacent to an opponent's figure in order to use Charging Assault.
ability_2_desc: After attacking with Manauvi, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may attack again with Manauvi.
ability_3_desc: When Manauvi is destroyed, place this figure on a Unique Army Card with a Range of 1. Manauvi's Spirit adds 2 to the Move number of that card.

name: Glyph of Frosa (Freeze)
ability_1_desc: All water spaces are considered normal ice spaces while standing on the Glyph of Frosa. Figures do not have to stop their movement on normal ice spaces.

name: Locksley
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving normally, you may choose a Treasure Glyph carried by a Hero adjacent to Locksley. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1–6, Locksley's movement ends. If you roll 7 or higher, place the Treasure Glyph on this Army Card and you may continue Locksley's movement. Locksley must be on a space where he can end his movement each time he uses this power.
ability_2_desc: Any Treasure Glyphs on this Army Card that are not Ancient Artifact Treasure Glyphs are treated as being on the Army Cards of all friendly Common Heroes within 3 clear sight spaces.
ability_3_desc: Locksley is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Microcorp Troopers
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Up to one Microcorp Trooper that was activated but did not move or attack normally this turn may attack with Heavy Weapon Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Figures attacking a Microcorp Trooper never have height advantage.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Patrick Ferguson
ability_1_desc: Patrick Ferguson cannot attack unengaged Unique figures that do not have any Order Markers on their Army Cards.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Patrick Ferguson, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Morgan's Riflemen
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Morgan's Riflemen, if none of the Morgan's Riflemen moved this turn, you may move each Morgan's Riflemen figure you control up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: If every Army Card you control has a valiant personality, each Morgan's Rifleman receives 1 additional defense die.

name: Nottingham Brigand
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a Nottingham Brigand Army Card, before taking that Nottingham Brigand's turn, you may take a turn with one other Rogue Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: A Nottingham Brigand is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Otar
ability_1_desc: When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by an attack from Otar, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, you may Toss the figure by placing it on any empty space adjacent to Otar. The space must be on the same level as Otar. A figure moved by Gore and Toss never takes any leaving engagement attacks

name: Millerson
ability_1_desc: When a Rogue you control who is adjacent to Millerson is attacked by an opponent's figure that is not adjacent to that Rogue and receives one or more wounds from that attack, you may place the same number of wound markers on this Army Card to ignore any wounds that Rogue just received.
ability_2_desc: When Millerson attacks, he may attack one additional time for every two wound markers on this Army Card.

name: Sentinels of Grax
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may, if possible, place one of your previously destroyed Sentinels of Grax on an empty space adjacent to a Sentinel of Grax you control.
ability_2_desc: Sentinels of Grax do not take falling damage and may ignore all effects from terrain tiles they move onto or occupy.

name: Glyph of Searing Amulet
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure adjacent to this figure. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure receives 1 wound. Figures with the Lava Resistant special power are not affected by the Glyph of Searing Amulet.

name: Mellifera
ability_1_desc: After a Common Insect you control attacks a figure within 4 spaces of Mellifera with a normal or special attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, that Common Insect may attack again with a normal or special attack.
ability_2_desc: When Mellifera rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent to Mellifera, add 2 defense dice to Mellifera.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Mellifera's movement, ignore elevations. Mellifera may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Mellifera starts to fly, if she is engaged, she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Kursus
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 5. Choose a non-adjacent figure to attack that is not a destructible object and whose base is not higher or lower than 15 levels from Kursus' base. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Sonic Fists Special Attack. Kursus only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. After attacking, immediately place Kursus on a space one of the destroyed figures occupied, if possible. If Kursus did not destroy a figure or cannot be placed, destroy Kursus.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Kursus may use Bound. Bound has a move of 4. When counting spaces for Bound, ignore elevations. Kursus may bound over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and bound over obstacles such as ruins. Kursus may not bound more than 15 levels up or down in a single bound. If Kursus is engaged when he starts his Bound, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Skull Demon
ability_1_desc: Common figures attacking this Skull Demon with a normal attack subtract 1 from their attack dice.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to this Skull Demon with a range of 1 who follow Valkrill add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: Shieldsmiths of Granite Keep
ability_1_desc: If a Shieldsmith of Granite Keep begins his turn unengaged, add 2 to his Move value this turn. If he begins his turn engaged, add 2 to his Attack value this turn.
ability_2_desc: Shieldsmiths of Granite Keep cannot be moved by any special power on any opponent's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Shieldsmiths of Granite Keep may double their height.

name: Sir Orrick
ability_1_desc: Sir Orrick may add 1 to his Move number for each engaged Human you control who follows Jandar other than Sir Orrick, up to a maximum of +3 for A Brother's Call.
ability_2_desc: Sir Orrick rolls one additional die against each figure leaving an engagement with him.

name: Skull Demon
ability_1_desc: Common figures attacking this Skull Demon with a normal attack subtract 1 from their attack dice.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to this Skull Demon with a range of 1 who follow Valkrill add 1 die to their normal attack.

name: Master Lao Xin
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Master Lao Xin, instead of taking that turn with Master Xin, you may take a turn with one Monk hero you control and either another Monk hero or a Monk Squad you control. You may choose which one to activate first. Master Xin may be one of the chosen Monk Heroes. Any other figure that is taking a turn with Sifu must be within clear sight of Master Xin before moving.
ability_2_desc: When rolling attack dice for a normal attack, Master Xin always adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Master Xin may use Stealth Leap 25. Stealth Leap 25 has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Stealth Leap 25, ignore elevations. Master Xin may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Master Xin may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Master Xin is engaged when he starts his Stealth Leap 25, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Tomb Skeleton Archers
ability_1_desc: You may move up to 4 Tomb Skeleton Archers you control each turn. If more than 2 of the Tomb Skeleton Archers move this turn, no Tomb Skeleton Archers may attack. If none of the Tomb Skeleton Archers move this turn, you may attack with up to 4 Tomb Skeleton Archers you control.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a figure that is not engaged, a Tomb Skeleton Archer rolls 1 additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against an attack from a figure with a Range number of 4 or more that is not a Cleric or Wizard, a Tomb Skeleton Archer adds 1 die.

name: Glyph of Xipta
ability_1_desc: After placing Order Markers and before rolling initiative, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, choose an opponent who must, one at a time, remove two different Order Markers from Army Cards that opponent controls, and then may place them again. Each Order Marker must be placed on a different card (or cards if your opponent has more than one common card for that figure) than it was removed from, or else it cannot be placed again this round.

name: Varkaanan Swiftfangs
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Varkaanan Swiftfangs' card, before taking that turn with the Swiftfangs, you may choose one other Unique Wolf Army Card you control and take a turn with it. You may not attack with more figures from the chosen Army Card than the number of destroyed Varkaanan Swiftfangs on this card.
ability_2_desc: When Order Marker 1 is revealed on the Varkaanan Swiftfangs, add 2 to their Move number and 1 extra attack die for that turn.

name: Varkaanan Swiftfangs
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Varkaanan Swiftfangs' card, before taking that turn with the Swiftfangs, you may choose one other Unique Wolf Army Card you control and take a turn with it. You may not attack with more figures from the chosen Army Card than the number of destroyed Varkaanan Swiftfangs on this card.
ability_2_desc: When Order Marker 1 is revealed on the Varkaanan Swiftfangs, add 2 to their Move number and 1 extra attack die for that turn.

name: Quorik Warwitch
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 1, 2 or 3. Quorik Warwitch starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any non-adjacent figure within range and attack by rolling 1, 2 or 3 attack dice. Quorik Warwitch may keep making special attacks with 1, 2 or 3 attack dice until she has rolled all 6 attack dice. Quorik Warwitch may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: If Quorik Warwitch is attacked by an adjacent opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-9, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 10 or higher, Quorik Warwitch takes no damage and may immediately move up to 2 spaces. If Quorik Warwitch is engaged when she starts to flutter, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Quorik Warwitch's movement, ignore elevations. Quorik Warwitch may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Quorik Warwitch starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Varkaanan Greyspears
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Varkaanan Greyspears' card, before taking that turn with the Greyspears, you may choose one other Unique Wolf Army Card you control and take a turn with it. You may not attack with more figures from the chosen Army Card than the number of destroyed Varkaanan Greyspears on this card.
ability_2_desc: While moving, the Varkaanan Greyspears may add 2 to their Move number. If they do, the Varkaanan Greyspears cannot attack this turn.

name: Van Nessing
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When a Lycanthrope or Hybrid figure receives one or more wounds from Silver Bolts Special Attack, that figure receives one additional wound.
ability_2_desc: When revealing an order marker on Van Nessing's Army Card, after taking Van Nessing's turn, you may reveal an "X" order marker that is on Van Nessing's Army Card and take another turn with Van Nessing. During this additional turn, Van Nessing adds 2 to his normal attack against Undead figures.
ability_3_desc: When the 20-sided die is rolled for a special power on an opponent's Undead Army Card and at least one of the figures from that Army Card is within 3 clear sight spaces of Van Nessing, subtract 3 from the die roll.

name: Wildwood Runner
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, a Wildwood Runner may move one space. That space may be up to 4 levels higher.
ability_2_desc: At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, if you have not used a Vigorous Growth power this round, you may destroy one Wildwood Runner that was not placed this round and replace it with one of your previously destroyed medium Wildwood Heroes. Remove all wound markers from that Hero's Army Card.

name: Varkaanan Darkclaws
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Varkaanan Darkclaws' card, before taking that turn with the Darkclaws, you may choose one other Unique Wolf Army Card you control and take a turn with it. You may not attack with more figures from the chosen Army Card than the number of destroyed Varkaanan Darkclaws on this card.
ability_2_desc: When a Varkaanan Darkclaw attacks, he may attack one additional time. A Varkaanan Darkclaw cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_3_desc: A Varkaanan Darkclaw rolls 1 additional defense die while on a shadow space and 1 additional attack die when attacking a figure that is not a destructible object on at least one shadow space.

name: Varkaanan Darkclaws
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on the Varkaanan Darkclaws' card, before taking that turn with the Darkclaws, you may choose one other Unique Wolf Army Card you control and take a turn with it. You may not attack with more figures from the chosen Army Card than the number of destroyed Varkaanan Darkclaws on this card.
ability_2_desc: When a Varkaanan Darkclaw attacks, he may attack one additional time. A Varkaanan Darkclaw cannot attack the same figure more than once per turn.
ability_3_desc: A Varkaanan Darkclaw rolls 1 additional defense die while on a shadow space and 1 additional attack die when attacking a figure that is not a destructible object on at least one shadow space.

name: Wildwood Monarch
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, the Wildwood Monarch may move one space. That space may be up to 4 levels higher.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Wildwood Monarch, you may take a turn with a small or medium Wildwood Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: Wildwood figures you control cannot attack other Wildwood figures you control.
ability_4_desc: At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, if you have not placed the Wildwood Monarch or used a Seedling power this round, you may place one of your previously destroyed small Wildwood Heroes on any empty space adjacent to the Wildwood Monarch.

name: Wildwood Sentinel
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally, this Wildwood Sentinel may move one space. That space may be up to 4 levels higher.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Wildwood Sentinel, you may take a turn with a small Wildwood Hero you control.
ability_3_desc: At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, if you have not placed this Wildwood Sentinel or used a Verdant Growth power this round, you may destroy this Wildwood Sentinel and replace it with one of your previously destroyed large Wildwood Heroes. Remove all wound markers from that Hero's Army Card, then place wound markers on it equal to the number of wound markers on this card.

name: Yi Feng
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, if Yi Feng receives no wounds from the attack, the attacking figure receives one wound.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Yi Feng may use Stealth Leap 25. Stealth Leap 25 has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Stealth Leap 25, ignore elevations. Yi Feng may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Yi Feng may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Yi Feng is engaged when he starts his Stealth Leap 25, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Zhen Yuan
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's Samurai or Ashigaru, Zhen Yuan rolls 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking with Zhen Yuan, you may choose an opponent's adjacent figure to attack with Eagle Claw. If the chosen figure receives one or more wounds from Zhen Yuan but is not destroyed, Zhen Yuan may attack the chosen figure one additional time. For the second attack, the chosen figure subtracts 1 from its defense dice for each wound received on the first attack. You may not use Whirlwind Assault if you chose a figure for Eagle Claw this turn.
ability_3_desc: Zhen Yuan may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.

name: Captain America
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to both Captain America and the chosen figure are also affected by Shield Sweep Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Captain America add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.

name: Cannon Golem
ability_1_desc: Range Special Attack 6. If this Cannon Golem did not move this turn, you may use Cannon Fire Special Attack. Choose 7 spaces in a straight line from any unengaged Cannon Golem you control. The figure on those spaces who is closest to the attacking Cannon Golem, and all figures adjacent to that figure, are affected by Cannon Fire Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: This Cannon Golem does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces and add 2 to its movement when starting its turn on a water space. This Cannon Golem cannot use Cannon Fire Special Attack while standing on a water space.

name: CaBooSE
ability_1_desc: If Caboose loses sight of the enemy then he becomes distracted and decides to occupy himself by dancing. Expend all movement points to change his facing.
ability_2_desc: Caboose may go into a rage by thinking of bad things, like milk and kittens with spikes. Whenever more than one figure is adjacent to Caboose, he must attack all adjacent figures.
ability_3_desc: Range 3-6. Attack 5. If there are friendly figures in front of Caboose then roll a 20 sided-die. On a roll of 9 or higher, Caboose must attack the closest friendly figure.

name: Captain Boomerang
ability_1_desc: Captain Boomerang does not need a clear line of sight when attacking.
ability_2_desc: When Captain Boomerang attacks with a normal attack, he may attack one additional time. He must attack the same figure.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Captain Boomerang attacks with his Razorangs Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. He may not attack the same figure more than once.

name: Carrion Warriors
ability_1_desc: When a Carrion Warrior attacks a hero with one or more wounds on its card, or attacks a squad with one or more eliminated figures on its card(s), add 1 attack die.

name: Captain Cold
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure moves adjacent to Captain Cold, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, that figure's movement immediately ends and it cannot attack this turn. Figures can be affected by Freeze Defense only as they move into engagement with Captain Cold.
ability_2_desc: Figures roll 2 less defense dice when defending against Captain Cold.

name: Zettian Deathwings
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. A Zettian Deathwing that moved but did not attack normally may use Detonation Special Attack. Any figures adjacent to the attacking Zettian Deathwing are affected by Detonation Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice for all affected figures. Destroy the attacking Zettian Deathwing before each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When a Zettian Deathwing rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 2 defense dice to the defending Zettian Deathwing.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Zettian Deathwing's movement, ignore elevations. A Zettian Deathwing may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Zettian Deathwing starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_4_desc: After moving and attacking with Zettian Deathwings, each Zettian Deathwing you activate this turn may move up to 3 spaces.

name: Captain Edwin Morefew
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. Each skull rolled counts as one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Captain Morefew, you may first take a turn with one common Squad of Rogues or Pirates you control.
ability_3_desc: For every wound marker placed on Captain Morefew, add one additional attack die.

name: Z'Thoth, Mouth of the Abyss
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose a figure within 6 clear sight spaces of Z'Thoth and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, choose an opponent. That player must move the figure 1 space, if possible. If you roll an 11 or higher, you must move the chosen figure 1 space, if possible. Figures moved by Maddening Visage take any leaving engagement attacks that apply.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Z'Thoth does not need line of sight on the targeted figure. You may also choose one figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by Shatter Minds Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: Z'Thoth does not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: CARCASS MUTT
ability_1_desc: Whenever a figure is destroyed by an attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may move a Carcass Mutt you control up to 6 spaces. Figures moved by Scent Of Death must end their move on an empty space, and must begin and remain unengaged throughout their move. You may only roll for Scent Of Death once per turn.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Carcass Mutt may add 2 to its Height.

name: Catalan Mercenaries
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, before you place order markers, compare the number of remaining Catalan Mercenaries you control to the number of your previously destroyed Catalan Mercenaries. If there are at least as many destroyed figures as remaining figures, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-7, destroy all remaining Catalan Mercenaries you control.

name: CANDLEJACK
ability_1_desc: When Candlejack is targeted for an attack by any figure, you must roll the 20-sided die. Add 6 to your die roll if that figure is common. If you roll a 14 or higher, immediately place Candlejack on any space adjacent to that figure, then place that figure on Candlejack's army card if possible. Figures moved by this special power never take any leaving engagement attacks. A maximum of 6 figures may be placed on this card with this special power.
ability_2_desc: When Candlejack is destroyed, before removing Candlejack, you must immediately place all figures placed on this card with Don't Say His Name! on any empty spaces within 2 spaces of Candlejack. Any figures that you cannot place on the battlefield are immediately destroyed. This special power cannot be negated by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph.
ability_3_desc: All figures adjacent to Candlejack subtract 1 from their defense dice. Fearless figures are not affected by this special power.
ability_4_desc: Candlejack is never attacked when leaving an engagement and ignores all terrain effects.

name: Carnifex
ability_1_desc: At the end of each round, you may reveal an "X" Order Marker on Carnifex's Army Card to place an Anticipation Marker on this card. When attacking with Carnifex, roll an additional attack die for each Anticipation Marker on this card. A maximum of 4 Anticipation Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against an opponent's non-adjacent attacking figure with a Disciplined or Precise personality, each skull rolled by Carnifex counts as an unblockable hit inflicted by Carnifex on the attacking figure.

name: Captain M37
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Captain M37 may use this special attack 3 times in the same turn. M37 may target the same figure or a different figure with each attack.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Before attacking, choose a figure within 7 spaces. All special powers on that figure's Army Card are negated until the end of the turn. You must then target that figure for Homing Missile Special Attack, if possible. If a Guard or Scout figure you control is within 3 clear sight spaces of a figure, Captain M37 does not need line of sight to target that figure with Homing Missile Special Attack.

name: Carnivorous Plant
ability_1_desc: This Carnivorous Plant is consider a jungle bush as well as a figure for special powers.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this Army Card, you may take a turn with up to 2 Common Plant figures you control before taking a turn with this Carnivoroous Plant. Any figure that is taking a turn must be within 12 clear sight spaces of this Carnivorous Plant prior to its movement.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with this Carnivorous Plant, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 11 or higher, you may place any previously destroyed Common Plant figure from your army on an empty space adjacent to Carnivorous Plant.

name: Captain Atom
ability_1_desc: When placing wounds Captain Atom receives from a normal attack, a special attack, or a special power on another figure's army card, if there are fewer than 4 silver Energy Absorption Markers on this card, you may ignore one wound and instead place an Energy Absorption Marker on this card. Captain Atom receives one extra attack die for every 2 Energy Absorption Markers he has.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, if there at least 3 silver Energy Absorption markers on this card, Captain Atom may add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Captain Atom's movement, ignore elevations. Captain Atom may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Captain Atom starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Cave Troll Of Moria
ability_1_desc: When the Cave Troll attacks, you may add one extra attack die for each wound marker he has, up to an additional 3 attack dice.
ability_2_desc: When the Cave Troll attacks, he may attack one additional time.

name: Banshee
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Any figure that receives at least 1 wound from Sonic Shriek Special Attack cannot move or attack during the round in which the wound was received.
ability_2_desc: When defending against a non-adjacent attack, Banshee rolls 2 additional defense dice.

name: Hawkman
ability_1_desc: When Hawkman attacks, he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Hawkman starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Caravaggio the Lost
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, 4 unengaged dwarven squad members who end their movements within 2 hexes of Caravaggio may build a fortification on any 1 unoccupied non-start zone rock or grass hex. Fortification consists of up to 3 rock or grass hexes (which match underlying terrain) in a single stack adjacent to all 4 dwarven squad members. Fortification cannot be constructed on a hex that is more than 1 height higher or lower than the base of any of the 4 dwarves.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, up to 4 unengaged dwarven squad members who end their movements within 2 hexes of Caravaggio may each build a siegework. A siegework is a single non-start zone rock or grass hex (which matches underlying terrain) placed adjacent to or under the dwarf who is building it in an otherwise unoccupied hex. A siegework cannot be constructed on a hex that is more than 1 height higher or lower than the base of the dwarf. No dwarven squad member may attack this turn if even a single one builds a siegework.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Caravaggio may double his Height.

name: Celeborn, Lord Of Light
ability_1_desc: All Elves you control move one additional space.
ability_2_desc: When rolling for the Mirror Of Galadriel special power, you may add 2 to whatever is rolled.

name: Aquaman
ability_1_desc: Aquaman does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space. If Aquaman's entire move consists of water spaces, he may add 2 to his movement and does not take leaving engagement attacks. When Aquaman is on a water space, he rolls 1 additional defense die.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. If Aquaman is within 3 clear sight spaces of a water space, he may target up to 3 figures on an water space with his Marine Life Telepathy Special Attack. No clear line of sight is needed.
ability_3_desc: If Aquaman is not on a water space at the end of his turn, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 2 or less, place a wound marker on this card.

name: Ceallaigh
ability_1_desc: Before moving Ceallaigh, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure with a Valiant or Merciful personality adjacent to Ceallaigh. After you move Ceallaigh, place the chosen figure adjacent to Ceallaigh.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose a wounded hero figure adjacent to Ceallaigh. Remove 1 wound marker from the chosen figure's card.

name: Chargingbull
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose another figure adjacent to the targeted figure and Chargingbull to be affected by Cross Hack Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When taking a turn with Chargingbull without revealing an order marker on his army card, add 3 to Chargingbull's move value.

name: CHARLINA
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2 + Special When Charlina attacks with Fire Blast Strike Special Attack, add 1 to Charlina's attack dice for every additional elf wizard you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Charlina, up to a maximum of +3 dices.
ability_2_desc: For every figure with a "valiant" personality adjacent to Charlina, she may roll one additional defense dice.

name: Chainbonders of Burning Forge
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. A Chainbonder of Burningforge that moved but did not attack normally may use Chain Sweep Special Attack. To Chain Sweep, choose a small or medium figure to attack. You may also choose one small or medium figure adjacent to both the attacking Chainbonder and the targeted figure to be affected by the Chain Sweep Special Attack as well. Roll attack once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: A Chainbonder of Burning Forge rolls an additional die when attacking or defending against large or huge figures.

name: Batgirl
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose up to 2 figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Batgirl. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. When Batgirl attacks with the Bat-A-Rang Special Attack, she may attack 1 additional time. Batgirl may not use her Bat-A-Rang Special Attack while she is engaged.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Batgirl may use her Bat Grapple. Bat Grapple has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Bat Grapple, ignore elevations. Batgirl may grapple over water without stopping, grapple over figures without becoming engaged, and grapple over obstacles such as ruins. Batgirl may not Bat Grapple more than 30 levels up or down in a single grapple. If Batgirl is engaged when she starts to Bat Grapple, she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ciaphas Cain
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of each turn, you may move a small or medium figure you control that is within clear sight of Ciaphas Cain up to 4 spaces. That figure must end its movement adjacent to Ciaphas Cain. If that figure is engaged when it begins to move, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure or destructible object with Ciaphas Cain, all skulls rolled may be rerolled to count as unblockable hits.
ability_3_desc: When Ciaphas Cain rolls defense dice against an attack from an adjacent figure, he may count skulls instead of shields to block damage.

name: Omnicron Battery
ability_1_desc: Range 7, Lob 12, Attack 3. In stead of attacking normally, an unengaged Omnicron Battery may use Artillery Barrage Special Attack. You may use any friendly Soulborg that follows Jandar to determine a clear sight shot. After attacking an opponent's figure with Artillery Barrage Special Attack, you may move one precise common figure you control up to 5 spaces.
ability_2_desc: An Omnicron Battery may never roll for a leaving engagement attack against an opposing figure.

name: Cobra Harrier
ability_1_desc: Cobra Harrier may defend normally when being attacked for leaving an engagement.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Cobra Harrier, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with Cobra Harrier.
ability_3_desc: Cobra Harrier does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.
ability_4_desc: When rolling defense dice from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This includes leaving engagement attacks.

name: Churasumu, Battle Shaman
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Churasumu, you may reveal the "X" Order Marker on Churasumu to activate Battle Croak. Until you next reveal an Order Marker, all Anurian Figures you control within 6 spaces of Churasumu add 1 to their Attack and Defense values.
ability_2_desc: When an adjacent Common Anurian figure receives one or more wounds, you may roll the 20-sided die before removing that figure. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore all wounds.

name: Clockwork Titan
ability_1_desc: When Clockwork Titan attacks, it may attack 3 additional times. Reduce the number of additional times Clockwork Titan can attack by 1 for every 2 wound markers on its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 4+ Special Attack 4. Choose up to 3 figures to attack. You may also choose 3 spaces in a straight line from each of the targeted figures. All figures on those spaces are affected by Triple Laser Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Clockwork Titan cannot be affected by its own Triple Laser Special Attack. A single figure may be affected by Triple Laser Special Attack more than once. This attack can only be used once per game.

name: Batman
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Choose up to 2 figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Batman. Roll 3 attack dice for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. When Batman uses his Bat-A-Rang Special Attack, he may use it 1 additional time. Batman may not use Bat-Rang Special Attack while engaged.
ability_2_desc: If Batman is attacked with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 to the roll for every 2 spaces between Batman and the attacking figure. If you roll a 17 or higher, Batman takes no wounds and you may immediately take a turn with Batman.
ability_3_desc: Instead of a normal move, Batman may use his Bat Grapple. Bat Grapple has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Bat Grapple, ignore elevations. Batman may grapple over water without stopping, grapple over figures without becoming engaged, and grapple over obstacles such as ruins. Batman may not Bat Grapple more than 30 levels up or down in a single Bat Grapple. If Batman is engaged when he starts to Bat Grapple, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Col. Seth Bertram
ability_1_desc: Col. Seth Bertam starts the game with 2 blue Knife Markers on his Army Card. Add 1 to his attack for each Knife Marker on the Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. Before attacking with Knife Throw Special Attack, you must remove a blue Knife Marker from this Army Card. Choose a figure to attack. If that figure is Unique, then that figure rolls one less defense die. If that figure is Common, destroy that figure.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, Col. Seth Bertram always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Commissioner Gordon
ability_1_desc: All Lawmen you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Commissioner Gordon add 1 to their defense dice. Commissioner Gordon's Lawman Inspiration does not affect Commissioner Gordon.

name: Chewbacca
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose a Unique Hero you control. After taking a turn with the chosen figure, you may move Chewbacca up to 6 spaces as long as Chewbacca ends his movement adjacent to that figure. If the chosen figure would receive enough wounds to be destroyed and Chewbacca is adjacent to that figure, you must destroy Chewbacca instead. If the chosen figure is Han Solo, you may add 1 die to Han Solo's defense as long as he is adjacent to Chewbacca, and you may add 1 to Han Solo's Move number as long as he begins his turn adjacent to Chewbacca.
ability_2_desc: If Chewbacca attacks an adjacent Squad figure with a normal attack and fails to destroy it, he may attack one additional time. Chewbacca may not use Wookiee Rage to attack more than twice in a single turn.
ability_3_desc: Range 7. Attack 5. Chewbacca may not use his Bowcaster Special Attack if he moved this turn.

name: Commander Skvog
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving with Commander Skvog you may move with one ishehdulite squad you control. Instead of attacking with Commander Skvog you may attack with one ishehdulite squad you control. Any figures activated with Swamp Command must begin their action within clear sight of Commander Skvog.
ability_2_desc: All friendly ishehdulites and ishehdulogs adjacent to Commander Skvog receive an additional attack die when attacking with their normal attack.

name: Colossus
ability_1_desc: When defending with Colossus, each shield rolled counts for one additional block. Colossus never rolls for lava field damage, molten lava damage, falling damage, or extreme falling damage.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Colossus attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack Colossus.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Colossus. Place that figure adjacent to any opponent's figure within 5 clear sight spaces and no more than 15 levels above Colossus' base. Colossus may not use Fastball Special while engaged.

name: Conan
ability_1_desc: When Conan attacks an adjacent figure, he may add 2 additional attack dice. If he does, he cannot roll defense dice this turn.
ability_2_desc: Conan never takes leaving engagement strike wounds.

name: Comrade Skorpio
ability_1_desc: After attacking a small or medium figure with Comrade Skorpio, that figure cannot move or be moved by any special power on an Army Card or Glyph until the beginning of your next turn. If Comrade Skorpio is destroyed, Grip and Sting will no longer affect any figures.
ability_2_desc: All Communists you control, except Comrade Skorpio, roll one additional attack die when attacking a figure with a Point Value of 150 or more.

name: Colossus
ability_1_desc: If Colossus began his turn unengaged, add 2 to his Move value this turn. If he began his turn engaged, add 2 to his Attack value this turn.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Colossus. Place the chosen figure on any empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of Colossus. If the chosen figure is placed adjacent to one or more opponent's figures, the chosen figure may make a single normal attack.
ability_3_desc: If a friendly figure adjacent to Colossus is targeted by a non-adjacent normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-11, the figure is attacked as normal. If you roll a 12 or higher, the attack targets Colossus instead.

name: Luke Cage
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a figure without Super Strength, Luke Cage always adds two automatic shields to whatever is rolled. Luke Cage never takes damage from leaving engagement attacks from figures without Super Strength.
ability_2_desc: If an adjacent figure is attacked with a non-adjacent attack, Luke Cage may change the target to him.
ability_3_desc: Before moving Luke Cage, choose a friendly small or medium figure adjacent to him. After you move Luke Cage, place the chosen figure adjacent to Luke Cage. It never takes leaving engagement attacks.

name: Combustion Man
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game choose an opponent's figure to be Combustion Man's Bounty. For the rest of the game, before an opponent takes a turn with Combustion Man's Bounty, you may immediately move Combustion Man up to 2 spaces. Combustion Man may not end this movement with more minimum spaces between Combustion Man and Combustion Man's Bounty than when he started this movement and he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Range 7. Attack 2. Choose a figure or Destructible Object to attack. All figures adjacent to the chosen figure or Destructible Object are affected by Third Eye Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all figures. For each skull rolled, roll 1 additional attack die. Continue rolling an attack die for each skull rolled until no skulls are rolled. Roll defense dice for each affected figure or Destructible Object separately.
ability_3_desc: When Combustion Man is attacked by an opponent's figure that does not have the Elemental Defense special power, the most wounds Combustion Man can take from this attack is one.

name: Consul Dominicus
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Consul Dominicus, you may take a turn with a squad of Roman Archers you control.
ability_2_desc: After moving and instead of attacking, you may choose any unique figure adjacent to Consul Dominicus. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-18 nothing happens. If you roll a 19 or higher, take control of the chosen figure, and that figure's Army Card. You now control that Army Card and all figures on it. Remove any Order Markers on that card. If Consul Dominicus is destroyed, remove all Order Markers from all recruited Army Cards and return control of them to the Opponent from which you received them.

name: CONANDUS
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack Special. Roll 1 Aquilla Valkyrie dice for each friendly figure that follow Aquilla that is within 8 clear sight spaces of Conandus. The number of symbols rolled will be the number of attack dices that you will roll for this Inspired Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Aquilla figures within 4 clear spaces of Conandus, add one die when attacking or defending against an adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: Every time an adjacent figure who follow Aquilla, roll the 20-sided die, add 2 to whatever is rolled.

name: Crypt Guards
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Crypt Guards, you may take a turn with any Undead Queen you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling for Sudema's Stare of Stone against a figure adjacent to one or more Crypt Guards, you may add 2 to your die roll.

name: The Controller
ability_1_desc: At any point in his Move, the Controller may attach a Slave Disc to an adjacent target by rolling a single die. If a Skull is rolled, place a Disc on the target's army card. At the start of each round, place 1 Power marker on this card for each Disc in play. Only 1 Disc may be attached to any figure at a time.
ability_2_desc: Each Power marker removed from this card may be used by the Controller to add 1 die to his Attack or Defense, or 1 hex of Range, or 1 point of Movement.
ability_3_desc: Instead of an attack, roll d20. >=15 take a turn with 1 figure that has a Disc on it's card. Add 1 to the dr for each Power marker removed from this card.

name: Crone Queen
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 1 + Special. You may choose to attack 3 times the same figure or you may attack 3 different figures one time.
ability_2_desc: When the Crone Queen stops in a water space, place an ice space on top of the water space. This new ice space will be considered a Slippery Ice.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Couatl, The Plumed One
ability_1_desc: After attacking, choose one: * Attack an additional time, choosing an adjacent figure who follows Utgar or Valkril to attack; or * Take an immediate turn with an adjacent figure who follows Aquilla or Ullar.
ability_2_desc: Each time Couatl, the Plumed One receives 1 or more wounds, you may remove 1 wound from the Army Card of an adjacent figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Couatl, the Plumed One's movement, ignore elevations. Couatl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Couatl starts to fly, if he is engaged, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Copper Wyrmling
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 2. Choose 4 spaces in a straight line from this Copper Wyrmling. all figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by this Copper Wyrmling's Fledging Fire Line Special Attack. Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice sperately.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an order marker on a Copper Wyrmling Army Card, before taking that Copper Wyrmling's turn, you may take a turn with one other Wyrmling you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for this Copper Wyrmling's movement, ignore elevations. This Copper Wyrmling may move over water without stopping, pass over figues without

name: Cormin the Dark
