ability_1_desc: If Cormin the Dark is targeted for a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, choose a small or medium figure you control that is within 4 spaces of Cormin. Switch Cormin with the chosen figure. If you do, the attacking figure must attack the chosen figure, if possible, and cannot attack any other figure this turn. Figures moved by Façade never take any leaving engagement attacks. You cannot roll for the Façade power more than once per turn.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Cormin the Dark, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, choose an opponent. That opponent now controls Cormin. Remove any Order Markers on this Army Card, then give the card to that opponent.

name: Acolarh
ability_1_title: Leaf of the Home Tree Aura
ability_1_desc: When any Elf you control within 8 spaces of Acolarh recieves enough wounds to be destroyed, you may roll 12 Ullar Valkyrie dice before removing the figure. If you roll at least 3 Ullar symbols, ignore any wounds that figure just recieved. Acolarh's Leaf of the Home Tree Aura does not affect Acolarh.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures who follow Ullar and start their turn adjacent to Acolarh may move 2 additional spaces.

name: Count Orien Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Each time Count Orien Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Count Orien Esenwein can't life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: For each Esenwein adjacent to Count Orien Esenwein, he will gain one additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Count Orien Esenwein's movement, ignore elevations. Count Orien Esenwein may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Count Orien Esenwein starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Zettian Guards
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if a 2nd Zettian Guards attacks the same figure as another, add one attack die to the 2nd Zettian Guards's attack.

name: Cthu, The Abomination
ability_1_desc: All enemy figures who target Cthu or another figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Cthu must roll a 6 sided die. Use the chart displayed below to determine the direction of the enemy figures attack by matching the number rolled to the directional number below. Cthu's Aura of Madness does not affect Cthu.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Cthus's movement, ignore elevation.Cthu may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Cthu starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Tagawa Samurai Archers
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against Samurai.
ability_2_desc: When a Tagawa Samurai Archer rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.

name: Couatl
ability_1_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. This Couatl does not need clear line of sight to attack with Psionic Blast Special Attack. If a figure receives 1 or more wounds from Psionic Blast Special Attack, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When any friendly figure within 6 spaces rolls the 20-sided die for a special ability on that figure's Army Card, that figure may add 1 to its die roll. No clear line of sight is needed.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Couatl's movement, ignore elevations. A Couatl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If a Couatly is engaged when it starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: CPT. MARK YATES
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, if an adjacent Human Squad figure you control would receive any number of wounds, you may roll the 20-sided die. Subtract 1 for every wound that figure would receive. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may ignore all wounds.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a wounded Human Unique Hero figure you control that is adjacent to Capt. Mark Yates, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Soldier, add 2 to your roll. If you roll a 13 or higher, remove up to 2 Wound Markers from that Hero's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Cpt. Mark Yates never makes leaving engagement attacks on figures with only 1 Life remaining.

name: Shaolin Monks
ability_1_desc: Shaolin Monks may attack any or all figures adjacent to them. Roll each attack seperately.
ability_2_desc: Befor or after their normal move, any or all Shaolin Monks may use Stealth Leap. Stealth Leap has a move of 2. When counting spaces for Stealth Leap, ignore elevations. Shaolin Monks may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. A Shaolin Monk may not leap more than 2 levels up or down in a single leap. If a Shaolin Monk is engaged when he starts his Stealth Leap, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Runa
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, Runa may use her Helm of Mitonsoul Aura. When using the Helm of Mitonsoul Aura, you must roll the 20-sided die for all figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Runa, one at a time. If the target is a squad figure and you roll a 15 or higher, destroy the figure. If the target is a hero figure and you roll a 20, destroy the figure. Runa's Helm of Mitonsoul Aura does not affect Runa.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Runa's movement, ignore elevations. Runa may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Runa starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Curt Slade
ability_1_desc: If Curt Slade has not yet moved this round, add 1 to his Defence.
ability_2_title: Put Another Dime in the Jukebox, Baby
ability_2_desc: Immediately after placing order markers, you may place one available Jukebox Glyph on this card. At the end of the round, discard any Jukebox Glyphs from this card.
ability_3_desc: At the end of the round you may roll the 20-sided die. On a roll of 17 or higher, all discarded Jukebox Glyphs become available.

name: Wakandan Royal Guard
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker from this Army Card and before taking a turn with Wakandan Royal Guard, you can take a turn with any King you control who follows Wakanda.
ability_2_desc: When a Wakandan Royal Guard rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, one shield will block all damage.

name: Granny Goodness
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure adjacent to Granny Goodness. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 8 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound. This power and Engagement Strike don't work on Darkseid.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to Granny Goodness, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 8 or higher, the opponent's figure recieves a wound. Figures may be targetted only as they move into engagement with Granny Goodness.

name: Wonder Woman
ability_1_desc: After moving, you may choose an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Wonder Woman. The controller of that figure must reveal and remove his or her "X" order marker.
ability_2_desc: When Wonder Woman rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Wonder Woman's movement, ignore elevations. Wonder Woman may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Wonder Woman starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Collin, Warrior Prince
ability_1_desc: After revealing a numbered order marker from Collin and before taking that turn, you may take a turn with any Mouse Hero you control.
ability_2_desc: After Collin rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move up to 2 figures you control that have the Scramble special power up to 4 spaces each. Figures that scramble never get attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: Rat Jailers
ability_1_desc: When a Rat Jailer is on a dungeon space, add 1 to its Defense value.
ability_2_desc: After all Rat Jailers you control move, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 20 or higher, place 1 previously destroyed figure with the Surge special power that you control on any empty space adjacent to any Rat Jailer that moved this turn.

name: Collin, Warrior Prince
ability_1_desc: After revealing a numbered order marker from Collin and before taking that turn, you may take a turn with any hero you control that is adjacent to Collin.
ability_2_desc: After Collin rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move up to 2 figures you control that have the Scramble special power up to 4 spaces each. Figures that scramble never get attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: Ogre Pulverizer
ability_1_desc: When the Ogre Pulverizer attacks an adjacent figure and at least one skull is rolled, the defending figure is moved 3 spaces by the Ogre Pulverizer's controller. The moved figure takes any leaving engagement strikes.

name: TILDA
ability_1_desc: After rolling defense dice with a Mouse adjacent to Tilda, and before taking any damage, you may reroll that defense with one additional defense die for each shield rolled.
ability_2_desc: After Tilda rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move up to 2 figures you control that have the Scramble special power up to 4 spaces each. Figures that scramble never get attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: Rat Warriors
ability_1_desc: After a Rat Warrior you control rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move any 2 Rat Warriors you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: After all Rat Warriors you control move, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 20 or higher, return 1 previously destroyed figure with the Surge special power that you control to the battlefield on an empty space adjacent to a Rat Warrior that moved this turn.

name: WAR APE
ability_1_desc: If a War Ape attacks a figure it did not start the turn adjacent to, add 3 dice to its attack.

name: NEZ
ability_1_desc: Nez and any adjacent friendly figure add 1 to its Attack and Defense values if it has any Treasure Glyphs on its Army Card.
ability_2_desc: If a special power stops Nez's movement, he may move 1 additional space and takes no damage.
ability_3_desc: After Nez rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move up to 2 figures you control that have the Scramble special power up to 4 spaces each. Figures that scramble never get attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: LILY
ability_1_desc: When you roll the 20-sided die with Lily, you may double the result of your die roll.
ability_2_desc: After Lily moves, if she is not engaged, she may move again. If she does, she cannot attack this turn.
ability_3_desc: After Lily rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move up to 2 figures you control that have the Scramble special power up to 4 spaces each. Figures that scramble never get attacked for leaving an engagement.

name: Cxurg'gyath
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Each opponent's figure adjacent to the chosen figure is also affected by the Psionic Explosion Special Attack. Cxurg'gyath does not need clear line of sight to attack with Psionic Explosion Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Add 1 to your die roll when you roll for the Enslave power on any Army Card.
ability_3_desc: If Cxurg'gyath is on a shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Daisis Evolution
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of this Daisis Evolution, and its base is no more than 3 levels above this Daisis Evolution's height or 3 levels below this Daisis Evolution's base, this Daisis Evolution may add 1 to its Range when attacking that figure but rolls one less attack die.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Daisis Evolution, remove 1 Wound Marker from this Daisis Evolution's Army Card.

name: Cyclops
ability_1_desc: After you: roll attack dice for a normal attack, roll defense dice, or roll the 20-sided die for a special power, for any figure you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Cyclops, you may choose to re-roll all dice you just rolled. If that figure is not a Mutant, you must keep the result of the second roll. If that figure is a Mutant, you may choose to keep the result of the second roll or use the result of the original roll. You may only use this power once per round.
ability_2_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose up to 4 spaces in a straight line from Cyclops. You may also choose up to 4 spaces in a straight line from the last space in the first line. All figures on those spaces who are in clear sight are affected by this special attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_3_desc: If Cyclops is unengaged, add 1 to his attack and defense. Cyclops ignores all damage he would receive from non-adjacent figures with this special power.

name: Corsairs Of Umbar
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Corsairs Of Umbar, you may first take a turn with any Corsair Captain you control.
ability_2_desc: Archers Of Umbar do not have to stop their movement when entering water spaces.
ability_3_desc: After you take a turn with Corsairs Of Umbar, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with Corsairs Of Umbar.

name: DAG'GUM TY'GOR
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack Special. If Dag'gum Ty'gor is attacking a small or medium figure, roll 3 attack dice for Double Shuriken Special Attack. If Dag'gum Ty'gor is attacking a figure of a different size or a destructible object, roll 2 attack dice for Double Shuriken Special Attack. When Dag'gum Ty'gor attacks with their Double Shuriken Special Attack, they may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Dag'gum Ty'gor can move through all figures and are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: DALINA
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. Add 1 additional attack dice for each friendly figure adjacent to Dalina that have a Valiant personality. You can attack one additional time but it can't be the same figure.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Dalina will receive 1 additional defense dice.

name: Batman
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Roll 3 attack dice once for up to 2 figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Batman. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. When Batman attacks with the Bat-A-Rang Special Attack, he may attack one additional time. Batman may not use the Bat-A-Rang Special Attack on the same turn he uses Batline.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Batman may use his Batline. Batline has a move of 6. When counting spaces for Batline movement, ignore elevations. Batman may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Batman may not Batline more than 30 levels up or down in a single Batline. If Batman is engaged when he starts to Batline, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Before Batman rolls defense dice against a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. Add 1 to the final roll for every two spaces between the attacking figure and Batman. If you roll a 17 or higher, the attacking figure's turn is over and you may take an immediate turn with Batman.

name: Dark Iris
ability_1_desc: If Dark Iris is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other friendly figure, add 2 dice to Dark Iris' attack.
ability_2_desc: Dark Iris receives two additional dice when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from her at the start of her turn.

name: Damigrim
ability_1_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Damigrim recieve 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Damigrim, You may first take a turn with any squad who follows Aquilla.
ability_3_desc: If a order marker is placed on Damigrim, you may take a turn with any 2 Dwarf unique heros you control, instead of Damigrim. Damigrim may not be included as one of the unique heros.

name: Damumaki, War Baron
ability_1_desc: For every opponent's figure Damumaki destroys, place a Blood Marker on this card. Add 1 to Damumaki's Attack for each Blood Marker on this card. A maximum of 3 Blood Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: If the total number of Blood Markers and Wound Markers on this card is greater than 5, Damumaki may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Damumaki does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space.

name: Glyph of Gloves
ability_1_desc: If any different Treasure Glyph on this figure would be removed by terrain or any enemy special power, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, the Glyph isn't removed.
If ????? is attacked, and at least one skull is rolled, roll the twenty sided dice. On a roll of ten of higher, ????? may move three spaces in any direction. Stealth flight applies.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with ???, you may move any three undead devourers you control seven spaces each. Stealth Flight applies.
ability_3_desc: When counting movement for ???, blah blah blah, you know how it goes :D

name: Dark Orc Clan
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may move all Dark Orc Clan again.
ability_2_desc: Before taking a turn with Dark Orc Clan, you may first move any unit on another single Orc Army Card that you control. Dark Inspiration cannot be used on other Dark Orc Clans.
ability_3_desc: Dark Orc Clan are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Damisa
ability_1_desc: If Damisa is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, before rolling defense dice, roll the 20-sided die. If the attacking figure is not adjacent, add 7 to your roll. If you roll a 13 or higher, Damisa takes no damage and must immediately move one space, if possible. If Damisa is adjacent to the attacking figure after moving you may roll one unblockable attack die against the attacking figure. Damisa never takes leaving engagement attacks when moving with Displacement.
ability_2_desc: When Damisa attacks she may attack two additional times. Damisa may attack one fewer times for each Wound Marker on this Army Card.

name: Darkmire Prowlers
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure is at least 5 spaces away from a Darkmire Prowler, it may not attack that Darkmire Prowler with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: Darkmire Prowlers can move through all large or huge figures and never take any leaving engagement attacks from large or huge figures.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Darkmire Prowlers may double their height.

name: Darter Clan Sniper
ability_1_desc: When a Darter Clan Sniper inflicts at least 1 wound against a nonadjacent figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, add 1 additional wound to the defending figure.

name: Daredevil
ability_1_desc: If Daredevil is attacked by an opponent's figure and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-12, roll defense dice normally. If you roll 13 or higher, Daredevil takes no damage and may immediately move using his Swing Line 3 special power.
ability_2_desc: Instead of a normal move, Daredevil may use Swing Line. Swing Line has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Swing Line movement, ignore elevations. Daredevil may swing over water without stopping, swing over figures without becoming engaged, and swing over obstacles such as ruins. Daredevil may not move more than 30 levels up or down in a single Swing Line. If Daredevil is engaged when he starts to Swing Line, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When Daredevil attacks with his Billy Club Special Attack, he may attack 1 additional time. He cannot attack the same figure more than once. No clear line of sight is needed.

name: Dark Phoenix (Jean Grey)
ability_1_desc: You may draft a Jean Grey figure with the Unstable personality. If you do, Dark Phoenix does not start the game on the battlefield. When your Unstable Jean Grey is destroyed, switch her with Dark Phoenix.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you must roll 1 unblockable attack die against each figure within 2 spaces of Dark Phoenix, one at a time. If a figure receives a wound, you may place it on any empty space within 2 spaces of its original placement.
ability_3_desc: Anytime Dark Phoenix receives one or more wounds or is destroyed, you must immediately roll 1 unblockable attack die against each adjacent figure, one at a time.

name: Dazzler
ability_1_desc: If Dazzler inflicts one or more wounds on an opponent's figure with a normal attack, you may remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's army card.
ability_2_desc: Opponent's figures roll one less attack die when attacking Dazzler or any figure adjacent to Dazzler.
ability_3_desc: Opponents can never remove order markers from this card with any special power or glyph. Shielded Senses supersedes all such powers.

name: Darth Vader
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Darth Vader rolls at least 2 skulls with his Blind Rage special attack, Darth Vader may attack again with his Blind Rage Special Attack. Darth Vader may continue attacking with his Blind Rage Special Attack until he rolls fewer than 2 skulls.
ability_2_title: There Is Still Good In Him
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Darth Vader, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1, choose an opponent. That opponent now controls Darth Vader. Remove any order markers on this Army Card, then give the card to that opponent.

name: Deathcharger 3000
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack Special. If Deathcharger 3000 begins its turn unengaged, instead of moving normally, it may use its Deathcharge Special Attack. Choose a figure within 5 spaces of Deathcharger 3000 to attack and roll 3 attack dice. If the defending figure receives one or more wounds from that attack, you may move Deathcharger 3000 up to 5 spaces. If Deathcharger 3000 ends that move engaged, it may attack again by rolling 4 attack dice.

name: Darth Vader
ability_1_desc: Darth Vader may attack every figure he is engaged to with a normal attack.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent figure, all excess sheilds count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. If Darth Vader's Force Choke Special Attack inflicts a wound, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, inflict another wound and roll the 20-sided die again. Continue inflicting wounds until you don't roll a 13 or higher.

name: Deathwalker 1000
ability_1_desc: Range 8. Attack Special. When attacking an adjacent figure with Searing Laser roll 8 attack dice. Each space beyond a range of 1 reduces the Searing Laser's attack value by 1 die.
ability_2_desc: If DW 1000 receives more than 3 wound markers from any single attack, remove all order markers from DW 1000's card.

name: Dead Marsh Specter
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving with this Dead Marsh Specter, you may choose an opponent's Small or Medium nonflying figure within 8 spaces and roll the 20-sided die. Add 4 to you roll if the figure is not adjacent to any other figures. If you roll a 14 or higher, you may move that figure a number of spaces equal to its Move number. The minimum number of spaces between this Dead Marsh Specter and the figure after moving must be lower than what it was before moving that figure. Figures moved will not take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Opponent's Small or Medium figures adjacent to this Dead Marsh Specter cannot move or attack, unless they are adjacent to another figure that opponent controls.

name: Deathwalker 10000
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 1 Power Core Marker on this Army Card. When Deathwalker 10000 receives one or more wounds, you may remove a Power Core Marker from this Army Card to ignore all wounds Deathwalker 10000 just received.
ability_2_desc: When Deathwalker 10000 attacks, he may attack one additional time if a Power Core Marker is on this Army Card.
ability_3_desc: Once per turn, when Deathwalker 10000 is attacking an adjacent figure, you may add 2 dice to Deathwalker 10000's attack.

name: Deathleap Reaper
ability_1_desc: Instead of a normal move, a Deathleap Reaper may use its Deathjump. Deathjump has a move of 6. When counting spaces for a Deathleap Reaper's Deathjump movement, ignore elevations. A Deathleap Reaper may jump over water without stopping, jump over figures without becoming engaged, and jump over obstacles such as ruins. A Deathleap Reaper may not jump more than 40 levels up or down in a single jump. If a Deathleap Reaper is engaged when he starts to Deathjump, it will take any leaving engagement attacks. If a Deathleap Reaper ends its Deathjump movement adjacent one or more figures, choose a figure. You may immediately roll one attack die. If you roll a skull, the chosen figure receives one wound.

name: DARKSEID
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round after Darkseid has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die before placing order markers. If you roll an 17 or higher, immediately place Darkseid on a space in your starting zone and remove all Wound Markers on Darkseid's card.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. Darkseid does not need clear line of sight to attack with Omega Effect. If an opponent's Unique Hero receives at least one wound from the Omega Effect, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 17-18, you may place that Unique Hero on any empty space. If you roll a 19-20, that figure is destroyed.
ability_3_desc: Instead of moving Darkseid normally, you may choose any empty space that is on the same level and within 10 spaces of Darkseid. Place Darkseid on the chosen space. When Darkseid starts to teleport, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Deathwalker 4000
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. If Deathwalker 4000's Death Assault Special Attack inflicts a wound, you may move him up to 2 spaces and attack again with his Death Assault Special Attack. Deathwalker 4000 may continue attacking with his Death Assault Special Attack until he does not inflict a wound. Deathwalker 4000 cannot attack the same figure more than once on a single turn.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is at least 4 spaces away from Deathwalker 4000 it may not attack Deathwalker 4000 with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: Deathwalker 4000 is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Deathmauler 900
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special. When Deathmauler attacks with his Whirling Flail Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. If Deathmauler's Whirling Flail Special Attack does not inflict at least one wound, he may add one attack dice to each additional attack.
ability_2_desc: If Deathmauler receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1–14, nothing happens. If you roll a 15-19, each figure within 2 clear sight spaces receives 1 wound. If you roll a 20 each figure within 2 clear sight spaces receives 3 wounds. After using this power, Deathmauler is always destroyed.

name: Demon Hunters
ability_1_desc: If a Demon Hunter figure is attacking an adjacent figure, add one dice to that Demon Hunter's attack.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a Demon figure, Demon Hunters roll 2 additional dice.

name: GALACTUS
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Galactus, take a turn with up to 2 Heralds you control.
ability_2_desc: Galactus cannot move normally or be moved by other special powers. After moving a Herald you control, Galactus can move up to 2 spaces.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with Galactus, you must roll the 20-sided die. if you roll: * 1-6, inflict 4 wounds to Galactus; * 7-16, inflict 3 wounds to any adjacent figure and remove 2 wounds from this Army Card; or inflict 3 wounds to Galactus; * 17-19, inflict 5 wounds to any adjacent figure and remove 3 wounds from this Army Card; or inflict 2 wounds to Galactus; * 20, inflict 9 wounds to any adjacent figure and remove 5 wounds from this Army Card; or inflict 1 wound to Galactus.

name: Deathwalker 5000
ability_1_desc: Deathwalker 5000 cannot attack with a special attack during more than one turn each round.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. Deathwalker 5000 may use this special attack 3 times in the same turn. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose up to two other figures adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by this Special Attack. Roll attack once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately.
ability_4_desc: When defending against a normal attack with Deathwalker 5000, you may roll Utgar Valkyrie dice. Each Utgar symbol rolled counts as an additional shield.

name: Deathwalker 9000
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Explosion Special Attack. Deathwalker 9000 only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice seperately. Deathwalker 9000 can be affected by its own Explosion Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Any Soulborg Guards you control adjacent to this Deathwalker 9000 add 2 spaces to their range.

name: Deadman
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking with Deadman, you may choose a figure adjacent to Deadman. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Squad or Common figure and you roll a 6 or higher, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Unique Hero figure and you roll a 8 or higher, place Deadman on that figure's card and remove all Order Markers on that figure's card.
ability_2_desc: While Deadman is on a Unique Hero's Army Card, your Opponents can not take turns with that figure. Instead of taking a turn with Deadman, you may take temporary control of a Unique Hero with Deadman on it's Army Card and immediately take a turn with that Hero. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to its previous owner, and you may place Deadman adjacent to that figure, if possible.
ability_3_desc: If a figure with Deadman on it's Army Card receives one or more wounds or is destroyed, before removing that figure, you must immediately place Deadman adjacent to that figure, if possible.
ability_4_desc: Deadman can move through all figures, obstacles, and terrian and is never attacked when leaving an engagement. If Deadman is attacked with a normal attack, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 12 or higher, Deadman takes no damage from that attack.

name: Deepwyrm Blackspawn
ability_1_desc: A Deepwyrm Blackspawn does not start the game on the battlefield. Instead, whenever a Common Drow figure you control is destroyed by a normal attack, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, you may replace that Drow with one of your Deepwyrm Blackspawn, if possible. After placing that Blackspawn, you may move any unrevealed Order Markers from the Drow Army Card to this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with a Deepwyrm Blackspawn, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher you may take another turn with a Blackspawn.

name: Deathwalker 6000
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. You must remove an unrevealed order marker from this Army Card to use Optic Laser Special Attack. Choose a space within 4 spaces of Deathwalker 6000. You may also choose 3 spaces in a straight line from the chosen space. All figures on those spaces that are within line of sight of Deathwalker 6000 are affected by Optic Laser Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Deathwalker 6000 is not affected by Optic Laser Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When defending against a normal attack with Deathwalker 6000, you may re-roll all defense dice that did not show shields. Reinforced Armor can be used only once for each defense roll.
ability_3_desc: Opponents' figures are not attacked when leaving an engagement with Deathwalker 6000 unless there is at least one unrevealed order marker on this Army Card.

name: Delandria
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, when Delandria is chosen as the target of a normal or special attack, before attack dice are rolled she may move one space. This space may be up to 4 levels higher. If Delandria can no longer be targeted, the attacker may choose a new target if possible.
ability_2_desc: Delandria is never attacked when leaving an engagement.
ability_3_desc: When revealing a numbered Order Marker on this Army Card, you may also reveal an "X" Order Marker on this card to activate Haste. On the turn you activate Haste, Delandria may either move an additional 6 spaces, or attack one additional time with a normal attack.

name: Demonic Hound
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 2 + Special When this Demonic Hound attacks with this special attack, it may attack one additional time. If this Demonic Hound is on at least one shadow space, he may add one additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: If this Demonic Hound is on at least one shadow space, opponents' figures must be adjacent to attack him with a normal attack.

name: Deltacron
ability_1_desc: When Deltacron attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Deltacron, each skull rolled counts for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Deltacron may use his Grapple Cord. Grapple Cord has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Grapple Cord, ignore elevations. Deltacron may grapple over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged, and over obstacles such as ruins. Deltacron may not grapple more than 45 levels up or down in a single Grapple Cord move. If Deltacron is engaged when he starts his Grapple Cord move, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Der Spinne Panzers
ability_1_desc: If no Der Spinne Panzers attacked this turn, you may move one Unique Nazi Arachnid Hero you control up to 6 spaces. The chosen Hero must begin and remain unengaged throughout its move.
ability_2_desc: Der Spinne Panzers roll 1 additional die when attacking a figure that has a height advantage on them and 2 additional dice when attacking a figure that has an extreme height advantage on them.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Der Spinne Panzers may add 2 to their height.

name: Det. James Woo
ability_1_desc: Det. James Woo may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an opponent's adjacent figure with a normal attack, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. When defending against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When making a normal attack on a non-adjacent figure that is engaged with a Lawman you control, Det. Woo rolls one additional die.

name: Dionaean Mantrap
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of each round, after all order markers have been placed, you may move this Dionaean Mantrap up to 3 spaces.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with this Dionaean Mantrap, if the defending figure was adjacent to this Dionaean Mantrap at the beginning of this turn, the defending figure rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: Dexter Morgan
ability_1_desc: If any figures were wounded last turn, instead of taking this turn normally with Dexter Morgan, you may take a turn with any Lawman hero or Lawmen squad you control, or with Dexter Morgan. If a figure was destroyed last turn, for the duration of this turn, Dexter Morgan and Lawmen figures you control will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc:
* Dexter Morgan can move through all figures.
* Dexter Morgan can add 3 to his Attack value when attacking Utgar figures.
* Dexter Morgan can't attack if he is adjacent to more than one figure.

name: Dire Rats
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Dire Rats, you may first take a turn with a Predator that you control.
ability_2_desc: After a Dire Rat you control rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move up to 2 Dire Rats you control up to 4 spaces each. Dire Rats moved by Swarm must end their movement adjacent to an opponent's figure.
ability_3_desc: Dire Rats are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Lord Denethor
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of the game you may place Lord Denethor in your opponent's Start Zone. Figures your opponent controls who follow Einar cannot target Denethor with any attacks or leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with Lord Denethor, you may move up to 8 Squad figures your opponent controls who follow Einar up to 5 spaces each. The chosen figures must be within clear sight of Denethor before moving, cannot move in a way that would incur falling damage, and will take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: Figures your opponent controls within clear sight of Denethor cannot move or attack with other figures your opponent controls who follow Einar by a special power on an Army Card or Glyph.

name: Dienekes
ability_1_desc: If a small or medium enemy figure moves at least one space and ends its movement within 3 clear sight spaces of Dienekes, if it is no more than 3 levels above Dienekes's height or 3 levels below his base, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, place that figure on any same-level space adjacent to Dienekes. If the figure is engaged before it is moved by Tether of Logos, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Figures engaged with Dienekes may only attack figures with the Combat Challenge special power.

name: FO-TO-KI-RO
ability_1_desc: You may make up to 4 additional attacks with Fo-To-Ki-Ro. For each additional attack Fo-To-Ki-Ro makes place 1 wound marker on this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Fo-To-Ki-Ro destroys a small or medium figure with a normal attack, remove one wound from this Army Card. Fo-To-Ki-Ro cannot use Gobble and Graft on a destructible object.

name: Dingbots
ability_1_desc: If a Unique Human Hero you control within 3 clear sight spaces of a Dingbot would take any wounds from a normal attack, you may destroy that Dingbot and ignore all wounds. The Dingbot must be within 3 clear sight spaces of the attacking figure to use Sacrifice.
ability_2_desc: If a Dingbot is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you must choose an adjacent figure, if possible. The chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: A Dingbot may ignore all wounds from Lightning Staff Special Attack.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Dinbgots may double their Height.

name: DOMITIA
ability_1_desc: Instead of attacking, you may choose any non-adjacent figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Domitia. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher remove all Order Markers on the chosen figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common Army Card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: When Domitia rolls defense dice against a normal attack, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Doombots
ability_1_desc: At the end of a round where the Doombots are given an 'X' order marker, they will self destruct. Each figure adjacent to them will suffer an attack of 5 (each rolled individually).

name: Doctor Doom
ability_1_desc: Before an enemy figure within 3 clear sight spaces starts to move, if you haven't already rolled 14 or higher for Planned Trap this turn, roll the d20. If you rol 14 or higher, place that figure on an empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of its current space and Doctor Doom. That figure will not take passing swipes and cannot move this turn.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Doctor Doom, choose a Unique Hero within 4 clear sight spaces and roll the d20. If you roll 17 or higher, take temporary control of that Hero and immediately take a turn with it. At the end of that turn, return control of that Hero to the player who controlled it before Mind Exchange.

name: Dorim the Bulkhead Brawler
ability_1_desc: If Dorim the Bulkhead Brawler attacks an opponent's figure during his turn, the Move Value of all of your Army Cards is increased by 1 until the next time you reveal an Order Marker.
ability_2_desc: After rolling attack dice, before defense dice are rolled, you may re-roll one die that did not roll a skull.

name: Doctor Doom
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Doctor Doom, you may choose any Unique Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Doctor Doom. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take temporary control of that hero and immediately take a turn with the chosen Hero. At the end of that turn, control of the chosen Hero returns to the player who controlled the Hero before the Mind Exchange. All Order Markers that were on the chosen Hero's card will stay on the card.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Doctor Doom's movement, ignore elevations. Doctor Doom may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Doctor Doom starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Parked Vehicle
ability_1_desc: When the Parked Vehicle has received enough wounds to be destroyed, roll 6 attack dice once for all adjacent figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Afterward, remove the destroyed vehicle from the battlefield.

name: Draft Horses
ability_1_desc: Before moving a Draft Horse, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to that Draft Horse. After moving that Draft Horse, you may place the chosen figure adjacent to it.

name: Daenerys Targaryen
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose a wounded Hero figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Daenerys Targaryen. Roll the 20-sided die. If the chosen figure is a Dragon, add 5 to your die roll. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove one wound marker from the chosen Hero's Army Card. Daenerys' Dragon can use its Dragon Healing on Daenerys.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Daenerys Targaryen. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, the chosen figure receives one wound.
ability_3_desc: If Daenerys is unengaged and adjacent to an Einar Dragon before that Dragon moves, after moving you may place Daenerys adjacent to that dragon.

name: Draconian Sentinels
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Draconian Sentinels, you may first take a turn with a Dracon Hero you control. If you did not take a turn with any Dracon Hero you control, add 1 to the Attack Value of this card.
ability_2_desc: The first time a Draconian Sentinel attacks a figure, that figure subtracts 1 from its Defense Value for the remainder of the Draconian Sentinels' turn.

name: Doctor Octopus
ability_1_desc: Doctor Octopus may attack up to four times each turn. Reduce the number of attacks by one for each Wound Marker on this card. Doctor Octopus may attack enemy figures within 2 clear sight spaces whose bases are no more than 6 levels above Doctor Octopus's height or 6 levels below his base.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose an adjacent Small or Medium non-flying figure and roll the d20. If you roll 13 or higher, you may throw the figure to an empty space within 4 spaces and clear sight of Doctor Octopus. Roll the d20 for throwing damage unless the figure was thrown onto a level higher than the height of Doctor Octopus or onto water. If you roll 13 or higher, the thrown figure receives 2 wounds. Thrown figures do not take passing swipes.
ability_3_desc: Enemy Small or Medium figures adjacent to Doctor Octopus cannot move and cannot be moved.
ability_4_desc: Up to four times while moving, Doctor Octopus may ignore up to 8 levels of elevation.

name: Doctor Octopus
ability_1_desc: Up to four times while moving normally, Doctor Octopus may ignore up to 8 levels of elevation.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, choose an adjacent Small or Medium non-flying figure and roll the d20. If you roll 14+, place the figure to an empty space within 4 clear sight spaces. Roll the d20 unless the figure is thrown onto a level higher than Doctor Octopus's height or onto water. If you roll 11+, that figure receives two wounds. That figure does not take passing swipes.
ability_3_desc: Range 2. Attack Special. Attack by rolling up to 4 dice. Continue attacking until 8 attack dice have been rolled. Doctor Octopus cannot use Telescopic Tentacles to attack figures whose bases are more than 6 levels above Doctor Octopus's height or 6 levels below his base.
ability_4_desc: Adjacent enemy Small or Medium figures cannot move and cannot be moved.

name: DOOMBOT
ability_1_desc: If you control Doctor Doom, and he is destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 6 or higher, remove all but one wound marker from Doctor Doom's Army Card, destroy one Doombot you control, and place Doctor Doom on the space previously occupied by that Doombot. You may only roll once for all Decoy of Doom special powers each time Doctor Doom is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for this Doombot's movement, ignore elevations. This Doombot may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When this Doombot starts to fly, if it is engaged it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dragon Hound
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 6. After moving and instead of attacking normally, if this Dragon Hound is not engaged, you may choose an opponent's figure within 3 clear sight spaces whose base is not higher or lower than 5 levels from the base of this Dragon Hound. Place this Dragon Hound on any empty space adjacent to the chosen figure and attack that figure with Leaping Assault Special Attack, if possible. If the defending figure is not destroyed, that figure immediately inflicts one wound on this Dragon Hound.

name: Dreadguls
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, you may move all Dreadguls that moved this turn again.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with a Dreadgul, if the defending figure was not adjacent to that Dreadgul at the start of this turn, that Dreadgul receives 1 additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with the Dreadguls, if none of the Dreadguls you control are engaged, you may first take a turn with any non-disciplined Warlord Hero you control.

name: Dretch
ability_1_desc: When an adjacent figure receives one or more wounds from a normal or special attack, it receives an additional wound. Putrid Aura does not affect Demons, Constructs, Undead, or destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When a Dretch attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Dretch may add 2 to its height.

name: Dr. Gudruna Vogt
ability_1_desc: Immediately after revealing an Order Marker on an Army Card you control, you may reveal an 'X' Order Marker on this card and either: •View any unrevealed Order Marker belonging to an opponent; or •Look at the power side of any Glyph that is symbol side up.
ability_2_desc: Once per round, after any combat dice or the 20-sided die is rolled for Dr. Gudruna Vogt or any figure within clear sight of her you may immediately add or subtract a skull, shield, blank, Valkyrie General Symbol or 1 from that roll.
ability_3_desc: An opponent may never take temporary or permanent control of Dr. Gudruna Vogt.

name: POLYMEDES
ability_1_desc: When rolling attack or defense dice against dragon figures, Polymedes always rolls one automatic skull or shield.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking normally, choose a target within 4 clear sight spaces and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 18 or higher inflict 4 wounds to the target, otherwise nothing happens. If the target is large or huge add 3 to your dice roll.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Polymedes's Army Card, before taking a turn with Polymedes, you may take a turn with any other Dragonslayer Hero you control.

name: DR. ZED
ability_1_desc: Dr. Zed may not make leaving engagement attacks, and does not gain any height advantage when attacking.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's figure that is not Psychic moves onto a space within 3 spaces of Dr. Zed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, the figure takes one wound and ends its move. If you roll a 20, and the figure is a Unique Hero, you may also remove all Order Markers from its Army Card. You now control that Army Card. A figure may only be targeted once per turn with Psionic Field.
ability_3_desc: If a medium or large figure you control is adjacent to Dr. Zed before or during its normal movement, you may place Dr. Zed adjacent to that figure at the end of its move. Dr. Zed will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Drider Fanglord
ability_1_desc: A Drider Fanglord's Species is considered to be Drow and Arachnid in addition to Drider.
ability_2_desc: When an opponent's small or medium figures moves onto an empty space within 2 clear sight spaces of this Drider Fanglord, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 1-13, the figure may continue its move as normal and cannot be affected by another Immobilizing Web until the end of the current turn. If you roll a 14 or higher, that figure must end its move there and it may not attack for the remainder of the current turn.

name: Dragon-Bot Fly
ability_1_desc: If Dragon Bot Fly is adjacent to a Jungle Piece, Dragon Bot Fly receives two additional defense dice when defending against a non-adjacent attack.
ability_2_desc: Dragon Bot Fly starts the game with 1 Larva Marker on its Army Card. If an opponent's Unique Hero receives at least 1 wound from Dragon Bot Fly, you may place the Larva Marker on that figure's Army Card. When Dragon Bot Fly is destroyed, if possible, place Dragon Bot Fly on any empty space adjacent to the figure with the Larva Marker. Remove the marker from the figure's Army Card and place it back on Dragon Bot Fly's Army Card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Dragon Bot Fly's movement, ignore elevations. Dragon Bot Fly may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Dragon Bot Fly starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: DREVELEC
ability_1_desc: Drevelec's Species is also Dragon and Undead.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure that Drevelec was not adjacent to at the start of this turn, roll 3 additional attack dice. You may only use Swoop Attack when attacking a figure on a level lower than the level Drevelec began its turn on.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Drevelec's movement, ignore elevations. Drevelec may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Drevelec starts to fly, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Dunlending Warriors
ability_1_desc: If a Dunlending Warrior begins his turn unengaged, add 2 to his Move value this turn. If he begins his turn engaged, add 2 to his Attack value this turn.
ability_2_desc: After a Dunlending Warrior attacks, if that Warrior did not inflict a wound with that attack, he may attack one additional time. The Wild Onslaught special power can only be used once per turn.

name: Drunk Firefox
ability_1_desc: When the Drunk Firefox inflicts at least one wound with its normal attack, he must attack one additional time, if possible. The Drunk Firefox must continue attacking until he inflicts no wounds or there is no more figure to attack.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, before moving with the Drunk Firefox, you can add a wound to his Army Card to increase its move value of 3 for this turn.

name: Druaga
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 7 or higher, Druaga takes no leaving engagement attacks and may add 2 additional attack die when attacking normally until the end of his turn.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Druaga's movement, ignore elevations. Druaga may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Druaga is engaged when he starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Drosera Jungle Stalker
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's small or medium figure moves adjacent to this Drosera Jungle Stalker, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-10, nothing happens. If you roll an 11-19, the opponent's figure receives 1 wound. If you roll a 20, the opponent's figure is destroyed. Figures can be affected by Ambushing Prey only as they move into engagement with this Drosera Jungle Stalker.
ability_2_desc: When this Drosera Jungle Stalker rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 5 defense dice to this Drosera Jungle Stalker.

name: Dwarven Breaker
ability_1_desc: Whenever a Dwarven Breaker attacks a figure, add 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled for each other enemy figure adjacent to that Dwarven Breaker.

name: Durburz, Goblin King
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. If Durburz's Goblin Fury Special Attack destroys a figure, Durburz may attack again with his Goblin Fury Special Attack. Durburz may continue attacking until he does not destroy a figure.
ability_2_desc: All Goblin figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Durburz add 1 to their defense dice. Drums In The Deep does not affect Durburz.
ability_3_desc: Durburz is never attacked when leaving engagement.

name: Duncan Idaho
ability_1_desc: If Duncan Idaho successfully defends against an attack from an adjacent figure, he may immediately attack any adjacent figure.
ability_2_desc: When an adjacent figure attacks Duncan Idaho with a normal attack, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: If a friendly adjacent figure is wounded in battle, the player who controls Duncan Idaho may ignore all wounds the friendly figure just received and place one wound marker on Duncan Idaho.

name: Drokalraxa
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Drokalraxa and before taking a turn with it, you may first take a turn with any other Beholder you control.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking, Drokalraxa may choose an adjacent figure and roll the 20-sided die. •1-10: Nothing happens. •11-16: Target receives 1 wound. •17-18: Target receives 2 wounds. •19-20: Target receives 3 wounds. Chilling Bite does not affect Soulborgs or destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. Sightless Stare does not require line of sight to target.
ability_4_desc: Instead of moving normally, Drokalraxa may move to any unoccupied space within 7 spaces which is not more than 1x his height. Phase Shift never incurs disengagement swipes.

name: Dryad
ability_1_desc: When making a normal attack, this Dryad may roll two additional attack dice if the target is adjacent to a tree, bush, or a friendly figure who follows Ullar. After attacking with Way of the Wood, place a wound marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: If this Dryad is adjacent to a tree or bush, it has no visible hit zones. A Dryad may move through all trees and bushes.
ability_3_desc: If this Dryad is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, you may place up to two Twiglings in your army on previously empty spaces adjacent to this Dryad.

name: Éomer
ability_1_desc: For every opponent's figure Éomer destroys, place a purple Experience Marker on this card. When attacking with Éomer, roll one additional attack die for each Experience Marker on this card. A maximum of 3 Experience Markers can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Knights who follow Ullar who start their turn unengaged and adjacent to Éomer may move 2 additional spaces.

name: Deathwalker 9500
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Lob 12. Attack 2. Choose a space to bombard. No clear line of sight is needed. Any figures on or adjacent to the chosen space are affected by the Bombardment Special Attack. Roll the 20-sided die to determine the number of times Deathwalker 9500 can bombard the chosen space: If you roll a 1, Deathwalker 9500 may not bombard the chosen space this turn. If you roll 2-12, Deathwalker 9500 bombards the chosen space once. If you roll 13-18, Deathwalker 9500 bombard the chosen space twice. If you roll 19-20, Deathwalker 9500 bombards the chosen space three times. For each time Deathwalker 9500 bombards the chosen space, roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Deathwalker 9500 can be affected by his own Bombardment Special Attack.

name: EARPER SNOOPS
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, you may choose one Unique Hero your opponent controls to be the Earper Snoops' Target. For the rest of the game, after your opponent takes a turn with the chosen Hero, you may move the Earper Snoops up to 6 spaces. Earper Snoops must begin and remain unengaged throughout their move.
ability_2_desc: Earper Snoops roll one additional die when attacking or defending against an opponent's most expensive figure (or figures if that opponent has more than one of that figure).

name: Deathwalker P-9500
ability_1_desc: Range 7. Attack 4. Instead of moving normally, Deathwalker P-9500 may move 2 spaces and may attack up to 4 times in a straight line with Prototype Gatling Gun Special Attack. Deathwalker P-9500 may only target the nearest figures.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, Deathwalker P-9500 always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: Range 7. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by the Explosion Special Attack. Deathwalker P-9500 only needs a clear sight shot at the chosen figure. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. Deathwalker P-9500 can be affected by his own Explosion Special Attack.

name: Omnicron Snipers
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Omnicron Snipers, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.

name: Drow Assassin
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on, and taking a turn with a Common Drow Squad, or Common Drow Hero, you may choose one of the figures that attacked or moved this turn that is within 6 sight spaces of a Drow Assassin whose base is no more than 5 levels higher or lower than the base of the chosen figure. You may Switch the Drow Assassin with the chosen figure. If you do, you may immediately take a turn with that Drow Assassin. Figures moved by Shadow Shift never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: If a Drow Assassin is attacking an opponent's figure that is adjacent to at least one other figure you control, add 2 dice to that Drow Assassin's attack.
ability_3_desc: If a Drow Assassin is attacked with a normal attack and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If that Drow Assassin is on a dungeon space, add 3 to your die roll. If it is on a shadow space, add 6 to your die roll. If you roll a 1-15, roll defense dice normally. If you roll a 16 or higher, ignore all damage that would have been inflicted by the attack.

name: Easy Company Medic
ability_1_desc: If an Easy Company Medic ends his movement adjacent to a friendly figure, instead of attacking you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, you may remove one wound marker from the chosen figure's Army Card or place one of your previously destroyed small or medium squad figures adjacent to that Easy Company Medic.

name: PROJECT K-300
ability_1_desc: After moving, and before attacking, Project K-300 may choose to grab any adjacent small or medium figure. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-13, nothing happens. If you roll a 14 or higher, the figure can roll no more than 1 defense die if attacked this turn.

name: Dzu-Teh Chieftain
ability_1_desc: Dzu-Teh Chieftain starts each game with up to 2 one-space Glacier Mountains on his Army Card. After moving and before attacking, choose any empty space within 5 spaces of the Chieftain. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 8 or higher, you may place a Glacier Mountain from this Army Card onto the chosen space if the Glacier Mountain fits normally onto that space.
ability_2_desc: All Dzu-Teh you control that are adjacent to at least one Glacier Mountain add 1 extra die to their attack, and 1 extra die to their defense.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving Dzu-teh Chieftain.

name: Wild Dog
ability_1_desc: You may move and attack with up to 4 Wild Dog figures each turn.
ability_2_desc: For every 3 friendly Wild Dog figures killed, all remaining friendly Wild Dog figures roll one additional attack die.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down terrain, Wild Dog may double it's height.

name: Wind Riders
ability_1_desc: A Wind Rider never rolls for molten lava damage or lava field damage, and it does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_2_desc: If a Wind Rider starts its turn within 4 clear sight spaces of a friendly Air Elemental, when counting spaces for a Wind Rider's movement, ignore elevations. A Wind Rider may wind ride over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and wind ride over obstacles such as ruins. When a Wind Rider starts to move using Wind Riding, it will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: A Wind Rider can never roll defense dice while it is on a water space.

name: Sven the Viking Champion
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Sven, you may take a turn with up to 2 Unique Heroes you control that follow Jandar. Sven cannot be one of the 2 Unique Heroes. Any Unique Hero that is taking a turn instead of Sven must be within 6 clear sight spaces of Sven prior to it's movement.
ability_2_desc: When Sven is attacked, before rolling defense dice, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 11-19, the most wounds Sven may take from this attack is one. If you roll a 20, ignore all wounds.

name: EGRON
ability_1_desc: When Egron attacks an adjacent figure, roll 2 additional attack dices.
ability_2_desc: When Egron receive one or more wounds from an adjacent attack, roll the 20-sided die for each wound inflicted. If you roll 15 or higher, the attacking figure will receive one wound.
ability_3_desc: Any friendly figure from 3 clear spaces of Egron, will receive 1 more defense dice, when rolling for defense.

name: Elf Rangers
ability_1_desc: At the end of Elf Rangers' turn, you may move each Elf Ranger up to 3 spaces.

name: EK'ANN
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. When Ek'ann attacks with his Xen'drik Boomerang Special Attack, he may attack 2 additional times. He cannot attack the same figure more than once.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure that is adjacent to Ek'ann attacks with a normal or special attack, it must attack Ek'ann.

name: ZEPHYR
ability_1_desc: Range 5, Attack 4. Choose 5 spaces in a straight line from Zephyr. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Zephyr's Mighty Wind Special Attack. Roll 4 Attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice seperately. Any small, medium, or large figures wounded, but not destroyed. are immediately pushed backward 5 spaces, up to a wall that is the same height as the figure being pushed back, or another figure. If the figure hits a wall, it receives an additional wound. If it hits another figure, both figures receive an additional wound.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Zephyr's movement, ignore elevations. Zephyr may move over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Zephyr starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Eidolons of Vydar
ability_1_desc: After attacking or defending, you may re-roll all dice if the Eidolon of Vydar is within 3 spaces of another Kyrie you control. Eidolons may use this ability once per engagement.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for the Eidolons of Vydar's movement, ignore elevations. Eidolons of Vydar may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Eidolons of Vydar start to fly, if they are engaged they will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Elbad, Necro-Assistant
ability_1_desc: When rolling for the Mindless Pack special power, you may take a turn with one additional Thrall.
ability_2_desc: When placing an Undead figure with the special power of any other Undead Army Card you control, instead of placing that figure adjacent to another Undead Unique Hero you control, you may place that figure adjacent to Elbad, Necro-Assistant.

name: Elektra
ability_1_desc: When Elektra attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure with Elektra, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_3_desc: Elektra can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: The Elder Tree
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack, The Elder Tree always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: The Elder Tree is considered to be a tree for all special powers that reference trees.
ability_3_desc: All Plants and Sidhe you control can move one additional space. Arboreal Leadership does not affect The Elder Tree.

name: Ehecatl
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Ehecatl, you may roll the 20-sided die three times. For each roll of 13 or higher, an opponent of your choice must choose one of their figures within 5 clear sight spaces of Ehecatl to receive a wound, if possible.
ability_2_desc: When Ehecatl rolls defense dice against an attacking figure that is not adjacent, add 2 dice to Ehecatl.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ehecatl's movement, ignore elevations. Ehecatl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ehecatl starts to fly, if they are engaged they will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Elder Oak
ability_1_desc: Before moving this Elder Oak, choose up to 2 unengaged small or medium friendly figures adjacent to it. After you move this Elder Oak, place the chosen figures adjacent to it.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 2 spaces of this Elder Oak, and its base is no more than 3 levels above this Elder Oak's height or 3 levels below this Elder Oak's base, this Elder Oak may add 1 to its range when attacking that figure.
ability_3_desc: While on a Molten Lava or Lava Field space, this Elder Oak rolls 3 fewer defense dice.

name: Ejhin of Vanth
ability_1_desc: When a small or medium common figure is destroyed within 8 clear sight spaces of Ejhin of Vanth, place that figure on this Army Card. If Order Marker 1 is placed on Ejhin of Vanth, before taking a turn with her roll the 20-sided die for each figure on this Army Card. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may, if possible, place one of your previous destroyed small or medium Undead common figure on an empty space within 3 clear sight spaces of Ejhin of Vanth. After placing an Undead figure, remove a figure from this Army Card.
ability_2_desc: All Undead you control move one additional space.

name: Elisabeth Cairnwillow
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Elisabeth Cairnwillow, the defending figure receives 1 less defense die for each Wound Marker on the defending figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 less defense dice for Witherblade. When defending with Elisabeth Cairnwillow, the attacking figure receives 1 less attack die for each Wound Marker on the attacking figure's Army Card, to a maximum of 3 less attack dice for Witherblade.

name: Elincia, The Elf Warrior
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 2. Elincia, The Elf Warrior can't use this ability if she is engaged in battle.
ability_2_desc: Before moving Elincia, The Elf Warrior, choose an unengaged friendly small or medium figure adjacent to Elincia, The Elf Warrior. After you move Elincia, The Elf Warrior, place the chosen figure adjacent to Elincia, The Elf Warrior.

name: ATOMICS
ability_1_desc: Choose a space within 6 clear sight spaces of the figure who controls this glyph. Any figure on the chosen space is affected as are all adjacent figures and figures within 2 spaces. All squad figures on the space or within one space roll 2 less defense dice. All squad figures 2 spaces away roll one less defense die. Roll attack dice once for all affected figures. This glyph may only be used once.

name: Elite Rebel Trooper
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if another unit in this squad attacks the same target, add one attack die to the 2nd unit's attack.

name: Elaria the Pale
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's Squad figure moves adjacent to Elaria the Pale and onto a space where that Squad figure can end its movement, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, Elaria the Pale may immediately move up to 4 spaces. Elaria the Pale will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moving with Slippery. Elaria the Pale can use this power only if she ends her Slippery move not adjacent to any enemy figures. You may not roll for Slippery more than once during any turn.
ability_2_desc: After a Tricky figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of Elaria the Pale rolls the 20-sided die for a special power on its Army Card, you may add 1 to your die roll. Queen of Thieves does not affect Elaria the Pale.

name: Ellana
ability_1_desc: When Ellana attacks, she may attack one additional time.

name: Elite Hoth Trooper
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if another unit in this squad attacks the same target, add one attack die to the 2nd unit's attack.

name: Enslaved Gladiators
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Enslaved Gladiators, you may first take a turn with any unique Human Gladiator you control.

name: Elia Van Nessing
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. When attacking Wolves, Devourers, or Undead, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: When adjacent to ruins or walls, Elia cannot be targeted by normal ranged attacks.
ability_3_desc: While bearing the Heirloom of Annellintia, Elia is protected against curses like Lycanthropy, Chilling Touch, Life Drain, Soul Devour, and Mind Shackle. If targeted by these powers, you must counter-roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 4 or higher, Elia is safe. If you roll a 1-3, place a black Affliction Marker on Elia's Army Card. While Afflicted, Elia cannot use Special Abilities or defend against attacks. Each time you take a turn with Elia, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, remove the Affliction Marker.

name: Drogon
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 4. Choose 8 spaces in a straight line from Drogon. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Drogon's Fire Line Special Attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Drogon's movement, ignore elevations. Drogon may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Drogon starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ert the Underling Pit Fighter
ability_1_desc: When Ert is engaged with only the figure he is attacking, add 1 die to his attack.
ability_2_desc: Ert does not roll any defence dice when attacked by a non-adjacent figure.

name: Easterling Spearmen
ability_1_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to any Easterling Spearman may not move. Figures affected by the Halberd ability cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, an Easterling Spearman adds 1 to its defense dice.

name: ENTINDARK
ability_1_desc: When Entindark attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Entindark's movement, ignore elevations. Entindark may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Entindark starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Enchanted Tree
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with an Enchanted Tree, you may first take a turn with any Unique Feylundian Hero you control. The Hero must be within six clear sight spaces of an Enchanted Tree to be activated with Feylund Hero Bonding.
ability_2_desc: You may place only one Enchanted Tree on the board at the start of the game. Place the remainder on this card. At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, you may place two Enchanted Trees from this card onto the battlefield. Trees placed with Enchanted Forest must be within four clear sight spaces of an Enchanted Tree you control.
ability_3_desc: Friendly small and medium figures adjacent to an Enchanted Tree add 1 to their defence dice when defending against an attack from a non-adjacent figure.

name: Enchanted Tree
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with an Enchanted Tree, you may first take a turn with any Unique Feylundian Hero you control. The Hero must be within six clear sight spaces of an Enchanted Tree to be activated with Feylund Hero Bonding.
ability_2_desc: You may start the game with any number of Enchanted trees on this card. At the start of each round, before you place Order Markers, you may place an Enchanted Tree from this card onto the battlefield. Trees placed with Enchanted Forest must be within four clear sight spaces of an Enchanted Tree you control.
ability_3_desc: Friendly small and medium figures adjacent to an Enchanted Tree add 2 to their defence dice when defending against an attack from a non-adjacent figure.

name: Esky Yupic
ability_1_desc: When Esky Yupic attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If Espy Yupic is in an Ice or Snow terrain when defending, then add one more dice to your defense roll.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Esenwein Blood Mage
ability_1_desc: Each time this Esenwein Blood Mage destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. This Blood Mage cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_2_desc: When attacking normally with this Esenwein Blood Mage, or any Undead figure you control within 6 clear sight spaces of this Blood Mage, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, after attacking you must place a wound marker on this Blood Mage's Army Card.

name: Entrean the Elder
ability_1_desc: All Evergreen Trees are Destructible Objects with Defense 3 and Life 7. Before taking a turn with Entrean the Elder, move any or all Evergreen Trees within 4 clear sight spaces of him up to one space each, if possible.
ability_2_desc: When attacking a small, medium, or large figure, if Entrean the Elder rolls at least 3 skulls, for the duration of the round, the defending figure can't move or attack with leaving engagement attacks. If the defending figure is adjacent to one or more Evergreen Trees, instead destroy the defending figure.

name: Eradicator
ability_1_desc: After rolling for initiative but before anyone takes a turn, choose an opponent. That opponent must show you their Order Markers.
ability_2_desc: When Eradicator attacks, he may attack one additional time. If he is attacking an adjacent figure or a figure he has previously wounded this turn, he rolls one additional die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Eradicator's movement, ignore elevations. Eradicator may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Eradicator starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: EMET
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a Unique Hero to be Emet's Creator. Emet rolls 1 additional attack die while adjacent to his Creator. Emet's Creator rolls 2 additional defense dice while Adjacent to Emet.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Emet, you may first take a turn with its Creator, if it is still under your control. An opponent can not take control of Emet while its Creator is under your Control.
ability_3_desc: All Small or Medium opponent's figures that enter or or occupy a space adjacent to Emet may not move. Figures affected by Clay Embrace may not be moved by and special power on any Army Card or glyph.
ability_4_desc: When Emet is on a water space he rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: ENT OF FANGORN
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose up to 3 small or medium figures within 6 clear sight spaces of this Ent of Fangorn that are adjacent to a tree, bush or another friendly Ent. Roll the 20-sided die for each figure. If you roll a 14 or higher, the chosen figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. Any figures adjacent to the chosen figure are also affected by Boulder Throw Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. This Ent of Fangorn can be affected by his own Boulder Throw Special Attack. This Ent of Fangorn may only use Boulder Throw Special Attack once per round.

name: Fire Beetle
ability_1_desc: After a friendly Insect within 3 clear sight spaces of this Fire Beetle rolls for defense, you may immediately move this Fire Beetle adjacent to the attacking figure and attack it with a normal attack.

name: Orc Pawn
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Orc Pawn, you can take a turn with any insect you control.

name: Erevan Sunshadow
ability_1_desc: Range 5. Attack Special. Each time you attack with Fire Blast Special Attack, you may choose to roll 2, 3, or 4 attack dice. If a skull is rolled on every die, you may attack again with Fire Blast Special Attack. You may continue attacking with Fire Blast Special Attack until you do not roll a skull on every die.
ability_2_desc: When Erevan Sunshadow rolls defense dice against an attacking figure who is not adjacent, add 1 defense die to the defense roll.
