Abomination rolls 3 less attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap. Abomination will take any leaving engagement attacks when he Super Leaps. Abomination never takes any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, Abomination always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. All figures and ITFs adjacent to Abomination are affected.
ability_4_desc: After taking a turn with Abomination, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher remove one wound marker from Abomination's card.

name: Batgirl
ability_1_desc: At any point during Batgirl's move she may move 1 space that ignores elevations. Outside of her turn Batgirl may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Batgirl rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Batgirl may take from this attack is one. If Batgirl takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move her 2 spaces.
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. When Batgirl attacks with her Batarang Special Attack she may attack 1 additional time.

name: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 9. If 3 Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. all target the same figure or ITF they may roll their attack dice as one combined, 9 dice attack. The defending figure compares height to the lowest Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. to determine any height advantage.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. you may move any 3 Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. you control that did not attack this turn up to 3 spaces each.

name: Robin
ability_1_desc: Dick Grayson is a member of the Batman Family who has been a superhero most of his life and has and held several aliases. His parents were the Flying Graysons, acrobats performing with him alongside in the traveling Haly's Circus. They were tragically murdered by a mobster in Gotham City named Tony Zucco, and millionaire Bruce Wayne adopted him as his legal ward at a very young age. Grayson went through extensive training in martial arts and crime fighting to become the original Robin, Batman's sidekick. Many years later when he had outgrown the position, he took the name and costume of Nightwing. (Jason Todd was his successor, followed by Tim Drake.) As an adult he becomes Batman to replace Bruce Wayne during Battle for the Cowl, alongside Damian Wayne as his Robin. Since Bruce's return they operate simultaneously as part of Batman Incorporated. He was also a founding member and leader of the Teen Titans, and has been on the Outsiders, and currently the Justice League of America.
ability_2_desc: Grayson went through extensive training in martial arts and crime fighting to become the original Robin, Batman's sidekick.
ability_3_desc: Many years later when he had outgrown the position, he took the name and costume of Nightwing. (Jason Todd was his successor, followed by Tim Drake.)
ability_4_desc: As an adult he becomes Batman to replace Bruce Wayne during Battle for the Cowl, alongside Damian Wayne as his Robin. Since Bruce's return they operate simultaneously as part of Batman Incorporated. He was also a founding member and leader of the Teen Titans, and has been on the Outsiders, and currently the Justice League of America.

name: Martian Manhunter
ability_1_desc: J'onn has innate telepathic abilities used to communicate and form psychic bonds with others.
ability_2_desc: J'onn is able to shapeshift into human-like forms, adopting appearances such as 'John Jones' to blend in with humans.
ability_3_desc: Like all Martians, J'onn has a psychosomatic fear of fire that can cause intense stress.
ability_4_desc: Meanwhile on the planet Earth, a would-be scientist named Dr. Saul Erdel developed a transmitter machine based upon ancient Martian technology. Seeking to make contact with extraterrestrial life, he aimed his device towards the vicinity of Mars and activated it. The transmitter beam streaked across both space and time, striking the Martian Manhunter at a point in time several centuries before Erdel would even be born. The beam brought J'onn back to Erdel's natural time era, where he collapsed on the ground outside of the doctor's Colorado laboratory.

name: Amon Sur
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Yellow Battery markers on this card. Add one to Amon Sur's Move, Range, Attack and Defense numbers for each Yellow Battery marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Anytime Amon Sur, or any friendly figure or ITF within 4 clear sight spaces of Amon Sur is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally you may remove one Yellow Battery marker from this card and ignore that attack.
ability_3_desc: Remove 1 wound marker from Amon Sur's card at the beginning of each round that Amon Sur is still in play, before order markers are placed.
ability_4_desc: All opponents' figures adjacent to Amon Sur subtract 1 from their defense, down to a minimum of 1.

name: Giant Mechanical Penguins
ability_1_desc: Only the Penguin can operate the Giant Mechanical Penguins. If the Penguin is destroyed all Giant Mechanical Penguins are also destroyed. When a Giant Mechanical Penguin is destroyed place wreckage in the space that it occupied.
ability_2_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When attacking with a Giant Mechanical Penguin, roll 1 additional attack die for every wound that has been inflicted this turn by any other Giant Mechanical Penguin(s) that you control.

name: Daredevil
ability_1_desc: Instead of moving normally Daredevil may Baton Swing Line. Baton Swing Line has a move of 3 and ignores elevations. Daredevil will not take any leaving engagement attacks when he uses Baton Swing Line. Outside of his turn Daredevil may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: If Daredevil is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 13 or higher, Daredevil takes no damage and may immediately move using his Baton Swing Line Special Power.
ability_3_desc: Daredevil receives 1 automatic skull when he attacks. After he attacks he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_4_desc: Daredevil may ignore the effects of any special ability with the word Fear in its title.

name: Deadpool
ability_1_desc: When an opponent's figure that is within 6 clear sight spaces of Deadpool targets a figure, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher that figure must attack Deadpool if possible.
ability_2_desc: When Deadpool attacks an adjacent figure, subtract 1 die from their defense. After Deadpool attacks once he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Remove 1 wound marker from Deadpool's card: After taking a turn with Deadpool. At the beginning of each round that Deadpool is still in play, before order markers are placed.
ability_4_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of Deadpool.

name: Human Torch
ability_1_desc: His mutation allows him to envelop his body in fiery plasma without harm to himself. While in this state he is able to fly at supersonic speeds by providing thrust behind himself with his own flame, and to project powerful streams and/or balls of flame. The plasma field immediately surrounding his body is sufficiently hot enough to vaporize projectiles that approach him, including but not limited to bullets.
ability_2_desc: Storm refers to his maximum flame output as his "nova flame," which he can release omnidirectionally, although this usually weakens him.
ability_3_desc: Storm has demonstrated enough control that he can hold a person while in his flame form without his passenger feeling discomforting heat.
ability_4_desc: Storm's ability to ignite himself is limited by the quantity of oxygen in his environment, and his personal flame has been extinguished by sufficient quantities of water, flame retardant foam, and vacuum environments. He can reignite instantly once oxygen is returned, with no ill effects.

name: Hal Jordan
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Green Battery markers on this card. Add one to Hal Jordan's Move, Range, Attack and Defense numbers for each Green Battery marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Anytime Hal Jordan, or any friendly figure or ITF within 4 clear sight spaces of Hal Jordan is attacked, and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally you may remove one Green Battery marker from this card and ignore that attack.
ability_3_desc: Hal Jordan may ignore the effects of any special ability with the word Fear in its title.

name: John Stewart Green Lantern
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Green Battery markers on this card. Add one to John Stewart's Move, Range, Attack and Defense numbers for each Green Battery marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Anytime John Stewart, or any friendly figure or ITF within 8 clear sight spaces of John Stewart is attacked, and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally you may remove one Green Battery marker from this card and ignore that attack.

name: Kilowog
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 3 Green Battery markers on this card. Add one to Kilowog's Move, Range, Attack and Defense numbers for each Green Battery marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Anytime Kilowog, or any friendly figure or ITF within 4 clear sight spaces of Kilowog is attacked, and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally you may remove one Green Battery marker from this card and ignore that attack.
ability_3_desc: Kilowog receives 1 extra attack die when he attacks an adjacent figure.

name: Doombots
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with the Doombots, you may take a turn with Doctor Doom if you control him.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 6. Instead of its normal attack a Doombot may self destruct. All figures and ITFs adjacent to the Doombot are affected. After it self destructs the Doombot is destroyed.
ability_3_desc: If you control Doctor Doom, and he is destroyed, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher you may immediately replace a currently in play Doombot figure with Doctor Doom. Afterwards, remove all wound markers on Doctor Doom's card.
ability_4_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of a Doombot.

name: Invisible Woman
ability_1_desc: At any point during Invisible Woman's move she may move 1 space that ignores elevations. Outside of her turn Invisible Woman may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice for Invisible Woman, as well as any figures that you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Invisible Woman, you may re-roll any dice that show a Skull once.
ability_3_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of Invisible Woman.

name: Jessica Jones
ability_1_desc: Instead of taking a normal move Jessica Jones may Leap. Leap has a move of 3 and ignores elevations. Jessica Jones will not take any leaving engagement attacks when she Leaps. Jessica Jones never takes any type of falling damage.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Jessica Jones rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Jessica Jones may take from this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of Jessica Jones.

name: Thanos
ability_1_desc: Thanos possesses the superhuman physiology of all Eternals, granting him superhuman strength, endurance, reflexes, and agility.
ability_2_desc: He is an accomplished hand-to-hand combatant, having been trained in the art of war on Titan.
ability_3_desc: His skin is nearly invulnerable, particularly against heat, cold, electricity, radiation, toxins, aging, and disease, and he can survive indefinitely without food or water even before his 'curse' from Death left him immortal, unable to die.
ability_4_desc: His mind is also invulnerable to most forms of psychic attack, and can project a psionic blast of energy as well as blasts of plasma/cosmic energy from his eyes and hands.

name: KA-ZAR
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on Ka-Zar, and after taking a turn with Ka-Zar, you may take a turn with Zabu.
ability_2_desc: If Ka-Zar does not attack this turn you may add 2 to his move number.
ability_3_desc: When defending, Ka-Zar receives 1 extra defense die for each wound marker on this card.
ability_4_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.

name: Winter Soldier
ability_1_desc: Believed dead near the end of World War II, Russian General Vasily Karpov and the crew of a Soviet patrol submarine find Bucky's cold-preserved body, missing one arm. Bucky is revived in Moscow, but suffers brain damage with amnesia as a result of the explosion that incapacitated him. Scientists attach a bionic arm, constantly upgrading it as technology improves.
ability_2_desc: Programmed to be a Soviet assassin for Department X – under the code name the Winter Soldier – he is sent on covert wetworks missions and becomes increasingly ruthless and efficient as he kills in the name of the Soviet state. While a Soviet agent, Captain America's former sidekick also has a brief relationship with The Black Widow. The Winter Soldier is kept in a cryogenic stasis when not on missions, and as a result has aged only a few years to a young adult since the closing days of World War II.
ability_3_desc: The Winter Soldier is kept in a cryogenic stasis when not on missions, and as a result has aged only a few years to a young adult since the closing days of World War II.

name: Harley Quinn
ability_1_desc: If Harley Quinn is attacked and at least one skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, Harley Quinn takes no damage and may immediately move 2 spaces. Harley Quinn will not take any leaving engagement attacks when she moves with Acrobatic Reflexes.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Lob 6. Attack 4. Choose a space to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. All figures or ITFs in or adjacent to the chosen space are also affected. Harley Quinn can be affected by her own attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures.
ability_3_desc: Harley Quinn is not affected by any Special Ability with the word Venom or Poison in its title.

name: Ninjas of the Hand
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with the Ninjas of the Hand, you may take a turn with any Unique Ninja Hero that you control.

name: Luke Cage
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and before taking a turn with Luke Cage, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher you may take a turn with any Defender that you control.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Luke Cage rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Luke Cage may take from this attack is one.
ability_3_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to Luke Cage may add 1 to their defense.

name: Lockjaw
ability_1_desc: Once per round, instead of moving Lockjaw normally, you may choose any empty space within 10 spaces of Lockjaw. You may also choose up to three Tiny, Small, or Medium figures that are within 3 clear sight spaces of Lockjaw. Place Lockjaw on the chosen space and place the chosen figure(s) on any empty space(s) adjacent to Lockjaw. Figures moved with Teleport 10 never take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When rolling against figures leaving an engagement with him a figure may not leave engagement with Lockjaw if he rolls a skull or a blank.

name: Joker
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Joker rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Joker may take from this attack is one.
ability_2_desc: After moving and before attacking you may either: • Roll 1 attack die. If you roll a skull all figures adjacent to Joker receive 1 point of unblockable damage. • Or choose one figure up to 3 clear sight spaces away. Roll 1 attack die. If you roll a skull that figure receives 1 point of unblockable damage.
ability_3_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. When Joker attacks with his Deadly Comic Props Special Attack, he may attack 1 additional time.
ability_4_desc: Range 5. Lob 14. Attack 4. Choose a space to attack. No clear line of sight is needed. All figures or ITFs in or adjacent to the chosen space are also affected. Joker can be affected by his own attack. Roll 4 attack dice once for all affected figures.

name: Moloids
ability_1_desc: You may move up to 6 Moloids that you control each turn. However, you may attack with only 3 Moloids. You may attack with any 3 Moloids, even Moloids that you did not move this turn.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack Special. Moloids that are adjacent to the same enemy figure may roll their attack dice as one combined attack. If 2 Moloids are attacking with Sheer Numbers Special Attack, roll 4 attack dice. If 3, roll 6 dice. The defending figure compares height to the lowest combined Moloid attack to determine any height advantage.

name: Loki
ability_1_desc: After revealing both a numbered order marker, and an "X" order marker on this card, instead of moving Loki normally, you may choose any empty space that is within 10 spaces of Loki. Place Loki on the chosen space. When Loki starts to Teleport, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When Loki is targeted by a non-adjacent attack roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher (6 or higher for a single squad or Dimwitted figure), the opposing figure cannot target Loki for their attack, and may switch targets.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense, Loki always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_4_desc: While Loki is in play your team receives one additional "X" order marker.

name: Nick Fury
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, you may take a turn with a squad of Agents that you control. You may choose who goes first, Nick Fury or the Agents.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_3_desc: If you control Nick Fury, and he is destroyed, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher you may immediately replace a currently in play Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. figure that you control with Nick Fury. Afterwards, remove all wound markers on Nick Fury's card.

name: MR. FREEZE
ability_1_desc: When taking a turn with Mr. Freeze, if he is on a snow or ice space, or adjacent to a glacier, add one attack die.
ability_2_desc: After moving, and before attacking, choose an opponent's small or medium figure within 5 clear sight spaces of Mr. Freeze. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher the chosen figure cannot roll any defense dice if attacked by Mr. Freeze this turn. In addition, if you roll a 20, inflict 1 wound to that figure.
ability_3_desc: Mr. Freeze is not affected by any Special Ability with the word Venom or Poison in its title.
ability_4_desc: Double all wounds that Mr. Freeze sustains from any Special Ability with the word Fire or Flame in its title. This also includes wounds from burning wreckage and lava fields.

name: Rhino
ability_1_desc: If Rhino moves 6 or more spaces, and then targets a figure or an ITF, he receives 2 extra attack dice. When he moves he may not enter the same space more than once.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, Rhino always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_3_desc: You can never place more than 2 order markers on Rhino's card, even if he is the last figure you control.

name: Query & Echo
ability_1_desc: When either Query or Echo roll defense dice 1 shield will block all damage.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 8. If Query and Echo both target the same figure or ITF they may roll their attack dice as one combined, 8 dice attack. The defending figure compares height to the lowest of either Query or Echo to determine any height advantage.
ability_3_desc: If either Query, or Echo, is destroyed, after the remaining figure attacks once she may attack 1 additional time.

name: Parademons
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with the Parademons, you may take a turn with Darkseid if you control him.
ability_2_desc: You may move up to 4 Parademons that you control each turn. However, you may only attack with 2 Parademons.
ability_3_title: Advanced Apokaliptan Targeting System Special Attack
ability_3_desc: Range 5. Attack 8. If 2 Parademons target the same figure or ITF they may roll their attack dice as one combined, 8 dice attack. The defending figure compares height to the lowest Parademon to determine any height advantage.
ability_4_desc: You can never place more than 2 order markers on the Parademon's card, even if they are the last figures you control.

name: Ocean Master
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 12 Shallow Water markers on this card.
ability_2_desc: Ocean Master does not have to stop his movement when entering a water space. If Ocean Master starts his turn on a water space, add 3 to his movement for that turn.
ability_3_desc: Instead of attacking, Ocean Master may remove up to 4 Shallow Water markers from this card and place them within 0 - 5 clear sight spaces of him. All figures in the same space with, or adjacent to, a just placed Shallow Water marker(s) must roll 1 die unblockable damage. Afterwards, all figures receiving a wound may be moved one space in any direction by the player controlling Ocean Master. Ocean Master cannot be affected by this attack.
ability_4_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When attacking with Lightning Trident Special Attack, if Ocean Master targets a figure on or adjacent to a water space double all skulls.

name: Robin
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with Robin, you may take a turn with Batman if you control him.
ability_2_desc: At any point during Robin's move he may move 1 space that ignores elevations. Outside of his turn Robin may ignore any type of falling damage.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice, if Robin rolls at least one shield, the most wounds Robin may take from this attack is one. If Robin takes no damage from the attack you may immediately move him 2 spaces.

name: Supergirl
ability_1_desc: If Supergirl does not attack this turn she may add 4 to her move number.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, Supergirl always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When attacking with Supergirl's Heat Vision Special Attack all blanks count as skulls.
ability_4_desc: Any attack that has the word Magic in its title, or is from a Kryptonian, negates Supergirl's Girl of Steel Special Ability.

name: Wonder Woman
ability_1_desc: Wonder Woman has super-strength, drawn from the Earth spirit Gaea as blessed by Demeter, the goddess of agriculture and fertility.
ability_2_desc: Granted by Hermes, the messenger god of speed, Diana has superhuman speed and the ability to fly.
ability_3_desc: Wonder Woman has invulnerability and unbreakable bracelets.
ability_4_desc: Wonder Woman possesses a magic lasso that compels people to tell the truth.

name: Luke Skywalker
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_title: The Force Is Strong With This One...
ability_2_desc: When Luke Skywalker attacks with his normal attack all blanks count as skulls.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. When Luke Skywalker attacks with his Blaster Barrage Special Attack he may attack 1 additional time.

name: Superman
ability_1_desc: If Superman does not attack this turn he may add 4 to his move number.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense, Superman always adds 2 automatic shields.
ability_3_desc: Range 6. Attack 4. When attacking with Superman's Heat Vision special attack all blanks count as skulls. Superman cannot use his Heat Vision Special Attack on Humans.
ability_4_desc: Any attack that has the word Magic in its title, or is from a Kryptonian, negates Superman's Man of Steel Special Ability.

name: Trench Monster
ability_1_desc: When this Trench Monster attacks he recieves one extra attack die for each wound marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: When the Trench Monster attacks he may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: • The Trench Monster must start the game on a water space. • The Trench Monster cannot enter a non water space. • The Trench Monster figures may never enter or be placed on a Shallow Water space.

name: The Riddler
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with The Riddler, you may take a turn with any Henchmen that you control.
ability_2_desc: Start the game with 3 extra dice for this card. Before either attacking, or defending, The Riddler player may secretly hide 1, 2, or 3 extra dice in his hand. Once completed his opponent gets a chance to guess the number of dice that are hidden in his hand: • If he guesses successfully The Riddler may only attack, or defend, with his normal dice. • If he does not guess correctly then The Riddler may add the number of dice in his hand to his normal attack, or defense.
ability_3_desc: An opponent can never take temporary or permanent control of The Riddler.

name: Human Torch
ability_1_desc: Range 2. Attack 4. All figures and ITFs within 2 spaces of the Human Torch are affected. After the Human Torch attacks with his Nova Flame Special Attack place 1 wound marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: If Human Torch does not attack this turn he may add 3 to his move number.
ability_3_desc: The Human Torch never rolls for molten lava or lava field damage and he does not have to stop on molten lava spaces.
ability_4_desc: Double all wounds that the Human Torch sustains from any Special Ability with the word Water in its title. If the Human Torch starts his turn in a water space he loses all of his Special Abilities for that turn.

name: The Thing
ability_1_desc: When defending against an attack with The Thing, each shield rolled counts for one additional block.
ability_2_desc: When The Thing attacks he may attack any or all figures and ITFs adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: If there are 3 or more wound markers on this card, when The Thing attacks, all blanks count as Skulls.
ability_4_desc: When The Thing takes enough wounds to destroy him immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher do not remove The Thing. Instead add or subtract enough wound markers on this card to bring the total up to 5.

name: Zatanna
ability_1_desc: Zatanna is the daughter of adventurer John Zatara and his wife Sindella, and a member of the mystic tribe of sorcerers called the Hidden Ones, or Homo Magi. Zatanna inherited her mother's ability to manipulate magic and her father's penchant for heroism. Sindella later faked her own death to return the Hidden One's sanctum in Turkey, leaving her daughter in John Zatara's care.
ability_2_desc: Zatara traveled the world with his daughter and taught her to harness her magical abilities. Zatanna was later raised by strangers, however, when the evil witch Allura cursed Zatanna and prevented her from seeing her father. Zatanna was left to search fruitlessly for her natural parents.
ability_3_desc: Zatanna discovered her father's diary and created a stage persona for herself. With a name like Zatanna Zatara, becoming a professional stage magician almost seems like an unquestionable career choice. Of course, it doesn't hurt that the illusions she creates and the spells she weaves to dazzle the audience just so happen to be real.
ability_4_desc: Her quest to find her father led her into a brief affair with John Constantine. Later, with the help of the Justice League of America, Zatanna was able to lift Allura's curse and reunite with her father and later her mother. Tragically, Sindella died rescuing her daughter from the city of the Hidden Ones, while her father died saving her and the spiritual dimensions from the Great Evil Beast.

name: Valkyrie
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense, Valkyrie always adds 1 automatic shield.
ability_2_title: At the Side of the Slain 10
ability_2_desc: Whenever any Unique or Uncommon Hero within 10 spaces of Valkyrie is destroyed, you may immediately place Valkyrie in any space the destroyed figure occupied. Valkyrie will not take any leaving engagement attacks when moved in this way.
ability_3_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. When Valkyrie attacks with her Dragonfang Special Attack, she may attack 1 additional time.

name: Wasp
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with Wasp, you may take a turn with any other Unique Hero that you control. During this turn the chosen Unique Hero cannot attack, only move.
ability_2_desc: All opponents figures adjacent to Wasp subtract 1 die from both their attack and their defense.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice 1 shield will block all damage. If Wasp takes no damage from the attack, you may immediately move her 2 spaces.
ability_4_desc: Figures attacked by Wasp cannot roll defense dice.

name: Wolverine
ability_1_desc: If Wolverine is attacked roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher Wolverine takes no damage from the attack.
ability_2_desc: When Wolverine attacks he may attack 1 additional time. Figures roll 2 less defense dice when attacked by Wolverine.
ability_3_desc: Remove 1 wound marker from Wolverine's card: • After taking a turn with Wolverine. • At the beginning of each round that Wolverine is still in play, before order markers are placed.
ability_4_desc: Wolverine is not affected by any Special Ability with the word Venom or Poison in its title.

name: Grom Hellscream
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Grom Hellscream, if the defending figure receives at least one wound, you may roll one unblockable attack die. If a skull is rolled, the defending figure receives on additional wound.
ability_2_desc: If Grom Hellscream destroys a figure, if possible, he must attack again.

name: TRIPLICATE GIRL
ability_1_title: SPLIT THE ONE, MERGE THE THREE
ability_1_desc:
Start the game with one Triplicate Girl on the battlefield and two on this card. After revealing an order marker on this card, and before taking your turn, Triplicate Girl may either Split, or Merge.

• Split: Place any Triplicate Girl on this card adjacent to any Triplicate Girl currently on the battlefield.

• Merge: Remove all but one Triplicate Girl from the battlefield and place them on this card. Removed Triplicate Girls will not take any leaving engagements attacks.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice you may add in the defense of each Triplicate Girl on this card.
ability_3_desc:
Range 1. Attack Special.
If two or more Triplicate Girls all target the same figure or ITF they may combine their attack dice into a single roll. The defending figure compares height to the lowest Triplicate Girl to determine any height advantage.

name: Arkillo
ability_1_desc: Start the game with 4 Yellow Battery markers on this card. Add one to Arkillo's Move, Range, Attack and Defense numbers for each Yellow Battery marker on this card.
ability_2_desc: Anytime Arkillo, or any friendly figure or ITF within 4 clear sight spaces of Arkillo is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, instead of rolling defense dice normally you may remove one Yellow Battery marker from this card and ignore that attack.
ability_3_desc: All opponents' figures adjacent to Arkillo subtract 2 from their defense, down to a minimum of 1.

name: Joker Goons
ability_1_desc: After revealing an order marker on this card, and after taking a turn with the Joker Goons, you may take a turn with any Unique Hero with the Insane personality that you control.
ability_2_desc: If a Unique Hero that you control with the Insane personality receives one or more wounds from an attack, instead of giving that Hero those wounds you may destroy a Joker Goon that you control. The destroyed Joker Goon must be within 5 clear sight spaces of the Unique Hero.

name: Grut Skeletusks
ability_1_desc: Grut Skeletusks add 2 to their attack when attacking destructible objects.
ability_2_title: Two Heads Are Better Than One
ability_2_desc: If two or more Grut Skeletusks are adjacent to one another and adjacent to a destructible object, they may combine their attack dice when attacking it.
ability_3_desc: If a Grut Skeletusk destroys a figure or destructible object, it may move into the space that was occupied by that figure or object.

name: Ny-Gi-Ra
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice from an attack from a nonadjacent figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: All Hunters you control add one defense die for each adjacent hunter that follows Utgar, to a maxium of +2 dice for the Hunting Pack Tactics Power. Ny-Gi-Ra does not gain this benefit although he can provide it.
ability_3_desc: Ny-Gi-Ra cannot be bonded with non-Utgar units and counts as a hunter.

name: Grishnákh, Captain
ability_1_desc: Each friendly figure adjacent to Grishnákh with a Relentless personality receives an additional attack die.
ability_2_desc: If Grishnákh receives enough wounds to be destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 20, ignore any wounds just received.

name: Guards of the Citadel
ability_1_desc: If none of the Guards of the Citadel move this turn, add one die to their attack.
ability_2_desc: If there is only one unrevealed Order Marker on any Guards of the Citadel Army Card you control, all Guards of the Citadel you control add 2 to their defense dice.

name: Ground Assault Drone
ability_1_desc: If this Ground Assault Drone did not move this turn, add 6 to its Range and 1 to its Attack values.
ability_2_desc: Instead of its normal move, up to 6 Ground Assault Drones you control may Tactical Leap. Tactical Leap has a move of 5. When counting spaces for Tactical Leap movement, ignore elevations. This Ground Assault Drone may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. This Ground Assault Drone may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If this Ground Assault Drone is engaged when it starts to leap, it will take any leaving engagement attacks. This Ground Assault Drone cannot attack on any turn that it used Tactical Leap.

name: Grishnakh
ability_1_desc: Grishnakh can eat up to 5 trees per game. Remove them from play.

name: Guardian Naga
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Mystic Purge Special Attack can be used to attack only Undead or Demon figures.
ability_2_desc: Whenever an opponent rolls the 20-sided die against a figure you control with 4 clear sight spaces of this Guardian Naga, then you may choose to subtract 1 from whatever is rolled on the 20-sided die.
ability_3_desc: This Guardian Naga do not have to stop its movement when entering water spaces.

name: Guile
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 3. The Sonic Boom Special Attack can only be used on figures whose base is on the same level as Guile's base. If Guile's Sonic Boom Special Attack inflicts a wound, remove one unrevealed order marker at random from that figure's Army Card (or cards if your opponent has more than one Common card for that figure).
ability_2_desc: If Guile did not move this turn, add 2 to his attack dice. When Guile attacks a figure with the Flying special ability, add 2 additional attack dice.

name: Guenhwyvar
ability_1_desc: If Guenhwyvar does not start the game on the battlefield, she must first be summoned by Drizzt Do'Urden.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack 4. If Guenhwyvar is unengaged when revealing the 1 order marker on her card, Guenhwyvar may use Lying in Wait Special Attack instead of attacking normally. To use Lying in Wait, after moving choose an adjacent small, medium, or large figure. The defending figure receives a wound for every skull and cannot roll any defense dice.

name: GUG
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, choose one small or medium figure adjacent to Gug. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure place it on Gug's card. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20 sided die. On a roll of 14 or higher place the chosen Hero on Gug's card. There may never be more than 2 figures on Gug's card.
ability_2_desc: At the end of the round, destroy all figures on this card. For each figure destroyed remove a wound marker from this card.
ability_3_desc: If Gug is destroyed, place all figures on this card onto a space previously occupied by Gug if possible.

name: Gummy
ability_1_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Gummy may not move. Figures affected by Gum Clamp may be moved by special powers or Glyphs.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, Gummy adds 1 die.
ability_3_desc: Gummy does not have to stop his movement when entering water spaces.
ability_4_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Gummy may add 2 to his height.

name: Gurei-Oni
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from a non-adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: Range 1 Attack 3. Choose a figure to attack. You may also choose one figure adjacent to the targeted figure to be affected by the Tetsubo Special Attack as well. Roll attack dice once for both figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.

name: EINAR
ability_1_desc: If the Elite is targeted, roll the twenty sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the Elite can no longer be targeted for the rest of that cards turn.
ability_2_desc: Special Attack Range 5An Elite may choose to attack one figure three times with 2, 3, and 4, or three figures with 2.

name: Wolverine
ability_1_desc: Wolverine is a mutant who possesses the ability to regenerate damaged or destroyed areas of his cellular structure at a rate far greater than that of an ordinary human. This healing ability enabled the supersoldier program Weapon X to bond the near indestructible metal alloy adamantium to his skeleton and claws without killing him. The claws are retractable one-foot long claws, three in each arm, that are housed beneath the skin and muscle of his forearms. Wolverine can, at will, release these slightly curved claws through his skin beneath the knuckles on each hand. The skin between the knuckles tears and bleeds, but the blood loss is quickly halted by his healing factor.
ability_2_desc: Wolverine's natural healing also affords him virtual immunity to poisons and most drugs, as well as an enhanced resistance to diseases. For example, it is nearly impossible for him to become intoxicated from drinking alcohol.
ability_3_desc: Wolverine's healing factor provides him with an extended lifespan by slowing the effects of the aging process. Although over a century old, Wolverine is as healthy and physically fit as a man in his prime.
ability_4_desc: Despite the extent of his healing factor, Wolverine is not immortal. If the injuries are extensive enough, especially if they result in the loss of vital organs, large amounts of blood, and/or loss of physical form, such as having flesh burned away by fire or acid, Wolverine can die.

name: Haradrim Chieftan
ability_1_title: Spear Of The South Special Attack
ability_1_desc: Range 2. Attack 4. A Haradrim Chieftan may only use his Spear Of The South Special Attack against a unit that is no more than 5 levels above or below him.
ability_2_desc: All friendly Haradrim adjacent to Haradrim Standard-bearer add 1 to their defense dice.

name: Harnum Firebelly
ability_1_desc: After taking a turn with Harnum Firebelly, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher Harnum Firebelly rolls two automatic shields when defending against an attack until the next time you reveal an Order Marker. You may also remove any markers that were placed on this Army Card by a special power.

name: Haradrim Infantry
ability_1_desc: After a Haradrim Infantryman you control rolls defense dice against a normal attack from an opponent's figure, you may move any 2 Haradrim Infantry you control up to 4 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: If a Haradrim Infantryman has extreme height advantage on an opponent's figure, he may add 4 to his Range when attacking that figure. No more than 2 Haradrim Infantry may use Lob Weapons per turn.
ability_3_desc: Haradrim Infantry are never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Hala Jax
ability_1_desc: Once per round, before moving Hala Jax, you may remove her from the battlefield and replace her with a QFP figure. You must place the other QFP figures adjacent to the first. Transfer all Order Markers from this card to the QFP Army Card, and immediately take a turn with the QFP.
ability_2_desc: If you revealed an Order Marker on the QFP Army Card this turn, after moving and before attacking you may replace a QFP with Hala Jax. Remove all other QFPs from the battlefield and move any unrevealed Order Markers from the QFP Army Card to this card. You may immediately take a turn with Hala Jax, during which she may only attack. Hala Jax rolls 2 additional attack dice on that turn.

name: Gwillar Greymire
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, before placing order markers, you may destroy up to 3 Squad figures you control and place a Blood marker on the Army Card of each destroyed figure. For the duration of the game, when a Squad figure with a Blood marker on its card that is within 3 clear sight spaces of Gwillar Greymire rolls attack dice for a normal attack, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Tribal Blood Pact can only be used once for each attack roll.
ability_2_desc: After Gwillar Greymire rolls attack dice against a normal attack and is not destroyed, you may choose a friendly figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Gwillar Greymire and place him on an unoccupied space adjacent to that figure. Gwillar Greymire never takes leaving engagement attacks when moving with Evasive Leap.

name: Gwillar Greymire
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, before placing order markers, you may destroy up to 3 Squad figures you control and place a Blood marker on the Army Card of each destroyed figure. For the duration of the game, when a Squad figure with a Blood marker on its card that is within 3 clear sight spaces of Gwillar Greymire rolls attack dice for a normal attack, you may re-roll all attack dice that did not show skulls. Tribal Blood Pact can only be used once for each attack roll.
ability_2_desc: After Gwillar Greymire rolls attack dice against a normal attack and is not destroyed, you may choose a friendly figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Gwillar Greymire and place him on an unoccupied space adjacent to that figure. Gwillar Greymire never takes leaving engagement attacks when moving with Evasive Leap.

name: Hawkeye
ability_1_desc: When Hawkeye attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Hawkeye, or any other figure within 4 clear sight spaces, is targeted for a normal attack from a non-adjacent opponent, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, the target figure and any figures adjacent to it no longer have any visible hit zones for the duration of the attacking figure's turn.

name: Hattori Hajime
ability_1_desc: If an opponent's figure moves onto a space within 2 clear line of sight spaces of Hattori Hajime, and its base is no more than 2 levels above Hattori's height or its height no more than 2 levels below Hattori's base, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 14 or higher, the opponent's figure receives one wound. Hattori cannot use Naginata Strike on the same figure more than once during a single move.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack. If the attacking figure is within 2 clear line of sight spaces of Hattori Hajime, and its base is no more than 2 levels above Hattori's height or its height no more than 2 levels below Hattori's base, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work against other Samurai.

name: Heavy Stormtrooper
ability_1_desc: If this unit has not moved this turn or used a special ability add +1 attack die.

name: Haradrim Mûmakil
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game you may place any number of small or medium figures you control onto the spaces on this Mûmakil instead of the Start Zone. Those spaces are considered to be on the same level as this Mûmakil's height. If this Mûmakil is destroyed, all figures on its Howdah must fall onto the spaces it previously occupied. Falling damage will apply for nonflying figures.
ability_2_desc: This Mûmakil can move through all small, medium, and large figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with a small, medium, or large figure. After moving with this Mûmakil, you must roll the 20-sided die for every figure it moved through this turn. If you roll a 16 or higher that figure receives a wound.

name: Hank Henshaw
ability_1_desc: Before moving, you may choose any unique Robot or Soulborg figure adjacent to Hank Henshaw. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, take control of the chosen figure's card and all figures on it for the rest of the game. Remove any order markers on that card.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 4. After attacking normally, Hank may attack with Heat Vision Special Attack. When attacking with Heat Vision Special Attack, you may re-roll any one die that did not show a skull.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Hank's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hawkman
ability_1_desc: When Hawkman attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Hawkman rolls defense dice, if Hawkgirl is within 4 clear sight spaces he may re-roll any one defense die.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Hawkman's movement, ignore elevations. Hawkman may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Hawkman starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hawkgirl
ability_1_desc: If Hawkgirl inflicts a wound on a Unique Demon, Mystic, Undead or Wizard figure, you may remove all unrevealed Order Markers from that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. When Hawkgirl attacks with her Fierce Swing Special Attack, she may attack 1 additional time.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Hawkgirl's movement, ignore elevations. Hawkgirl may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Hawkgirl starts to fly, if she is engaged she will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Heart-Of-Clubs Harlequins
ability_1_desc: If a Heart-Of-Clubs Harlequin wounds a figure with an adjacent attack, it may attack again as long as it attacks a nonadjacent figure. If a Heart-Of-Clubs Harlequin wounds a figure with a nonadjacent attack, it may move up to 4 spaces and attack again, as long as it attacks an adjacent figure. A single Harlequin can only attack one additional time per turn and never takes any leaving engagement attacks while moving with Bloody Giddiness.

name: Haya
ability_1_desc: When attacking a nonadjacent opponent's figure, if Haya does not inflict one or more wounds, you may move one Ninja you control who is within 8 clear sight spaces of Haya up to 4 spaces. If that Ninja moves into engagement with the opponent's figure Haya attacked, that Ninja may immediately attack the opponent's figure, if possible, with a normal attack. You cannot use Feint Attack to move Haya.
ability_2_desc: If Haya is attacking an adjacent figure, add 1 die to Haya's attack.
ability_3_desc: Haya can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Haradrim Soldiers
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Haradrim Soldiers, you may first take a turn with any Warlord you control.
ability_2_desc: If all your Order Markers are on Haradrim Army Cards, you may add 1 to your initiative roll for every Order Marker on Haradrim Soldiers, up to a maximum of +3 for Initiative Advantage.

name: High Elf Warriors
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with High Elf Warriors, you may first take a turn with any Elf Champion you control.

name: HEKATIANE
ability_1_desc: All Small and Medium figures within 6 clear sight spaces of Hekatiane subtract 2 from their Attack and Defense values, to a minimum of 1. Hekatiane subtracts 1 from her Attack and Defense values for every 4 figures affected by Wither Aura, to a maximum of -3 dice.
ability_2_desc: Before attacking, you may choose one friendly Squad figure and one opponent's Squad figure who are both within 6 clear sight spaces of Hekatiane. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 6 or higher, destroy both Squad figures.
ability_3_desc: Hekatiane can move through Small and Medium figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with small and medium figures.

name: Vision
ability_1_desc: When Vision attacks an adjacent figure, if at least one skull is rolled, you may roll one extra attack die and add it to Vision's attack. You may continue to add extra attack dice one at a time as long as a skull is rolled on each extra die. Vision can receive a maximum of 3 extra attack dice for High-Density Attack.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Vision's movement, ignore elevations. Vision may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Vision starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Herman Stites
ability_1_desc: If Herman Stites inflicts a wound on a Unique Hero place one Hyper Venom Marker on that figure's Army Card.
ability_2_desc: When a figure with a Hyper Venom Marker reveals an Order Marker place a Hyper Venom Marker on that figure's Army Card. If a figure has 3 Hyper Venom Markers on its Army Card destroy it immediately.
ability_3_desc: A figure with a Hyper Venom Marker on its army card may not attack a non-adjacent figure.

name: Herdis Fireblood
ability_1_desc: If there is at least 1 wound marker on this army card, Herdis Fireblood and all friendly Dwarf Squad figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Herdis add 1 die to their normal attack. This power is negated for the entire game if Herdis Fireblood receives one or more wounds from a friendly figure.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, Herdis Fireblood may double her Height.

name: Kryptonite
ability_1_desc: Green Kryptonite is the most common form of Kryptonite and occurred both as a metallic ore and crystalline forms. Green Kryptonite will quickly strip a Kryptonian of their superpowers and if exposed long enough kill them turning their corpse green. However, Green Kryptonite is harmless to non superpowered Kryptonians and humans.
ability_2_desc: Long term exposure to Green Kryptonite will produce cancer in humans as demonstrated by Lex Luthor who put a piece into a ring he wore to ward off Superman. After several months the radiation produced cancer that forced Luthor to amputate the limb and eventually transplant his brain into a clone body.

name: Teleportation Device
ability_1_desc: The Teleportation Device can only be used once during a round.
ability_2_desc: Instead of moving normally a figure holding the Teleportation Device may choose any empty space that is within 10 spaces of that figure. Place the figure on the chosen space. When a figure starts to Teleport, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks. (In the case of a double space figure both empty spaces must be within 10 spaces.) Afterwards add 1 wound to that figure's card, unless that character is a Makluan. The Mandarin, as well as any Scientist or Mastermind figures, may roll the 20-sided die. If they roll an 11 or higher they do not add a wound.

name: Hideki Eiji
ability_1_desc: When attacking a small or medium figure, if the first die you roll is a skull, the opponent cannot roll any defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a Normal Attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure. This power does not work on other Samurai.

name: Wendigo
ability_1_desc: When Wendigo attacks, add 1 automatic skull for each 2 skulls rolled in the attack.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking, choose up to 2 small or medium figures adjacent to Wendigo. One at a time roll the 20 sided die for each chosen figure. If you roll an 11 or higher the chosen figure receives one wound and you may move the figure 1 space. Figures moved by Wendigo's Wild Swat never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_3_desc: When defending against an attack from an adjacent figure, if there are no other figures engaged with Wendigo, add 1 to his defense dice. When defending against an attack from a non-adjacent figure, if Wendigo is unengaged, add 1 to his defense dice.

name: High Dune Scorpions
ability_1_desc: When attacking, if a High Dune Scorpion rolls skulls on all attack dice, the defending figure rolls 1 less defense dice.
ability_2_desc: When defending against an attack from a Small, Medium or Large figure, High Dune Scorpions add 1 to their defense.
ability_3_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, High Dune Scorpions may triple their height.

name: Henchmen
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, declare which of your Unique Heroes is the 'Boss' of the Henchmen. Before taking a turn with the Henchmen, you may take a turn with that Hero. Henchmen adjacent to the Boss may add 1 attack die if not using Gang Warfare.
ability_2_desc: Henchmen may combine their Attacks into a single die roll, providing that all Henchmen are in range and have LOS to the target.
ability_3_desc: If the 'Boss' is adjacent to a Henchman and is about to be attacked, roll a 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may direct the attack at an adjacent Henchman figure instead.

name: Herok
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Herok may use Trampling Charge. Trampling Charge has a move of 6. When moving with Trampling Charge, Herok must move in a straight line and can not move up levels of terrain. Herok can move through all small or medium figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with a small or medium figure while moving with Trampling Charge. After moving with Trampling Charge, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure Herok moved through this turn. If you roll a 11 or higher, that figure receives a wound.
ability_2_desc: Herak adds 1 automatic skull to whatever is rolled when attacking any figure that was at least 4 clear sight spaces away from him at the start of his turn.

name: Hezrou Demolishers
ability_1_desc: Adjacent figures figures roll one less attack and defense die against Hezrou Demolishers. Stench does not affect Constructs, Soulborgs, Undead, or Warforged.
ability_2_desc: At the start of the game, place 2 copper exoskeleton marker on Hezrou Demolishers Army Card for each Hezrou Demolisher figure in your Army. After a Hezrou Demolisher rolls defense dice against a normal attack, you may remove 1 exoskeleton marker from its Army Card to ignore all wounds inflicted by that attack.

name: Deadman
ability_1_desc: Deadman can never be placed on the battlefield. At the start of the game, place Deadman's figure on the Army Card of any other Unique Hero you control. If a figure is destroyed while Deadman is on its card, immediately place Deadman on the Army Card of any other Unique Hero you control. If you do not control any other Unique Heroes on the battlefield, destroy Deadman and remove his figure from the game.
ability_2_desc: When taking a turn with Deadman, you may move Deadman by placing his figure on the Army Card of any Unique Hero that is within 5 spaces of the figure that currently has Deadman on its card.
ability_3_desc: Range Special. Attack 5. Choose the figure that currently has Deadman on its Army Card, or any figure adjacent to that figure, to attack with Deadman's Possession Special Attack and roll 5 attack dice. The defending figure can only roll a number of defense dice equal to the Defense value on their army card. If the defending figure rolls any excess shields, place 1 wound marker on this card and immediately move Deadman to the Army Card of any Unique Hero you control.

name: Helmed Horrors
ability_1_desc: At the start of the game, choose a small or medium Unique Sorcerer, Arachnomancer, Warwitch, or Wizard Hero you control to be the Creator of all your Helmed Horrors. If their chosen Creator does not follow Utgar or Valkrill, roll the 20-sided die once for each squad of Helmed Horrors you control. If you roll a 1-2, the chosen Creator takes 1 wound.
ability_2_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card, you may first take a turn with the Creator of your Helmed Horors. The Helmed Horrors add 2 attack dice when they are within 2 clear sight spaces of their Creator.
ability_3_desc: If their chosen Creator is destroyed, remove all Helmed Horrors you control from the battlefield.

name: HIPPOGRIFF
ability_1_desc: When a Hippogriff attacks, it may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal or special attack, a Hippogriff always adds 1 automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for a Hippogriff's movement, ignore elevations. A Hippogriff may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When a Hippogriff starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hobbit Assassin
ability_1_desc: When Hobbit Assassin attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: If Hobbit Assassin or any Ninja within 4 spaces of Hobbit Assassin is attacked and at least 1 skull is rolled, roll the 20-sided die to vanish. If you roll a 11 or higher, the defending figure takes no damage and you may immediately move Hobbit Assassin and the defending figure up to 4 spaces. Figures can vanish only if it ends its vanishing move not adjacent to any enemy figures. Cannot be combined with Vanish or Disappering Ninja.
ability_3_desc: Hobbit Assassin can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Fallen Phalanx
ability_1_desc: When the Claws Of Hades Treasure Glyph is added to the game, if the Fallen Phalanx weren't in any army at the start of the game, add this card and the Fallen Phalanx to the game and then destroy all Fallen Phalanx figures.
ability_2_desc: Before any friendly or enemy figure takes a turn, if the Claws Of Hades Treasure Glyph is on the figure's Army Card, the figure's controller gains permanent control of this card and the Fallen Phalanx.
ability_3_desc: When rolling defense dice for any figure adjacent to a friendly figure with the Shield Formation special power, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Holler of Chaos
ability_1_desc: When rolling the 20-sided die for any figure within 3 clear sight spaces of this Holler Of Chaos, subtract 3 from the roll. Figures with the Mindless Personality are not affected by Sanity Drain.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with this Holler Of Chaos, roll the 20-sided die for every figure within 3 clear sight spaces, adding 3 to your roll if that figure is a Squad figure. If you roll a 19 or higher, you may temporarily take control of that figure and immediately make a normal attack with that figure. After attacking, return control of that figure to its previous owner. Figures with the Mindless Personality are not affected by Madness Shriek.

name: Sleestak Raiders
ability_1_desc: Start the game with only three Sleestak Raiders on the battlefield. Before taking a turn, you may place up to three Sleestak Raiders, one at a time, on any empty space within 4 clear sight spaces of a Sleestak you control. You may place it up to 8 spaces instead if the space is dungeon or shadow. You may never have more than three Sleestak Raiders on the battlefield.
ability_2_desc: After moving a Sleestak Raider with normal movement, you may place it on any empty same-level or lower dungeon or shadow space within 5 spaces and add 2 to its Attack value. If a Sleestak Raider is engaged when it starts to tunnel, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Honored Soul Guides
ability_1_desc: Once per game, before placing Order Markers at the start of any round, you may choose one of your previously destroyed Unique Human Heroes to be the Honored Soul Guides' Revenant. Remove all wound markers from the Revenant's Army Card and place the Revenant adjacent to a Soul Guide you control. After revealing an Order Marker on this card and taking a turn with the Soul Guides, you may take a turn with the Revenant.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with the Revenant, if it is not adjacent to a Soul Guide you control, destroy the Revenant and all Soul Guides you control.
ability_3_desc: Soul Guides do not take falling damage and may ignore all effects from terrain tiles they move onto or occupy.

name: Elsa of Arendelle
ability_1_desc: All snow spaces within 2 spaces of Elsa are considered Heavy Snow and all land spaces within 2 spaces of Elsa that aren't lava are considered snow spaces. All water spaces within 2 spaces of Elsa are considered ice spaces. When moving, Elsa may count Heavy Snow and Slippery Ice as 1 space each. When attacking, if the defending figure is on snow or ice, Elsa may roll 1 additional attack die.
ability_2_title: Do You Want to Build a Snowman 11
ability_2_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Elsa, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll an 11 or higher, remove all wound markers from the Army Card of any previously destroyed Snowman and place the Snowman figure on any empty space adjacent to Elsa. Elemental figures with the Ice Cold special power count as Snowman figures.
ability_3_desc: When Elsa or any friendly figure on a snow or ice space within 6 spaces of Elsa rolls defense dice against a normal attack by a nonadjacent figure, add 2 automatic shields to whatever is rolled.

name: The Headless Horseman
ability_1_desc: At any point while moving, the Headless Horseman may choose a medium figure that is adjacent, and on the same level as the Horseman. If the chosen figure is a Squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a Hero figure, roll the 20 sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, destroy the chosen Hero. The Horseman can only use Decapitate once during his move. You may continue the Horseman's movement after using Decapitate.
ability_2_desc: Range 5. Attack 3. The Headless Horseman cannot attack using his Pumpkin Throw Special Attack on the same turn he uses Decapitate.
ability_3_desc: The Headless Horseman can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Huatzin
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 3. All figures adjacent to Huatzin are affected by Shimmering Warp Special Attack. Roll attack dice once for all figures. After a figure rolls defense dice against Shimmering Warp Special Attack, the owner of that figure must place it on an empty space within 4 spaces of its original position. The figure cannot be placed adjacent to Huatzin.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for Huatzin's movement, ignore elevations. Huatzin may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Huatzin starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Honored Soul-Guides
ability_1_desc: At the start of any round, before placing Order Markers, you may choose one of your previously destroyed small or medium Unique Heroes. Place or remove wounds from that Hero's Army Card so that it has 1 Life remaining, then destroy an Honored Soul Guide you control and replace it with the chosen Hero. At the end of the round, negate that Hero's powers for the entire game and destroy that Hero.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for an Honored Soul-Guide's movement, ignore elevations. An Honored Soul-Guide may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If an Honored Soul-Guide is engaged when it starts to fly, it will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hrath Silverstone
ability_1_desc: All small or medium figures you control within 3 clear sight spaces of Hrath Silverstone add 1 to their defense dice when rolling defense against an attack from a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill. Hrath Silverstone's Greater Protection from Evil Aura does not affect Hrath Silverstone.
ability_2_desc: Range 4. Attack 4. Holy Word Special Attack can only be used to attack Undead or Demon figures.
ability_3_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on a wounded Hero figure you control that is adjacent to Hrath Silverstone, and before using any other special powers on any Army Card or Glyph, you may first roll the 20-sided die. Add 4 to your roll if the Hero is a Dwarf. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove up to 2 wound markers from that Hero's Army Card.

name: KRATOS
ability_1_desc: Each time Kratos destroys an opponent's Unique Hero, place a Godly Artifact Glyph on this card to a maximum of five Glyphs this game. Kratos cannot drop Godly Artifacts.
ability_2_desc: If an opponent's figure is within 3 spaces of Kratos, and its base is no more than 4 levels above Kratos's height or 4 levels below Kratos's base, Kratos may add 2 to his Range when attacking that figure with a normal attack.
ability_3_desc: When Kratos attacks with a normal or special attack, if he rolls at least two skulls, he may attack one additional time. Kratos may continue attacking with normal or special attacks until he doesn't roll at least two skulls to a maximum of three additional times.
ability_4_desc: At the start of each of your turns after Kratos has been destroyed, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 18 or higher, place Kratos on any empty space that is no higher than any figure's base and immediately remove all wound markers from this card. Each time Kratos is destroyed and is your only figure on the battlefield, roll for Climb From Tartarus.

name: Humphrey
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Any figure adjacent to Humphrey is affected by the Astral Stomp Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.
ability_2_desc: When friendly figures within 3 clear sight spaces of Humphrey receives one or more wounds from a leaving engagement attack, immeditaly roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 11 or higher, ignore any wounds from that leaving engagement attack.
ability_3_desc: Humphrey add 3 additional defense dice when rolling defense against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent. Humphrey can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Huntress Fionn
ability_1_desc: Range 2, Attack 2. Instead of a normal attack, Huntress Fionn may immediately move one space to become adjacent to the target, and attack with 2 attack dice. Huntress Fionn must not be engaged when she begins her Pounce, and must be 2 spaces away from the target before using Pounce. Small, medium, and large figures roll 1 less defense die against Pounce Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: Huntress Fionn rolls 1 extra defense die when being attacked by a Huge figure.

name: HUMPHREY
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 3. Any figure adjacent to Humphrey is affected by the Astral Stomp Special Attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately.
ability_2_desc: When a friendly figure within 3 clear sight spaces of Humphrey receives one or more wounds from a leaving engagement attack, immediatly roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 9 or higher, ignore any wounds from that leaving engagement attack.
ability_3_desc: Humphrey adds 3 additional defense dice when rolling defense against a normal attack from a figure who is not adjacent. Humphrey can move through all figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement.

name: Incredible Hulk
ability_1_desc: When Incredible Hulk attacks using a normal attack, he recieves one extra attack die for each Wound Marker he has, up to a maximum of 5 extra attack die for Rage Smash.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Hulk may use Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10. When counting spaces for Super Leap movement, ignore elevations. Hulk may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Hulk may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Hulk is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Hulk rolls 3 fewer attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap.
ability_3_desc: Range 1, Attack 3. Any figure adjacent to Hulk is affected by this special attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately. Hulk cannot use this special attack and Super Leap in the same turn.

name: Hydra Agents
ability_1_desc: When a HYDRA Agent you control attacks, before defense dice are rolled you may re-roll 1 attack die for each Terrorist Hero you control within 4 clear sight spaces of that HYDRA Agent. You may only use this power once per attack.
ability_2_desc: If a HYDRA Agent you control is destroyed this turn, all HYDRA Agents you control add 1 to their Defense for the duration of this turn.

name: Faux Hydra Custom
ability_1_desc: When attacking with Faux Hydra Custom, all skulls rolled count for one additional hit.
ability_2_desc: After taking a turn with Faux Hydra Custom, you may place a wound marker on Faux Hydra Custom and take another turn with him. You may only use this power once during a round.

name: Incredible Hulk
ability_1_desc: When Incredible Hulk attacks using a normal attack, he recieves one extra attack die for each Wound Marker he has, up to a maximum of 5 extra attack die for Rage Smash.
ability_2_desc: Instead of his normal move, Hulk may use Super Leap. Super Leap has a move of 10. When counting spaces for Super Leap movement, ignore elevations. Hulk may leap over water without stopping, leap over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Hulk may not leap more than 50 levels up or down in a single leap. If Hulk is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks. Hulk rolls 3 fewer attack dice on any turn that he chooses to Super Leap.
ability_3_desc: Range 1, Attack 3. Any figure adjacent to Hulk is affected by this special attack. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense separately. Hulk cannot use this special attack and Super Leap in the same turn.

name: Hurricane
ability_1_desc: Hurricane may attack again for each wound marker on his card up to a maximum of 4 additional attacks.
ability_2_desc: Before moving or attacking, Hurricane may use Monsoon. All small and medium figures adjacent to Hurricane must move 3 spaces away, ignoring elevation. Each figure is moved by the controlling player and may not move adjacent to Hurricane. Falling damage will apply. Monsoon may only be used once per round.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Hurricane's movement, ignore elevations. Hurricane may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. If Hurricane is engaged when he starts to fly, he will receive any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ice Archons
ability_1_desc: An Ice Archon on a snow or ice space rolls 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: While an Ice Archon is on a water space, that water space is treated like an ice space. When an Ice Archon moves off a water space, that water space is no longer treated like an ice space.
ability_3_desc: An Ice Archon on a Lava Space rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: Human Torch
ability_1_desc: Human Torch has Heat Resistance. At the start of each round, you may place a Flame Marker on this Army Card. While a Flame Marker is on this card, Human Torch has Flying and Water Weakness, and adds 3 to his Move, Range, Attack, and Defense Values. Remove a Flame Marker from this card if Human Torch is on a water space. A maximum of 1 Flame Marker can be placed on this card.
ability_2_desc:
After revealing an order marker on Human Torch's Army Card, before taking his turn, if you control exactly 3 other figures with the Fantastic Four special power, you may either:
• Move each of those figures up to 5 spaces each; or
• Take a turn with one of those figures.
ability_3_desc: When a figure that does not have Heat Resistance rolls for a leaving engagement attack against Human Torch and does not roll at least one skull, if a Flame Marker is on this card, that figure receives 1 wound, plus an additional wound if that figure has Heat Weakness.
ability_4_desc: Instead of taking a turn with Human Torch, you may remove a Flame Marker from this card. If you do, you must roll the 20-sided die once for each figure that does not have Heat Resistance within 3 clear sight spaces of Human Torch. Add 4 to your roll when rolling for a figure with Heat Weakness. If you roll an 12 or higher, that figure receives a wound.

name: HYOUSUKE
ability_1_desc: Once per turn, Hyousuke may use Utility Chain to use one of the following abilities: • Utility Chain Special Attack: Range 1 Attack 4. Utility Chain Special Attack affects all figures adjacent to Hyousuke. Roll attack dice once. Each figure rolls defense dice separately. • Reach: Hyousuke may add 3 to his Range number this turn. • Trip: Hyousuke may move through all figures he was engaged with at the start of his Move, and those figures cannot take any leaving engagement attacks against Hyousuke this turn. • Bind: After moving and before attacking, choose a figure adjacent to Hyousuke and roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, remove one unrevealed Order Marker on the chosen figure's Army Card.

name: Ibixian Ridge Raiders
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with Ibixian Ridge Raiders, you may first take a turn with any medium or large Beast you control.
ability_2_desc: An Ibixian Ridge Raider rolls 1 additional attack die if at least 2 other friendly Ibixian figures are within 2 clear sight spaces.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for movement (including height limits for climbing and falling), ignore up to 3 levels of elevation per hex. Any remaining levels are counted normally. This ability does not apply to movement on ladders.

name: I.
ability_1_desc: After moving and before attacking, you may choose any figure within 7 clear sight spaces of I. Roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 10 or higher, the controlling player must place the chosen figure back in its Start Zone. If that figure cannot be placed back in a Start Zone, destroy that figure. The chosen figure will take any leaving engagement attacks. If I. successfully Desummons a Squad figure, he may choose another figure and roll again for Desummon.
ability_2_desc: When counting spaces for I.'s movement, ignore elevations. I. can fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When I. starts to fly, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Ibaraki-Doji
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. After attacking with Demon of Rashomon Special Attack, Ibaraki-doji may move up to 4 spaces and attack one additional time with Demon of Rashomon Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: At the end of each round, if there are no revealed Order Markers on this Army Card, place one wound marker on this card.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Ibaraki-doji's movement, ignore elevations. Ibaraki-doji may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Ibaraki-doji starts to fly, if he is engaged, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Hiro
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Hiro causes a wound, you may immediately look at all order markers on that figure's card.
ability_3_desc: When rolling attack or defence dice against an adjacent figure, Hiro always adds one automatic skull or shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Imperial Officers
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Imperial Officers, you may take a turn with a squad of Stormtroopers you control before taking a turn with Imperial Officers. The Stormtroopers cannot move during this turn.

name: Illithid Hunters
ability_1_desc: When attacking a Mind Flayer, an Illithid Hunter may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: Illithid Hunters cannot be targetted by a non-adjacent attack while engaged with an opponent.
ability_3_desc: An Illithid Hunter adds one attack and defense die for each friendly figure that is currently engaged with same figure that he is engaged with up to a maximum of 3 dice.

name: Imladris Sentinels
ability_1_desc: An Imladris Sentinel you control may move 1 additional space, but that figure must end its movement adjacent to a friendly squad figure of Imladris.
ability_2_desc: All friendly figures adjacent to an Imladris Sentinel add 1 to their defense.

name: Hiro Protagonist
ability_1_desc: When rolling defense dice against a normal attack from an adjacent attacking figure, all excess shields count as unblockable hits on the attacking figure.
ability_2_desc: Whenever Hiro causes a wound, you may immediately look at all order markers on that figure's card.
ability_3_desc: When rolling attack or defence dice against an adjacent figure, Hiro always adds one automatic skull or shield to whatever is rolled.

name: Intergang Agents
ability_1_desc: Non-adjacent figures attacked by an Intergang Agent subtract 2 from their defense dice.

name: IMPACT
ability_1_desc: Whenever Impact successfully defends against an attack from an adjacent figure, you may move that figure and Impact one space. Figures moved by Fierce Parry never take leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When attacking with Impact, if the defending figure was not adjacent to Impact at the start of this turn, Impact receives 2 additional attack dice.
ability_3_desc: When defending against a normal or special attack, Impact always adds one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.

name: IDINIA
ability_1_desc: At the start of each round, before you place order markers, you may chose to activate Scion of Winter Aura for the duration of the round. While Scion of Winter Aura is active, the space Idina is on and all spaces within 4 spaces of Idina are considered heavy snow spaces if they are land spaces, or slippery ice spaces if they are non-land spaces. Molten lava spaces and lava field spaces are not affected by Scion of Winter Aura.
ability_2_desc: When Idina rolls defense dice against a normal attack, if Idina's Scion of Winter Aura is not active, one shield will block all damage.
ability_3_desc: Slippery Ice and Heavy Snow only count as 1 space when moving.

name: Incredible Hulk
