Roll 2 attack dice once for all affected figures. Figures roll 1 less defense die when defending against the Bio Shock Gun Special Attack and each figure rolls defense dice separately. A Marrden Shocker can be affected by its own Bio Shock Gun Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: When moving up or down levels of terrain, a Marrden Shocker may double its Height.

name: Marcu Esenwein
ability_1_desc: Marcu Esenwein starts the game with one red Revenge Marker on his Army Card. If Marcu Esenwein receives one or more wounds from an opponent's figure, you may place the Revenge Marker on that figure's Army Card. Once all the figures on that Army Card have been destroyed return the Revenge Marker to this Army Card. If Marcu Esenwein is attacking a figure with a Revenge Marker on its Army Card, roll 2 additional attack dice.
ability_2_desc: Each time Marcu Esenwein destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. Marcu Esenwein cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Marcu Esenwein's movement ignore elevations. Marcu Esenwein may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Marcu Esenwein starts to fly, if he is engaged he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Marcu Esenwein Uncursed
ability_1_desc: If you control Marcu Esenwein Uncursed, you must also have Marcu Esenwein in your Army. At the beginning of the game, do not place Marcu Esenwein on the battlefield. Instead, at the beginning of every round, after placing Order Markers, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 1-3, you must destroy this figure and replace him with Marcu Esenwein. Move all wound markers and Order Markers from this card to the Army Card of Marcu Esenwein.
ability_2_desc: Each time Marcu Esenwein Uncursed destroys a figure, you may remove a wound marker from this Army Card. He cannot Life Drain destructible objects.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Marcu Esenwein Uncursed's movement, ignore elevations. He may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When he starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: GODZILLA
ability_1_desc: Range Special. Attack 5. Choose 8 spaces in a straight line from Godzilla. All figures on those spaces who are in line of sight are affected by Godzilla's Atomic Fire Line Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: Before moving, choose one medium or small figure adjacent to and on the same level as Godzilla. If the chosen figure is a small figure or a medium squad figure, destroy it. If the chosen figure is a medium hero figure, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, destroy the chosen figure.
ability_3_desc: After you take a turn with Godzilla roll the 20-sided die. If you roll 19 or higher, you may take another turn with Godzilla.

name: Mary Marvel
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 5. Any figure adjacent to Mary Marvel is affected by Shazam! Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each figure rolls defense dice separately.
ability_2_desc: After revealing Order Marker 1 on this card and taking a turn with Mary Marvel, you may take one additional turn, either with her or with another figure with the Shazam! Special Attack that you control.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Mary Marvel's movement, ignore elevations. Mary Marvel may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged and fly over obstacles. When Mary Marvel starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Brunnhilde, Valkyrie
ability_1_desc: When attacking an adjacent figure, the defending figure can't use special powers.
ability_2_desc: Each time a friendly figure that's adjacent to Valkyrie is destroyed, you may place that figure on this card and then destroy Valkyrie. At the beginning of each round, before placing order markers, if Valkyrie is destroyed with four or fewer wounds on her Army Card, you may roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 12 or higher, remove all wounds from the Army Cards of all figures on this card and then place Valkyrie and all figures on this card onto empty spaces on the battlefield.
ability_3_desc: Each time Valkyrie is destroyed, you may place this figure on any friendly Unique Female Hero Army Card. Valkyrie's Spirit adds 2 to the Life and Attack value and 1 to the Move and Defense value of that Army Card. When placed, remove all order markers from the card. The hero's name is Valkyrie while this figure is on its card.

name: Master Grezth
ability_1_desc: After revealing Order Marker 1 on Master Grezth, before moving you may choose an opponent's figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Master Grezth. Place the Negation marker on that figure's Army Card. All of that figure's special powers are negated until the marker is removed. (If the player has more than one common card for that figure, all of those cards are affected by the Negation marker.) Remove the Negation marker at the end of the round or when Master Grezth is destroyed.
ability_2_desc: Instead of attacking with Master Grezth, you may choose a figure within 6 clear sight spaces that is not a destructible object. Roll the 20-sided die. If the figure is a friendly figure, add the Attack number of the chosen figure's Army Card. If you roll a 15 or higher, you may place one wound on any figure adjacent to the chosen figure.

name: Foot Soldier
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on this card and before taking a turn with Foot Soldiers, you may first take a turn with any Foot Clan Master or Assassin Unique Hero you control
ability_2_desc: You may attack with any 3 Foot Soldiers, even Foot Soldiers that you did not move this turn.

name: Meliador
ability_1_desc: Range 6 Attack 3. Figures attacked by Evicorating Winds Special Attack subtract 2 from their defense dice. Destructible objects are not affected by Evicorating Winds Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After rolling defense dice against an opponent's special attack if Meliador has 3 or less Wound Markers on his Army Card he may then immediately attack that opponent's figure with Evicorating Winds Special Attack if it is within 6 clear sight spaces.

name: MCU Detectives
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with MCU Detectives, you may move a Lawman hero you control or up to 3 other Lawman squad figures you control up to 5 spaces each.
ability_2_desc: MCU Detectives roll one additional die against figures leaving an engagement with them.

name: Merry
ability_1_desc: When Merry attacks an adjacent figure engaged to at least one other figure you control, add one automatic skull to whatever you roll.
ability_2_desc: Merry adds 1 to his Attack when attacking Medium or larger figures and is never attacked when leaving an engagement with Medium or larger figures.

name: Master Win Chiu Woo
ability_1_desc: All Monk Squad figures you control may leap an additional 13 levels up or down when using their Stealth Leap special power. All Monks you control within 2 clear sight spaces of Master Win Chiu Woo add 1 to their attack dice and 1 to their defense dice.
ability_2_desc: Master Win Chiu Woo may attack any or all figures adjacent to him. Roll each attack separately.
ability_3_desc: Instead of his normal move, Master Win Chiu Woo may use Stealth Leap 25. Stealth Leap 25 has a move of 3. When counting spaces for Stealth Leap 25, ignore elevations. Master Win Chiu Woo may leap over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and leap over obstacles such as ruins. Master Win Chiu Woo may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Master Win Chiu Woo is engaged when he starts his Stealth Leap 25, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: MAXIMA
ability_1_desc: Range 6. Attack 2. Figures cannot roll defense dice against Psi-Blast Special Attack. No clear line of sight is needed. Figures with the Mental Shielding special power, Robots and destructible objects cannot be attacked with Psi-Blast Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: After you take a turn with Maxima, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 16 or higher, you may take another turn with Maxima.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Maxima's movement, ignore elevations. Maxima may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Maxima starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Merfolk Shore Raiders
ability_1_desc: Before taking a turn with the Merfolk Shore Raiders, you may first take a turn with a Merfolk hero you control.
ability_2_desc: When a Merfolk Shore Raider is adjacent to a figure with a wound marker on its Army Card, that Merfolk Shore Raider adds 1 to its Attack and subtracts 1 from its Defense.
ability_3_desc: Merfolk Shore Raiders do not have to stop their movement when entering a water space.

name: Hercules
ability_1_desc: Instead of his normal move, Hercules may use Standing Leap. Standing Leap has a move of 1. When counting spaces for Hercules' Standing Leap movement, ignore elevations. Hercules may not leap more than 25 levels up or down in a single leap. If Hercules is engaged when he starts to leap, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mazirek, Kraul Necromancer
ability_1_desc: When counting movement spaces for Mazirek, ignore elevations. Mazirek may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Mazirek starts to fly, he will take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: Once per turn, you may destroy target squad creature adjacent to Mazirek to add a Skull marker to this army card. Black and Green creatures within 4 clear sight spaces of Mazirek get +1X, and +1🛡 for each Skull marker on this army card.
ability_3_desc: Before taking a turn with Mazirek, you may first take a turn with a Kraul hero or squad you control.

name: Storm
ability_1_desc: Figures that have the Flying or Stealth Flying special power subtract 1 from their defense dice when attacked by Storm.
ability_2_desc: Range 3. Attack 3. Choose up to two figures to be affected by Storm's Cyclone Wind Special Attack. Affected figures must be within 2 spaces of each other. Roll 3 attack dice once for all affected figures. Affected figures roll defense dice separately. After attacking, you may move any affected small and medium figures that did not roll any excess shields, up to 1 space for each skull rolled in the attack. Figures moved by Storm's Cyclone Wind Special Attack never take leaving engagement attacks and cannot ignore elevations.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Storm's movement, ignore elevations. Storm may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Storm starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Mikhlo
ability_1_desc: When Mikhlo attacks, he may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When rolling defense dice for Mikhlo, any die result that is not a skull counts as a shield.

name: Merian the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: Merian may attack any or all figures adjacent to her. Roll for each attack separately.
ability_2_desc: All Undead figures you control within 4 clear sight spaces of Merian may add 1 to their attack dices.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Merian's movement, ignore elevations. Merian may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Merian starts to fly, if he is engaged he will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Liz Sherman
ability_1_desc: Range 4. Attack 5. Choose a figure to attack within 4 clear sight spaces of Liz Sherman. Before rolling attack dice, you must roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 17 or higher, all figures within the same number of spaces as the targeted figure and within clear sight of Liz Sherman are also affected by Overwhelming Flame Special Attack. Roll 5 attack dice once for all affected figures. Each affected figure rolls defense separately. Liz Sherman, Demon figures and any figures on water spaces are not affected by Liz Sherman's Overwhelming Flame Special Attack.
ability_2_desc: If there are any Order Markers on this card, Liz Sherman and all figures you control adjacent to Liz Sherman add 1 to their defense dice.

name: The M.O.A
ability_1_desc: The Microsoft Office Assistant can change its race anytime.
ability_2_desc: Any figure you control that gets to move two extra spaces if it moves adjacent to The Microsoft Office Assistant anytime before, during, and after its movement.
ability_3_desc: After taking a turn with The Microsoft Office Assistant, you may destroy it. Any adjacent soulborgs take three wounds.

name: Plastic Man
ability_1_desc: All figures within 2 clear sight spaces of Plastic Man are considered engaged with Plastic Man.
ability_2_desc: When Plastic Man is targeted and receives one or more wounds from an attacking figure who is not adjacent, choose an opponent's figure engaged with Plastic Man. If Plastic Man is not destroyed by the attack, the chosen figure receives 1 wound.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Plastic Man's movement, ignore elevations. Plastic Man may Stretch over water without stopping, over figures without becoming engaged and over obstacles such as ruins. Plastic Man may not Stretch more than 40 levels up in a single Stretch. If Plastic Man is engaged when he starts to Stretch, he will not take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Melinda May
ability_1_desc: When attacking an opponent's adjacent figure with a normal attack, add one automatic skull to whatever is rolled. When defending against a normal attack from an adjacent figure, add one automatic shield to whatever is rolled.
ability_2_desc: When Melinda May attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_3_desc: Once per game, when an Agent figure you control is destroyed, you may immediately move all Order Markers from any and all Army Cards in your army onto this one. For the rest of that round, Melinda May rolls one additional attack die when attacking an opponent's figure.

name: Major Q1
ability_1_desc: Range 6 Attack 1 or 2 Major Q1 starts each turn with 6 attack dice. Choose any figure within range and attack by rolling 1 or 2 attack dice. Major Q1 may keep making special attacks with 1 or 2 attack dice until he has rolled all 6 attack dice. Major Q1 may target the same or different figures with each attack.
ability_2_desc: All small or medium opponent's figures that enter or occupy a space adjacent to Major Q1 may not move. Figures affected by Cyberclaw cannot be moved by any special power on any Army Card or Glyph.

name: Mirage
ability_1_desc: When any living creature attacks Mirage, she receives a +3 on her defense. When they attack a friendly figure within 4 clear line of sight hexes of Mirage, they receive a +2 on their defense.

name: Mielki the Kyrie Warrior
ability_1_desc: When Mielki attacks, she may attack one additional time.
ability_2_desc: When Mielki destroys a figure with a normal attack, you may choose a small or medium friendly figure within 4 clear sight spaces of Mielki. Remove a wound marker from the chosen figure. Mielki cannot heal herself with Spear of Sankari, and it cannot be used when destroying a destructible object.
ability_3_desc: When counting spaces for Mielki's movement, ignore elevations. Mielki may fly over water without stopping, pass over figures without becoming engaged, and fly over obstacles such as ruins. When Mielki starts to fly, if she is engaged she will take any leaving engagement attacks.

name: Microcorp Strikers
ability_1_desc: At the beginning of each round, after placing Order Markers, you may move any number of Microcorp Strikers you control up to 4 spaces each. For each Microcorp Striker moved with Stealth Tactics, subtract 2 from your initiative roll. When moving with Stealth Tactics, a Microcorp Striker does not take any leaving engagement attacks.
ability_2_desc: When an Agent in the Microcorp Strikers receives one or more wounds, before removing that Agent, roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 15 or higher, ignore any wounds.
ability_3_desc: Range 8. Attack 1. An unengaged Microcorp Striker that did not move or attack normally this turn may use HMD Targeting Special Attack. Small and medium figures targeted by HMD Targeting Special Attack reduce their base Defense to 0.

name: Mirana Silverflame
ability_1_desc: A friendly Human Knight adjacent to Mirana Silverflame adds 1 to its Defense number.
ability_2_desc: When making a normal attack on a Unique Hero, Mirana Silverflame rolls 2 additional attack dice if that Hero began the game with 4 or more Life.
ability_3_desc: Mirana Silverflame may not attack a figure that follows Jandar. If a player controls Mirana Silverflame and a figure who follows Utgar or Valkrill, destroy Mirana Silverflame.

name: Minotaur Pit Fighter
ability_1_desc: Range 1. Attack 4. Before or after attacking normally, this Minotaur Pit Fighter may attack with Gore Special attack. When a small or medium figure rolls defense dice and is not destroyed by Gore Special Attack, immediately roll the 20-sided die. If you roll a 13 or higher, you may place that figure on any empty space adjacent to this Minotaur Pit Fighter. A figure moved by Gore Special Attack never takes any leaving engagement attacks. A non-flying figure moved lower by Gore Special Attack can receive any falling damage that may apply.

name: Misan
ability_1_desc: After revealing an Order Marker on Misan's Army Card, choose an opponent's figure and roll the 20-sided die. •If you roll 1-12, nothing happens. •If you roll 13-18, remove 1 unrevealed Order Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card. •If you roll 19-20, remove all unrevealed Order Marker from the chosen figure's Army Card.
